1a1(rgyud 'grel): lhan gcig skyes pa'i glu bzhugs so// /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa hA dzo gr-I ti/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes pa'i glu/ bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal
2a1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa'i nags las me tog rab rgyas pa// me tog gcig la kha dog sna tshogs te// dpe med me tog
2a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes na phyogs las rgyal// rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang // de la rtsa ba med cing yal 'dab med// grogs dag ser
2a3(rgyud 'grel): kha bzang po'i phyogs rgyal ltos// dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal// rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig dang //
2b1(rgyud 'grel): go sar blangs pas sgyu 'phrul mkhan po yin// rdo rje dbang phyug chos kyi dbyings la mchod// dpe med me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal// rin thang med pa'i me tog long zhig
2b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mchog dang dga' bral rnam par brtags te zung // bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la gus pas mchod// dpe mod me tog skyes na phyogs las rgyal// rin zang med pa'i me tog
2b3(rgyud 'grel): long zhig dang // rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shAn+ta de bas mdzad pa rdzog so// / bla ma d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA ni'i zhabs dang / lo tsA ba rma ba na chos 'bar gyis
2b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ tat+taM swa b+hA ba driSh+Ti gI ti ka de ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba
3a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis med bdud rtsi kun 'dus grub thob kyi// dri med dgongs pa lta spyod la sogs ni// nyams len thabs de kun la phan pa'i phyir// bde gshegs rnams la phyag 'tshal bshad par bya// dngos po yang ni
3a2(rgyud 'grel): ma yin zhing // dngos med la ni ma skyes pa'i// 'di lta bu yi rang bzhin ni// su zhig gis ni rtogs par 'gyur// lU yi pa ni smra bar byed// 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che// khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang // de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med// do yi kha dog rigs dang ni//
3a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyibs kyang bdag gis rtogs pa med// de lta bu yi rang bzhin ni// dngos por ma grub ji ltar bstan// lha yi pa ni smra bar byed// 'di lta bu ni po mtshar che// khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang // de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med// bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri/
3a4(rgyud 'grel): chu gting zla ba gzugs brnyan ni// don dam sgyu mar rtogs pa med// lU yi pa ni smra bar byed// 'di lta bu ni ngo mtshar che// khams gsum gnas su longs spyod kyang // de nyid gnas ni rtogs pa med// lha yi ba ni smra bar byed// bdag gis gzhan la ji ltar dri//
3a5(rgyud 'grel): de yi rang bzhin rtogs pa med// rang bzhin b+h+r-i do ha madz+nye k+Sh+me klu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon lha yi pas mdzad pa rtogs s+ho// / rgyu gar spyad du/ bi kalpA ba ri ha ram+b+hi ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnam rtog spang ba'i g+ha zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/
3a6(rgyud 'grel): b+ho la gsang ba'i rdo rje la// 'dus pa sems kyi rang bzhin ni// thig le gsong po'i rtsal breng // kak+ko la yi kha sbyor la// kye'o re ni 'bar bar byed// kr-i pi ti yi sgra sgrogs pas// rtsa drug 'khor lo hU~M gis bcing // sku gsung d+hU tIr bdag med rtogs// rang byung me tog
3b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yi// ga pur po la bsres byas nas// ka ru ka'i bdud rtsi 'thungs par byas// ka la dzor skal bar ldan// rnal 'byor tshogs su bsre bar bya// du d+hAr skal bar mi ldan te// spongs shig rnal 'byor dam chog go// ba ni mnyam gla rtsi lus byugs nas// rtog pa rnam
3b2(rgyud 'grel): ni spang bar bya// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs dag tu// he ru kA yi nga rgyal ldan// sha ldang zhing chen khur byas nas// ma la rigs skyes bram ze la// kun tu phrad pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rtog pa mi bya lus la gnas// kye'o skal ldan mchod par gyis// laM la bdag
3b3(rgyud 'grel): med seng ge yis// stong nyid don ni rtogs par 'gyur// rnam rtog spang phyir rnal 'byor kye// bdag ni gno rgyal nyal byas nas// lag pa bsnol nas brang la sbyar// rang rig na mkha'i phyogasu gtad// li la skyes te gnyis med rtogs// rtog med rnal 'byor
3b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa thob// le la pa yis rtogs nas grol// rnam rtog spyang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon li la bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ karma tsaN+Da le ka do ha prI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ las kyi gtum mo'i ngo ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/
3b5(rgyud 'grel): don thams cad grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo// nang nas gtum mo'i me sbar bas// dbus nas bdud rtsi 'bab par byed// rang 'byung sdong bu skyes pa yi// rtse mo'i ri la phyin te gnas// mgon po'i bdud rtsi 'bab par byed// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom//
3b6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs// sangs rgyas yon tan phreng ba 'byung // bde ba chen po rgyas pa yis// thams cad kyis ni khyab par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom// gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs// rdo rjes bkos shing bgos pa
4a1(rgyud 'grel): la// nyi zla gnyis ni bsres byas nas// na mkha'i dbyings su thim par 'gyur// bde ba chen po'i grong du phyin// kun dbus sangs rgyas yon tan gyis// rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas su brtol// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom// gshin rjer 'gro ba'i
4a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa spangs// 'byung rgyu'i rlung ni bkag pa yis// rin chen gsol ba'i gnas su phyin// rtags shing rtags shing dpyad pa yis// bi rA bdag gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom// gshin rjer 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa spangs// las kyi
4a3(rgyud 'grel): gtum mo'i ngo ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha bAn dr-iSh+Ti tsAr+ya pa la do hA gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu'i ngo ha glu zhes bya thA/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
4a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po sna tshogs rang gi sems nyid yin// 'khor 'das thams cad rnal 'byor dbyer med pa// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med pa ste// dper na chu dang de yi rlabs bzhin no// dngos dang dngos min spangs pa'i sems nyid 'di// rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor skad cig gcig la
4a5(rgyud 'grel): nini// sgron me chung ngu zhig gis mun pa ltar// 'khor ba'i dug lnga rang bzhin rab rib sel/ zung 'jug bya brgya blo 'das chen po ni// bde gsal mi rtog na mkha' lta bu ste// khyab cing rgya chen snying rje chen po'i ngo// snang yang rang bzhin med pa chu zla bzhin// gsal yang tha snyad mtha'
4a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kun dang bral// gang gis ma gos dri med re dogs bral// lkugs pa'i rmi lam bzhin du sgra mi shes// tshad med bde chen rang bzhin ye shes ni// nyi zla'i 'od bzhin phyogs dang bral ba med// kye 'o rnal 'byor rang 'byung ngo mtshar che// gnyug ma ma bcos sems ni chos sku ste//
4b1(rgyud 'grel): bcos pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor thob mi 'gyur// de phyir bde ba'i phyogs su yin par mthong // rang bzhin grub pa'i lam thob rnal 'byor bde// rnam rtog bral bas zhe 'dod 'byung mi srid// rta mgrin grub thob bdag nyid sar has smras// kye 'o rnal 'byor
4b2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba'i nyams len gyis// de yi rang bzhin gang zhig sgom 'dod na// rang lus ri bo 'di ni gnas kyi mchog/ sems nyid dus kyi rnal 'byor bsgrub pa po// dbang po rnams bcings mtshams bcad bde bar 'gyur// g.yeng bya rnams kyang ched du spang mi bya//
4b3(rgyud 'grel): gtug phrad sems su shes na yi dam lha// shes pa ma bkug rtog par rims kyis spangs// sems la rnam rtog byung na rnal 'byor pas// ras bal 'dab ma bzhin du glong la zhog/ bya ba spongs la rang sems rang gis ltos// zhe 'dod byung ni bdud du shes
4b4(rgyud 'grel): par gyis// rnam rtog rnams kyi rtsa ba sems yin te// de med phyir na rnam rtog yod min no// dran pa dran med bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor te// sems 'di rtag par ma grub rang la thim// bsgom 'dod med pas sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob// rnal 'byor bu chung lta
4b5(rgyud 'grel): bur rtog pa med// ldum ra'i bung ba'i me tog ro myong ltar// nags nas nags su 'khyam pa seng ge bzhin// kun tu rgyu ba sna tshogs rlung ltar ni// sems nyid bag dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin mi dgag smyon pa lta bur spyad// rgyab tu mi chags mdun du
4b6(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa med// mdor na lha sgom spyod pa nyams len la// ji ltar phan pa'i spyod pas rnal 'byor spyod// sna tshogs snang ba sems kyi ngo bo 'di// thug phrad tsam gyis ma grub phyag rgya che// snang la mi snang 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'byung // de la sems na dngos grub
5a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa yin// phye nang thams cad lhan cig skyes pa 'dri// nam rtog chu ba'i rgyun gyi rnal 'byor 'dra// de yang sems las gzhan nu btsal du med// yid la mi bzhag phyag rgya chen po'i lam// 'bras bu ma re rtogs na phyag rgya che/
5a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rtogs rtogs pa na mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// rtogs na de nyid rang bzhin stong pa yin// lta spyod 'bras bu dbyer med lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin gnyis med rtogs na 'bras bu'i mchog/ lta spyod sgom pa 'bras bu do ha'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa ra ha pas mdzad/
5a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tat+taM do ha gI ti kA nA ma/ bod skad du/ do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// brtags na bdag gzhan dngos po med// byis pa lhug po'i rmi lam 'dra// de nyid rtogs pa shin tu
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dka'// byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra// tha ka nA ni smra bar byed// de nyid tshig gis brjod pa dkaT// nang stong rtogs bla ma spel bar// thur pa thob par gau lA 'gyur// lus ngag yid gsum dbyings su ni// de nyid mnyam par ma shes na// de nyid rtogs par shin tu dka'//
5a5(rgyud 'grel): byis pa rgyan po rtse ba 'dra// dngos po chog gis brjod po dka'// chos rnams tshig tu smra ba yang // tshig tsam gyis ni 'grub pam ci// sems kyi de nyid mi rtogs par// thams cad gcig par rtogs pa med// don dam rtogs pa shin tu dka'// byis pa rgyan
5a6(rgyud 'grel): po rtse ba 'dra// tha ka na ni smra bar byed// do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon kan rIg nas brgyud pa/ tha ka nas mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tsar+ya do ha gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ spyod pa'i ngo ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba// dpal te
5b1(rgyud 'grel): ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// ldong ros kyis ni theg le byas// ka tsa ri ni bstan par bya// kye ma phyed mos bdud bzhi bcom// gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// smra bar byed pa'i khyab 'jug gam// drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus// k+She ma gal te smra ba na// 'chi bdag gis
5b2(rgyud 'grel): ni za bar 'gyur// ma rungs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bsrungs// kye ma rmongs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya// kye 'o byol song mkha' gro ma// glags tshol bsam pas ci zhig bya// kye 'o 'bar ba'i mer ma dug/ gzi brjid ldan pa'i
5b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor la// smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam// drag po tshangs pa bsrungs mi nus// ji ltar spu gri ral gri'i so// de bzhin la ba pa yi zhabs// dam tshig spyod pa ngo mtshar che// gzi brjid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// smra bar byed pa khyab 'jug gam/
5b4(rgyud 'grel): drag po tshangs pa bsrung mi nus/ spyod di'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba// slob dpon kau bya la nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon kaM ka nus gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dz+nyA a tsan+d+ra gI ti ka dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes dga'i ngo
5b5(rgyud 'grel): ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpalte he r+ya ka la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyiste sbyor dug blo brang la stabs// b+hU d+he pa ni gA nyid du log/ ji ltar kun la mkhas pa yis// dug po de ni dzaM ltar khyer// tshem bu thob par gyur pa na// chags sdang gti mug gnas su
5b6(rgyud 'grel): dag tsham bu 'di la dbye bo 'am// rin gyi grangs kyis chos pa med// ngani bangadag gi tshom bu 'ong// nam pa'i dang ni mnyam par 'gyur// tshim bu thob par 'gyur ba ni// chags sdang gti mug gnas su da // b+ha d+hi chem bu tshol du byin// thams carda
6a1(rgyud 'grel): du ni btsal bas na// bdag nyid kyang ni dmigs med 'gyur// tshem bu thob par 'gyur ba na// chags sdang gti mug gnas su dag/ lhan cig skyes dga'i do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes pa/ slob dpon b+ha d+hes mdzad pa rdzog s+ho//
6a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta dr-iSh+Ta g+hi ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// thams cad du ni bdag phyag 'tshal lo// skye 'gag sdug bsngal bsgrol
6a3(rgyud 'grel): phyir mdzad// d+hu ma pa ni sgra bIr byed// bde gshegs spyi bor bkur ba yis// bdag nyid don dom de nyid rtogs// tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi lha khang du// 'di ru bdag ni rab tu 'byung // chos rnams thams cad khongs su chung // rlom pa ni spro bar bying // bde
6a4(rgyud 'grel): go shegs spyi bor dkur ba yi mo// byadag gis don dum de nyid rtogs// ri rab dang ni rtswa yis tshogs// ji ltar srang la gdal lam ci// de bzhin phyi rol thams cad kyis// lbu ba 'di dang mnyam mam ci// d+ha ma pa ni skye bar byed/ khade gshegs spyi bor
6a5(rgyud 'grel): bkur ba yis// bdag gis don dam de nyid rtogs// nor bu ran chen bor nas ni// su dge 'ching bu len par byed// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun no// brtags na badren gnyis yin par sgra// d+ha ma pa ni smra bar byed// bang gshegs spyi bor bkur po yis//
6a6(rgyud 'grel): ga pa na phyogs// 'angag shegs the 'khor grum pa byab// sleb po byam pas mdzang brjom s+ho/ rdzas me nga/ tha su tha~Mng ba I t-i ka nAm/ dzang nang / rlu bang rtso nyi bu sa byag gi nyas ri rje
6b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan g.yo rlung gi gzhal yas khang // sems kyi rdo rje gdun du bzhugs// stong pa nyid ni zab mo la// kye bo lhan cig skyes pa yi// dga' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na// slar yang ji ltar phrad par
6b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// skye bo lhan cig skyes pa yi// mdzes ma bdag gi dbang du gsol// khyed ni bzhugs na bdag gis ni// ji ltar bdag gis gzhan la btsal// gru ni 'bying bar 'gyur ba la// yongs su drang bar 'dod pa la// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// dga'
6b3(rgyud 'grel): mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab g.yos na// slar yang ji lhor phrad par 'gyur// khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni// rigs lnga'i grong ni bsad byas kyang // khyod kyi zhal ni bdag gis ni// skad cig gcig kyang ma mthong ngo // kye 'o lhan
6b4(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes pa yi// dga' mo bdag gis dbang du gsol// srid pa 'di ni rab glayos na// slar yod ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// kye 'o lhan cig skyes pa yi// mdzes ma bdag gi dbang du gsol// khyed kyi slad du bdag gis ni// phyag rgya dgos te
6b5(rgyud 'grel): rlung tsam yang // rigs ngan bram ze'i b+hasam+me pa maung // kye lho lhan cig skyes pa skye// dgu' mo bdag gi dbang du gsol// srid pa 'don rab g.yos nA// smar yang ji ltar phrad par 'gyur// rgya mtsho'i nang du rdzangs baicas bya// thong ba sngon ni ka tra las// ma
6b6(rgyud 'grel): sa gangams ngagathob par 'gyur// phred pa'i bcings pa yod bci // khro'o lhan cig byas pa yi/ mdza'i ma bdag gi dbang du gsol// rlung gi danyid kyi 'i su nis bya ba slob don nag ponas brdung ba/ slob don mchims mdzad sa
7a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha sa taM ti la ka do ha gI ti ku nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpyid kyi thig le ngo ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// se b+hu sku gsum la sogs kyi// sos ka'i me
7a2(rgyud 'grel): tog mthong ba yi// gzhon nu bdag ni myos par 'gyur// he ru ka la chags pa yis// sos ka'i dang po dang po 'dir// khyod kyis bdag ni bsrung bar mdzod// gdung bas 'gum par ma mdzad cig/ me tog aM b+ha ka ru Na// dri bsung ldan pas
7a3(rgyud 'grel): dgyes par 'gyur// sha ris pa ni brdungs pas brdungs// me mar khur nas tsuN+Da li// re mo bdag la 'bab po zhes// ka nA pa ni gshegs par re// so ka'i dang po dpyid dus la// khyod kyis bdag ni bsrung ba mdzod// gdung bas 'gum par
7a4(rgyud 'grel): ma mdzad cig/ phyogs bcur bltas ni bdag gis ni// khyod las gzhan ni mthong ba med// gdung ba'i me yis bdag gis ni// bdag gi lus kyang bsam pa med// rnol 'byor ma brgyad las bzhi ni// bdag cag gsol ba btab pa yis//
7a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs par mdzad// dbyed kyi thig la do tau mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nAg pA pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon sa ra has mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gror skad du/ badz+ra tsa tu ra gI ti ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bzhi'i glu l+le
7a6(rgyud 'grel): byab/ dpel sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// mi mthun sems ni khyod ma bsgom// de nyid de bzhin nyid ma 'dzin// 'bras bu re ba bsgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyag rgya chen po bsgoms// gal te mnol la gnas med na// de ni dpal gyi thig chen ri ma
7b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu rab bsgom ma byed// me dmigs phyag rgya chen po sgoms// phung po khams te phyag rgya che// dam tshig 'khor lo d+ha rang bzhin// 'bras bu re ba bsgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyug rgya chen po bsgoms// gnyis med yon tan rgyal 'di yin//
7b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis meng yon tan rnol 'byor gsung // 'bras bu ra ba sgom ma byed// mi dmigs phyug rgya chen po snyoms// sha rI'i yul du sku 'khrungs pa// oM bad+hU trA~M gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pA/ a ma ra sing+ge g+ha rdzog s+ho// / bud yang
7b3(rgyud 'grel): mi skye mi 'geg dngos po bcings pa med// khams gsum grol med 'khrul pa rnams lo snang // rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// thog ming 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs nA rnyed mi 'gyur// dngos rnams gdod nas sgyu med
7b4(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba gang zhig yin// su zhig skye bar 'gyur dang 'gag dang bcings pa sems// rtsu ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// sems ni nam mkha' dri med dang 'dra slob
7b5(rgyud 'grel): na gsung // srid pa gsum po de 'dra ba yi rang bzhin yin// rtsu pa sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin no// thog med 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// rang bzhin mi rtog rang rig nyams su myong bas 'grub// rang
7b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin 'od gsal 'khrul pas ci phyir rmongs par 'gyur// rtsa ba sems nyid sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i ring bzhin ni// thog med 'khrul ba'i rang bzhin gzhigs na rnyed mi 'gyur// bla ma me tri'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la
8a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// thub mo zab mo 'jig rten kunas+thA yang // ma smras pa la dka' ba dka' ba 'ga' zhig 'drug// kyi sems kyi bab mo shes par dga' bas nA// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med bA yIn// mi gnas sems nim
8a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa la bzhag/ rnal 'byor me yis dngos po thams cad bsgrag/ kye sems kyo zab mo shes par dka' bas na// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin// rnal 'byor 'dod pa bla mos bstan du med// bla ma'i byin rlabs gong nA mang ba len//
8a3(rgyud 'grel): kyekyi sems kyi zab mo shes par dka' bas na// lhan cig skyes pa gzhigs na med pa yin// dpal gyi bde ba chen po tshol 'dod ni// dbus ma tshol 'dod mig meng khron par lhung // kye sems kyi zab mo rtogs par dka' bos na// lhan cig skyes pa
8a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhigs na med pa yin// sa ra ha'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa dang ni snying rje'i rang bzhin 'dres// stong nyid dbyer med rgyun mi 'tshed par yod// bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong // nam mkha'
8a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'jug/ na mkha' na ma khAr sbyor ba de mA mthong // 'khor bas bcings pa'i sa la de mi gnas// bdag gis stong pa'i rnol 'byor ma de mthong // nam mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug/ de 'dra'i rnal
8a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rtsa ba'i khyim las g.yo// snying rje'i ro chen dri ma med pa yin// bdag gis stong pa'i rnal 'byor ma de mthong // na mkha' bzhos shing bzhos shing 'thung zhing 'dug/ sa ra has brjod gang gzhan ci phyir byed// nyin dang mtshan du na mkhar 'byo phyir 'gro/
8b1(rgyud 'grel): drug pas stong da rnal dbyor ma mthong // rnam par banas shing banos shing 'awang gling 'dug/ sa ti rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rnal dbyor mngang 'dzin de// rlos rnams mtshon par rab shes nas/
8b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis lhan skyes mnga' 'brangs rgyab// 'ben med cig kyang phog pa med// lhan cig skyes pa'i gtam gson cig/ thams cad dngos por sbyor ba'i mda'// nga yis lhan skyes mda' 'phangs brgyab// 'ben med cig kyang phog pa med// de rnams nas ni
8b3(rgyud 'grel): tshor ba med// de yis 'di yin gnyis med song // nga yis lhan skyes mda' 'phangs brgyab// 'ben med cig kyang phog pa med// glu ster 'gron bu nyi shu med// de 'dra'i khol po bai ru byed// nga yis lhan skyes mdara' 'phangs rgyab// 'ben med cig
8b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang phog pa med// bi ru byed pa'i rdo rje'i sku rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul mtshon dkyil 'khor bum pa rdo rje sogs// grol bar mi lta phung po 'grangs pa'i thabs// ko na pas brjod de 'dra su zhig bye/ thams cad
8b5(rgyud 'grel): brdzun pas bslu ba yin par 'dod// kA na ba'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// kye bram ze ral can skyes bu saM g+ha ba// sangs rgyas ye shes ngag la mos par gyis// de 'bru'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin//
8b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che// mi gnas rang bzhin bung ba khyod ni bsgoms// yang dag bla ma'i man ngag nan tan gyis// de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems na dga' ba yin// brtan g.yo thams cad dri mdo rin po che// mi gnas rang bzhin
9a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba ma skyesmra pa// rmi lam bung med de bzhin med pa ste// de 'bru'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin// brtan g.yo thams cad dri mad rin po che// mi gnas rang bzhin bung ba de shes na// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas dngos grub 'grub//
9a2(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra'i skyes bu'i sems ni dga' ba yin// brtan naM g.yo thams cad dri med rin po che// mi gnas pa yi don thugasu chud pa/ bla ma rje btsun d+hiSh+Thi dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo//
9a3(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bltas pa de ltar mthong ba med// brdzun pa med pa'i slu ba 'ba' zhig ste// bsam mi khyab cing grub ma he ru ba// skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// ji ltar de ltar glo bur gang la bzhag/ 'dod pa'i mdung gis rang la tsi ta zug
9a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam mi khyab cing grub sgra he ru ba// skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// lhan cig sems te mkha' lus bde snying lus// gnyis mang gnyis yin stong dang snying rje'i sems// bsam gyis mi khyab grub spu he ru bya// skyob pa'i sems kyis
9a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// de ni mo skye mi 'gag rkyen med de// rang bzhin rtogs na rtsa ba'i sems shes yin// bsam gyis mi khyab grub smra ha ru pa// skyob pa'i sems kyis rang bzhin gzugs mi shes// bla ma d+hiSh+T+r-i dz+nyA na'i zhalo snga nas kyi glu rdzogs
9a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma khams gsum sems can rnams// rnam rtog sgrog gis dam bcings te// 'khor ba'i mya ngan snam pu ru// phyogs bcu kun tu rnam par 'khyam// e ma lam gyi khams gsum bde bar gshes
9b1(rgyud 'grel): gdong mnyid nas rgol ba che// rnam ngag zhing ni 'de ba can// sang sa rgyus rol mo rab tu ston// k+She ma rnam rtog sdug bsngal lam// phyin pa'i dus med ston pa bzhin// bde bral 'dod pa sdug bsngal nyid// mnyam nyid don la rab tu go pa// e ma ro las
9b2(rgyud 'grel): med lam gyi mchog/ lhun rdzogs namakha'i bya bzhin du// re dogs med la phyag rgya che// skyon yon dbang gis ba slad du med// kye ma 'o bskal pa grangs med gsum// de nyid btsal bas mi rnyed de// rmongs pa na mkha'i mtha' tshol bzhin// sangs rgyas
9b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya rnyed mi srid// i ma'o skad cig gcig nyid la// ma bral 'bras bu ring la rnyed// rang rig ye shes stobs po che// 'jig rten dbang sgyur kun gyi rje// rtogs s+ho// / mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed bla ma ste// 'thung ba'i bye'u ni
9b4(rgyud 'grel): rArang gi sems nyid yin// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chang 'jo ka nA pa// rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshegs la mchod pa 'bul// ba 'jo snong gsol ga ri m+b+ha ma kI/ ba 'jo snong ni dri med lhan cig skyes// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chang 'dzog pa ma// rnal 'byor sdom
9b5(rgyud 'grel): nga'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// mkha' lnga bzhos shing bzhos shing snod bkang bzhag/ bzung bar mi nus 'di ltar glang po lnga// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'dzo ka n+ya ba// rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// mkha' la ba 'jo 'jo byed
9b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir ma mthong // ji ltar nang du chus gang ka li ba// mkha' la rgyun mi 'chad 'jo ka na pa// rnal 'byor sdom pa'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// kaN+Da ri'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// me tog gcig rgyas
10a1(rgyud 'grel): na dang ga/ rlung chu rdzun shid dul t+ta shAn r+m+mag// banan pa dang mang mi ga rab myug// rlung me ga 'di rnams ga/ de shing cag yal ga sum dang // ts+tsha dang rnagal 'artson 'dang
10a2(rgyud 'grel): bo dus// bcan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas pa// rin theng med pa'i me tog 'di snyoms shig/ ge sar gcod mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po yin// chos dbyings rdo rje dbang phyug mchod pa 'bul// btsan po dpe med me tog rab rgyas bya// rin thung med
10a3(rgyud 'grel): ri me tog 'di snyoms shig/ mchog dga' dung ni dga' bral gzhig nas long sde// yang dag bla ma'i zhabs btud nan tan gyis// btsan po dpe med mi tog rab rgyas paM/ Shin thang med de'i me tog 'di snoms shig/ ma d+hi tsi tI'i grwa rdzog s+ho//
10a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dge dang mi dge'i las rnams la// dga' dang mi dga' khyod ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// chos nyid zab mo rnal 'byor yul// sgom dang mi sgom byang chub sems//
10a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan dang mi ldan khyod ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can gyi// spyod pir lam ni 'di yin zhes// mthun dang mi mthun khyod ma byed// rlung dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// bde dang sdug bsngal 'bras bu'i chos// 'khor
10a6(rgyud 'grel): de mya ngan 'dres po la// ra dang dogs pa khyod ma byed// rang dga' ye shes seng ge bzhin// klu zlog s+ho// bdag ni 'dug gyi shi dang ma shi med// bdag gi yid la dan cig 'jug pa med// gan ral gris nags pa ba bcad pas// dalta
10b1(rgyud 'grel): ba med de ba da sgra// gru gnyis sna lnga rkang pa rab bzhag nas// lus 'gyel gyur te sems la sdug bsngal skye// ka na'i ral gris zhugs pa rab bcad pas// da lta re ba med de pung smra// mi gang rtsa ba khron pas bskor gyur kyang // shing gcig la ni 'bras bu
10b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mi 'byung // ka nai ra ral gris zhags pa rab bcang bas// de lta re ba mod de ba smra// mig sman rol bu bcud len rkang dngos grub// de rnams la ni bdag med le lor gyur// ka nA re ral gris zhags pa rab bcad pas// da lta re ba med de pang sgra/
10b3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// kye yul rnams thams cad lha 'dod na// ri bo chen po'i kha nas ltos// chos rnams thams cad skye 'gag med pa'i yul// rang sems rig na ri rab rtse// chu rnams thams cad 'thung 'dod ni/
10b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho chen po'i tshul 'thung // skye med byang chub sems kyi chu// mtha' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho che// brtan g.yo thams cad bsreg 'dod na// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me chen sbyor// rnam rtog brtan g.yo thams cad de// lhun grub ye shes
10b5(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi me// 'jigs med bde ba'i gnas 'dod na// ma gon pa chen po'i gnas su 'dug/ 'khor ba rnam dag bde ba'i gnas// byang chub sems ni dgon pa che// A tsar+ya dpa' bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi glu rdzogs s+ho//
10b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// rang bzhin bdag med ma de ni// bdag gi ma rir byed pa yin// chags pa med pa de yis ni// nyon mongs zhi bar byed pa yin// skye dang 'chi ba srid popa yin// 'khrul pa rnams ni spong ba yin// bde ba chen po
11a1(rgyud 'grel): ster byed pa'o// lon gyi 'khrul pa ma yin no// des na kha dog dbyibs med de// tshad kyang yod pa ma mtho nga ngo // 'dod pa med pa de yis ni// nga rgyal skye ba mi 'dod do// gang tshe bdag med ma de ni// bdag gi snying la zhugs pa na//
11a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan rnams ma lus pa'i// dbye ba yod par ma mthong ngo // 'gro ba mngad cing 'ong ba med// gar yang gnas pa ma yin te// na mkha' yi ni ngo bo ltar// yongasu gsal bar snang ba yin// thub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// ma lus pa dang
11a3(rgyud 'grel): ral ba ni// de ni me li bdag med mar// de ltar bdag nyid smra ba yin// nA ro paN+Di ti'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can nyon mongs gdung bas sa steng bskor ba'i lha// de lta na yang bde chen chung ma'i lus
11a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'dor// kye kye dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags// bskul ba dngag med mi 'phrul gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha// shin tu ngo mtshar bdud kyi chung ma de mi len// gzhan las khyod 'phags gzugs mchog mnga' ba g+ha// kye kye dpe med chung ma
11a5(rgyud 'grel): la ni rab tu chags// bskul ba dpag mod mi 'bral gtso bo 'jig rten lha// 'gro ba brgya phrag mang po nad kyis thebra la bskor// de dag bde ster lha ni khams gsum me long yin// kye kye dpe mad chung ma la ni rab tu chags// bskal
11a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dpag med mi 'bral gtso bo'i 'jig rten lha// mnyam med mnyam pa'i bde gsol ma ti ro ha na// rgyal ba'i yon tan mang ldan kaR+Sha ba na'i lha// kye kya dpe med chung ma la ni rab tu chags// bskal pa dpag meng mi 'bral gtso bo'i
11b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten lha// lha yi ba'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sbyangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sgyu ma'i nags tshal mang po de dang dwer// ri dwags bsad phyir blon po Don+ti 'gro/ log 'gro ri dgas gar 'gro ba yis mthong // Dom+bi mdar
11b2(rgyud 'grel): rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs// mda' lnga yod de lA ka shar gyis bton// Dom+bi gzhu bkang bzung nas rnam par 'dug/ log lta'i ri dgas gar 'gro ngo yis mthong // Dom+bi mnga' rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs// gzhu med rgyud med skyug
11b3(rgyud 'grel): myed mde'u myed// Dom+bu thi tshom med de nges par byasad// log lci'i ri dgas gar 'gri nga yis mthong // ro m+bi myudar rnon bkang nas nang du zhugs// rgyal ba rigs lnga dbu rgyan byas nas su// ri dgas bsad pa slar la sogs par bya/
11b4(rgyud 'grel): log lta rnyi dgas gar 'gro ba yis mthong // ro ste medang non bkang nas nang du zhugs// Dom+bi 'iri gru rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan pa ngan pa 'jig rten kun sgra yang // gces pa'i yon tan
11b5(rgyud 'grel): dri med zab mo yod// ut+pal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sgyu mkhan bi rU ba// tshong 'dus dang ni grong dang chu 'gram ni// gang du phyin nas lus 'gyel de mi shes// ut+pal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de
11b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dri'i mang por sgyu mkhan bai rUb// 'jig rten ngan por smra ba de brdzun yin// khros pa gang gA bab pargyun las bzlog/ ut+pal chu nang btus nas tshus mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sgyu ma khan bai rU ba// nyi ma gti mar 'drug nas chang ni
12a1(rgyud 'grel): 'thungs// an+da 'jigs byas b+he mo'i sar bshog/ ut+pal chu nang btus nas chus mi reg/ de 'dra'i mang po'i sgra mkhan b+hi rU ba// bi rU ba'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshul lo// bltos dang
12a2(rgyud 'grel): skye ba gnas pa med pa na// de tshe lhan cig skyes dong khyad par med// de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas// de nyid mi mthun pa de rnam par smros// 'di ltar khams gsum bde bar gshegs pa lnga// de yi tshe na gang gis bcings par sems
12a3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas// ji ltar mi mthun pa de rnam par smros// 'di kun rtsa ba'i rang bzhin ma rnyed stor// de yi tshe na na mkha'i rang bzhin mi 'chi 'am// de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas// de nyid mi mthun pa de rnam par
12a4(rgyud 'grel): smros// rmongs par ma byed gnyis med mdud pa yis// cis te stong pa'i khu tshur brdzun gyis bcings// de nyid rang bzhin shin tu go gyur nas// ji ltar mi mthun pa de rnam par smros// la ba pa'i glu rdzogs s+ho// // ji ltar
12a5(rgyud 'grel): til la til mar khyab po bzhin// de bzhin khams gsum 'jam dpal sku yis gang // de shes lhun grub rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis// bde tshan dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // bde gshegs kun gyi btsun mo ming med ma// sna tshogs gzugs
12a6(rgyud 'grel): can snying rje can de dang / lhan cig 'grogs na sdug bsngal thams cad sel// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di longo // nam mkha' na mkha'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar// sems kyi chos nyid de 'dra bla ma gsung // bla med don de mi shes bsgom mi
12b1(rgyud 'grel): nus// bde ba chen po chos kyo glu 'od long // nyo ma mo shol ras bal 'dus jo bzhon// lung dang man ngag do bzhon brton pa las// rang rog yo shos mo ni 'bar bar 'gyur// bde tshon dam pa chos kyi glu 'dri long // grogs bam chos dang gzhan lag
12b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i nor// chos nor min te dgos pa'i dus na med// 'phags pa'i nor chen rang gi sems la chongs// bde chen dam pa chos kyi glu 'di long // bde dang sdug bsngal gnas skabs thams cad du// yid bzhin nor 'drir de nyid byang chub sems/
12b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal kun 'dul nyin mtshan nan tan byos// bde chen dam pa chos kyi gru 'di long // ma hA su khA ta'i glu rdzogs s+ho// / dpal sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu ngo mtshar bdag gi gtam// glang chen btsongs nas
12b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyid log ltar// gang zhig nor yod me lo tshe byed// kun khyab dpa' bo bla sai ra// chos dang chos min gtam mi 'dri// rung byung rang bzhin g.yo ba med// glang chen btsongs nas gnyid log ltar// gang zhig nor yod mel tshe byed//
12b5(rgyud 'grel): kun khyab dpa' bo pra sa ra// rnal 'byor me tI'i dbye shes paso// thogs med dus bsags skyon kun bral// gang zhig nor yod mel tshe byed// kun khyab dpa' bo pra sa ru// rnal 'byor pra sa ri glu rdzogs s+ho// // stong pa lo gnas
12b6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i bdag nyid can// zhing na bzhugs pa'i thabs dang shes rab tshogs// gzugs brnyan lta bur shes par bya// snying rje ro yis tha dad brtsod pa spangs// der ni kun rdzob yul gyi sha rnams bza'o// shin tu rnam ngag stong pa'i chang ni btung
13a1(rgyud 'grel): skye 'gro gal ldan rnams la don 'di bskrun/ skal med rnams la shin tu gsang bar bya// rnam thar byug pas phyi nang brlan byas la// yul gyi ljongs spyod lan co bdor spyad// phan tshun k+kong
13a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong ba'i chos rnams la// ngag dang ma dag yid la mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyi phreng bas rnam rgyun la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug bya ste// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad// lhan cig skyes pa'i g.yung mo mi sbyang
13a3(rgyud 'grel): ngo// klu sgrub kyi glu rdzogs s+ho// / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam rtog 'jig pa'i chom rkun 'jigs shes na// chu lho khrims nor chen bsrung phyir mel tsho gyis// kye snyoms las mo byed sems kyi mel gyi
13a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis// gauti mug gnyid kyis 'khor bir mtshan mo rnying // kye snyoms las ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis// gnyid log na ni khyim nang chom rkun 'gro// khyod kyis tshul khrims nor chen 'phrog par 'gyur// tshul khrims nor de med na
13a5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin med// de med na ni nyi ma 'char ba med// de nyid nyi ma bsgom pas myel tsho gyis// skad cig gcig kyang nor chung gzhan ma byed// de yi dus na de nyid nyi ma 'char// 'di ltar de tshe 'khor ba'i nam langs 'gyur// kye snyoms las
13a6(rgyud 'grel): ma byed sems kyi mel tshe gyis// dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i chos kyi glu rdzogs s+ho//
14a1(rgyud 'grel): dote spyod pa'i bu'i lta zhes bya ba bzhug go//
14b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsaR+Sha Sh+Ti do ha gI tI ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ ngo ha spyong pa'i glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rmya bya'i gdugs steng 'dzin byed cing // cha byung sna tshogs 'dzin byed pa'i// rnam/
14b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa ni smyon pa 'dra// nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam// med ces lU yi smra bar byed// lus kyi tshom bu bsrungs pas grub// dbang bskur mdo bo blang bya ste// don med pararo ni slu bar byed// dbang bskur rtogs par ma gyur no// dus kyi
14b3(rgyud 'grel): dbong du 'gro ba yin// nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam// med ces lha yi skye bar byed// lus kyi tshem bu bsrungs pas grub// gnyid dang chung dang rtsod pa dang // sbyor bas rnal 'byor ji ltar grub// bzlog na srid pa'i zhags pas bcings//
14b4(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal can la rgyal ba'i lam// mad ces lnga yi smra bar byed// lus kyi tshim bu bsrungs pas grub// tshong 'dus kham phor gser skyogs ltar// gal te de ltar byas pa no// sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur// nga rgyal can
14b5(rgyud 'grel): la rgyal ba'i lam// med ces lU yi smra bar byed// lus kyi tshem bu bsrungs pas grub// dro ha spyod pa'i glu'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon lA yi pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon ki rA bsdu mdzad pa rtogs s+ho//
14b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA roSh+Ti nA maM/ bod skad du/ stong pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi rtog rje chos nyid ni// sa bon na mkha'i dbyings su smos// bdag med gzhon nu'i mgu
15a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'khyud// gnyid snang byed pa nyid du gnas// spongs shig ngor shog bdag rmongs so// k+She'o bcings pa ma lus pa// sha ba ro bdo chen por rol// stong po'o btsun mo 'khyud byas to// kyo 'o lus ngag sems smon to//
15a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du ni brtags pa yis// sha ba ri ni myos par 'gyur// dga' ba'i rnam pa thams cad du// sha ba ri ni gnyid log nas// gnyid ni na mkha'i dbyings su log/ kye 'o bdag gi de nyid ni// sa bon na mkhar mnyam par smos//
15a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu na mkhar skar chen shar// spongs shig ngor shig bdag rmongs so// srid pas bcings pa'i glang chen bsad// dbang po lnga yi gtor ma byas// bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad spangs// spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so// nyin
15a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan rtag tu gnyid med par// rang gi sems la byar byas// de nas skyes pa bud med ni// gcig tu dben par song steg nas// gtso bo 'jig rten mgon dang sgra// spongs shig dor shig bdag rmongs so// stong pa'i btsun mo 'khyud byas te// sha
15a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ri ni bde ba chen por gnas// stong pa nyid kyi lta bo zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sha ba ri pas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ su kha duHkha a d+h+ya pa rir+ya g+ha dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba zhes
15a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo// sgom las 'das pa sgrub rgyu meng // mgon po rnams kyi bdag nyid can// grub thob rnams kyi bla ma la// phyag 'tshal gnyis bral lta ba bshad// rang bzhin sgom rgyu med pa'i
15b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir// rnal 'byor sgom las 'das pa yin// dngos dang dngos min gnyis dang bral// de phyir kun rdzob grub pa med// dngos po sgom med dngos mod min// rang bzhin dbyer med rgyu las 'das// nam yang rang bzhin ye shes to// zung 'jug dka'//
15b2(rgyud 'grel): ba gnyis su med// dran pa dang bral dran med de// rnal 'byor pa yi 'khrul pa yin// shes rab thabs kyi zung 'jug la// rnal 'byor gzhan gyi dgongs pa ni// dang po thabs ni bsgom pa'i phyir// mi rtog shes rab skad cig la// ma grub
15b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyang 'grub mi 'gyur// mthong min de ni bsgom pa min// gang zhig thabs ni sgom byed na// bla ma'i gdams ngag ldan pa yis// yang dag phyag rgya thabs nyid kyis// phra zhing rang bzhin rab rgyu ba// ye shes kun gyi bdud rtsi 'bab//
15b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon pa'i 'od gsal skad cig la// blo ldan brtan pa'i sems kyis bsgom// brtags pas ma grub rtogs bral yin// dper na 'gron po yul 'gro bzhin// chos sku'i mtshan mar sems gtang bas// rim gyis sleb pas de nyid min// sngar
15b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mtshan ma mang 'gyur bas// rnam rtog dang bral bde chen 'grub// sna tshogs pa yis rig pa rnams// rang rig gzhan gyis rig mi 'gyur// de rtogs nyin mtshan bde chen mnyam// gnyis dang gnyis med spangs gyur pa'i// gang la mi
15b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnal 'byor de// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rtogs// de rtogs bdag med lta ba yin// rnal 'byor bde sdug gnyis dang bral// gnyis bral rnal 'byor shA ti pa// rtogs pa phyag rgya chen po thob// bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba zhes
16a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ slob dpon shA ti bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho/ rgya gar skad du/ a so ban+d+ha dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'bre lnga mod kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ 'brel mong rgyun chad ye shes lha la phyag 'tshal lo//
16a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig dang rten pa'i tha snyad la// re zhig brten na 'jig rgyu med// 'jig dang rten gyis ci zhig bya// de phyir 'jig rten pa yis ni// rnam par bzhag pa yod min la// 'jal byed tshad mar shes par bya// khyab bya dang ni khyab byed kyi// dbye ba'i
16a3(rgyud 'grel): dpe yi dbang du ni// nyi ma khyab bya zhes bya ste// 'od zer khyab byar shes par bya// dper na'o mor 'dres pa yis// mar ni dang por yod min te// khyab bya khyab byed thad min la// de dag 'brel pa yod min no// me yi rgyu ni gang yin la// de la
16a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu ji ltar 'byung // me yi mtshan nyid sreg byed de// de nyid khyab byed ces bya ste// khyab byar du ba yin par mthong // pha ni sangs rgyas khyab byed do// bu ni dam chos khyab byar gsungs// dper na bum pa'i me de ni// nang gsal phyir ni
16a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal mi byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas gsal byed mo// chos ni ji ltar gsal bar byed// dang po chos min sangs rgyas min// skye min la ni ji ltar 'brel// rgyu rnams 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung // gsungs pa rgyu med 'bras bu med// khyab bya
16a6(rgyud 'grel): khyab byed ji ltar bsgrub// g.yo dang me g.yo rnamos kyis ni// rten 'jigs 'byung ba rnams kyi ste// 'byung ba ni mtha' ngag rang mi sgrog/ shing ni khyab bya yal gi dang // rtsa ba khyab bya dza ltar yod// bdag dang bdag gi rtog pa yis// rmeng
16b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ming can 'phros pas 'byung // dang po med can ming zhe na// de ltar gang zhig ldog pa ni// khyab bya de bzhin ldog pa'o// rten cing 'brel pas 'byung ba ste// rten cing 'brel par 'gag par byed// cig la yang dag 'byung ba ni// byis pa rnams kyis
16b2(rgyud 'grel): smra bzhin byed// khyab bya ldog na 'gal ba med// de ltar de ni 'jig rten gyi// 'jal byed tshad mar shes par bya// ji ltar ri bong rA co ni// brtags bzhin yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin du ni chos rnams la// gang zhig rtogs bzhin yod
16b3(rgyud 'grel): ba min// ba yi r-I tsi ji ltar ni// shar dang nub ni de bzhin du// phrad par shes par mi 'gyur te// dpe ni de bzhin lha drug pa// phyi nang mu stegs rtags can dang // nad pa sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // a ti dang ni gcer bu dang // grub mthar
16b4(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug tshangs skud can// phyi nang gnyis ni sgrub min pa// rnams la 'brel pa yod min la// sangs rgyas dgongs pa de yin te// de dang mi ldan gang zag ni// 'jig rten 'das zhes mi bya'o// de yi dbang du byas nas ni// brtags
16b5(rgyud 'grel): pas khyab bya gang zag ni// bdag gzhan gang zag yod min no// bya ba mtho ris ngan song dang // khyab bya sems nyid gnyis su mthong // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa bzhin// bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khor ba ste// de nyid bral zhing bde
16b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs te// chags pa zhe sdang rmongs pa dang // bral zhing rgyun tshod mya ngan 'das// de ltar rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// gsungs pa de ni mi rigs so// 'khor ba de ni mya ngan min// mya ngan 'das la mya ngan med// rig pa dang ni ma rig
17a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gnas skabs rtog pa bcing bar byed// mi rtog bkrol bas gsungs pa ste// rtog pa rnams la khyad par med// yod 'gro dag ni byang chub la// nye ring tha snyad yod pa min// nyon mongs mun pa byang 'gyur la// mthong/
17a2(rgyud 'grel): min de la yod min no// sangs rgyas kyis ni lung las gsungaso// mtha' dbus med pa'i rgya mtsho ni// ji ltar yi dgas skams par mthong // de bzhin ma rig mun pa yis// tshig pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas ni// yod pa min la mthong ba min//
17a3(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs chen po'i lung las ni// chos nyid bzhi 'am ma bcos pa// khyab byed de la 'byung ba yi// 'gro drug khyab byar gsungs pa'o// cung zad dge ba'i chos rnams la// sangs rgyas mi sgru ba ci zhig byed// dper na dmus long skyes bu la/ 'bar
17a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rin chen lag mthil bzhag/ mthong min de yis ci zhig bya// nang po mu stegs dbang du ni// rang rig 'od gsal khyab byed de// rnam par rig pa khyab bya sems// dper na chu dang bsres pa yi// 'o ma snod ni gcig pa ste// ji ltar chu ni lus
17a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// ngang pas 'o ma 'thung bar byed// de bzhin nyon mongs 'dres pa ni// ye shes snod ni gcig pa ste// de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa 'thung // ma rig pa ni lus par byed// nang pa mu stegs rnams kyis ni// lta ba de ni gsungs pa'o// de la lan
17a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang du ni// sangs rgyas lung laso 'di ltar gsungs// byed po med la las kyang med// de dag med la khyab bya med// gsum med 'brel pa ji ltar bsgrub// phyi ni bden pa gal te yod// nang ni bden par rang bzhin no// gang zhig rtog pa phyi don la//
17b1(rgyud 'grel): de med gang zhig yod pa min// rang dang gzhan gyi rig pa min// de phyir khams gsum 'brel ba med// de phyir rig pa dngos po la// mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no// dngos po rig min dngos min bzhin// skyo mon de ni bdag mod pa// bdag//
17b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa ni skye mi len// de ni kun rdzob mi rigs te// gal te rigs na don dam med// re zhig rgyu med skye ba med// 'bras bu med la skye ba med// bdag la mi skye gzhan la min// gnyis la min phyir kun rdzob min// rang rig bde gsal khyab
17b3(rgyud 'grel): byed dang // rnam rig tsam du khams gsum dang // sems kyi 'dod pa khyab bya yi// dbang du bshad pa byas nas ni// nyan thos rnams kyi dbang du ni// kun gozhi rnam shes khyab byed la// nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang // rtogs pa
17b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni khyab bya'o// dper na na mkha' khyab byed de// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // sprin dang glog dang chu sogs dang // khyab bya mi 'gag yon tan bcu// de ltar dpe rnams gnyis yin te// tha snyad 'jal byed tshad mar shes// de la don dam 'jal
17b5(rgyud 'grel): byed kyi// tshod mo'i dbang du byas nas ni// gong ma'i dpe don rnams gnyis ni// kaM ba la yi dgongs pa ni// phyi sgrub lus las gsungs pa bzhin// sangs rgyas dang ni sgrub rnams kyis// nyams rang rig pa gsal bar gsungs// de
17b6(rgyud 'grel): les lung gi dbang du ni// chos kyi bdag ni yod min la// khams gsum thams cad stong pa ste// 'dus byos thams cad rtag min gsungs// de rnams sems nyid rtog pa ste// rtog pa de nyid 'khor ba yin// gang zhig rtog med
18a1(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'o// chags pa zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // gzhan yang byis pa rnams kyis ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa sogs// chos rnams ji ltar gsungs pa ste// sems kyis rtogs par shes par bya// bzang dang ngan pa'i
18a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa la// khyad ni yod pa ma yin no// dper na shing chen ma la ni// khyad ni yod po ma yin la// gang+gA la reg pa tshig par byed// tsan dan ga bur la sogs kyi// 'bar ba'i me yis de bzhin tshig/ de phyir cung zad rtog pa ni// lta shes rnal
18a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yis spong // rigs pas brtags pas ma grub ste// dbang po'i yul la chags bya med// phyi nang sems la yod po min// gzhan la gnas min bdag la min// dper na ma rtogs pa yis ni// ji ltar thog ni sprin las 'byung //
18a4(rgyud 'grel): de bo zhin zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // nyon mongs la sogs sems las byung // bdag gi bdag nyid stong pa ste// dbang po rnams la rten yang med// de med sems ni yod min la// bems po 'brel pa ji ltar bsgrub// khyab bya dang ni khyab byed kyi// 'brel
18a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ha cang ches pa ste// skad cig gcig kyang bsgrub pa med// nyams kyi dbang du byas nas ni// byams dang snying rje mdor bstan nas// ma grub pa yi sgo nas bshang+ga// skad cig ma ni dang po la// zhe sdang skyes pa'i dus su nA~M// byams pa'i ming yang
18a6(rgyud 'grel): yod min la// byams pa skyes pa'i dus su ni// zhe spyang mun pa yod min no// de la rtog pa gsum yin to// de rnams sems las 'byung bar shes// sems nyid de ni don dam du// lung las gsungs bzhin yod min no// rigs kyi bu'am
18b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu mo// sems nyid sgyu marmi lam 'dra// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// dper na gcig dang du ma ni// sems nyid rang bzhin chos rnams mthong // de dag sems nyid sprul pa ste// sems nyid med la spros pa med// dper na skar ma'i yon tan ne//
18b2(rgyud 'grel): snam bu yod la yon tan yod// de nyid med la yon tan med// gcig dang du ma rigs med la// snam bu de na yod min no// de ltar dpe yi dbang du ni// sems nyid med lo byams pa dang // snying rje btang snyoms dga' sogs ni// de dag yod
18b3(rgyud 'grel): ma yin no// de la rigs pa'i dbang du ni// rgyun ni gcig gam tha dad dam// rgyun ni gcig pa yin na ni// thog mar zhe sdang skyes pa na// byams pa phyi nus skye mi rigs// 'on te byams pa sngon las ni// zhe sdang phyi nas skyes pa 'am// yang
18b4(rgyud 'grel): na de gsum dus mnyam yin// yang na las kyi 'bras bu yin// mi rtag rnams la 'brel par 'byung // dper na ras bal sa bon la// ras ba liM ji ltar dmar po 'byung // ngo bzhin skad cig gcig las ni// 'byung ba'i phung po rnams
18b5(rgyud 'grel): las kyang // gzhan dag rnams la las kyis 'brel// ji ltar rigs pa yod pa yis// de bzhin rang re rang 'dus la// 'brel pa yod par rig pa'o// byams pa'i dus su byams pa ste// rang 'dus 'byung ba zhi sdang la// ha cang sbyin ni mi
18b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs so// lhas sbyin byas pa'i las la ni// mchod sbyin la ni 'brel pa med// de bzhin zhe sdang byams pa la// 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no// de ltar dgos pa mi rigs so// mi rigs pa ni ji ltar na// lhas sbyin mchod sbyin rigs la/
19a1(rgyud 'grel): ni// phan tshun 'brel pa med pa'i phyir// dper na ki ba'i bar dag dang // nas dang 'bras kyi so ba bzhin// de bzhin skyes pa'i phung po bzhin// gzhan dag phung pos 'brel pa med// de bzhin zhe sdang byams pa la//
19a2(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa yod par mi rigs so// gal te sems nyid rgyun gcig na// 'brel pa yod na rigs so zhes// dper na tshe grang bzhin du ni// phan tshun spangs pa'i 'gal ba yin// snga ma byams pa zhe sdang ni// rgyun ni gal te gsungs par rigs//
19a3(rgyud 'grel): grang ba yi ni reg pa las// tsha ba'i reg pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de yi rgyu ni gzhan zer na// skad cig dang po'i gnas ni bsgrub// lus dang sems ngag ma gtogs pa// gzhan yang gang zhig yod min la// rgyu zhes gang la dgag du med//
19a4(rgyud 'grel): gal te dus mnyam smras pas ni// de ni 'thad par med po'i tshig/ 'gro la sems rgyud gnyis mi 'chung // de nyid nyam sa dang lu las gsal// de yi rigs pa 'di lta ste// phyung po khams dang skye mchong dag/ brtan dang khyab dang g.yo
19a5(rgyud 'grel): ba yi// de rnams spangs pa'i gzhan ma ni// bdag dang skyes bu phung po sogs// mi rtsegs rnams kyis smras pa ni// sems ni spangs pa gzhan med de// de rnams sna tshogs mi rtag pa// gzhan rnams smras pas rtag pa'o//
19a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa la byams pa dang // snying rje la sogs rgyun chang bso// thog ma tha ma mi dmigs so// gal te rtag ni 'di skyon te// sa bon myu gu dus gcig du// de phyir don nga mi 'jal byed kyi// tshang ma'i dbang du byis nas ni// 'jig rten khyab
19b1(rgyud 'grel): byubyub byed dang // dge d+hon rgyu dang sa bu dang // 'brel pA la sogs skad cig kyang // ma grub par ni gsungs pa'o// ma sgrub pa yI gus pa nI// dang po ma dang dub ni// gnyis kyi 'grel pa ma grub ste// sreg byed gsal ba'i mtshan
19b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni// du ba mun pa mi rigs so// rigs nas gsal ba med pa yi// me la sgron ni 'gel bar byed// gang nyid du ba me yin na// mi rigs pa yi gsal ba skyon// bud rgyu med la me med pa'i// mo ni shing la mi gnas so// de phyir 'brel
19b3(rgyud 'grel): pa yod min no// yang na bdag nyid gcig pa dang // de las byung ba'i 'brel pa ste// de dag yod pa ma yin no// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel yod na// phan tshun dag la ba'i skyon yin no// mes ni gsal bar byed pa bzhin// du ba de bzhin
19b4(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i skyon// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel yod na// mes ni sreg par byed pa la// du bas de bzhin bsreg par thal// du ba nag pa de bzhin du// ma yang nag par thal ba'i skyon// de phyir 'brel pa yod min lo// dper na snam bu stsal
19b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la// ji ltar 'brel pa yod min la// snam bu min la sna lA ma myin// sbrul mA yiyan la snam bu min// snam bu yin na thag pa min// thag pas ji ltar snam bu'o// de dag phran tshun 'gal ba yin// chos dang sangs rgyas 'brel ba med//
19b6(rgyud 'grel): dang por chos min sangs rgyas men// sangs rgyas yin na chos min no// bru'i pa min la ma skyes so// ma skyes pi la 'brel ba med// de bzhin pa dang bu la ni// lung dang rigs bzhin bshad par bya// rlung gi shugs can 'khor lo la//
20a1(rgyud 'grel): nub ji ltar 'grub pa med// phywa dang bul 'brel ba yang // de bzhin yod bla ma yin no// gal te kun rdzob bden pa la// 'di lta'i skyon ni yod min no// de la ba ga ni kaM pa la raM// meng pa'i rigs pa 'di yin no// yod bla skye min
20a2(rgyud 'grel): yod pa'i phyir// dper na yod pa'i bum pa la// skyes bu'i rtsol bas skye mi nus// med pa de bzhin skye mon te// rgyu dang 'bras bu med pa'i phyir// dper na mo long sku bzhin no// de bzhin yod dang med pa yi// rang las ma yin gzhan las mi no//
20a3(rgyud 'grel): ma skyes rang bzhin bdag nyid med// pha dang bu yang ji ltar 'grub// de dag grub pa med la ni// pha dang bu yi tha snyad med// de yi tha snyad dbang du ni// dang po bu ni ma grub pa'i// phra yi tha snyad ji ltar 'byung // bu nI ma grub dus su ni// dus kyi mtshan nyid
20a4(rgyud 'grel): ma grub po// de phyir pha yi tha snyad dang // bu yi 'brel pa ga la yod// gal te gzhan dag dgongs pa ni// rigs pas brtags na ma grub bzhin// yod med 'brel pa yod par 'dod// de la bdag gi dgongs pa ni// de la bdag nyid gcig pa 'am// de
20a5(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa yod// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa med// pha yi ngo bo ma grub phyir// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ni// dper na mar ni 'o ma las// ji ltar 'byung yang shes par bya// khyod kyi 'du byas gang smras pa// skye 'jigs gnas
20a6(rgyud 'grel): so rim pa las// 'on te so sor gnas pa'o// de las skye ba'i gnas su ni// 'jig dang gnas pa yod min no// de dag med pa'i skye ba med// 'brel pa ji ltar grub pa'o// gal te gnas pa'i rang po zhin ni// so sor gnas pi mtshan nyid ni/
20b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa ji ltar 'grub pa'o// dngos po gnyis ni ma grub na// pha zhes bdag su ga la rung // skad cig dang po pa yis ni// nus pa dngos med de las ni// de nyid la ni bu zhes ni// tha snyad mi 'grub zhe na ni// de phyir gnyis ni ma grub na// de dag
20b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis 'grub pa med// rgyu lta pha zhes ma grub kyang // 'bras bu bu ni grub bo zhes// med pa yod par thal ba'i skyon// don byed tshad ma yod pa'i skyon// de phyir khyab bya khyab byed dang // 'di yi skabs su grub pa medo// de dag ji ltar ma grub pa//
20b3(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa de ni grub min no// skad cig de bzhin grub pa med// dper na myu gu sa bon bzhin// myu gu med pa'i skyon la ni// gong la bltos nas sa bon bzhag/ myu gu la bltos slu zhe na// myu gu 'byung ba'i dus su ni// sa bon de ni grub pa
20b4(rgyud 'grel): med// sa bon 'byung ba stobs med pa'i// nus pa 'bras bu sgrogs pa'o// de phyir sa bon ma grub ste// med pa de ni ji ltar 'brel// yod pa de ni 'brel lo zhes// yod pa de ni ther zug bstan// dngos po can la 'bras bu med// khyab bya khyab
20b5(rgyud 'grel): ked ji ltar grub// ma grub pa ni dngos med de// kha dog dbyibs ni yod min no// de dag med pa de ltar gyis// dus kyi skad cig ma grub bo// 'das pa'i dus na ma 'ongs pa// ma grub bdag ni ma yin no// dpe dang de bzhin don la ni// khyab byid
20b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi gang zag gi// brtag pa de ni byed pa po// khyab pa motho ris ngan song la// bdag nyid gcig pa'i 'brel pa 'am// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa yod// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel yod na// rtag pa byed pa'i ming can rnams//
21a1(rgyud 'grel): mtho ris ngan song bden pa min// rtag pa byed par thal ba'i skyon// gal te ci phyir zhe na ni/ bdag nyid sa ni gcig pa'i phyir// dper na snam bu bum pas ni// mi rtag par ni bshad pa bzhin// dbang po'i don
21a2(rgyud 'grel): ni dngos po ste// bum pa'i gzugs ni yod par mthong // med pa'i gzugs ni mthong min te// de phyir gzugs mthong bum pa bzhin// de ltar smras pa mi rigs pa// bum pa dang ni dbang po dang // gcig gam 'on te mi gcig pa//
21a3(rgyud 'grel): gal te de nyid mi gcig na// dbang po de ni 'brel med la// bum pa de ni mthong min la// gal te de dag gcig pa ste// dbang po med lnga bum pa min// bdag nyid gcig bla'i 'brel pa med// gal te dbang po med la ni// bum pa de ni yod ce na// /
21a4(rgyud 'grel): de la de dag gcig pa med// mi gcig pa ni 'brel med do// de las 'byung ba'i 'brel zhe na// rtag par bdag nyid byed pa po// mtho ris ngan song 'byung bar thal// mtho ris ngan song de dag kyang // rtag par byed pa po las ni// 'byung bar
21a5(rgyud 'grel): thal ba b+h+yon yin no// gal te 'brel ba medun yang // rtag pa gcig pu yin zhen// don 'di snyam smra can rnams kyis ni// gnan don byed dam mi byung ngo // de ltar mi byed rkyen ni// rdo dang khyad par med par bal// gal te don ni byung
21a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes// ri mo gyes byed dam gcig car byed// de ni rim gyis byed ce na// rtag par nyams par thal ba'i skyon// cig car byed do zhen ni// bdag cig smyos pa'i dus su ni// 'gro drug thams cad skyes par thal// de bzhin rga shi skye 'gag
21b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs// tse rigs rnams dang 'brel bar bya// de skabs mu skyugs rnams kyis ni// bdag myed 'brel myeng lta ba 'di// thams cad mkhyen pa rigs kyi bu// phung po 'brel snad bstan pa ste// phung po 'di la bdag med na// ji ltar 'gro 'od rgod/
21b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // bu dang rol mo khro ba sogs// de ltar bdag cag rnams la ni// rnam rtog 'byung ste sgrol bar 'dod// phung por bdag ni yod min la// theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni// bdag mang 'brel pa ji ltar rigs// bdag ni phung po 'di la
21b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// mu stegs yod pa ma yin no// yod pa dang ni med pa dang // de dag gnyis ni sgra mi bya// bdag nyid yod par smra ba yi// med par de ni mi rigs so// gal te yod na 'di rnams la// gnas pa ji ltar mi mthong ngo // skra dang pags pa
21b4(rgyud 'grel): sen mo dang // mgo dang sha dang rus pa la// rkang dang tshil dang chu ba dang // mkhris pa dang ni rgyu ma la// lag pa rkang pa la sogs la// phyi nang rnam pa gnyis su ni// lta zhing bdag med mi mthong ngo // de la mu stegs 'dri ba ni// bdag med mi
21b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ji ltar 'brel// theg pa chen po'i rigs can ni// 'brel med de la 'di ltar smra// sha yi mig ni ha rdang mes// ye shes migo gis ma mthong ngo // kha dog dbyibs dang gnas 'brel pa'i// de ni ji ltar mthong ba'i rigs// de
21b6(rgyud 'grel): la mu stegs 'dri ba ni// 'o na de ni med do zhes// theg pa chen po'i rigs can smra// med pa'i tshig ni smra ba yis// yod pa de ni mi rig so// slar yang 'di ltar med na ni// tshad ma 'di rnams ji ltar mthong // sa dang me dang chu dang rlung // de
22a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams sems la brten rol mo'i tshogs// de phyir me ni mi rigs so// yod pa de yang ma grub bo// de la mu stegs 'di ltar smra// 'o na de rten gang yin na// theg pa chen po'i rigs can no// bdag med 'brel med ji ltar sgra// rten ni
22a2(rgyud 'grel): gang yang yod min no// mu stegs rgol ba 'di skad smra// ji'am stong pa'i na mkha' la// theg pa chen po 'di skad smra// rtags can de ni de bzhin smra// mu stegs pa ni 'di skad smra// 'o na dngos po can rnams ni// ngu dang rgod dang rol mo'i tshogs// ji
22a3(rgyud 'grel): ltar shes par bya'o zhes// theg pa chen po 'di skad smra// sgyu ma dang ni rmi lam dang // cho 'phrul gzhan du shes par bya// mu stegs pa ni 'di skad smra// sgyu ma lta bu'i rmi lam dang // theg pa chen po 'di skad smra// sgyu ma na mkha' lta bu la// rmi lam de
22a4(rgyud 'grel): ni 'dzin byed pa// cho 'phrul de ni brdzun pa'o// yul dang yul can 'dus byas te// brjod bya'i yul ni ma grub bo// rtags can ji ltar phyag gis sogs// slar yang kun rdzob mthong ba ni// don ni dam pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob ming can 'di lta
22a5(rgyud 'grel): ste// 'drin bdag dang gzhan dag dang // sems dang skyes bu phung po dang // tshor ba dang ni byed pa po// nor dang bu dang lang cho sogs// de dag don dam 'brel pa med// gang la bdag med gzhan med la// sems med skyes bu yod min la// byed
22a6(rgyud 'grel): bye med la tshor ba med// nor dang lang tshes dregs pa sogs// don ni dam par shes par byo// de dag rnams la 'brel pa dang // don na yod ba min te// kun rdzob la ni brten byas nas// nyon mongs pa yi dbang pob pas// 'khor bar ni
22b1(rgyud 'grel): grangs med 'khyams// sdug bsngal nyon mongs thob pa yis// 'gro ba'i lam ni shes min la// 'jig rten pa bzhin 'khor bar 'khor// dper na nyin mtshan nyi zla bzhin// don ni dam par byang chub sems// rten med pa la rang bzhin
22b2(rgyud 'grel): med// thams cad stong pa la gnas med// spros pa rnams kyi 'brel pa ste// don dam byang chub tshad nyid la// 'jam pa ma yin mkhregs pa min// dro ba ma yin gsil ba min// rigs bya rogs min 'dzin pa med// phra dang rags
22b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin te// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid do// mu stegs mthong min sgom las 'das// dngos med mthong min bsgom med pa'i// gsal dang mi gsal nyid dang bral// 'brel med de ni byang chub sems// thams cad rgya mtsho'i chu bur
22b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// snying po mdo la sgru ba bzhin// rtag min bdag med sgyu mu ltar// ri dgas smyig rgyu lta bu la// rdzas bum+b+ha pa bzhin du ni// cho 'phrul rnams kyis bkang ba la// dbus su 'khor lo stong grub mon// de ltar don dam kun rdzob ni// de dag ji ltar
22b5(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa grub// sems rtog rmi lam lta bu la// sems ni yod min namakha' ltar// re zhig sems nyid ji ltar 'brel// slob de pon k+She ba la'i 'brel med kyi lta ba 'angadi // rnal 'byor rtogs tshad kyi lta ba rdzogs s+ho//
22b6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma rat+na pa las rang 'gyur du 'asgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ a sam+b+han+t+ra san rbats+tshi nA ma/ bong zhing du/ zhen med kyi lha ba zhes bya ba/ yus phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa gsum gyi dkyus sa 'di// dpa' bo bdag gis
23a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyus sar zungs// bde gshegs lnga yi rta la zhon// rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni// 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin// rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// lha chen bzhi yi sgra yis gtang // shes rab thabs kyis srab du
23a2(rgyud 'grel): bcug/ rta ba bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni// 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin// rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// nyon mongs bcu yi bso sa gcig byin// lha drug dbus kyi bres su bcug/ rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// rta ba
23a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni// 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin// bla ma lung gi ral gri thogs// tshangs pa'i gnas drug steng du 'gro/ rta ba bdag 'drir dpa' bo ni// 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin// rgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// phyogs bcu
23a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag tu rgyugs pas kyang // de yi rta rjes mngon pa med// rta ba bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni// 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin// rmugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul// slob dpon kaM ba las mdzad pa// zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba rdzog s+ho//
23a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shU n+ya tA ka ru Na draSh+Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mi gtsang ba yi srid pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi spyod pa dang // rnam pas
23a6(rgyud 'grel): dpyad cing bltas bsan// dngos po stong pa nyid du sbyang // kye ma snying rje Da ma ru// sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che// Ar+ya de ba dmigs med pa'o// rgyal po'i sring la ngoms pa med// gang du yid dang rlung ngag dang // dbang po gnas pa
23b1(rgyud 'grel): yod minan// bdag ni gang du 'gro ba dang // gang du gnas pa ma shes so// kye ma snying rje Da ma ru// sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshur che// Ar+ya de ba dmigs med pa'i// rgyal po'i sgyid la ngoms pa med// zla ba las ni zla ba yi// 'od zer yongs su
23b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'byung // lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni// de nyid du ni 'jug par 'gyur// kye ma snying d+hi Da ma ru// sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshor che// Ar+ya de bya dmigs med drir// rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med// Ar+ya de ba thams cad spyang //
23b3(rgyud 'grel): spyad pas rang bzhin dmigs mdo 'gyur// kye ma snying rje Da ma ru// sgra sgrogs pA ni ngo mtshar che// Ar+ya de ba dmigs med pa'i// rgyal po'i sring la ngoms pa med// stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon Ar+ya de ba nas brgyud pa/
23b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon tsa ta bas mdzad pa rdzog s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta rat+na dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems nyid rin chen gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid bde gshegs khyab 'jug dang
23b5(rgyud 'grel): ni lha chen tshangs pa rnams// a ti gcer bu nyi ma dang ni grub mtha'i ngo bo dag/ bdag ni dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin// 'jig rten pa ni rmongs pas mi rtogs gti mug dra bas bcings// bdag ni dpa' bo 'jig
23b6(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum na gcig pu yin// srid pa bdag ste srid par rol pa bdag gi ngo bo nyid// gar byed mnyam nyid klong du 'gran zla med par rnal 'byor gnas// bdag ni dpa' bo chen po 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin// 'jig rten pa
24a1(rgyud 'grel): ne rmongs pas mi shes gti mag drabus bsgrengs// skyes pa bud med dag tu snang yang bdag gi rnam 'phrul yin// snyed pa chags pa 'jig pa de yang bdag glen ma 'phrul yin// bdag ni dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum na
24a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu yin// 'jig rten pa rnams rmongs pas mi shes gti mug drabs bcings// bla ma sleb ma bdag nyid bshad par byed pa bdag nyid de// dbye don bangadaganyid sdug bsngal skyob par byeng ba bdag nyid yin// bdag ni dpa' bo chen po
24a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin// 'jig rten rnams ni rmongs pas mi shes gti mug dra bas bcings// kha dog du myur snang ba de yang bdag gi ngo bo yin// ka ni smra bar byed po gcig kyang du mi ngo bo yin// bdag ni dpa' bo chen po
24a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin// 'jig rten rnams ni rmongs pas mi shes gti mug dra bas bcings// bdag ni dbu'i che ni po 'jig rten gsum na gcig pu yin// sems nyid rin chen gyi lte ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon kun pa nas rgyang
24a5(rgyud 'grel): ba/ slob dpon d+hA tA nas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ tat+t+wa At+ma ka dr-iSh+Ti nAm+b+ha/ bod skad du/ de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor 'das
24a6(rgyud 'grel): das le rgyas pa 'di/ grub pa ched nga rgyu bachen// dran rdzob brgyang kyi bya / song rgyad gyi rtsa ba'i // ces sems ni 'khor po ste// brgyang dang tha la mya ngas dag/ dban sprin mang nam par di// gang
24b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas phyag rgya tshe// in+d+ra bo d+hI s+thA bar byed// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa dang // bde dang sdug bsngal gang zhig kyang // sems kyi rtog pas sreg par byed// dper na gA bur me bzhin no// de phyir rnal 'byor rtog pa ni/ chung yang kun tu sra
24b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sems dang sems nyid dngos po'o// dngos po thams cad mi gnas pa// dper na dri za'i grong khyer bzhin// mi gnas mi 'das 'khrul snong yin// in+d+ra bo d+his gnyis med smras// de ni dbus ma'i de nyid de// bdag med chos
24b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang rang bzhin la// thog mtha'i rang bzhin de nyid do// bde gshegs lta ba de nyid de// stong nyid don yang shes par bya// dngos med dran med blo 'dis smra// dper na nyi ma zla ba dang // na mkha' skar mI'i 'khor lo dang // sa dang chu dang
24b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho dang // phyogs dang mtshams dang de yin la// ri rab la sogs 'khrul snang yin// in+d+ra bo d+hi smra bar byed// de rnams gang yang grub pa med// gnyis med don la nyams len gyis// de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon in+da
24b5(rgyud 'grel): bo d+his mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tsit+taM kalpa pa ri ha rau dr-iSh+Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems nyid kyi rtog pa 'joms pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ gshin rje gshad la phyag 'tshal lo// mar sar mgo bo
24b6(rgyud 'grel): bcang ba yis// sta re'i son 'chag par byed// sbal pas glang po med par 'gyur// kye ma shing thun dgod par byed// kye mngo mtshar me go kye// sems la the tshom mo byed cig/ mtshar na a ba d+hU tI ba// sems la rtog pa ma byed cig
25a1(rgyud 'grel): kho yis ma bshang 'di mgo/ nam mkha' las ni me tog 'byung // kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye// sems la the tshom ma byed cig/ mtshar na a ba d+hU tI pa// sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya// kye ma mo ga sham bu skyes na// khri
25a2(rgyud 'grel): yang gar ni byed par 'gyur// ras bal dkon par thob 'gyur bas// namakha'i gos can ngu bar byed// kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye// sems kyi the tshom ci zhig bya// mtshar ne a ba d+hU tI pa// sems la the tshom ma byed cig/ kye ma glang chen khre la
25a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug/ sdong bu gnyis kyis 'degs par byed// dmus long lam ston ngo mtshar che// lkugs pas gtam ni smra bar byed// kye ma ngo mtshar me go kye// sems la the tshom ma pyod tsog/ mtshur na a ba d+hU tI bo// sems kyi the tshom ci zhig
25a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ k+She ma spreru ltogs pa ni// rdo ba khams kyis zla bar byed// kye ma sems kyi nyams myong ni// sus kyang brjod bor nus ma yin// kye mdo mtshar me g+ho kye// sems lo the tshom ma byed cig/ mtshar na a ba d+hU tI pa// sems kyi
25a5(rgyud 'grel): tshom ci zhig bya// sems nyid rtog pa 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba/ kaM ka la dang / me kha la nus brgyud pa/ slob dpon lag+ni yis gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ sho ka b+hi no d+ha dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/
25a6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ mya ngan gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyog 'tshal lo// bdag gi phung po ngan pa 'di// bla ma he dang bral 'gyur bas// snang ba rnams ni nub par 'gyur// bla ma dam pa'i mya ngan gyis// ma hi la dag mya ngan
25b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bla ma ye shes mig med pas// phyogs mtshams gang yang mthong ba med// bla ma dam par mya ngan gyis// ma Ni b+ha drag bdag ni ngu// snying rje rje chung gdugs dkar phub// rnal 'byor rgyal po mdzes pa'i bdag/ sdig
25b2(rgyud 'grel): can gang gis spyan drangs nas// ma Ni b+ha dra re mo dga'// grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yis// na mkha'i dbyings su dkyil 'khor bzhengs// de dbus bla ma nor bu bzhugs// sems kyi gdung bas bdag lus bsregs// d+ha ma d+hA ma re ma dga'//
25b3(rgyud 'grel): skad cig gcig la kA ma ru// bla ma longs spyod thim par mthong // sna tshogs skad cig gcig la ni// rnam par dngos med mthong 'gyur bas// bla ma gshegs pas re ma dga'// nor dang lang tsho thams cad spangs// srid la chags pa'i nga
25b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bcom// nor bu bzang po ma hi la// d+ha ma d+hA ma bdag cag gi/ dpal ldan bla ma med 'gyur bas// phyogs mtshams thams cad mun pas khebs// kye ma gnyis mang Da ma ru// nam mkha'i dbyings su gdung byas nas// gdung
25b5(rgyud 'grel): bas rnal 'byor bdag cag gis// bla ma'i gdung thal lus la byugs// de nyid spyi bor bsgom byas nas// snying rjes b+ha hu ri bdag gis bsad// bdud kyis khyer bi'i b+ha ri khyod// bla ma'i sku dgra khyod yin no// bdag cag khyod kyi mun
25b6(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgribs// bdag cag rnams kyis mdun ma byas// dug po gyon zhing skra rnams bregs// dbyug pa dang ni thod pa thogs// mya ngan lus rnams keng rus 'byung // kye ma rnal 'byor mi rtog go/ bdag cag rnams kyis b+ha
26a1(rgyud 'grel): hur bcom// daD+D+h+ya dz+nyAn+d+ha ko tA nas// sra ma la'i gnas chen phyed dang gsum// bla ma nag po lta ba yis// rnal 'byor drag po ma h+yaM las// mnga' 'gro drug cu rtsa bani skrag/ sre mi li bshags b+ha d+ha raM bsad/
26a2(rgyud 'grel): kye ma bla ma'i sku dgra bsgral// bdag cag mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro/ mya ngan gyi lto ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma hi la nas brgyud pa/ d+hA'u ros mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyu gar skad du/ tsit+ta mA tra dr-iSh+Te nA ma/
26a3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ dngol dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// na mkha' zhes bya'i gru la ni// lus ngag yid gsum dkrugs shing byas// bla ma'i man ngag gzhung shing btsugs// sems kyi brten pas klu
26a4(rgyud 'grel): mnan zhing // pha rol sgrol bar byas pa las// 'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor la// yod pa dag ni ma yin no// 'di las rnam rtog yod min la// dkrugs shing dag kyang yod ma yin// rlung gnyis kyis ni deng nas 'gro/ tha
26a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis de ru rtol te gnas// gru 'ong myur bar ma bskyod na// bar nas choms po'i 'jigs pa che// rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs g.yos pa yis// srid gsum g.yang sar rnal 'byor lhung // sems kyi glu 'ong brtan gzung ba// pha rol dag tu
26a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ba bya// 'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor pa// yod pa dag ni ma yin no// ma rtogs pa ni thams cad kyis// bye brag tu ni smra bar byed// brtags shing lha drug thams cad kyang // gru 'di gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur// sems
26b1(rgyud 'grel): kyekyi gru 'di brtan gzung la// pha rol dag tu sgrol bar bya// 'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor pa// yod pa dag ni ma yin no// mtha' gcig nas ni drangs byas nas// gru 'di gyen la bgrod par bya// sa ra ha ni smra bar byed// sems ni stong
26b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid gnas su thim// sems kyi gru 'di brtan bzung la// pha rol dag tu bgrod par bya// 'di las thabs gzhan rnal 'byor pa// yod pa dag ni mu yin no// sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa ra ha nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon
26b3(rgyud 'grel): me traM pas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ kau ru Na ka pA la tsar+yaHdr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnying rje spyod pa thod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// na mkhar gser
26b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi yu ba can// gdugs steng mgo la 'dzin nas gnas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshegs par mdzad// d+ha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras// ci phyir zhe na de yi ni// drin gyi rnal 'byor bsam pa grub// stong nyid kham phor lag tu thogs//
26b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi khu bas bkang byas nas// sangs rgyas zhing du phyin te gnas// srid gsum bcing ba'i brtsad nas bcad// mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rtag tu bsrungs// sgo bcu dag ni rgya yis btab// d+ha ri ka ni sla bar byed// kun la khyab kyang gcig
26b6(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// de yi mtshan nyid rtog med na// bdag gis ji ltar bstan par byas// d+ha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras// ci phyir zhe na de yi ni// bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// snying rje thod pa spyod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
27a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hA ri kA ba nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon sa ra b+hA khas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ a sam+b+han+ta dr-iSh+Ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'brel med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
27a2(rgyud 'grel): nor dang lang tshe rigs kyis dregs// bdag nyid 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus// de dag gcig kyang snang ba med// khyod dang nga zhes bya ba ni// phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod// rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa// slar yang 'du bar 'gyur ram
27a3(rgyud 'grel): ci// pa dang ma dang bu tsha rnams// gar la blta phyir 'dus pa 'dra// gar mkhan song nas ltad mo gyes// khyod dang ngo zhes bya ba ni// phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod// rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa// slar yang 'du bar 'gyur ram ci//
27a4(rgyud 'grel): tshong 'dus ngag gam srang dag gam// ri 'amathong ngam chu 'gram du// lus ngag gang gi sar 'jig pa// bdag gis de ni mo shes so// khyod dang nga zhes bya ba ni// phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod// rgya mtsho'i nang du glu zhig pa// slar
27a5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'du bar 'gyur ram ci// ku na pa ni smra bar byed// bdag gis 'di las rtogs pa med// 'gro 'ong byas pas bdag nyid bcom// khyod dang nga zhes bya bo ni// phrad par 'gyur ba ga la yod// rgya mtsho'i nang du gru zhig pa// slar yang
27a6(rgyud 'grel): 'du bar gyur ram ce// slob dpon nag/ po bso mdzad pa/ 'brel med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skrod du/ ta thA ga tA dr-iSh+Ta~M nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs
27b1(rgyud 'grel): pab rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin nyid kyi shing drung la// rtsa ba yal ga dmigs pa meng // me tog 'bras bu rtag tu 'byin// kye ma shing 'di ngo mtshar ltos// sa bon myu gu med pa yi// 'bras bu dpag tu med pa 'byung // da ya
27b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ji lta bu// na mkha' chang bar bcug nas ni// khu tshur dag gis gcog pa bzhin// shing de gcog pa de dang 'dra// rtsa ba dag kyang yod 'gyur la// yal ga dag kyang yod pa yi// shing gis na mkha' khyab par snang // kye
27b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ltos dang shing 'di la// nam mkha' khyab pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma shing 'di ngo mtshar ltos// sa bon myu gu med pa yis// 'bras bu dpag tu med pa 'byung // de bzhin nyid kyi shing 'di yi// mtshan nyid khyod kyis rtogs pa meng //
27b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bstan par rtogs par 'gyur// d+ha ri pa ni smra bar byed// 'di la le lo byas pa yi// mtha' ru phyin par ma gyur pas// bar du phung bar ma byed cig/ kye ma shing 'di ngo mtshar ltos// sa bon myu gu med pa yi// 'bras
27b5(rgyud 'grel): bu dpag tu med par 'byung // de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+hi r-i ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// /
27b6(rgyud 'grel): bkris//
28a1(rgyud 'grel): thig le bcu drug gi nyams len zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho//
28b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Sho Da sha din+na b+ha bA na nA ma/ bod skad du/ thig le bcu drug gi nyams len zhes bya ba/ yum bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rang lus khong stong bsam byas nas// mtshan med a ba d+hU tI la/
28b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi ni bsam par bya// yi ge drug bcu rtsa bzhi ni// sprul pa'i 'khor lor byin gyis brlabs// bde gshegs lnga dang lha mo rnams// 'dab brgyad pad+ma dgong par bya// khams dang phung po dag pa'i phyir// dbyangs can bcu drug longs spyod
28b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// de rnams nyid 'gyur spyi bo ru// bdag nyid bsrung ba'i man ngag go// bcu drug thig le rab tu 'bar// rtsa brgyad thig le rgyu ba yin// bzhi po zhu ste rol pa gnyis// gnyis kyi phyed ni bdag med ma// bcu drug phyed phyed grangs yi no//
28b4(rgyud 'grel): ka nas brtsams nas ma yi bar// reg byed nyi shu rtsa lnga yin// ya nas brtsams nas ha yi bar// mi rig ming can brgyad yin no// bsdus pa A phreng kA phreng gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lor bsam par bya// nyi ma'i 'od kyis dros tsam na/
28b5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum bsreg cing nu bar bsam// chos kyi rim pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// ri bong can gyis rgyas par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro longs spyod bdag thim nas// dga' bo'i bdag nyid skad cig la// dngu' rgyal snying rje chen po sgra// yang dag
28b6(rgyud 'grel): zung 'jug grub pa yis// sgrib pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// skye 'gag med pa'i rnal 'byor ni// kaM ka li bdag grub pa thob// kye 'o ma yangs rnal 'byor pa// rang gi sems la nyams len gyis// slob dpon kau ka li pas
29a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ 'khor lo bzhi'i nyams kyi zhal gdams rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ bAh+ma an+ta ra bo d+hi tsit+ta ban+d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyi nang byang chub sems bcing ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ byang
29a2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems// lhan cig skyes te mun pas bsgribs// kun tu skye ba'i nyams len ni// bdag gis 'di ru bshad par bya// spyi bo'i gtsug nas bo la'i bar// sna tshogs rtsa ni bsgom
29a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas bde tshon 'khor lo ru// sgo ba'i khog pa lta bu yi// byang chub sems la sems gtad nas// bo la'i rtse la rgyal po tsam// gsal la sran rdog tsam du bsgom// bod chen sgo nga'i rtsa la ni// byang chub sems ni 'dzag par bya//
29a4(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i bar du rnal 'byor kye// gnyis med bdud rtsis bkang byas nas// shes pa bde ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// sgom pa'i spyod yul par mi spro// sems ni tshur la bkug mi bya// dper na sbrul gyi mdud pa bzhin// sems ni rang grol gnas pa
29a5(rgyud 'grel): ste// dngos po'i bya ba bral 'gyur ba// rnal 'byor yid kyi zhen pa chod// mA nA bdug gis rtogs pas grol// byang chub kyi sems bcing ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon min pas mdzod pa rdzogs s+ho// /
29a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bA yu tA traM swa b+ha bA no ba de sha nA mo/ bod skad du/ rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ blo ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// g+ho ra kho ni ba lang bsrung // brdzi ba lang 'tsho bar byed// 'tsho bar byed cing gnyid med 'gyur/
29b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis// ro gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur// g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis// nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che// gal te rgyab kyi skal tshigs su// drag tu bcings pas rnal 'byor pas// skad cig tsam gyis khams su grub//
29b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis// ro gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur// g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis// nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che// shing bu gting du nub pa dang // pha bong gyen du 'byung bar 'gyur// dga' bas bdag ni bsrubs so zhes//
29b3(rgyud 'grel): g+ho ra kha ni sme bar byed// nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis// ro gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur// g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis// nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che// nor bu thams cad rdo rjes 'bigs// g+ho ra kha yi rnal 'byor ni// bla ma'i drin gyis/
29b4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa yin// nyi ma dang ni zla ba gnyis// ro gcig par ni 'dres par 'gyur// g+ho ra kha ni sgra gcan gyis// nyi ma zos pa ngo mtshar che// rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon g+ho ra khas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// /
29b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bA yu tat+taM b+ha ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dur khrod ma ni lhan skyes rtog pa mang // phra zhing mi dmigs rang bzhin yid 'ong ba// pad+ma'i dbus
29b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur sna tshogs rol mdzad de/ dus kyi stobs kyi dpa' po gnyis med pa// na mkhar khyab ci'i thim par dmigs pa med// mnyam pa'i bde rtogs skad cig gcig la ni// khams gsum g.yo zhing bde lta rtogs pa ste// bla ma'i bka'
30a1(rgyud 'grel): yis gang yang lhan skyes so// bla mas ma rtogs lhan skyes gzhan du min// yon tan rnams la nga rgyal ma byed kye// lhan cig skyes pa'i gnyid log myos 'gyur ba// dam tshig glang chen lta bur spyod// dbang po sgo dgu'i
30a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi lam bkag pas// brtan pa'i bum pas de ni mya ngan 'das// pad+ma'i ge sar rlung gi 'byung 'jug 'di// brtan par bcings na mgon po 'chags par 'gyur// rlung nyid thim pas mi 'gyur kha dog meng // 'brel med dran sems nyid ni
30a3(rgyud 'grel): stong pa la// sgom dang sgrom rgyu bsgom bya de la med// g.yo ba'i sems nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis ni// sems kyi rgyal po brten med mkha' la lding // mnyam par non cig lus kyi 'khrul 'khor bya// sems nyid bde chen bkram pas mya ngan 'das//
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gti mug zhags pa bcad cing gzhan dag spongs// skad cig gcig la 'khor ba'i chags pa bral// de nyid bcings pas bya ba bral 'gyur ba// 'gro ba drug du yang dag skye mi len// gang zhig rtse sgor ma yengs gnas pa des// drag po'i rkun
30a5(rgyud 'grel): mas de la 'jigs pa med// gang zhig brdzun bcu brdzun ni mya ngan med// sngags nyid rang gi lus la gnas pa ste// bde bo thams cad rnal 'byor dran par gyis// bde bo rtogs pas rnal 'byor skyes 'gyur ba// khyim gyi bdag mo rang lus tshim
30a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas la// rlung gi sems nyid pad+ma'i chu dang 'dra// 'byung ba rnams ni de yis myong 'gyur bas// de phyir g.yo ba'i sems la rnal 'byor pa'o// sgo dgu bkag nas nan tan gyis// rnal 'byor gyi ni gti mug bcang byas la// gnas kyi yon
