30b1(rgyud 'grel): tan rtogs par chags med 'gyur// sprin ltar mi 'phrul rang bzhin kun brtags kyi// gti mug gnas kyi gti mug bsregs byas nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas la rnal 'byor thim// thams cad nub pas sdang 'og lam 'gags pas// /
30b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi nyams kyis 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// de ni rnal 'byor bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs// nyin mtshan bla ma spyi bor bsgom byas nas// lhan cig skyes pa nyid du gnas 'gyur ba// yang nas yang du na mkha'i bdud rtsi rngub// rjes 'brang bkur
30b3(rgyud 'grel): ste dri med sku thob pas// ka ba gcig la gzhal yas sgo dgu ste// lam gyi rgyu lus bdag gis gcig tu rtogs// de yos bdud bzhi par gcod sel bar 'gyur// de phyir dge sbyin khrims sogs dgos mi 'gyur// dge sbyong chos smras
30b4(rgyud 'grel): lha nyid bsgom pa de// chos kyi ro ni sus kyang rtogs pa med// sku gsum brtan par 'dod na rnal 'byor kye// phyi nang byang chub sems kyi rlung nyid sgoms// dug lnga'i yan lag bcod pas myur du ni// byang chub sems kyi lam la legs par
30b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ rnal 'byor bstan pa thob ste skye mi 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid bsgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon tse rA g+his mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyu gar skad du/ badz+ra DA kI ni ni shAn+ta kra ma/ bod skad du/
30b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rdzogs pa'i rim po/ rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro gonu ru thogs// dngos po thams cad 'ben du btsugs// gnyi su med po'i mdar yos brgyag// skom dang sgom byung mi gas pa med/
31a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnun pas skye ba dmigs ma gyur// bdag gzhan gnyis kyi mtha' yang bcad // gnyis su med pa'i mnga' yis brgyab// sgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med// stong pa'i gzhu ni bkang byas nas// shor med mda' ni rdeg
31a2(rgyud 'grel): par byed// bsad dang bsad byi gnyis ka med// gnyis su med pa'i mnga' yis brgyub// sgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med// na mkha'i cho 'phrul chen po yis// chos nyid thams cad bsdus byas nas// gnyis su med pa'i mnga' yis brgyab/
31a3(rgyud 'grel): sgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka medo// bi rUs 'di ltar 'khor byas nas// gcig nas nyi shu'i bar du ni// dngos po cir yang zhugs pa med// yi ge stong pa gsos su 'byin// gnyis su medado pa'i mda' yis brgyab// sgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis
31a4(rgyud 'grel): ka med// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pi rU pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon b+hi na pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tuR+Yo ga b+ha bA na n+yA mA/ bong skad du/ rnal 'byor ba ni'i
31a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams len gyi thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dAng rol phyag 'tshalo// sems dang sems nyid rgyu med de// bsgrub bya sgrub byed thig le'i ngo // 'bras bu ma grub mya ngan 'das// dpal ldan dpa' bo yi ge med// lte bar gsong ba'i gesar
31a6(rgyud 'grel): la// A li kA li la brten nas// rnal 'byor bzhi yi nyams len bshad// lte ba ye shes 'khor lo ru// rtsa ni brgyad kyi thig btab nas// A 'phreng kA phreng mnyam bsams nas// mkha 'gro brgyad kyis mo lce sbar// byang chub sems kyi rang
31b1(rgyud 'grel): zhin ni// nam b+ha'i dbyings kyi 'ong las ni// gnyis med zung 'jug 'dzag byas pas// dpa' bo rnams kyi lam nas brgya// de 'gag rnal 'byor mtshan ma med// brtan pa'i rnal 'byor grub 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa lam
31b2(rgyud 'grel): thob// A li kA li'i rnal 'byor ro// a ho bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dngos dang dngos mang bral 'gyur bas// phyi nang dug gi rnam pa sel// rnal 'byor 'di ni brtan grub na// zla ba drug nas 'grub 'gyur ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa'
31b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam mo// de ni rig pa'i rnal 'byor ro// sems nyid gnas su pad+ma ni// mnyam pa nyid ni dmar por bsam// pad+ma 'ong ba bzhi la thig la ni// dbus su rgyu med thig le yin// de dag rnams kyi kha dog ni// shar du dmar dang
31b4(rgyud 'grel): byang du ser// nub tu dkar dang lho ru gnag/ sna tshogs 'od gsal dbus su 'gro// sngar bshad sngags dang bcas pa ni// bsgom na rnal 'byor dbang phyug // skad cig gcig la rdzogs sangs rgyas// de ni mnyam nyid rnal 'byor
31b5(rgyud 'grel): ro// mi skyod chu dang rnam snang dang // phyi nang bdud rtsi lnga yi ni// sngags pa'i thabs kyis rnal 'byor kye// tAn+ti bdag gis grub pa thob// rnal 'byor bzhi'i nyams len ces bya ba/ slob dpon tan+ti pas mdzad pa rdzog s+ho//
31b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyo pA yi bi ni sh+tsa ya so mung yaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ thabs dang shes rab gtan la phab pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ko la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sprin ltar rtog pa sel cing rang bzhin dri ma med// ma
32a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi gzhan dang mi mnyam gnyis med tshos sku de// gzugs ldan sna tshogs longs sku rang bzhin rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis mong sbrul sku do la phyag 'tshal nas// lham
32a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhan rigs 'dzin bdag gzhan don du rnam par bsdu byas nas// ma rtogs sems can rnams la phan phyir ma lus de nyid ni// bdag gis bshad bya blo ldan rnams kyis gus pas mnyan par gyis// dngos po'i rtog pa la brten
32a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// dngos med bdag med yang dag 'byung // gnyi ga rtog par mnyam mod kyi// byis pa rnams la drang phyir gsungs// de la nyon mongs thams cad de// kyi 'jig sdug bsngal de las 'byung // bdag gzhan gnyis kyi 'dzin
32a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// thar pa thob par mi 'gyur bas// de phyir dngos po spang bya zhing // dngos med la yang brten mi bya// rnal 'byor dngos po la brten nu// 'khor ba nyid las gzhan du min// phan tshun 'brel phyir de dag min// de min bdag
32a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan grub pa med// dper na na mkha'i me tog bzhin// de phyir dngos dang dngos med ni// brdzun pa'i cho 'phrul spang bar bya// rang bzhin ma grub dri ma med// de phyir pha rol phyin mar grags// khyab byed snying rje dbyer med de//
32a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa yi thabs yin no// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// 'dzin bya 'dzin byed thog mtha' med// dri med dngos po'i mtshan ma bral// gnyis dang gnyis min zhi ba'i bdag/ de rnams la
32b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas bde ba'i mchog/ rang rig ye shes chos kyi dbyings// zhe dul pha rol phyin ma yin// theg pa gsum dang sku gsum ldan// sngags ni 'dum sngo grangs las 'dus// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog phyag rgya dang // 'jog rten 'das dang
32b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten rnams// lha dang lha min brgya byin dang // mi dang yi dgas dud 'gro sogs// dper na chu yi brlabs bzhin te// de las byung zhing thim par 'gyur// de phyir thabs dang shes rab kyis// gnyis med don ni bsgom par bya//
32b3(rgyud 'grel): mi mnyam pa yi sngags nyid kyis// stong nyid bsgom par mi bya zhing // de bzhin dngos po bsgom mi bya// de dag gnyis kyi 'dzin pa ni// mya ngan 'das kyang 'khor ba yin// de ni mi rtag spang byas pas// dmigs mang stong nyid 'grub
32b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// brjod bral nam pa'i snying rje ste// de nyid yid bzhin nor bu ltar// 'gro ba'i don ni byams pa yin// nam mkha' kun la khyab pa bzhin// gnyis med sems ni dga' ba yin// dngos dang dngos med gnyis dag la//
32b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i btang snyoms de nyid ni// dngos med don dam bsgom par bya// bya ba dang ni byed pa po// bsgom dang bsgom rgyu gnyis ka med// sbyin dang sbyin bya gnyis ma grub// 'dzin bya dang ni 'dzin pa po// brtags pas nyon mongs
32b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med// de nyid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// byang chub sems ni grub 'gyuraro// chags pas bsgribs pas 'khor ba yin// sprin med na mkha' lta bu ni// rtog pa dang bral mya ngan 'das// de phyir sems ni brtan byas nas// blo dang ldan
33a1(rgyud 'grel): pas bsgom par bya// bla ma'i zhal gyi pad+ma las thob gdams ngag bros// bdag nyid grub pa gang zhog dag pa'i 'bras bu des// 'gro drug nyon mongs 'dam las brgal phyir dri med pa// byang chub sems la gnas shing
33a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa thob par shog/ thabs dang shes gtan la phab pa'i dngos grub bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsam ris gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgyu gar skad du/ swa b+hA ba oM sid+d+hi nA ma u ba de sha/ bod skad du/ rang bzhin
33a3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa med pa'i gzhi'i man ngag ces bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma ji ltar mkhas pa yi// lha khang 'di ni bzhengs par bya// ka ba gcig la sgo dgu pa'i// shing mkhan gang gis khang par byas// ji ltar nam zhig
33a4(rgyud 'grel): lho khang der // 'jig par 'gyur ba mi shes na// b+hU khang nang nasna phug ron ni// gnas ni gang du tshol bar byed// ji ltar nam zhig wA khyod der// 'jig par 'gyur ba ma shes na// gang gis g.yogs ni ldan la nal byas// sgo rab
33a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdams pa de ltar na// ka ba srin gyis zos pa na// ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der// 'jig par 'gyur ba ma shis so// gang gis g.yogs shing zhal zhal byas// lha khang nang nas phug ron ni// gnas ni gang du tsholo bar byed/
33a6(rgyud 'grel): ma re dang sbrang rtsi'i zas byin yang // rigs ngan gyi ni spyod pa 'dra// de bzhin rdo rje 'gro bar byed// ji ltar nam zhig lha khang der// 'jig par 'gyur ba ma shes so// lha khang nang nas phug ron ni// gnas ni gang du tshol bar byed//
33b1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mdog can phug ron no// lha khang bum pa spangs nas no// dpa' bo'i sgo nas smra bar byed// ji ltar nam zhog lha khang dor// 'jog par 'gyur ba ma shos so// lha khang nang nas phug ron no// gnas no gang du tshol bar byed// lha khang
33b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa spangs nas ni// dpa' bo'i sgo nas smra bar byed// sems kyi rnam 'phrul yin no zhes// 'phags pa klu bsgrub smra bar byed// rang bzhin grub pa med pa'i gzhi'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
33b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sha ta ak+Sha ra b+haT+TArA s+ya sa tAM tAM yo b+hA ba na/ bod skad du/ rdzi btsun yi gri brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bsgom pa'i thabs/ bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi lam// dge ba gsum
33b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag nyid can// sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal te// blo dman dang ldan sgrub brtson zhing // bla ma'i gdams dag dang bral la// phan phyir sgrub thabs gsum bsres tsam// oM shrI badz+ra he ru ka sa ya ma nu pA la ya/ he ru ka twe no pa
33b5(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha/ dre D+ho me b+ha ba/ mr-i d+haSh+yo me b+h+r-i g+ha/ oM nr-i ro/ ma b+ha ba/ subi Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sadz+nyA N+Tim+me b+hU y+YAts+tsha/ sarba/ r+m+ma sa tsa me// shre ya ku ra d+d+ho/ ha~M hA hwA d+d+hothA ba wAn/ badz+ra ma me m+b+hany+dzi/ he ru kA b+had+d+hi b+hU bi me tA sA ya satwa a d+hu
33b6(rgyud 'grel): phaTi// de la bsgom pa'i man ngag ni// rang snying dbus gur phra ba yi// hU~M gi dkyil du mthe bo tshad// TaM yig dkar 'od lta bu ni// de yi spyi bor gnas par bsam// hU~M las byung ba'i 'od zer ni// ting 'dzin sems
34a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i snying ga yi// kha sbyor na mkha'i dbus su ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// oM dang hU~M gi sbyor ba las// pad+ma rdo rje rnam par bsgom// oM ni du ba'i mdog lta bu// dam tshig sems dpa' shes par bya//
34a2(rgyud 'grel): de gnyis nye bar sbyor ba las// a ni ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa nyid// thig le'i ngo bo yi ge med// gnyis dang gnyis min zhi ba nyid// na mkha' lta bur dri ma med// 'di lta bu ni mgrin par bsgom// gnyis
34a3(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'od zer gcig la spro// du ba me khyer mar me'i nang // mkha' snang dang ni smig rgyu'o// kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer ni// dbang po'i gzhu 'bri'i ngo bo nyid// rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang // pad+ma gar dbang rdo rje rgyal// rdor sems drug pa he ru
34a4(rgyud 'grel): ka/ mgrin par bsdus te rnam par gnos// de ltar bla med rgyud rnams la// bsnyen pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyis ni// bsgrub pa'i gdams ngag zhal gyi lung // rim pa ji bzhin bshad byas nas// da ni rnal 'byor rgyud bzhin du//
34a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i zhal gdams bshad par bya// rnal 'byor rgyud du dbang thob pa'i// shes rab ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bde bar ston la 'dug byas la// oM AHhUM gis sems dpa' ni// gsum gyi don la 'di ltar brtsam// thog
34a6(rgyud 'grel): mar rdo rje skyil krung bcas// ting 'dzin rgyal bcas sna rtsor lto// oM AHhU~M ni brjod byas pas// gnas gsum du ni rnam par bsam// de nas so so'i kha dog gi/ 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu ni// spros pas sangs rgyas sras bcas
34b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// mdun gyi na mkhar spyan drang zhing // de la lnga 'am bdun das mchod// gsum la skyabs 'gro la sogs bya// de nas sprin bral na mkha' la// gnas pa'i skar ma lta bu ni// yog brgya'i sngags ni 'di yin to// oM shrI badz+ra la
34b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// de nas 'di lta'i sngags brjod bya// / oM dang sA b+ha ba shud+d+ha// sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba// shud+d+ho hAM zhes brjod byas pas// skar ma ltar gsal dag par bsam// IM dA tsit+ta pra ti baM// d+h+waM dang ka ro mi brjod pas//
34b3(rgyud 'grel): de la na mkhar hU~M las ni// sna tshogs pad+ma bsam par bya// de nas yi ge oM gyis ni// na mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi steng du AM brjod pas// rang nyid skar ma ltar gsal ba// zla ba'i steng du rnam par bsam// de rjes oM dang
34b4(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi tsita// tA dang ut+pA ta yA mI// brjod de rang nyid yi ge A// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// de yi rang bzhin gsal ba yi// byang chub kyi ni sems yin pas// 'gro ba rnams la khyab byed cing // gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid
34b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de rjes gsuMm pa yi ge ni// he zhes brjod pas spyi bo yau// tshangs pa'i blo gar hU~M bsams la// de las byung ba'i rdo rje no// rtse lnga pa ni rnam bsnams te// brten byed sngogs 'di brjod par bya// oM dang tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM// de
34b6(rgyud 'grel): nu ba las rdo rje sems// bdag nyid 'di yi rigs can ni// yin par yang ni rab bsams te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgra mdog dkar// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// de la shrI ni dpal gyi don// de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod//
35a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ma gyi yi ga yos// dmachog sems dpa' rnam par bstan// yang na 'ad ltar shes par bya// oM nr-i zla ba'i de steng ngu// hUM las rdo rje rje lta pa// de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la// dbyangs yig dang po lasgra
35a2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar// zhal phyag la sogs snga ma bzhin// de ni oM ste dam tshig sems// zlog mar dge ba bAk+Sha shis pa'o// da ni ting 'dzin sems dpa'i ni// sgom pa rnam pararo brtsam par bya// oM
35a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ya ta te tA thA// ga ta ta thA haM zhes pa// brjod pas mdun du hUM sngon bsam// de byung 'khor lo bcu drug rtsibs// de yi dbus 'byung rdo rje ni// rgya gram de dbus baM las kyang // sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// de yi ge sar steng du ni//
35a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM 'byung rdo rje sems dpa' bsam// de nus shar gyi 'dab ma la// tshangs yig dang po byis pa yi// mA me muny+tsa'i sngags brjod pas// rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i// mi skyod mgon po bsam par bya// rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i//
35a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan g.yas 'ang ba la// oM dang badz+ra sAtA twe// no pA tiSh+Tha brjod pas so// oM dang dr-i D+ho mi b+hI ba// brjod pas rgyu ba dkyil pad 'dab la// sa bon las byung 'od dpag med// g.yon gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma lnga// oM dang su to/
35a6(rgyud 'grel): Sh+yo ma b+ha ba// brjod pas don grub sa bon las// me yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// rnam snang yi ge dang bcas pa'i// a nu rok+to me b+ha ba// brjod pas rang gi sa bon la sa// rdo rje sems ma sku mdog dku ri// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
35b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du gzog ste// phyag gnyis bkur brton gtso dang mtshungs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje 'bar// bdun bral oM dang su poSh+To// mo b+ha ba brjod rigs can ma// sa bon las byung sku mdog ser// phyag g.yon sngar
35b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin g.yas pa yis// rin chen 'dzin cing g.yon du gzigs// rlung oM sarba sid+d+him+bi// pra yats+tsha brjod chos ma dmar// g.yas pang g.yon pa snga ma bzhin// g.yon du gzigs te dbang ldan du// rig byed tshig gi dang po
35b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // sarba kar+m+ma su tsa me// tsit+ta shre yaHku ru brjod// sa bon las byung las ma ni// ljang ser sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas// phyag g.yon mthun la g.yon du gzigs// yum bzhi'i dbu rgyan rigs kyi bdag/ de rjes 'khor
35b4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i rtsibs la ni// dbang ldan las brtsams g.yon skor du// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// sems dpa' bcu drug rim bzhin bskyed// hU~M ha ha ha ha ho b+ha// ga bAn badz+ra satwa ni// kun la khyab par byed pa'i tshig/ ma ni 'dren pa'i
35b5(rgyud 'grel): don yin te// me ni bdag tu rnam par bshad// muny+tsa 'dzin par brjod cig bya'o// de phyir bdag ni zungs la drongs// khyad par byung ba rdo rje sems// sku mdog ljang gu g.yon du gzigs// gaugayas po rdo rje rtse lnga pa// g.yon pa
35b6(rgyud 'grel): br-il bu dku brten te// pad+ma'i gdan la brten pa'o// badz+rI las rdo rje rgyal po ser// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon lcags kyu// khacig g.yas pa lcags kyu ste// phyag g.yon da ni brten pa 'chang // sa byung chags pa sku mdog das
36a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas mang g.yon ni gnu 'dzin pa'o// s+thA las legs pa mchud mdog/ sgrubs sbyin g.yas la g.yon dkur brtan// b+ha 'byung rdo rje rin chen ser// dbang bskur phreng ba gnyis kyis 'dzin// grwa lus rdo
36a2(rgyud 'grel): rje nyi ma dmar// snying gar phyag gnyis nyi mar 'dzin// ban las rgyal mtshan na mkha'i mdog/ yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni// phyag gnyis kyis ni 'dzin pa'o// ma byung bzhad pa sun+ti ri// mdog can rgyal mtshan so yis
36a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o// hA las chos ni dkar dmar mdog/ g.yon gyi pang sdong g.yas kyis 'byed// sa 'thung rnon po gur gum mdog/ phyag g.yon po ti g.yas ral gri/ ma lus byung ba'i rdo rje rgyu// sku mdog
36a4(rgyud 'grel): ser la chos 'chang rgya// ya las rdo rje 'od mdog dmar// g.yon du g.yas pas lce 'dzin pa// sa las rdo rje las ljang ser// phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa// gar stabs kyis ni spyi bor 'dzin// tra las bsrung ba sku mdog sar
36a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis rdo rje go 'dzin// twa byung rdo rje gnod sbyin nag/ phyag gnyis kyis ni zhal phyogs su// mche 'dzin bdud rnams 'jigs byed rgya// a las rdo rje khu tshur dkar// rdo rje 'ching byung gnyis kyis 'dzin// dI ni hU~M gi rang
36a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin can// ting 'dzin sems dpar shes par bya// a ni ye shes sems dpa' ste// de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya// phyag rgya snga ma la gnas nas// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las// 'od zer spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// oM shrI badz+ra satwa
36b1(rgyud 'grel): dang // sa ma yo he zhes brjod pas// dam tshig sems dpa' bdag nyid bsam// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas// rang mdun namakhar zla dkyil la// gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dgug/ yang ni sa mA ya stu zhes// ting nge 'dzin dang
36b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'phreng // de yang mdun gyi na mkha' la// zla steng a nI dkar po yi// ngo bor zhugs pa'i ye shes sems// bkug ste gtso bo'i thugs kar bstim// yang na phyag rgya snga ma yis// 'di lta'i rdo rje sems dpa' dgug
36b3(rgyud 'grel): ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// hUM ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa// de yi dbus kyi rtse mo la// oM nI ye shes sems dpa' ste// de nyid rdo rje sems dpas bshad// rtse mo bzhi la rigs bzhi ste// mtshams bzhir lha mo rnam pa bzhi// 'od rtse
36b4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du rnam par gnas// de nas zla ba rdo rje la// rdo rje hUM ni oM lA ste// de la rtse bzhi'i 'od dbus la// mtshams kyang dbus la thim pa dang // de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' la// thim par gyur par rnam bsam bya// de ni dam
36b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig sems dpa' la// de yang gnyis med don du byA shad// de rjes yi ge hUM gyur pas// rdo rje lce ni rdo rje yi// 'od zer spro bar rnam bsam bya// de yis phyi nang dag byas nas// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur te// de rjes bzlas
36b6(rgyud 'grel): pa tsi nus bya// bzlas pa'i rigs pa 'di lta ste/ oM shrI badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ma nu pa la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me b+hi ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/
37a1(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta shre yo/ ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bAn/ badz+ra satwA mA me muny+dzu/ badz+rA b+hA ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH// des ni dam tshig bsrung bar gsungs// yi ge brgya pa btus pa yis/
37a2(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas sems dpa' gsum gyi don// sgrub thabs dge ba gsum ldan pa// rnal 'byor rgyud dang mthun par bstan// da ni bya ba'i rgyud gsungs pa'i// sems dpa' gsum gyi sbyor ba bzlum// thog mar rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis//
37a3(rgyud 'grel): phung po lnga yi nga rgyal bya// de rjes sngags ni 'di ltar brjod// oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+rI Na~M/ ma hA pra ti sa raM/ rak+Sha rAk+Sha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// / lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom byas la// de rjes bya mos sogs dran byas
37a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// mdun du la mo skyes gru ba zhi ste// de dbus sna tshogs pad+ma bsam// de steng oM las byung ba yi// zla bo'i dkyil 'khor rna ma bar+ya bsam// ut+pal phyag rgyas bkug pa yi// ut+pal rigs brgya bsam par bya// phyag rgya
37a5(rgyud 'grel): de ni dam tshig gi/ sems dpar yang ni rnam par bshad// de rjes ye shes sems dpa' ni// sngags 'di yis ni dgug par bya// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti/ pra sA d+hi tsi d+ha yaM ku ru a/ pu dzaM gr-ih+Na/ a tra san+na hi to b+ha baM/ 'od brjod
37a6(rgyud 'grel): M ku'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa'ang spyan drang bya// da ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' yi// sbyor ba 'dri ltar shes par bya// oM b+ha gra ba ti sa ma ye shwa ra sarba bud+d+ha ma tI/ tra re a tr-iSh+Tha nAny+tsi mr-i ku ru sI hI// te yi ga hUM gi sa
37b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun pa las/ byung ba'i sgrol ma ljang gu ni// zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum ste// me bskyod pa yi dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams kyis ni legs par spras// g.yas zhal dkar la g.yon nal gnas/ g.yas gsum phyag mtshan
37b2(rgyud 'grel): rim par ni// mI 'jigs sbyin da mngar dang nI// rdo rje rtse lnga rnam byur 'dzin// g.yon gsum rim bzhin sdigs mdzub dang // gan dang ud+g+ha shes par bya// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du nAM// pad+ma rtags rgya'i banags stabs
37b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// mkha' lding lnga la brten pa'o// dbus kyi ma par lding dkur po ste// lhag pa gnyis kyis bus b+ha 'dzin// g.yas sngo nag dang ser po ste// g.yon pa ljang dang dmar po yang // rim+b+ha pa ba zhin du shes par bya// don ting 'dzin
37b4(rgyud 'grel): sems dper bshid// rang lus la nI na mi dgu don// yo ge gsum gyis byin gyis parlabs// oM da// ra spyi bo'i gtsug tu ste// mgrin par A/ yig dmyu bsam// dz+nyA nag snying ga'i pad+ma R+YA// de ltar rang lus rnam bsam
37b5(rgyud 'grel): b+hA// sa bon rnams la legs skor dzA'i// yi ge brgya pa bzlas byar bya// oM b+ha ga pa tI d+hA ra~M/ sa ma ya me nu pA la ya/ trI ra ka twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i d+hi mi b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ a nr-irak+to sa b+hA ba/ suM pa~M ts+tsho ma~M b+hu ba/ sar+b+ba sid+d+ha me pra
37b6(rgyud 'grel): yots+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa mo/ tsiN+Ti gr-i ye ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha hoHb+ha ga bA tI badz+ra tA re mA me muny+tsa tA ra/ b+ha ga ba ti me bA sa ma ya satwa aH/ 'di ltar mi sbyo'i bar du bzla// smon lam rgya chen ba ta
38a1(rgyud 'grel): byas la// oM gam+b+ha t+na bud+d+ha gar ya pun+d+ha ra ga ma na ya s+t+ra/ dzaHsgrub te// zhes bya ba'i don nu o khyud ni sangs rgyas gnas su gshegs// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o// hUM gis
38a2(rgyud 'grel): dgug cing dzaHyis gshegs// baM gyis btsongs shing hoHsa dgyes pa'o// / de ltar bya ba'i rgyud la ni// brten pa'i sems dpa' gsum don bshad// da ni rgyu yi theg pa las// grags pa'i sems
38a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i don bshad bya// / yang na gcig kyang ldan pas kyang // 'jig rten chos la blo ldog ste// rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// bde bar stan la 'dug nas su// 'di ltar bsgrub phyi'i sbyor ba tsam/
38a4(rgyud 'grel): dang por maN+Dal la sdigs bsham// sems bskyed sngon du stong ba yis// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ skyabs kyi dam pa bla mod pa'i// dkon mchog gsum lo skyabs su mchi// zhes brjod lus yid
38a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ldan bya// des ni byang chub sems dpa' yi// dge bsnyen du ni mi 'gyur te// de rjes byang chub sems bskyed de// bo dag dang tha mi dad pA yi// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms kyang ni bsgom par bya// de
38a6(rgyud 'grel): yoM rjes la bla ma la// dod pa bskyed de dang po bsgom// de ltar byas pas 'bras bu ni// 'khor ba las ni grol 'gyur te// bar chad rnams kyang mi 'byung ngo // gdams ngage don ni rnam pa gnyis// bsgom dang de bzhin bzlas
38b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// / sgrom don dang po mal nas langs byas te// de rjes dkon mchog gsum ni rjes dran bya// de nas bdag nyid thog mar khrus byas te// rang gi lag mthil g.yon par oM las ni// zla ba'i dkyil
38b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de yi steng du hrIH// de las byung ba 'o ma'i mdog can gyi// bdud rtsi'i chu bsam oM hrIHswA hA yi// byin gyis brlab bya chu dang rang nyid la// dbang bskur tshul du sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ A b+hi She ka sa ma ya
38b3(rgyud 'grel): shrI ye hUM// zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod rang nyid spyi bor gtor// bsgrub pa'i gnas la sogs la gtor bar bya// de rjes yaM gaM gsum gnas ni gsum du dgod// spyi bor tshangs pa'i yi ge dkar po ste// mgrin par ye shes
38b4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge AHdmar bsam// khro yig sngon po snying ga'i dbus su dgod// de ni sems dpa' rnam pa gsum du bshad// de yi man ngag khro yig pad+ma ste// a ni zla ba rIgr-I byed dang po'i tshig/ bcom ldan shAkya thub pa yin zhes
38b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de nI gnas gsum bsrung zhing dag pa'o// de rjes shar gyi phyogs su kha ltas la// gser sogs snod du chu ni gtsang ma ltam// shar gyi phyogs su na mkhar hUM yig bsam// de gyur las byung pad+ma'i gi sar la// u
38b6(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba daM yi rigs skyes mtshon// de steng rnam snang yig gyur nyi dkyil 'khor// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lta bur rnam par bsam// zla dbus bcom ldan shAka thub chos 'tshang rgya// nyi 'od thub dang gnyis su med par bsam// de yi
39a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes la gsang sngags 'di brjod de// oM na mo ta thA ga ta s+ya phaT phaT/ mriSh+TaM anaN+Da pa naM/ pra yats+tsha me swA hA// me tog re blangs sngags re brjod byas pas// sngar bshams chu la nyi shu rtswa gcig
39a2(rgyud 'grel): dor// yang na rig pa de nyid brjod byas la// snga ma'i me tog re re blangs nas kyang // maN+Dal la sogs phyogs gtsang mar ni// bcom ldan shAkya thub la dbul bar bya// de rjes dpal ldan yi ge brgya pa ni// mi skyo'i yid
39a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ci nus bzlas par bya// oM b+ho ga bA ti mu na ye sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ shAkya mu ni tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho mau b+ha ba/ su t+yo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo mi b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+ham+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba kar+m+ma su tsa me/ tsit+sa shre yauHku ru
39a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ ha ha ha ha hauHb+ha gau bAn shAkya mu ne mA me muny+tsa/ bud+d+ha b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH// / de ni thog mar gti mug yi ge la// bar du sgra gcan tha mar dbyings yig las// yI ge a ste sems dpa'
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum du grags// de rjes dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo byas te// dziHhUM baM hoHsa gshegs su gsol bar bya// rigs gnas lnga la mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang // spyad par rtogs dka' rdo rje 'chang gi dngos// rtsa ba'i grub chen lU yi nas
39a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa// gdams pa phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpa' gsum// sgrub thabs slob ma mchog gi gsol btab ngor// bla ma'i gdams pa bum rgyun legs 'thungs pa// brtson shugs 'bar ba'i snying rjes sna drangs te// nyams
39b1(rgyud 'grel): chung bzung phyir rin chen phreng bar bsdebs// ji srid thub pa'i bstan pa gnas par du// mtha' khob phyogs su dar cing rgyas gyur cig/ rje btsun gyi yi ge brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi sgom pa'i thabs// slob dpon na ro pas mdzad
39b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ rat+na mA la nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po kun gyi bdag nyid ni// dngos po'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i// bla ma rjes
39b3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal nas// rin chen phreng ba bshad par bya// sgom dang sgom rgyu rnal 'byor gyi// rtog pa de ni bden pa min// bden gnyis grub pa med pa'i phyir// sgom la brten par mi bya'o// chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid// gang yang
39b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin rtogs pa de// zhi ba rang rig gnyis su mdo// bla ma dam pa'i dgongs po'o// mtshan nyid med pa'i shes rab ni// phyag rgya bla ma'i gdams ngag bcas// phra zhing rang rgyud ye shes kyi// ma rdzogs pa yi skad cig la// yang
39b5(rgyud 'grel): ngag grub par mi 'gyur ro// bla ma gnyis pa'i dgongs pa'o// rnam par rtog pa bden pa min// rtog med rjes su 'brel pa yi// rim gyis rnam rtog rnams dang bral// dper nu tha gu'i sbrul 'dzin te// rnal 'byor rtog med bde
39b6(rgyud 'grel): ba che// bla ma gsum pa'i dgongs pa'o// ma rig pa yi snang ba 'di// rang rig ye shes rtogs 'gyur na// rmi lam nyin mo'i snang ba rnams// mnyam pa nyid du don rtogs pas// tshor ba tshor byed gnyis su med// gnyis dang gnyis
40a1(rgyud 'grel): mi spangs pa yi// gang la mi gnas rnal 'byor de// shes rab pha rol phyin ma yin// bla ma bzhi pa'i dgongs pa'o// bdag nyid shu li'i dgongs pa ni// dmigs med snying rje'i rnal 'byor pa//
40a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'dzin gnyis med don rtogs can// zab mo'i chos nyid la gnas pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gonas thob 'gyur// rtog pa dang bral dri ma meng // rnal 'byor rol pa'i lta spyod na// chos rnams rang bzhin rtogs gyur na//
40a3(rgyud 'grel): babede dang sdug bsngal gnyis mdo rtogs// de ltar rtogs pas rang grol 'gyur// rin chen phreng ba zhes bya bya/ slob dpon si la a lis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ ku ru Na ad+d+hiSh+ThA na b+ha ba na nA
40a4(rgyud 'grel): mA/ bod skad du/ snying rje bsgom pa'i byin brlabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma'i byin brlabs thob gyur pas// skad cig gcig la mnyam par rtogs// rgyud sde rnams la mi gsal bas//
40a5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje sgom pa'i nyams len bshad// rnal 'byor de nyid dran byas nas// mtshan bcas mtshan med rang bzhin gyi// snying ga'i dbus su thig le ni// mun pa'i rab rib bsal gyur pa// zla rtse'i steng du bsam par bya// rang
40a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bdag po rol mdzad pa// drag po'i gzi borjid phreng bas brgyan// he ru ka dpal mgon po che// bdud bzhi las ni rnam par rgyal// lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod gnas// bde ba chen po dga' bo'i mchog/ ro myang longs
40b1(rgyud 'grel): sku byung sems ldan// yi ge rgyu med yang dag gsungs// lha sgom phreng sngags mtshams gcod dang // sbyin bsreg klog sogs dgos pa med// rtog pa rnams ni spang byas nas// 'jigs med snying rje bskyed byas la// slob ma dang
40b2(rgyud 'grel): nibadag nyid kyi// snying gar bsgoms pas ye shes ni// thams cad mkhyen dang mnyam par 'gyur// de nyid rtogs pas yang dgu phreng // rdzu 'phrul bzhi drong sa bcu thob// namakhar spyod de mi snang 'grub// skye ba
40b3(rgyud 'grel): dradunu zhing rang sems rtogs// 'dus dang mya 'ongs da ltar ni// rlung rig gnon rig thams cad kyi// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltar// sna tshogs sems kyi rang bzhin gyi// nyams skyes rnal 'byor grub papo thob// snying
40b4(rgyud 'grel): rje sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon tu lo pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rmya gar skad du/ ma hA yA na a ba tA rinA ma/ bod skad du// theg pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa
40b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid ni// bde chen rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi yis// mtha' dbus mnyam pa'i tshang na du sel// dga' ba che la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa rnams kyi mchog
40b6(rgyud 'grel): byur po// shes dang shes byi ro ye shes ni// gzhan la phan phyir rang la ni// bdag gis gtan la dbab par bya// 'dzin dang 'dzin bya'i rig pa ni// so so'i las dang rnam par ldan// dngos po gzugs can 'ching bar
41a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu// phyi dang nang gi gzugs med pas// de nyid ma grub gnyis med do// glang zhig 'dzin pa gzugs yin te// 'dzin pa med pas de nyid do// de ni dam pa'i ye shes te// lhun grub kha dog dbyibs
41a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bral// mkhas pa rnams kyis rang rig rtogs// gang zhig rig pa stong pa de// stong pa min la rig pa min// 'di dag thams cad rang 'gag go// bden gnyis bral ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// stong gnyid rig pa'i lta ba 'di//
41a3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje chen po'i shes rab bo// rdzogs pa'i rim dang lha sgrub sogs// rgyud rnams kun las gsungs pas kyang // de nyid don ngam ye shes min// don ngam ye shes stobs kyis ni// rdzogs pa'i lha ni grub par 'gyur// de
41a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir bdag ni rdo khan+tis// blo dman rnams kyi yul min pa// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med bshad// theg pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon chen po rdo khan+tis mdzad pa rdzogs
41a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta s+ya sa pra d+ha ya byA baSh+TA naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems la glos 'debs zhes bya ba/ yum rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'byung po rnams kyis bskor byas pa'i
41a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// khams gsum sems can rnams kyi sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir// bdag gzhan rnams kyi don du sems la phan pa'i gros 'debs bya// 'dod pa pad+ma'i chu ltar rig nas soms
41b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi// bla med lta bsgom 'bras bu khyod kyis dran par gyis// de yis dpal ldan zhal mthong gnyis med don rtogs te// de phyir nyams len brtson pas phyag rgya chen po thob pa'i phyir// sna tshogs gzugs sgyu sogs la ma
41b2(rgyud 'grel): chags ma zhen na// 'khor bar mi go nas rgyu med mya ngan 'das pa thob// pad+ma bzhin mdzes mngon sum mig gi dbang po dang // sgra brnyan rna ba nyams shing sems nyid rmongs 'gyur bas// kye ma zhe sdang phrag dog dug ni ci phyir
41b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// sgra dkar gnyer ma la sogs khyod kyis mthong gyur kyang // yongs su 'chol ba'i zhen pas nyes pa skyon gyis bcings// rab 'bring tha ma'i spyod lam 'dod chags zhe sdang gis// mkhas btsun mngon pa'i nga rgyal 'khor
41b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas su 'khyam// yi dgas lha mini dud 'gro la sogs sdug bsngal mang // de phyir phrag dog spangs la rang nyid dmigs par gyis// lha dang klu dang mo rnams bde bar grangs med thob gyur kyang // sems kyi rgyal po 'dod pas
41b5(rgyud 'grel): mi ngoms ngo mtshar che// gnyen bral sdug bsngal mchi ma rgya mtsho bas kyang lhag/ dur khrod gnas kyi keng rus bsags pa ri dang mnyam// 'dod bI'i rma phyung 'khrugs pa'i khrag ni mtshe dang 'dra// kye ma sems kye rgyal po'i
41b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ci phyir srid mi spong // mi lus 'dod bya khom ldan yang dag thob byas nas// dngos po rnams ni chu bur lta bur brtags byas la// khyod kyis bdag gzhan rnams la ji srid phan par gyis// 'khor ba'i 'dam la bying
42a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur thar pa shin tu dka'// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ngu 'bod tshwa grang sreg cing btsir// sred pas phrag dog yi dgas bkres skom skye 'gyur la// sIng d+hA'i gnas thob dud 'gro phan tshun zhe sdang che// lha
42a2(rgyud 'grel): yang gnas nas lhung 'gyur mi rnams sdug bsngal mang // de ltar 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal khyod kyis dran byos la// don dam kun rdzob tha snyad sna tshogs spang bar gyis// longs spyod sprin phung glog ltar rnam par g.yo bar 'gyur// tshe
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ni rlung gis bskyod pa'i pad+ma'i chu ltar 'jig/ leng tshe rnams ni mi rtag de ltar bltas byas nas// mkhas pa rnams ni myur du nags su 'gro bar gyis// 'khor ba'i 'dod pa'i gnyen bshes chags pas phrag dog skye// mthar
42a4(rgyud 'grel): yang gshin rje'i gnas 'gro rgyal ba thob mi 'gyur// khyod kyis de ltar shes na thar pa'i lam thob bo// mI lus dam pa yang dang yang du thob pa dka'// dper na rgya mtsho'i chu rlabs rlangs snang zla ba'i gzugs brnyan dang /
42a5(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam mig 'phrul 'khrul snang sna tshogs bsgom byed na// 'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings grol rgyal bya bzhin no// de phyir sems nyid ma chags ma zhen nyams len gyis// 'khrul zad gang zhig rnal 'byor bde ba thob pa
42a6(rgyud 'grel): nges// sems gsal ye li gA birgya yi sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob// sems kyi gros 'debs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a dze kis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ sma na marga pa la
42b1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA mu dra b+hA bAn nA ma/ bod skad du/ gzhi lam 'bras bu sgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i nyams len zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyi ni// rtsa gsum rgyud da'i bla ma dang // yig 'bru gsum
42b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi nyams len no// nyam chung nyon cig bshad par bya// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo nas// sna bug gnyis dang tshangs pa'i bar// rtsa gsum la ni sems gtang bya// g.yon gyi dkar dang g.yas rtse dmar// dbus kyi mi bskyod mthing
42b3(rgyud 'grel): ga la// g.yas par hUM dang g.yon par oM// tshangs pa bu gar a yig bsam// 'od gsal mthing ga dkar dang dmar// khams gsum sprul pa'i 'od kyis khyab// gdul bya btul nas slar yang thim// yi ge gsum gyi zla
42b4(rgyud 'grel): chos la// stong pa'i thig la steng du ni// rgyad pa'i bla ma 'ong gsal ni// de steng 'di ltar bsgom par bya// g.yon gyi sna bug yi ge la// yid ches nyams myong bla ma ni// skor ma lta bu'i 'od gsal bsgom// 'bras bu mngon
42b5(rgyud 'grel): sum bla ma ste// hUM yig zla chos snying du ste// bstan par bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rlung gsum 'ogag ste gdon gri sum+b+ha sel// dug gsum rnam rtog bral 'gyur ba// rgyu 'bras chos kyi rtog pa sbyangs// lus kyi dgon
42b6(rgyud 'grel): ba brtan 'gyur bas// bdag gzhan gnyis med don rtogs te// dur khrod kyi ni 'jigs pa spangs// ha ri tsan dran mkha'i dbyings// dri za'i grong khyer longs spyod byed// gzhi lam 'bras bu bla ma bsgom pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i
43a1(rgyud 'grel): nyams len zhes bya ba/ slob dpon paM ka las mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ nA da bin+na dA re yo gi ni tsar+ya nA mA/ bod skad du/ rtswa rlung gi sgo nas rnal 'byor gyi
43a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa zhes bya ba/ yum bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni mdog sdug 'phyon ma min// dbyibs legs 'phyon ma'ang ma yin te// dgyes rdor spyod pa'i dge sbyong gis// de ni bdag gi bdag por 'gyur// bdag
43a3(rgyud 'grel): ni mtshams su 'phung bar 'gyur// b+han+d+ha po yis mtshams su bcom// de ni bdag gis ji ltar bya// phyogs bzhir bltas na thar pa med// thams cad bltas pas na mkha'i dbyings// bdag ni mtshams su phung bar 'gyur//
43a4(rgyud 'grel): b+han+d+ha pa yis mtshams su btsam// dwa ni stong pa'i de nyid rtogs// spros dang sems khyod ci rtogs na// de dor gzhan cig 'gro bar byed// bdag ni mtshams su phur bar 'gyuraro// b+han+d+ha pa yis mtshams su bcom// da
43a5(rgyud 'grel): ni dur khrod dgon pu ru// de ru bdag ni gnas par byed// ri spyod pa yi gnas dag tu// sgyu rgu'i rgyun ni bcad nas gnas// bdag ni mtshams su 'phung bar 'gyur// b+han+d+ha pa yis mchims su bcom// b+han+d+ha mkhas pa
43a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po nges// sna tshogs sems ni gar byed pa// de yi rang bzhin dbang du 'dus// bdag nem tshoms su 'phung bar 'gyur// b+han+d+ha pa yis mtshoms su bcom// rtsa rlung gi sgo nas rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa zhes bya ba/
43b1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon DoM bi bas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ak+Sha rA dAM pa u ba de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ yi ge gnyis pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// reg byed dang
43b2(rgyud 'grel): ni brtun shin yin// dzA dang mu sa la brtun brdungs yin// sa ma b+he dang brtun du byas// a thar shril mas phyag rngur bya swa// kye'i bdag gis brtun 'di ni// bla ma dam po'i bka' dang brdungs// bla ma dom pa'i man ngag dang // drangs
43b3(rgyud 'grel): shing rkang pas brdeg par byed// dngos po'i rang bzhin spyod pa na// lte ba drug ni sangs rgyas pa'i// lamo 'di bdog gis dang du blangs// kye ma rtse gcig sems kyis brdungs// 'di ltar 'bras bu nag po las// bsod nams
43b4(rgyud 'grel): brdeg pa gnyi ka yi// bsnon pas snyigs ma zad 'gyur te// rang sems stong pa nyid du lus// kye 'o bdag gi brtun brdungs yi ni// nyi zla gnyis ni 'gram shing byas// rkang pa'i rtun nad bdag gis gnas// 'di ni lkug pa'i rmi
43b5(rgyud 'grel): lam 'dra// ji ltar gang la smra bar byed// kye 'o bdag gi brtun shing ni// na mkha'i he dang hUM sgra sgrogs// srid de'i nges pa gnyis spangs te// nyin mtshan skad cig re re la// btsun dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas// yi ge gnyis pa'i
43b6(rgyud 'grel): man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon DoM bos mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar skad du/ a nu yo ga ta tA b+ha ba na aSh+Ta de sha yi nA ma/ bod skad du/ de nyid bde ba sgom pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal
44a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor sgom pa'i man ngag ces bya ba// rdzogs pA'i rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig snying gar kha sbyor pad+ma'i dbus su ni// sems nyid phra zhing rab gsal khyab la nyams dang ldan// khams gsum
44a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nye bar gnyis med thob 'gyur ba// mnyam zhing gnyis med chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yo 'gyur dbang po'i rta rgod nang du thim pa de// rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes yang dag snod du ni// mkhas pas gnyis med
44a3(rgyud 'grel): thob 'gyur myur ma'i don rtogs pas// dpal ldan dri med na mkha' ltar ni lta ba grub// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni// chos dang chos nyid bsgoms pas chos sku'i rang bzhin thob// de nyid dran tsher rig pa med 'gyur
44a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes mthong // shin tu bsgoms pa'i dgos pa 'od gsal yid gnyis med// yi ge med pa'i thig le snying gar gnas pa ni// sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu skye// de las rdo rje mkha' 'gro snying rjer ldan pa thams cad
44a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' khamasu bcas// de nyid rang bzhin mchod pas mchod 'os rnams las mchod pa thob// gang zhig rnal 'byor sgom byed sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod// mchod sgom byed pa
44a6(rgyud 'grel): de ni 'bras bu sangs rgyas gsung // rdo rje rnal 'byor nang gi bdag nyid gnyis sbyor bas// de phyir rdo rje'i mchod pas mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod// ye shes lnga 'phros sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// gang zhig rnal 'byor
44b1(rgyud 'grel): lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo la// ban+du ka yis 'bras ltar bang drug ge sar dbus// a Ni su tri pre du ka rigs drug 'gag phyir bsgom// dbus su khong stong yig 'bru drug po rim gyis ni// ka la thim pas sems nyid 'ag/ ga ste
44b2(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med// sgrib bya sgrib byed rang sems dri ming dmigs pa med// rgyud rnams 'dul phyir gsungs te rnal 'byor don dam mon// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub 'gyur rang bzhin mchod pa che// gnas chen nyi shu rang gnas sa lam
44b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa thob// de phyir de nyid gzhan du mi tshol rang la gnas// rnal 'byor de nyid mi rtogs 'khyams nas ci zhig bya// gal te de nyid rtogs na gzhan du ci zhig bya// bskal bzang bdag nyid rang la grub cing de nyid thob// gang
44b4(rgyud 'grel): zhig gang gis sbyor bas brtul zhugs can gyis ni// gnyis mang bsam gautan la ni smyon pa bzhin tu spyod// na mkha'o gos can yang na rnal 'byor de min pa// lus lo yi dam lha gnas rang bzhin de nyid bsgom// zla ba drug tu ngag
44b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdams mkha' 'gro rnams dang phreng // ye shes 'od 'phros rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam// sgyu ma mkhan lhur 'dul mchog 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// de nyid bde bsgom pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gdams
44b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ sra ba pa rits+tshe da na nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag ces bya ba// yum ngon grub ma la phyag 'tshal
45a1(rgyud 'grel): lo// rkyen dang rgya mtsho rgyas pa dang // grang ba spyod la mnyes bya ste// kha zas byin brlabs dam tshig gis// grang bya 'dzag nga chu rgyun bzlog/ rdo rje'i rkeng par dar dkar bsgril// dar g+hi rlung pas dam pAr+ya bcing // g.yas
45a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon ra dag rab tu sngags// bsam gtan lte bar gtad par gyis// rnam snang sgo ru sku yig sgom// rgyun gcong sngags ni zhal nas longs// zla ba rgya sa na rgya mtsho lung // kha brag brgyad la chu rgyun 'dzag/ ga gA'i rgyun bzlog rnal 'byor kye//
45a3(rgyud 'grel): mi ltung tshe ring bde ba thob// rdo rje'i spyi bor drag ser bsgom// hU~M trAM hUM gis thig le 'dra// steng rlung bcings nas bzhag pa ltar// g.yas skor g.yon skor rtsa la gram// rgya mtsho grang ba me yis bsro// bcud len smin gyi sbyor ba byas// a ru
45a4(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog 'o mar bskol// tsho bu gsum dang cong zhi bsre// bcud can zas dang sbyar la bza'// na ba'i sa ru mu sdug dang // bem brtol brgya dang rtsa brgyang brgyab// mar skol ras bal me rtswa gdab// grang 'don pags pa rkeng l-i dkri/ lha
45a5(rgyud 'grel): srung log na gdon gyis rkyen// rgya mtsho ma thub 'dzag pa la// rang 'byung me tog gu gul nag/ yungs kar thal ba mi klang bsre// ha bu'i sngags bzlas rdo rje byug/ dog pa nag pos bcing bar bya// drag po'i spyod lam bzlas byas nas//
45a6(rgyud 'grel): bub pa'i rlung bcing hUM phaT 'dren// rnal 'byor kha zas nyams na ni// se'u'i shun pags 'o mar skol// kha ra btab 'thungs 'gag par 'gyur// dam tshig nyams nas rgyu ba la// mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs zhu// gzhan du thams
45b1(rgyud 'grel): tsAng rnal 'byor la// yod pa dag ni ma yin no// 'dzag pa gcod pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ku ku ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ ti thi ka tsaN+Da lI ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ mu stegs
45b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpal thang skud can la phyag 'tshal lo// bud med gnas ni dbu rgyan mA// rigs ni gtum mo'i rigs gyur pa// srid pa gsum yang sreg par byed// me lces na mkhar khyab par byed/
45b3(rgyud 'grel): tsan+da dpal ni gor byed 'gyur// na mkhar rje chungs la rje chung brdung // rdo rje me yis rgya mtsho skems// nyi zla gnyis kyang skyabs su bzhugs// gar byed dpal gyi a con thod ba can// na mkhar rje chung sa la rje chung brdung // lha
45b4(rgyud 'grel): dang lha min mi rnams dang // dbang phyug u ma la sogs pa// thams cad ye shes me yis bsregs// gar byed dpal gyi a rtsen thod pa can// na mkhar rje chung sa la rje chung brdang // rnal 'byor ma ni khrid byas nas// me gon po'i
45b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas su 'jug par byed// 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor glu ru blangs// gar byed dpal nI A tsen thod pa can// na mkhar rje chung sa la rje chung brdung // mu stegs kyi gtum mAM zhes bya ba/ slob dpon A tsen+das mdzad pa rdzogs
45b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+ha tur+b+ha d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsor 'gyur gyi rtsi zhes bya ba/ yum rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin po'i pha rol rdzogs pa'i phyiraro// gser 'gyur rtsi yi gdams pa ni// nyams
46a1(rgyud 'grel): su len pa'i gang zag la// tshogs ni bsag phyir bshad par bya// bal po se'u sman tsha dang // sa'u r+ya bsre ka si sa// chung skyur dang ni sbyar bar bya// zangs kyi snod du zhag gsum bzhag/ de nas bdun
46a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum nyi shu gcig/ zhal gyi gdams pa'i sman ci yis// srab mo'i lcags rnams zangs su 'gyur// dngul chu dang ni khams dang // sems rtsi dang ni lci ba ni// lde gur byas nas de yi dbus// zangs mar bzhag na dngul du
46a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// rta mig dang ni lug ru dang // ru sbal shun lpags shi lar bcas// bzhus pa'i gser la dngul btab nas// de rnams bsdus pa'i cha brgyad kyis// bzhus pa'i zha nyo btab byas nas// zla ba ltar ni dngul 'gyur ro// dngul
46a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khar ba mnyam byas nas// zha nye'i tshad du bsre bar bya// phyi lha'i snod kyi nang du ni// zhu bas thams cad dngul du 'gyur// sha chen srang ni brgyad dang ni// zha nye dkar po de dang mnyamo// sa dzA srang gnyis sman tsha dang // dug bsrung
46a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig dang dngul chu monyam// gangs can sman ni khu ba yis// snga ma'i smin rnams mnye bar bya// thams cad ra dkar nang du bcug/ yang na DA si'i snod du ni// kha sbyor byas nas bsreg par bya// sman phal bar du bzhag nas bton//
46a6(rgyud 'grel): dngul ni zla ltar grub par 'gyur// skyes pa tsam gyi she'u yi// bu ri sha na blang byas nas// nyi mo zhu nas btab par bya// de ni bzhi 'gyur phye yis ni// zhi nye dkar po'i zhun mor la// btab nas chu skams dngul du 'gyur// sman tshad dang ni tsha
46b1(rgyud 'grel): le dang // ya bkAr sa dzi ka/ rtsi dkar sman ni khu ba dang // dug dang ha nu ma sha ti'i// chu ni ma he'i zho dang sbyar// zhag gsum zha nye'i nang du bzhag/ du ba mi 'byung thabs kyis bsreg/ dngul 'gyur 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal sel// dngul
46b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur sbyor ba bshad byas nas// gser 'gyur bdud rtsi bshad par bya// gangs can ri bo rnams la ni// ru tan+ti zhes sman mchog grags// lo mas sa phyogs zil mi bral// gser gyi mdog can khu ba 'dzag/ zha nye dkar po dngul
46b3(rgyud 'grel): chu ldan// thal sbyor zhal gyi gdams pa yis// reg pas dngul zangs gser du 'gyur// dang po me yis dngul chu yi// mi 'chor pa yi sbyor ba bya// de nas sman gyi rtsi shes nas// rnal 'byor gser 'gyur 'grub 'gyur ro// mi dang /
46b4(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig ma gnas na// gser 'gyur 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// de'i phyir kha sbyor 'khor lo yis// ci nas dngul chu bcing bar bya// de bcings gang yang gser du 'gyur// zos pas thams cad rdo rje'i sku ru 'gyur// gser 'gyur
46b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i gdams pa/ slob dpon na lis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta tse ti la sha pa no pa ya~M/ bod skad du/ sems dang sems nyid 'dul ba'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal
46b6(rgyud 'grel): lo// spu mdog sna tshogs te// rkang pas rdegs cing phyogs bzhir 'gro// brngas nas na mkhar bsad par byas// rang gi sha yis rang lus la// rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song // b+hu su ku yi rngon po yis// skad cig gcig kyang gtong
47a1(rgyud 'grel): ba med// ri dgas mo ni pho la sgra// nags su gnas na bde bar 'dug/ de nas byung nas gsod par byed// rang gi sha yis rang lus la// rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song // b+hU su ku yi rngon pa yis// skad cig gcig
47a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang gtong ba med// blo ni mo la 'di skad smra// su la bdag gis gnod ma byas// ci yang bdag gis zos pa med// su la bdog gis gnod ma byas// ci yang bdag gis zos pa med// su la'ang gnod pa ma byas na// ci yi phyir na song
47a3(rgyud 'grel): cig smra// rang gi sha yis rang lus la// rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song // b+hu su sku yi rngon pa yis// skad cig gcig kyang gtong ba myed// rtswa dong chu la mi gnod pa'i// gang du gnas kyang ltogs pa med// rtag tu btsal yong ma rnyed
47a4(rgyud 'grel): dwa'i// rI dgus pho mo 'di gnyis ni// bdag gis rnyed par ma gyur to// rang gi sha yis rang lus la// rnam pa kun tu dgra ru song // b+hu spu sku yi rngon pa yis// skad cig gcig kyang gtong ba med// rgyag cing 'gro ba'i ri dwags
47a5(rgyud 'grel): ni// de yis rjes ni rnyed pa med// brngas pas na mkha'i dbyings su gtor// b+hu su sku yi rngon pa yis// skad cig gcig kyang gtong ba meng // sems dang sems nyid 'dul ba'i man ngag ces bya ba// slob dpon shAn+ta de pa
47a6(rgyud 'grel): nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon me ko las gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba de ba d+ha ni sa baM kra ma marga nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i lam zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro rnams la
47b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// mi snyan dgra sngogs spangs pa yi// dben zhing gsang ba'i sa phyogs sam// yid dang mthun pa'i dgon pa ru// rim pa 'di bzhin bsgom par bya// shing gcig byang chub sems yin te// a ba d+hU ti'i chu 'gram la/
47b2(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i gtum mo dur khrod do// ri thong snying ga'i pad+ma la// dgon pa rnam snang gnas yin te// nags tshalnga pad+ma'i gsang ba ru// b+hi Da dang ni rdo rje chu// byang chub sems dang bzhi mnyam dong // rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpa ga med// thig
47b3(rgyud 'grel): le'i gnas ni drug la bsgom// rnal 'byor pa yi sgribs bstan// de nis lus kyi maN+Dal ni// rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i rtsa// lhan cig skyes pa'i nyams dang ldan// zlum po na mkha' lta bu ste// mAthe bong tshad ni bde chen la// oM
47b4(rgyud 'grel): mam haM gnyis gang rung bsgom// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// maN+Dal byin gyis brlabs byas nas// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni// rnal 'byor snying ga'i sgra gcan gyi// steng du hUM ni dung ka bsam// mi bskyod pa yi rgya mtsho la// oM ni
47b5(rgyud 'grel): skar ma lta bu ste// so sor rtog par ye shes ni// mgrin pa'i 'khor lor bsam par bya// byang chub sems dang rak+ta dang // mi bskyod chu yi thig le'o// de ltar byin brlabs rtsa bsgoms nas// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa'i
47b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir// mtshan mang rtsa dang 'khor lo bzhi// phyag rgya bzhi yi rgyas btab nas// thig lo bzhi lo nyams len bya// tshad mang bzhi yiso nyams skye'o// de ltar rnal 'byor bzhi sgoms nas// rdzogs pa'i hUM bsam bgegs bskang ngo // snying
48a1(rgyud 'grel): ga'i khong stong dbus su ni// baM las pad+ma raM nyi ma// hUM las 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'phro// phyi dang nang bgegs mtshams bcad do// de nas rnal 'byor steng nyid ni// skyil krung bcas zhing lus nyid bsrang // mig gi dbang
48a2(rgyud 'grel): bo sna rtser gtang // dngos po thams cad rjes dran nas// dri ma meng pa'i nu mkha' la// skar ma lte bu'i sems nyid kyis// phra rabs tsam gyi bdag gzhan bsgom// stong nyid lta ba brtan byas nas// rtogs pa'i dbang gi rim pa bstan// rdo rje
48a3(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i sbyor ba yis// dkan gyi phyogs su 'gyur lha mo// bde ba chen po'i zla rgyun ni// 'bab bsam dbang bskur lus tshim mo// de nas dpa' bo dpa' mo yis// grang yang dpal ldan 'dus pa'i sku// dri med me long gzugs brnyan
48a4(rgyud 'grel): dang // na mkha'i skyes bu lta bu ni// rang bzhin kha dog dbyibs dang bral// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin ni// na mkha'i dbyings su bsgom par bya// de ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// skal ldan rnams kyi don phyir brtsams// de yis dge
48a5(rgyud 'grel): ba gang thob pa// 'gro ba byang chub thob phyir bsngo// lha kun gyi rdzogs pa'i rim pa/ g+ha d+ha ris mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ so ma sUr+yA ban+d+ha no pA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ nyi zla bcing ba'i thabs zhes bya ba/
48a6(rgyud 'grel): yum don yod grub ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun rnams kyis yon tan brjod mi shes pa yi// gaN+DI'i sgra brdungs skyon smras phyi rol dag tu bskrad// chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying // ngo mtshar phul
48b1(rgyud 'grel): du byung ba'i bi rU ba zhes grags// tshong 'dus srang 'dus 'khyam zhing zas kyi lhag ma za// yud tsam khros pas gang gA'i chu rgyun gyen la zlog/ chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying // yon tan phul du byung ba'i baiR+Sha pa
48b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes grags// chang tshong ngag la khro bar mi byed nyi ma ni// khyod kyis khang par gta' mar bzhag ces smras te 'dug/ chu yi stang gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'bying // ngo mtshar phul du byung ba'i birba pa zhes grags// mu
48b3(rgyud 'grel): stegs rten la spyan zur gzigs pas liM ko bkas// de mthong khyab 'jug lha yi rten te an+d+ra 'dar// nyi ma gta' mar bcug nas chang 'thungs bi rU pa/ 'jig rten rnams ni phyugs 'dra bi rU pa zhes brjod// lhan cig skyes
48b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems nyid phra zhing dri ma med// chu yi steng gshegs me tog len cing chu yi gting mi 'byung // ngo mtshar phul du byung bI'i b+hiR+ShA pa zhes grags// nyi zla bcings pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon birU pa nas brgyud pa/
48b5(rgyud 'grel): ka mA ris mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ hUM ka re tsit+ta bin+d+ha b+ha ba n+yo krA ma/ bod skad du/ sems kyi thig le hA nyid bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ho ru kA la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje nyi zla'i steng
48b6(rgyud 'grel): du ni// de steng rin chen 'od byed pas// pad+ma'i kha ni dbye bar byed// mdzes me lha mdzes btsun mo kye// pad+ma'i chas ni btang ba yis// gzhan na yon tan ci zhig yod// sems kyi bung ba gaM sa ro la// khu ba dag ni 'thung bar
49a1(rgyud 'grel): byed// gzugs ni skams nas 'phur te 'gro/ mi rgod lnga dang me tshogs bzhi// de lnga mnan te thogs tu gnas// dga' ba'i glanu ni bkang byas nas// mda' ni bde ba chen por brgyab// sems
49a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bung ba ge sar la// khu ba dag ni 'thung bar byed// gzugs skams gyur nas 'phur te 'gro/ bung ba mo la 'di skad smra// smras kyang go bar mi byed dam// 'di 'thungs rtag tu 'di ru gnas// bde ba chen po'i khu ba 'di// 'thung
49a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing sgra skad sgrogs par byed// bde dang sdug bsngal grong khyer gnyis// mtshams na bdud rtsi'i rdzing bu gnas// de ru chu 'thung mi byed pa'i// yon tan med pa'i bung ba khyod// sems kyi bung ba ge sar ni// khu ba dag no 'thung
49a4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// gzugs skams gyur nas 'phur te 'gro/ stong nyid zhags pa chen po yis// sems kyi rgyal po bcing byar bya// bde gshegs lnga ni sdom byas nas// gcig tu mgo lA bkur byas te// bde bas gar ni byed par
49a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyuraro// sems nyid kyi thig le'i hUM nyid bsgom pa'i ri ma pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dzA lan+d+ha ris mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya ger skad du/ a tsin+ta b+ha ba ti bA rI b+ha ba nau nA ma/ bod skad du/ bsgom
49a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa sgom pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// dgongs pa mdor bsdus rnal 'byor gyi// tshad med bzhi yi nyams len ni// bsam gyis mi khyab
49b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya// rgyu 'bras stong pa'i rang bzhin la// dngos med gzugs dang gnyis med smra// dmigs med 'bras bu 'bad med 'gyur// dper na 'brug med char bzhin no// de phyir rang bzhin bdag myed kyi// brtul zhugs
49b2(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan rnal 'byorar pas// snang zhing srid pa sna tshogs 'di// dngos po stong pa bdag med de// ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag/ de lta bu yi snying rje la// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// mi sgom mi rtog rang bzhin
49b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal// mtha'i dbus bral ba dbus ma'i don// de lta'i sems kyi rang bzhin sgom// ma rtogs pa yi sems can lnga// nang 'don snying rje bsgom par bya// bdag gi mdun du gang zhig kyang // mnyam par bzhag ste mnyam
49b4(rgyud 'grel): par sgom// de la rnam pa thams cad kyis// gnyis med don ni 'grub 'gyur ro// dgon pa'i snyan brgyud gdams ngag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// kun gyi sems nyid hU~M yig dkar// bdag dang gzhan
49b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi snying gar bsgom// nyi ma'i gdan steng thig ler bsgom// de nyid kyis ni 'phro 'dul// nyon mongs thams cad sbyang bar bsam// de ni gnyis med don yin te// lha yi de nyid rang bzhin med // de ltar snying rje sgom byas nas//
49b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam mi khyab pa'i byams pa ni// phan phyir 'di ltar bsam par bya// rnal 'byor bdag nyid snying ga ru// pad+ma 'ong ba brgyad sran ma'i tshang // de nas 'od bsal dkar dmar te// bar du me lha'i oM yig ni// dngos po'i
50a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gang yang meng// de las ci yang bsam me khyab// gang zhig skom pa'i rnal 'byor de// gnyis mang ye shes 'grub 'gyur ro// gsal rig mang ba chos kyi sku// de ltar phra ba'i rnal 'byor pas//
50a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon shes sharA te gnyis med rtogaso// dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'byung 'gyur la// btang snyoms 'bras bu thob pa'o// kha cig lha mo bzhi bsgoms nas// kha cig dag gi don la brten// gnyis mang sgom pa mi shes so// zhal nas
50a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal du brgyad pa yi// zhal gdams gzhan la phan phyir ni// rA hu las ni bshad par byas// tshad med bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rA hu las mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar
50a4(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ hUM ka ra tsit+ta bin+du b+ha ba na kra nA ma/ bod skad du/ hUM yig sems nyid thig lo bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ yum rdo rje 'phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yas dang g.yon dang dbus ma yi// gyen thur gnas pa'i
50a5(rgyud 'grel): drug la// de rnams la nI sprin drug 'beb// dri dang zla bA sman gnyis ni// gyen thur gnyis kyi dbye ba yis// r-I sa nA nas yang dgu rgyu// chu dong nyi m+b+ha kun 'dar mA// glen thur gnyis kyi dbye ba yis// snga ma bzhin du yang dag
50a6(rgyud 'grel): rmyi// dbus ma a ba d+hU tI li// dbugs dang sgra gcan mi rgyu ba// me ngang chu khams mgrin pa yi// dus gsum gnas pa'i phag mo mchod// nyi zla'i shukra rak+ta yi// thig le 'dzin byed sgra gcan dang // sems nyid thig le
50b1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar dag/ thig le de ni gang la gnas// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbus su ni// kha sbyor pad+ma'i 'dab brgyad la// de'i dbus nyi zla kha sbyor la// nA da bon+d+ha rnam par brgyan// gnas pa phra zhing yungs kar chad// yi ge hUM nyid bsgom par bya//
50b2(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od 'phros thig le bzhi// bang 'dab bzhi la 'phro bar bsam// shAr gyi thig ler mkha' 'gro ma// mi skyod chu yis rang bzhin no// nub phyogs la ma'i thig le ni// gsal ba'i dri ni rnam snang ngo // khaN+Da ro ha byang phyogs
50b3(rgyud 'grel): te// byang chub sems kyi thig ler 'phro// lho yi phyogs su rU ba ni// thig le dmar po bsgom par bya// gnas bzhi'i 'khor lo dag pa yi// skye gnas bzhi ni dag par byas// de ltar 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro drug
50b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can dag par bsam// slar yang thig la thim pa yi// sbyor ba 'di ltar shes par bya// thi ga la bzhi ni hUM thim pa'i// hUM ni zla tshes bsdu bar bya// zla tshes na mkha'i thig le bsdu// na mkha'i thig le khong stong la// nyi zla'i
50b5(rgyud 'grel): kha sbyor thig le ni// gsal zhing kha dog dbyibs dang bral// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// hUM yig sems nyid thig le bsgom pa'i rim po zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nag po pa nas brgyud pa'i/ slob dpon d+harmA pas mdzad
50b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ br-i kr-i ti sid+d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rang bzhin grub pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// mdor bsdus pa yi rim pa 'di// byang chub sems
51a1(rgyud 'grel): kyai rang bzhin te// lus la gnas pa'i blo ldan rnams// rjes su dran zhing nyams su blang // yab yum sbyor ba'i nga rgyal bya// gang zhig rgyud de'i rdzogs pa'i rim// de phyir bdag nyid yi dam gyi// nga rgyal
51a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni bral mi bya// yum ni rigs kyi lha mo ste// dpal ldan yab ni dag pa'o// de dag gnyis kyi longs spyod ni// 'od 'phags thom pa bde gshogaso// zhe sdang rdo rje mi bskyed pa// gti mug dra bo rnam snang ngo // nga rgyal rin chen
51a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan no// phrag dog don yod grub pa'o// gzhan yang thabs dang shes rab kyi// lus la gnas po 'di dag go/ sa yi khyams ni sangs rgyas spyan// chu khams mA ma kI zhes bya// gos dkar mo ni me khams te// sgrol ma
51a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung khams ngo bo nyid// na mkha' rdo rje dbang phyug ma// sa yI snying po mig dag la// phyag na rdo rje rna ba la// sna la na mkha'i snying po ste// lci ni spyan ras gzigs dbang po// lus la sgrib pa rnam sel te// yid la kun tu bzang
51a5(rgyud 'grel): po'o// byang chub sems las 'di rnams 'byung // de phyir bdag ni chos dbyings so// so dang me dang rlung khams sogs// brjod bya tsam du rnam par sprul// rang bzhin dri ma dag pa yi// de nas sngags gsum brjod byas
51a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rang lus khong stong sa bya / de ma N+Da lnga gnal grwal gso re bzhi tsam gyis rnam par bskyed // oM AHhUM brjod yi dam lha// rnal 'byor ngag gi sgo lnga nas// gzhal yas dbus su spyan drangs bya// de nyid thige le zhu byas nas// lom du
51b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu zhing chos 'byung dbus// zil pa lta bu'i thig le la// bde gshegs dgug gzhug gnyis med bsam// de nas byang chub sems nyid ni// pad+ma'i dbyibs ldan bsam byas nas// de la bdag nyid sems gtad ngo // rang
51b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin grub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rdo ka ris mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgyu gar skad du/ sa ha dza an+ta yi nA ma/ bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
51b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams lnga phyag 'tshal lo// snying gi'i kha sbyor dbus su ni// gnyis med thig ge yungs kar tshad// de yang 'o ma'i rgya mtsho ltar// rim gyis rgyas pa bsam par bya// bdag dang gzhan gyi lus nyid ni// dri mong bdud rtsi'i zho ltar gang //
51b4(rgyud 'grel): rlung nad selo cing sems nyid bcing // me d+hi bAdag ni smra bar byed// dngos por sems gtud dngos med rtogs// kye 'o ma yengs rang sems bzung // rnal 'byor grub rtags dngos med pa// phan tshun gnyis kyi 'brel pa gtsang //
51b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin la// mtha' gnyis mi gnas lhan skyes grub// dngos po thams cad skye med de// sgrib pas bdag gis ma rtogs so// snang ba thams cad sems ngo bo// sems nyid ma grub sems nyid de//
51b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid snying rje kun tu khyab// na mkhar lta bur 'gyur ba med// gnyis la mi gnas sems nyid yin// me d+hi bdag ni smra bar byed// rang rig ma bcos bya ba thong // 'dzin med dran mang sems nyid do// chad par mi 'gyur
52a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rig rtogs// brtag par mi 'gyur sgro 'dogs bcad// stong pa'i rang bzhin rtag chad med// me d+hi bdag ni smra bar byed// lta ba sgom med 'bras bu med// snang la rang bzhin dngos po meng // rnam
52a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog sbrul gyi mdud pa ltar// rang grol zung 'jug tha snyad med// de ltar sgoms pas stong nyid rtogs// mi d+hi bdag ni slu bar byed// lhan skyes zung 'jug stong nyid ni// rnal 'byor bdag gis rtogs pa'o// lhan skyes zung 'jug
52a3(rgyud 'grel): gaM gdoms pa/ slob dpon ma d+hi nis mdzad ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ a nut+ta ra sarba shud+d+he kra mau nA ma/ bod skad du/ bla mang sbyor ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dza
52a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar pad+ma 'dum las skyes// de bzhin ma rig mun pa las// gnyis med rig pa skye 'gyur ba'i// rang rig de la phyag 'tshal nas// bla med sbyor ba'i rim pa yi// dri med dam chos bshad par bya// stong dang shin tu stong pa ste/
52a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pa chen po gsum pa yin// bzhi pa rgyu 'bras thams cad do// thabs shes yang dag sbyor bya yis// rdzo gas rims yang dag nye bar 'gyur// rdzogs pa nye bar mthong ba yis// thams cad stong pa'i 'od gsal yin//
52a6(rgyud 'grel): rang rig gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu gsum rnam par dag par 'gyur// stong nyid don ni rtogs pa yin// bla na med pa'i gnas thob 'gyur// 'od gsal stong pa shes rab dang // sems nyid gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang
52b1(rgyud 'grel): de la bdag gis 'di ltar ni// yang dag 'phros pas bshad par bya// rnam par chags shing shin tu chags// chags pa chen po de bzhin no// gti mug la sogs dug gsum gyis// brtan dang g.yo ba'i sems nyid 'di// 'das
52b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ma 'ongasu da ltar gsum// zhi dang chags dang rtogs par ldan// phyi rol ji ltar nang na gnas// 'das dang mya 'ongs da ltar ba// 'das pa'i 'das par bdag gnas so// sred pa che dang shin tu sred// dkris dang sgom pa kun
52b3(rgyud 'grel): tu ldan// tshor ba nyal ba'i tshor ba dang / shin tu tshor ba'i skad cig gicig/ so sor rtog dang snying rje ldan// ngo mtshar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// nyams dang phrag dog rnam par bsags// de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyis// rang
52b4(rgyud 'grel): rAg ye shes rnam par 'gribs// rnal 'byor pa yI nyams len la// nA mkha' blad chen pad+ma'i dbus// zla ba'i gden la haM yig gnas// kun rdzob gsal zhing dri ma med// 'byung 'jug rlung 'dzin ye shes yin// zla
52b5(rgyud 'grel): tshes dmar po shes rab ste// dbyangs yi go dang po thig ler ldan// rlung ni 'dzin phyir bsgom par bya// de ni 'od gsal skar chen ltar// sem+bas nyid stong pa'i thabs yin no// gzugs dang bral zhing kha dog med// zhi bar
52b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzung 'jug bral// brtan dang g.yo ba'i the snyad med// de ltar bla ma'i drin gyos ni// 'das dang ma 'ongs de ltar ba// rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ci yang mthong 'gyur the tshom med// ji ltar bud shing
53a1(rgyud 'grel): skam po la// mi rgyu gnas kyang 'bar ba med// de bzhin brngu dang rtsol med la// byams sems gnas kyang grub pa med// de phyir nga rgyal la sogs spang // brtson 'grus bskyed la bla ma bkur// dbang
53a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur thob nas nyams len gyis// rnal 'byor dang po'i sbyor ba yis// sa ni brgyad po thob par 'gyur// 'od gsal gsum ldan rdzogs pa yi// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa thob po// dbang bskur thob kyang skur pa 'debs pa dang //
53a3(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus chung la log lta 'dzin pa dang // bla ma'i skyon brjod yon tan brjod mi 'gyur// rgyal ba'i lam ni de yis thob mi 'gyur// bkur bsti med cing de nyid thob tu re// tshig ni 'jam ste khro tshul bstan nas 'gro// mi
53a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mang po gnas pa'i sa ru ni// bla ma mthong yang phyag sogs mi byed de// snod dang mi ldan gdams ngag mi sbyin no// yon tan bzang thob brtson 'grus ldan pa ni// bla ma 'khor la sogs pa bkur bsti ldan pa la//
53a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams dang mnyam pa'i dkar bar 'dzin// rgol bas gsungs pa'i chos la skyed pa che// rgyud rten rgyud mongs rdo rje sems dpa' ni// byang chub sems de pa'i lam du 'gyur ba de// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang tho ba rgyur 'gyur
53a6(rgyud 'grel): ba// 'gro drug la bsngo zhing bkra shis shog/ bla meng sbyor ba'i rim po zhes bya ba/ slob dpon brudz+dza dzas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho/ rgya gar skad du/ A li kA li man tra dz+nyA na nA ma/
53b1(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ a phreng ka phreng gi sngags kyi rim pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs dang gsal byed bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yi// bdag gzhan sgra yis rig par sgra don ni// brdzi lnga sogs grangs kyang de don rtogs
53b2(rgyud 'grel): pa med// de phyir gsal don bdag gis bshad por bya// sgra yi gnas ni brgyad yin te// rgan dang lce dang so rnams te// spyi bo mgrin pa mchu dang ni// khong ba sna la rnam par gnas// de yi dang po a phreng ni// thun phyed
53b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug la sogs ldan// shes rab me long ye shesau te// blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// de yi thog ma bcu bzhi pa// dbyings can sgra gsal yi ge'o// de dag rnams kyi dang po ni// bcu ni mnyam pa'i ye shes so//
53b4(rgyud 'grel): skabs 'byung lnga ni thung ba ste// gzhan rnams ring bar shes par bya// dbyangs rnams kyi ni thog ma gnyis// spangs te bcu bzhi'i ming can no// e ai o oM bzhi dag nAM// don dam kun rdzob bral yig go/ a ni stong pa'i
53b5(rgyud 'grel): thig le'o// zla ba nyi ma gtum mo'o// thig le gnyis ldan a yau ka nI// drag po'i sgra ni dbye bar byed// r-i rA li lAM 'byung ba bzhi// dbye bas sreg byed yi ge'o// thung byi'i mig 'dzum skad cig gcig/ mig 'dzum ring
53b6(rgyud 'grel): ba skad cig gnyis// skad cig gsum pa 'bod yig yin// skad cig phyed pa gsal byed de// rnal 'byor g.yon gyi phyogasu ni// dbyangs can bcu drug shes rab po// de rnams sgra gnas 'di yin te// a ku he yig
54a1(rgyud 'grel): thig le gnyis la ltung // A ni khong gi yi ge'o// i tsu ya sha rkan la gnas// lau tu la sa so 'byung ngo // r-I Tu ra ShA spyi bor gragas+ya// a ni 'od gsal sna ldan te// lte bar gnas te gyen la rgyu/
54a2(rgyud 'grel): e ai mgrin pa o oM mchu// de yi thog ma ra chos dbyings so// de ltar a phreng bshad byas nas// a ka tsa TA ta ba yung sha ste// rtsa ba'i sgras ni de rnams so// ka lAs brtsams te hi yi mthar// g.yas phyogs gsal
54a3(rgyud 'grel): byed shes par bya// ka phreng lnga tshan lnga po ste// bzhi yi sgo yi rig pa'o// sha Sha sa ha bcas pa ni// thog mar gnyis gnyis grangs min no// lhag ma gsum gsum sgra yin te// lnga tshan lnga ni sna las 'byung // mtha' la
54a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i 'byung ba bzhi// rnal 'byor kun rdzob 'dod pas bcad// mtshan lnga pa na mkha' la// sha Sha swA ha drod can gnas// k+Sha nI kA li ma mo 'dus// de ni 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ro// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dbye ba yis//
54a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu yi yi ge bshad par bya// ka nas brtsams nas ha yi bar// sti ra ro yi gdan yin no// ya rA la ba ma yis brgyan// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bskyeng thabs so// kAM ni thod pa kha T+wA~M ga/ tsha ni kong rus gdugs yin te//
54a6(rgyud 'grel): nga tshan lnga ni nyi ma yin// sha Sha dur khrod shes par bya// sa bon yi ge bshad byas nas// kA li rnal 'byor ngo sprod bstan// ka tshan ya dang bcas pa ni// zla gam sngon po nang nub la// phu phu sa dang gzhan la chags//
54b1(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar ri mo b+hi dang mthong // shar gyi yi ge rlung yin no// tsa tshan ra dang sha dang bcas// gru gsum dmar dang nyi ma phyed// zhe sdang dus su sbrul yang bri// lho phyogs drag po'i gnas yin no// Ta tshan b+ha dang bcas pa ni// zlum la
54b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar te snga dro'i dus// ka li dza na dang 'bug ka ni// gti mug bya yi ri mo can// nub kyi phyogs su mo gdon no// ta tshan k+Sha dang NA bcas pa// gru bzhi lnga ser nam phyed ni// sa dang rlung gi khams yin no// phrag dog dmar
54b3(rgyud 'grel): po rgyas pa'i dus// rmi lam rta dang stag mthong ba// rgyal po sa bdag gdon gyi ngo // byang gi phyogs su 'dzin par bya// batshan sngon po chu rlung ste// gru gsum zla gam dbyibs dang ldan// nang nub dus su khams lci ba// rigs pas
54b4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor brtag par bya// de bzhin 'byung chung nyi shu lnga'i// gdams pa zhal nas blang bar bya// dri med shes rab brgyan pa yi// thabs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba ni// tha snyad mun par bsal ba'i// de dag sems nyid stong pa bdag
54b5(rgyud 'grel): tha snyad la bkod dge ba des// 'gro drug sdug bsngal zad phyir bsngo// a li kA li'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ slob dpon g+han+d+has mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya grar skad du/ kA li mArga b+ha ba na nA ma/
54b6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ ka phreng sgom pa'i lam zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam kun rdzob rab gsal ba'i// a sogs bzhi bcu rtsa dgu yi// rang byung yi ge rnams kyi ni// dkyil 'khor 'khor
55a1(rgyud 'grel): lo'i sgom lam bshad bdag gis gnas bzhi rtsa lnga dang // sum mdo rlung lha 'khor lo nas// lte bar 'bar ba'i gtum mo la// snying ga sbar ba'i 'khor lo yin// steng du brtan pa'i 'khor lo gnas/
55a2(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor chu rlung ljang gu ste// de rnams la ni rim pa bzhin// ka phreng yi ge lnga la dgod// thog mar chags pa'i 'dab ma la// shar du kAM dang lho ru khaM// nub tu ga ste byangad du g+haM// dbus kyi na mkhar ngo zhes bsgom// rim bzhin
55a3(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang dmar dang dkar// ser dang sngo ba bsam par bya// chags pa skyes te chags pa na// chags pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed// ka gi rlung ni me la phog/ gtu mo mo 'od zer rjes dran nas// chu skams brtol rlangs pa
55a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byung // de nas lte ba nas hi ga hUM bgrang // bde che no haM la sems gtad nas// bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'bab par bsam// lte ba'i rdzing bu bkang byas nas// spyi bo'i tshang bug sgra skad 'byung // bde chen khong stong bsam byas nas/
55a5(rgyud 'grel): lte dbus khong stong sems gtad byi// rnal 'byor sdig pa dag par 'gyur// rnal 'byor d+he ma d+hA ma yis// de ltar sbyang ba'i 'pho ba smras// yul nas yul du 'pho byed na// rnal 'byor bdag gis mdun du ni// bdud rtsi
55a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi maN+Dal bya// tsa na ka yi 'bros bu ste// thod pa nag por bzhag par bya// kun d+ha lta bu'i hU~M nyid bri// de bzhin rang gi snying ga ru// zla chos steng du hU~M nyid bsgom// sems nyid rtogs nas rnal 'byor pas// thod pa'i
55b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su sems gtang na// grub pa'i rtags 'byung rnal 'byor bde// sems la sems nyid thim par bya// de nas me khyer ro langs la// de yi snying gar hUM bsam bya// ro langs grub rtags byung ba yis// rigs bzang
55b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu'i ro la ni// kha sbyor de nyid hUM nyid bsgom// rnal 'byor grong nas grong du 'phro// rnal 'byor btsun thabs 'pho ba lo// steng ge rnam rgyal me tog 'dzin// phyag rgya bcas la tshangs pa phye// sems nyid ri rab rtse mo'i steng /
55b3(rgyud 'grel): pad 'dab brgyad pa'i ge sar la// hU~M las sems nyid gtang bar bya// dpal ldan nag po'i 'pho ba 'di// d+ha ma b+hU ma bdag gis smras// rnal 'byor gang zhig 'grub 'gyur na// na mkhar thim 'gyur the tsom med// ka phreng bsgom
55b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam+ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha maM d+hu mas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ sam+ba ra tsakre shA rA A li kA l-I ma hA yo gA b+ha ba nA nA ma/ bod skad du/ a phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo'i
55b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ dpalA he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i thog mtha'i tshad nang ni// bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi// rgya mtsho lta bu'i bdud rtsis sal// dga' chen de la phyag 'tshal lo//
55b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldon phag mo'i snying po yis// bde chen dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes// dpa' bo dpa' mo nyi shu bzhis// sa mu dra yi lus nyid la// go cha drug gi rgyas btab la// yi ge bdun pa'i rna rgyan con// dpal ldan
56a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni// mgo phreng bani bcu rtsa dgus brgyan// glang po che yi ga yang gzhi ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro 'dzin// rnal 'byor mA yi rig pa ni// rnal 'byor rgya mtshos rkeng
56a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan byas// thod phreng ye shes lnga yin te// bde gshegs lnga yis spyi bor brgyan// sA gar bdag dang gar byed do// tshangs spyod rtag tu bsrung byas nas// rnal 'byor chen po gnyis med bsam// rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags
56a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod bya// bdag nyid rnal 'byor sa ga ra// dur khrod brgyad du gnas byed kyang // 'jigs pa rnams dang bral ba yin// de phyir rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams// bde mchog 'khor lor rtag tu mchod// kye 'o rigs lnga'i
56a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa 'di// rnal 'byor pa yos rtag tu rtogs// rtogs pa med pa'o sems kyis ni// 'dod yon lnga ni spyod par gyis// rgyan drug gis ni brgyan pa'i sku// seng ge bzhin du rtag tu spyod// a phreng ka phreng rnal 'byor
56a5(rgyud 'grel): che// mdun du bsamo zhing gnyis med skye// rnal 'byor chen po bsre byas nas// bdag gi lte ba'i khung bu la// zla ba'i thig le rgyas par bsam// yang dag pa yi yi ge ni// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus bsams nas/
56a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang po zhi zhing gnyis med 'grub// bsam gtan bas mo med 'grub rgyu med// bsam med bsams na grub pa thob// sA ga ra bdag smra bar byed// grub par rtags ni glang chen thul// rnal 'byor chen po gnyis
56b1(rgyud 'grel): med do// a phreng ka phreng bde mchog 'khor lo rnal 'byor chen po bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sA gA ras mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ bA yu s+tha na rog pa rig dz+nyA na nA ma/
56b2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ rlung dang nad kyi brtag pa zhes bya ba/ dang la he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo lo// dge dang mi dge'i chags pas 'khor ba'i gzhi// de dag chags bral rnal 'byor mya ngan 'das// ma rlung chags pa'i gnas su gnas
56b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba// rlung gi chu nas g.yo ba'i sems nyid dag/ de yis rnam rtog gang yang rim gyis 'gags// dper na chu dang na mkha'i skyes bu bzhin// me rlung nag pos snang ba 'dang gyur pas// dkar po'i shel ltar la sogs ye
56b4(rgyud 'grel): shes 'grub// dang pa'i yan lag mgo nI gti mug gnas// sngar lhur snyoms pas de nyid ye shes yin// dbang po lnga la nyi zla'i mig gnyis chags// lus kyi yan lag lte ba'i ye shes ni// chags pa'i 'khor lor
56b5(rgyud 'grel): srog gi rna gnas so// de la zla grangs rtsa ni bcu gnyis la// lus kyi tshad ni 'dom gang gru bzhi yin// 'dzam bu'i gling byin gling phran brgyad dag 'byung // nyi zla'i sgo nas rlung ni yang dag 'byung // lho byang gnyis ngag nyi zla'i
56b6(rgyud 'grel): lam yin te// dbyar zla 'brang po byang gi bar du dag/ dgun zla 'bring po lho ru shes par bya// skyon dpyid gnyis kyi 'bring po nyin mtshan mnyam// nga ni rnal 'byor rlung gi grangs la ni// skad cig
57a1(rgyud 'grel): thang cig yud tsam gcig yin te// thun brgyad thun phyed sum brgya drug bcu pa nag/ lo gcig hUM nyid thig ler shes par bya// nyi zla gnyis kyi sgo nas rlung lnga ni// rang nas mi rgyu gzhan nas rgyu ba des//
57a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan rnal 'byor rlung log na bar 'gyur// de la rlung gi ming dang gnas rnams ni// brtan g.yo bar gnas khris rgyas bde gshegs rlung // rim par gti mug chu rlung mgo la rgyu// bad+ma kan skyes pas rnal 'byor lha gnas mnyam
57a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba'i rlung ni gzhon gyi rtsa la rgyu// mdud par chags na drod nyams dran pa ste// chu rlung bar na me rlung gnas pa de// rtsub pa'i rlung 'dzin ngal dub byas pa'i tshe// drag po'o zhe sdang mthar yang snying rlung ldang // 'dus pa'i gnas su
57a4(rgyud 'grel): dug gsum rlung 'dus pa// 'dus pa'i nad kyis sems kyi dbang po 'khrul// bde gshegs gnas su mi rgyu gzhan rgyun// rnal 'byor las kyi nad du shes par gyis// sman dang sman pa rang gi lus la gnas pa la// lus kyi dkyil
57a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor brgyad kyi thig le las// sor ni bcu gnyis bcu gnyis steng du no// bzhi bzhi gnad 'dzin brgyad lo sems gtang bya// bung ba'i rlung 'dzin 'khrul 'khor nu don bya// dbus mar ma chung rlung ni rtsa bzhi ru// bzung bas
57a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor mngon rtogs 'di ltar 'char// sa yi rlung gis lus lci sems mi gsal// mi rtag chu brgal zla ba mthong ba dang // chu mig la sogs rtogs ni sna tshogs 'byung // rnal 'byor sha rgyas ldan pa shin tu dka'// thang
57b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'gro bar 'gyur na blo snying brdung // rlung gi rlung ni zin pa'i sngon rtags ni// grang ba skye zhing lus khol thig le 'dzag/ pho ba na zhing g.yang za yan lag 'khums// me rlung zin pa'i rtags ni mkhris pa rgyus// sems nyams drod skyes ro
57b2(rgyud 'grel): stong lci zhing na// rmi ltas mi mthong snang ba dmar po mthong // 'tshe rlung ga yang za 'gro 'dod sems mi dga'// mi rtags 'bur dang lhung dang 'phra ba mi thar// bde gshegs rlung 'dzin sems bde gnyid med gnas// gsus pa'i gegs
57b3(rgyud 'grel): sel rims bzhin 'di ltar bya// dmigs pas me sbyar sa khebs bsreg par bya// chu mig brgyad la rnal 'byor rlangs pa 'thul// chu 'brug sa sbyang rlung gi phyag dar bya// the rangs mi bskyong grangs nas btung bar bya// rlung la me sgoms
57b4(rgyud 'grel): ham rgyud dmar chen dril// baumA rtol brgyab pas ba spu'i bu ga che// 'khor lo bsgom zhing grang ba sel bar byed// dbus mar ma chung chu rlung gzhan zhugs na// byang kanau nA pas bu ga gnyis ngag byed// lus bca'o chu 'brub rlangs pa 'phrul
57b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam// me rlung gnyis kyis 'byung bar sems gtong ngo // khris pa ljang na gangs kyi chu 'brub bya// bdud rtsisna lus gang gangs nas du ba 'phrul// spyi bor bla ma'i bdud cu lus la byug/ rlung gi rlung ni 'dzin po'i rnal 'byor pa/
57b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab// gzhan yang nad rtags nang 'dzin zhal las shes// rlung gnas nad kyi brtags pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon oM dze kis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya garo skad du/
58a1(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta tA two pa dwe shaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems nyid kyi de nying bcing ba zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid kyis ni bcings pa la// de nyid kyis ni grol bar byed// bla ma'i bka' yis
58a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rtogs// g.yon nas 'gro ba'i lce spyang ni// de bzhin g.yas 'gro shes par bya// ko d+ha li ni spro bar byed// de tsam gyis ni bya ba grub// 'khor bas nga ni de nyid tsam du rtogs// bshang dang dkyil 'khor ci zhig bya// gang gis
58a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa ma rtogs sam// g.yon nas 'gro ba'o lce spyang ni// de gnyis g.yas 'gro shis par byed// ko d+ha li ni smra bar byed// de tsam gyis ni bya ba grub// rtsa ba sbyar nas yal ga ngag/ btsal ba des ni ci zhig bya// bla ma dam pa'i gdams/
