87a2(rgyud 'grel): non pa'i ri bong can mi mthong // khog rtses bkab pa'i ma yi dud pau su baMs// sgra gzo tshar dus mkhan po yang yang lta// brti ka na grogs po mdza' dus 'bral// sman gyi tshong pa'i gro phyogs ltos shig dang // rgun
87a3(rgyud 'grel): 'brum thal ma mi spung phyogs bzhir brdal// bya ba zin pa'i rdzi spyang phyi chis min// skyed med nad pa sman gzhan bsten par rigs// mkhas pa glang po drag ngal gnyis su sbyong // bus pa mi sang zhun mar sbyin mi
87a4(rgyud 'grel): bya// phyag gi lce yi kha mngar spangs nas 'dug/ bram ze skud pa 'khal ba ltos shig dang // rba klung 'khrug 'dus thabs ldan 'phyong rdo 'dogs// su zhig bde 'dod spang ma'i spyod pa bor// rgyal khrims chos
87a5(rgyud 'grel): tsho blon po'i rtsol ba zhig/ nor bu non pa'i ded dpon sems las bral// rgyal po'i bu mo gzhan gyi rgyan mi lta// sdong dum ma bsal shing rta 'gror ma btub// sman gyi lo 'bras drang srong bu la ston// bco ma'i 'od la
87a6(rgyud 'grel): gser mkhan mdog mi 'don// spu gr-i til la ngar blung mig mi 'dod// bu yis srid zin rgyal po'i bya ba rdzogs// dug tshor mi de lhag ma za mi 'gyur// bram ze'i rig byed slob dus bya gzhan 'dor// brtse med
87b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrub ma bskor bar mi bya'o// rgyal po chi dus khrims yig la mi blta// nor ba'i lam du 'dab pAr mi rigs so// nag tshur mi dgos 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser// pad+ma 'dam gyi skyon dang bral nas 'dug/ dug med
87b2(rgyud 'grel): rang dbang thob pa seng ge'i bu// gnya' shing bkrol ba'i ma he gar dgar 'gro// ram zhugs pa'i gser ni gu lang ma// tsher ma phyin pa'i shul de gu pa min// cir sgo byed po'i mi de srog mi 'dod// zho sga zho
87b3(rgyud 'grel): yis 'grangs pa lA ltos shig/ gso ras lnga pas bsdams pa grags pas 'chings// sgra nyan pa'i phag rgod gdams pa ston// don smras stong tshig khyad med rdo ya mi// smig rgyu'i klung na chu thigs yod ma
87b4(rgyud 'grel): yin// skye dang 'chi ba mo bsham bus ma byas// mdog dbyibs tha dad chu bran rgya mtshor grol// na mkha' la ni dbus dang mu ma mchis// ro gnyis mthong ba'i kaM ka mkha' la lding // stobs ldan seng ge srog
87b5(rgyud 'grel): gi mel tshe stor// kye 'o smyon pa'i sos skos soms dang kye// lce spyang mig 'di ngo mtshar che ba yin// ma la ya na tsan dran ma ru 'bud// seng ge grangs dang bral bar mi bya'o// spun pa'i rgyal po gso rig lung
87b6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'grogs// mkhan pos legs gsungs dge slong gis mi gtong // dpa' bo g.yul du 'jug che go me 'bud// 'gro ba bzang mos nye ba so sor 'dzin// g.yeng ba med pa dur khrod dbus kyi mi// dur khrod mi
88a1(rgyud 'grel): yis lus ngag tha mal spangs// lto rgyab shugs las 'byung ba dur khrod mi// dur khrod mi la khra ma kha mchu me// dgos pa mdun du bsgrub pa dur khrod mi// glang po'i 'gro sa gram pa'i bseb ma
88a2(rgyud 'grel): yin// me chu'i dgra la tshad yod byar mi rung // zhing pas sa yI mdog la lung rigs sbyor// rgyal po'i zhabs nas btag tshe bka' la 'dogs// kye 'o stag tshad yod pa'i sor mi 'gro// rgyal po'i bka' btags thob dus dgra dang
88a3(rgyud 'grel): bral// na tsha med pa'i dus de bde bar gnas// bzang ngan gnyis la zas kyis ma tshun med// mya ngan gdungs pas shaM dwa'i bu de mthong // brdzun spangs drang skyong dag gi phrin las grub// gyad la rAl gri btags te rgyal
88a4(rgyud 'grel): bo mnyes// nags kyi sbrang ma 'gi hang dri la snom// ma gi ta la bsil drod nus paM tshang // rtsi sbyor mthungs pas lus kyi zo mdog bde// ti la chang ltor grong rig pa ngan gyis khyogs// yid bzhin nor bu kun gyis lta bar
88a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// rgyal po la ni su zhig rgol bar nus// bu gcig po la ma sring gdung sems ldan// zhus tshe 'gron la bos pa gang mi 'ong // bang du 'ongs dus bu la a ma dga'// namakha' dngas pa'i ngang la dri ma med//
88a6(rgyud 'grel): tshegs med gnad khros rig byed gser 'gyur rtsi// glang po ma mthong phag pa'i lus dbyibs ltos// dman pa'i las la mi zhugs rgyal po'i lugs// be da'i 'bras bu sa bon dus su 'grub// rma bya'i mdongs la
88b1(rgyud 'grel): 'bri mkhan yod ma yin// thub dbang lag gi rdo rje bskyod mi nus// 'dam nas bton pa'i ut+pal ltos dang kye// bde ba dang ldan sder sbyar gnyid log dus// rang kha thon pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser// khyag rum
88b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin chu yi ngo bo yin// sbal pa'i spu yI la bya gsar rnying bral// 'dam gyi rkyen gyis pad+ma kha dog drungs// thabs kyis tshun tshe de dus dgra de shesna// rgyal mo ka ra'i gzugs la tha dad med// chu
88b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid rgya mtsho rgya mtsho'i ngang nyid chu// rtsi yis zin phyi'i de ri bo 'gul// rba rlabs tshe 'bring rtsang po'i dbyibs la thim// mun pa dag par byed pa mor ma'i 'od// zhag mig pA lA nyi ma mun par sros// slad 'tshong bu de su yi
88b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs rgyud yin// dur khrod lce sbyang tshang la mngon zhan med// gdon gyis brlabs pa'i gtam de sna tshogs smra// byis pa'i rang bzhin gcig tu 'dug mi 'gyur// nags kyi ri dwags shing 'bru'i phyogs ris spangs//
88b5(rgyud 'grel): lha rdzas rin chen nus po su yos byin// nor bu rin chen thog mar gang nas 'ongs// ying bzhin nor bus dgos 'dod sbyar ma myong // mchog gi nor bu'i rin thang smos kyang kye// nor bu'i bdag po dbul bir sdug
88b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bral// phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i mgur zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po
89a1(rgyud 'grel): ka ma la shI la dang / bod kyi ban+de lo tsA bzham ston pa seng ge rgyal pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ki ni gI tA ya nA ma/ bod skad
89a2(rgyud 'grel): du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dur khrod chen po ha ha sgrogs pa zhes bya ba na/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/ rgyal bu dung phung 'dzin zhes
89a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ skye bdun pa cig la tshe'i bar gcod byas nas/ de'i sha khrag la tshogs kyi 'khor lo byas te/ ye shes kyi mkha' gro ma rnams spyan drangs pas/ de'i dus su ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma dbyings kyi gtso mo nyi shu rtsa gcig
89a4(rgyud 'grel): gis/ snying gtam gros su btab cing rtogs pa mgur du gzhengs pa las/ dngal mkha' 'gro ma ta ma las mgur bzhengs pa/ hU~M nags kyi glang po yan 'dod na// 'ching ba'i sgrogs laso bros byas te// lcags kyu
89a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dag ru lta// 'bras chang rol ma chags par// rin chen rgyan rnams bor bar bya// glu lan sgra la ying mi gtad// dpung gi ru dpon mi bya b+hAr// rgyal po'i zhon pa spang bar bya// mchu la ral gri mi skyon
89a6(rgyud 'grel): bar// phi brang nang nas byil byas te// nags kyi mtha' la 'bros par bya gsungs// / mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i mdangs kyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM 'du bo gso nga'i drang srong la// nod kyi
89b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyen po dri bar bya// ded dpon nor bu len pa la// gling don sgrub pa'i zhu ba 'bul// dkor mdzod 'dzin pa'i rgyal po la// yid dang mthun pa'i nor bu'o// skya ba 'dzin pa'i rig byed la// chu bo sgrol ba'i grogs su btsal//
89b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam 'phel ying bzhin nor bu lnga// dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i gsol ba gdab gsung ngo // / mkha' 'gro ma rgyan gyi rgyal mos mgror bzhengs pa/ hUM rgyal po'i bka' 'og chud pa'i mis// zhings
89b3(rgyud 'grel): bshin la so nam bya// ded dpon snying khrag 'thungs nas ni// so btang rdza la las rnams bcol// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma btung // nyi zla'i thig le zed byas te// chang 'thungs pa yi sems de ltos// rab gnas tshur
89b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs brnyan brtan// de nas lci khang sgo phye ste// nyin mtshan rab tu blta bar bya gsung // mkha'agro ma b+hi nA sas mgur bzhengs pa// hUM gling bran nor bu mi btsong bar// sbal pa'i khA la phrin las bcol// rkun mo'i
89b5(rgyud 'grel): snying sha zos nas kyang // mi yi bu mo mi brnyed par// na mkha'i 'o ma skyugs nas ni// dpag bsam ljon shing bskyed pa gces// so mtshams mkhar gyi rtse la nyal// mel 'tshe byed pa'i gcan zan gso gsung / mkha'
89b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang mos mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM lcags rnams gser du bsgyur ba'i phyir// rin chen rnam lnga lugs su blugs// 'byung ba lnga ni dbugs su gzhug/ nam pa'i 'ja' mtshon bzung bar bya// 'khor los
90a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar rgyal spyan drangs la// spyan gzigs dgyes pa'i rol mo dngul// dbul nor bu thod du bcing // yi ge gsum gyis gtan la dbab// na mkha'i sprin tshogs rab bsdus te// 'byung ba'i cha grang
90a2(rgyud 'grel): 'thab pa'i sgras// sbrang char ngal buM phab nas kyang // bcud kyi lo tog rgyas par bya gsung // mkha' 'gro ma ti ma las mgur bzhengs pa/ hU~M dri za bu mo gzung bya ste// rin chen sna lnga'i rgyan btags la// ljon shing rmang nas sprul pa
90a3(rgyud 'grel): yis// gangs dkar rtse nas 'ju bar byed// chu bo gyen la ldog pa yis// na mkha'i bu mo 'gu bar byed// chu bran rgya mtshor slebs pa yis// rlangs pa mkho' la phur bar byed// kha dog du ma'i lho sprin gyis// namakhri'i dang/
90a4(rgyud 'grel): du yal bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i rdo rjes mgur bzhengs pa/ hU~M mkha' la 'ja' tshon gsal la stong // tshes gcig zla ba skyed du 'phel// dig mas rmi lam sgyu ma shes// bu ram gzugs ni
90a5(rgyud 'grel): ro gcig nyid// gzhon nu'i bde ba ngo ma shes// shel gyi kha dog gdan gyis bsgyur// nyi ma'i 'od kyis skar tshogs 'gribs// kyi ser rlung gis bar snang dngos// pad+ma 'dam gyi nang na gsal// rgya mtsho'i gnyer ma dro mtshar
90a6(rgyud 'grel): tshe gsung // mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes makur bzhengs pa/ hUM na mkha'i mtshon pa ci la btags// pu shi'i a ma sems las bral// bya ba zin po'i skyes bu dang // bram ze skud pa mkha' la ltos// 'dzam bu'i gser
90b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bse ru ltar// mdangs ldan me tog dzI bzhin nam// rgya mtsho'i dbyings dang 'dra ba'i don// dpal gyi be'u mdzes par mdzod gsung // mkha' 'gro ma bde de'i mdangs kyis mgur bzhengs pa/ hU~M ri rab chen po'i rtse ru phyin te// ri
90b2(rgyud 'grel): bran ma lus blta bar bya// gi ling sgrog du bcug pa lnga// phyogs mtshams kun tu rgyug par bya// bung bas rtsi bcud kun sdud de// ro rnams gcig tu sre bar byed// dwa phrug ma dang phrad pa yis// the tshom dri ma stsol bar byed//
90b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes bus na mkha'i dbyings mthong bste// phyogs su 'dzin pa'ajig par 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu ri gA ter thob pas// rmongs pa'i dbul ba sel byar byed// ces gsung ste// mkha' 'gro ma phra men stag gdong mas mgur
90b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhengs pa/ hUM lhangs kyis 'bod pa de ci sems// gcer+ya gyis bltas pa ga la yangs// na mkha' ji ltar gsal bar 'gyur// mar me 'di yi rtog pa gang // chu bur zhig pa'i rjes mi rnyed// rmi lam rtog pa sang
90b5(rgyud 'grel): pas stong // lder rtse'i sgo nga gang la chags// pu shri ri a ma'i gces 'dzin su// chu bo'i blo blag ro drug glang // lkug mAs smras pa'i tshig de ci zhes gsung ngo // mkha' 'gri ma dpal gyi bzang mos mgur bzhengs
90b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ hUM kyi ser rlung gi pha yul gang // lag bskor mig gis ma lus bcom// bu chung 'di yis gces 'dzin bor// shing ge skyes bu ral dung spangs// gling las nor bu len ma shes// gsil po'i sman
91a1(rgyud 'grel): ni za bzhin sun// gdon gyis brlabs pas dbang med spro// glang po chu la dor mi blta// seng ge'i bu ni 'jigs dang bral zhes gsung ngo // mkha'agro ma nor bu'i mig gis mgur bzhengs pa/ hUM
91a2(rgyud 'grel): gyad kyi nor bu su la blangs// sa bon bzhin du myu gu 'khrungs// ljon shing 'bras bu rim gyis smin// pa lak+Sha la lo 'bras med// shel gyi sgron ma rang gsal nyid// dmus long rgyal pos mtshan dpe mthong // na mkha' srid
91a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum dbang du bsdus// rin chen gling na sA rdo spangs// zhes gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma sprin gyi shugs can gyis mgur bzhengs pa// hUM na mkha' 'byung bzhi ma bzung ste// 'byung bzhis na mkha' 'da' ma nus// sna
91a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gzugs brnyan gser yin te// nyi ma'i 'od la mun pa med// 'o mas chu dang mar ma phye// 'jig chags bskal pa drug cu yis// nu mkha' la ni gnod ma skyal// 'khor los sgyur rgyal sems dpa' che// sems
91a5(rgyud 'grel): can kun la nye ring med// rdo yis gzugs skus bsdigs mdzub phyir// khyod dang nga ru 'byed mi shes// ma shel grang mo me ny-id yin gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma thong phreng rtsal gyis mgu re bzhengs pa/ hUM drangs pa'i chu la
91a6(rgyud 'grel): rlung gis bskyod// chab rom gzugs kyi rnam par shar// na mkha'i phyogs 'dzin lung pas byas// gzugs med gzugs kyi ngo bor snang // nyi ma'i 'od la sprin gyis bsgribs// srid gsum mun rum chen por 'gyur//
91b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyuchu bo rnyogs pas gzugs brnyan bsrubs// mig gis mig nyid ma mthong bar// klu rgyal gtsug gi nor bu bzhin// rang gi srog ni rang gis bcad// ces gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi rdo rje sa mgur bzhengs pa/
91b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM grib mas gzugs nyid mi gtong na// dug zos bu rjes ts+tshi ru 'gyur// byi li dug ni drin pas phung // na mkha' btsang bzhag dus su sbyin// sa bon 'phel stobs rab tu che// sbyin pas 'phung ba smyug ma'i 'bru// bsags
91b3(rgyud 'grel): pas bcing ba bung bya'i rtse// yod pas sbyang sa pa dmings po'i nor// rang gis bslus pa srin gyi kha// rang la smin pa sdig pa'i bu// zhes gsungs so// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs kyi rje mis mgur bzhed rnaMs pa/ glang ni zla bo rnyed
91b4(rgyud 'grel): pas nyes// mgo tom bde ba sdug bsngal yin// glang po gser gyi sgrog la dga'// dmyal byi'i lus blang ba med// yi dgas bkres shing skom pas gdungs// khra yis dang pa'i bye'u dong // mA he'i rje'u sems khril tshe/
91b5(rgyud 'grel): byA shi ri mya ngan yid la gcags// rang sogs dor pa'i dpa' bo blun// mdze bo sos skos soms dong kye// gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma dkar mos mgur bzhengs pa// hUM gdon sar bton pa'i rgyal bu yis// grogs
91b6(rgyud 'grel): po mi gnyis khrid byas te// 'dab ma bzhi pa'i lnga mig gis// khor yug sdom pa'i lcags phye la// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// res ches spyang khung bshig nas nas ni// rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye la// yid
92a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu blta bar bya// lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i skyes bu yis// nor bu rin chen blangs nas kyang // mtsham khung gnyis su sba bar bya// khrus byas rgyal mtshan rjel phyar// dgos 'dod 'brung
92a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir gsol ba gad ba// ces gsung ngo // mkhar 'gro ma nyi blo'i mig can gyis mgur bzhengs pa/ mkha' la nyi zla shar ba yis// mun pa ma spangs snang bar 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po'am// g.yar
92a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba'i me long bzhin// sgron me thogs pas mun pa bral// chu yi gzugs brnyan brtsegs pas stong // ka la ku tra ming yin te// na mkha' mthong bas ji ltar rug/ tshad pas gdungs pas chab rom nu// na bun
92a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi ser rlung gis phyag zhes gsung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma mig ngan mas mgur bzhengs pa// hUM me long zad nas gzugs brnyan 'gags// mtshol dar zhig 'gro lam stongs// gnyid sang skyes bus yul ma mthong //
92a5(rgyud 'grel): skar tshogs nyi ma'i zer gyis non// mkha' la gzugs shar khol ma'i nang // khong du chang 'thungs nyam nga byul// me chu rlung gis srid gsum stongs zhes gsung ngo // mkha 'gro ma bung ba'i mtsho can gyis mgur bzhengs
92a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ hUM nags kyi glang po spyo bas 'tshangs// ri dgas dman mas g.yeng ba spangs// dur bsrungs mi la so nam med// ne tsho sgra ma shes pas 'tshengs// mi gtsang khrod nas ut+pal 'khrungs// sha ba'i rwa ni bog na
92b1(rgyud 'grel): de// khur po med na 'jigs dang bral// nor med mi yis mel tshe spangs// nags kyi ma ni rlung gis sbyor// lus dag bkol byas 'tsho ba rnyed ces gsung ngo // mkha 'gro man ma khab dbang phyug mas mgur brnang/
92b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ mkha' la 'byung bzhi'i nye ring med// rmi lam nor la zhen tshugs med// bcoM ma'i gser li dri ma med// glang po rwa med chag ngogs med// gling len ded dpon 'dod sems med// me dpung dkyil na srog
92b3(rgyud 'grel): chags med// mo gsham bu la yang rtsal med // sbal pa'i kha la smra brjod med// me long nang na gzugs brnyan med// mkha' la bya 'phur rten sa med ces gsung so// mkha 'gro ma brda'i mgur chung //
92b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang mdzod 'phrul gyi rgya/ khyad par du gyur pa'i rgyud pa/ nam lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra DA ki ni gI ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha'
92b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mi'i brda'i mgur zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas rtogs pa'i lha da'i brda'u bstan pa/ gser gyi ral gri til ngur ldan pa da phyung la// buMng bas me tog rtsi bcud
92b6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus myang bar gyis// chu bran sna tshogs rgya mtshor gci go go lan tshwa'i ro// me long bzhin ni byang yin gud du ma sems cig/ chu yi zla ba 'di la byis pa ltad mo byed// bu ram gzugs 'di tha dad snang yang mngar
93a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ro// na mkha' gzugs su mthong ba'i byis pa snying re rje// ri bo rlung gis bskyod du med pa shin tu gces// ta la'i sdong po bregs na mgo rtsa gnyis ka skam// namakha'i kha dog rkyen gyis 'gyur
93a2(rgyud 'grel): ba ngo mtshar che// 'dab chags mkha' la gnas kyang grib ma sa la rgyu// shel gyi skong bu'i mar me 'od la dri ma med// rmi lam sad pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde// gzengs la gnas pa'i bya rog gang bder
93a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bar gyis// khang stong nang gi khyi rkun 'di ni ltad mor che// shel la tshon gyis bskus kyang gting nas 'gyur pa med// rang gis gser la ka 'jis brdar mi dgos// ded dpon lam rgyus tsan dang 'grogs na/
93a4(rgyud 'grel): nor bu lon// drang srong nags la chud pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che// ku sha rlung gis tshul ba'i rtsu ba e raM 'khrul// gdung meng gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa snying re NAM// sman dug 'dres pa 'di yis gnyis ka'i nus pa nyams
93a5(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i gzugs brnyan 'di la khal gyi nus pa med// rin chen snod du bzhag nas 'tsho ba grong du slong // na mkha' gos su gyon nas 'byung ba gnas su thim// khur bar chu blugs skyes bu de yis smra ma shes// rgyal
93a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i rjes gnang thob pa gshed ma la mi 'jigs// ral gri'i 'khor los mtshon cha gang yin btub par byed// 'dab ma gnyis dang ldan pa'i sems can mkha' la 'gro// a ma mthong ri'o byis pa gzhan gyis 'khrid du med/
93b1(rgyud 'grel): sa bon rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi nus pa mkha' la skams// nyi ma mkha' la shar ba'i rgyu skar zil gyis gnon// snying phyung de nas yan lag g.yob par ga la nus// mtho yor mo ru shos pas do tshe 'jogasna dang bral//
93b2(rgyud 'grel): sbrul nags mtshon gyis zin na dug gi gnod pa bral// rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams bcud du sgyur bar byed// rgyal bu pha dgos bzang po 'di la rtsol ba med// dbul po rin chen glang du sna tshogs thabs kyis bzhugs//
93b3(rgyud 'grel): 'thor rlung chen pos stong gsum 'jig rten g.yeng bar byed// dus mtha'i me yis srid gsum pa sreg par the tshom med// bskal pa chu yis snod bcud ma lus gzhi nas 'khru zhes gsung ngo //
93b4(rgyud 'grel): blta ba'i brda' rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur// / bam po dang po// / sangs rgyas mkha' 'gros ting 'dzin nyams kyi brda bstan pa/ drung bu shir ldan pa de tshe sa bon gdab pa'i dus/
93b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon bskyed med btag pas myu gu bskyed du sla// gyen thur lam lnga chu bo 'bab par 'gyur// nags tshal khrod du shr-ing rta 'dren para'i skyes bu blun// rin chen sna bdun ldan na 'khor los sgyu re rgyal r+g+ha// so ma btang ba'i
93b6(rgyud 'grel): rdza ni chu la reg pas 'jig/ seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan nang du blug mi bya// dbul po'i lus 'di dal bar mi bzhag ces kyang bskol// sna tshogs rgyu las sgra snyan 'byung ba ngo mtshar che// zhun sbyong legs pa'i rin chen
94a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bskolda na bde// so mtshams bsrung ba'i skyes bu 'di la dngul chu blung // nad kyis gdungs par gyur na thur ma gtad bar bya// nor bu rin chen rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar
94a2(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // mchod pa byas na dgos 'dod sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// a mA sgron mos khyer ba 'di ni dran gyis la// skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas seng ge'o gsob gon nas// nyi zla'i steng du dpa' bo'i gdong la
94a3(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya// rgyal po'i rkun mo gang yin de ni brtsad bcad nas// gyad kyi nor bu 'di ni thabs kyis btsal bar bya// glang chen smyon pa mi rtse yan du bcug pas bsrun// chu yi rnyog ma ma brgal bzhag pas rim gyis
94a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos// bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu 'di ni blo sems bde// lan na'i rdog po 'di la chu ye thigs pa gzan// tsho ba rom nyims gdungs pa 'di ni chu ru 'gro// dug la sngags kyis btab pa 'di ni sman gyi mchog/ sbu ba
94a5(rgyud 'grel): chu yin 'di lo tha dad yod mo yin// sprin rnams gtor ba'i rlung po 'di la nan tan bskyed// gsal bya gsal byed mang+ga pa'i sgron mi bde ba che// chu bo che dang rtag tu 'grogs pa shin tu gces// 'gro ba bzang mo'i
94a6(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'di ni yid la zhog/ na mkha' yid can 'di ni shar gyi phyogs su 'gro zhes bsgom pa'i brda// mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur bam po gnyis pa'o// // til gyi sgron me bum pa'i
94b1(rgyud 'grel): nang du sba bar bya// tshes gcig zla ba 'di ni bskyed du rim gyi sna 'phel// 'gro ba bzang mo rang gi phrug gu gso ba mkhas// 'dab chags sgo nga'i ched du gab pa 'di la ltos// chu lung 'dzom pa'i 'bras bu myur du sbyin// 'tsho
94b2(rgyud 'grel): byed mkhas po sman gyi nus pa sna tshogs brten// nags kyi me la rkyen rnams sna tshogs grogs su 'ong // gzhon nu ma yi bde ba khyod kyis sla nus sam// nam mkha'i ri mo 'di la gces par ma 'dzin cig/ kyai ser 'di yis
94b3(rgyud 'grel): chu yis slu ba dbyings su bangs// na mkha'i sgron me dus rnams kun du spar bar bya// dngul gyi me long 'di ni yengs po med par phyi// ri rab mthon po'i rtse la phyin pa 'di ci sems// bung rtsis myos pa 'di yis ci smras smyon pa'i
94b4(rgyud 'grel): tshig/ nad rnams 'byin pa'i sman mchog kun du gyur pa yod// pad+ma'i rtsi bcud 'thungs pa'i bung bu phyir mi lta// shel gyi mchod rten ma mthong bar du blta bo gces// sgron me lag na thogs pa'i skyes bu snang lam bde//
94b5(rgyud 'grel): khong du seng go'i snying gis rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yis dngos po bzang ngan med par 'joms// chu bo chen po zhon nas na mkha'i bya lam stag/ chu bo'i rgyu chad de dus rang thog 'khor mi nus//
94b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i srub thag chad pa'i rdza mkhan blo sems bde// sprin gyis na mkha'i ngang las byung zhing de ru dngas// bltas kyi bltas kyi na mkha' 'di ni mthong ba 'gags// nyams kyi brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur
95a1(rgyud 'grel): bam po gsum bya// / skyes bu nad kyis zin pa'i blo sems dran gyis la// dur khrod wa mo 'di yi spyod 'gros blta bar bya// nags tshal khrod na ri dwags
95a2(rgyud 'grel): dman ma gnas pa ltos// rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di ni su la'ang 'jigs pa maud // rdo yi mi la 'drin par nus pa ngo mtsha che// nags na gnas pa'i spre'u 'di yI spyod pa'am// yang na rgyal bu gzhon nu 'di la
95a3(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya// mkha' la rgya ba'i bya bran 'di 'dra ci yi phyir// 'bru yi mdzod du bkres pas nyen pa skyong ra rje// phye ma leb kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra su yis phod// dong gi btson 'di thar ram yid la bya bar rigs// sdug
95a4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal rgyan du mthong ba'i glang po sgro gau la dga'o// mtsho yi nang nas smig rgyu snyag pa'i ri dgas snying re rje// rin tshon glid nas stong lngab byed pa'i ded dpon blun// na mkha'i rlung dang grogs pa phyogs bzhir kun
95a5(rgyud 'grel): tu rgyug/ glang chen shugs kyis bag ma tshengs la khyi shra zlo// smyon pa'i rjes su 'brengs nas na mkhas sman mchog ster// nags la gnas pa'i ri dgas 'di ni yan par khye// 'dab tshogs mkha' la
95a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ba 'di yi rkang rjes ltos// ral gri lag na thogs pa'i mi de gang phrad gsong // gyad kyi spyod pa 'di la sems can phra mo skrag/ khyi phag gnyis kyis bram ze'i gsango tshig rlung la bskur// mi mgo
95b1(rgyud 'grel): skam po la ni shing gi skyes bu dga'// gi ling sgrog dang bral nas kun tu rgyug par rigs// khu ba'i nus pa mtsho la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// shing lo rlung gis khyed pa 'di yis rtsad ma rgyod// nyi zla lta bur
95b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur na skar ma'i tshogs dang 'grogs// gru pa 'di yis kya ba'i nyar bya bar rigs// dug 'di rma bya'o zas yin gzhan rnams 'phung bar byed// 'dag gshog med par mkha' lu 'gro ba/ dor bar bya//
95b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa'i brda mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur/ bam po bzhi pa// / shel sgong yongs su dag na 'od zer nang nas 'char// na mkha'i gtor la spyod pa'i skyes bu dngul dang
95b4(rgyud 'grel): bral// snying gra'i dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar smin par bla// drod tshad ldan pa'i 'o mA rtsol bas mar du 'gyur// stong pa'i snod 'di nam chags tshe na na mkha' 'dres// 'ja' tshon dus kyi mkha'
95b5(rgyud 'grel): la yal bA rnyed mi 'gyur// na mkha'i cho 'phrulnga sna tshogs 'di 'dre ngo mtshar che// 'khor los sgyur rgyal sna tshogs gnas nas bsdu ba mdzad// rgun 'brum 'bras bu bskul bas mI smin
95b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag na smin// nor bu yon tan sus byin 'di yi bsam pa ci// nyi zla mkha' la 'char ba 'di la rnam rtog med// stong pa'i cho'i phrul 'di yis lo tog 'bras bu smin// na mkha'i dbyings
96a1(rgyud 'grel): 'ang sna tshogs ston pa gang gi rkyen/ chu snod du ma'i zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shes par gyis/ 'bras bu'i bArda ma d+hA 'gro ma'i myug pa
96a2(rgyud 'grel): bam po lnga pa/ mkhye' 'gro ma'i badz+ra zlum po lnga pa zhes bya ba 'igasang mdzod ni shog dril du gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnamasu sa bka' bgrom
96a3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rje dam pa r+m+ma gar la gnang spyad kyis de rI thA 'kho du zham lo tsA bas bsgyur nas/ bla mi byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtang ba yin no//
96a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par gyi brgyud pa chen po brgyad las/ brda skor rnam pa bzhi rdzogs s+ho// bkra shis//
97a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs gsang ba'i ngo ta zhes bya ba bzhugs s+ho// /
97b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta gu h+yA do h+yA nA ma/ bod skad du/ thugs kyi gsang ba glur blangs pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bram ze chen
97b2(rgyud 'grel): po sa ra ha sa thugs kyi rtogs pa mgur du bzhengs pa// kI'i 'khor 'das kun gyi rtsa ba sems kyi rang bzhin te// rtogs nas sgom du med kyi ma bcos lhug par zhog/ rang lo bzhag nas gzhan la 'tshal ba
97b3(rgyud 'grel): re 'khrul// 'di yin 'di min med do thams cad gnyug ma'i ngang zhes gsungs so// klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa// rtogs nas gang gis 'ching bar nus pa khyod kyis smros// 'ching ba gang yin de ni ye nas grol
97b4(rgyud 'grel): ba nyid// gang la bcings dang 'ching bar bya ba ma grub na// nags la gnas pa'i glang po gang bder rgyug du chug gsung ngo // pradz+nyA pha las smras pa/ rtogs dang ma rtogs gnyis kyi bar na su 'dug pa// de ni
97b5(rgyud 'grel): nga yin gzhan du ci yang yod ma yin// de lo gang mthong de ni bde chen rang byung ste// thams cad thams cad de nyid yin par shes par bya// gsung ngo // zhi ba 'chos gsungs pa/ mnyam nyid dbyings las myi
97b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston// chu byan sna tshogs rgya mtshor gcig go lan tshwa'i ro// du ma ro gcig 'di la tha dad yod ma yin// thams cad thams cad gnyug ma'i ro yis khyab na bde gsung ngo // blo gros
98a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan pas gsungs pa/ gza' rgyal mkha' la shar bas rgyu skar zil non ltar// gnyis med ye shes chen pos rtog tshogs nyams par byas// 'dis ni 'khor ba'i sa bon mA lus
98a2(rgyud 'grel): bcom zin gyis// du ni mya ngan 'das pa gzhan du ma tshol cig gsungs// ngag gi dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ snang srid chos dbyings pho brang na// rig pa'i ye shes lham me ba// bde gsal stong pa'i gnang
98a3(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs// 'dod yon sna tshogs mchod par 'bul// dgag sgrub med par rol du gsol zhes gsung ngo // rdo rje dril bu pas gsungs pa/ sems kyi de nyid mthong 'dod cing // bdag gzhan 'dod pa bsgrub 'dod
98a4(rgyud 'grel): bas// spyi bo'i nor bu mchod par bya// dngos grub thams cad de las 'byung gsung / shraM ka ras gsungs pa/ dri med shel sgong dag pa gcig/ tshon gyi rkyen gyis sna tshogs 'char// bar snang khams su
98a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jog shes na// gtan gyi bde bo de lngas 'byung gsung ngo // shAn+ti bas gsungs pa/ gnas na zhogro la 'gro na thong // gnyer kra ma byed yan du chug/ ched du gang 'dzin 'khrul pa yin// gzings la
98a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phur ba'i bya rog ltos gsungaso// birba bas gsungs pa/ gang gang mthong ba de de nyid// dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral bar// ci rigos par ni nyams su long // gser 'gyur rtsi yi mkhan po ltos gsung //
98b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ snying chung skyes bus yan lag g.yob par mi nus bzhin// sems nyi da rtsa ba bral na rtog pas bcing du med// dug gi sngags can dug nyud sman du 'gyur ba bzhin// thabs
98b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas nyon rmongs nyid ni byang chub rgyu gsung ngo // shAn+ta de bas gsungs pa/ 'khor 'das gnyis kyi rtsa ba la// byang sems rnam gnyis sdong po rgyas// 'di phyi gnyis kyi me tog shar// bdag gzhan
98b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi 'bras bu smin gsung ngo // ye shes snying pos gsungs pa/ shing gi snying po bral ba bzhin// sems kyi de nyid btsal gyi stor// sgyu mkhan ri mo ji bzhin du// sna tshogs snang la ngos bzung med gsung //
98b4(rgyud 'grel): ni ru pas gsungs pa/ mAr mi rang gsal gtsig puraru zhog/ chu dang rlangs na tha dang min// bya yi rjes la btsal mi dgos// gnyid sang skyes bu blo sems bde gsung ngo // rtog ce pas gsungs pa/ gang la
98b5(rgyud 'grel): nges shes skyes pas rtsa ba zin// de las lhag pa'i ngo spong gzhan yod min// snang dang srid pa'i chos rnams thams cad la// bla mar ma gyur pa ni yod ma yin gsung ngo // nags po zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ me tog
98b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs du ma'i ro// bung bas gcig tu sdud pa ltar// chos rnams sna tshogs du ma'i ro// rtogs dang ldan pas gcig tu bsdus// ro ni skye ba med pa'i ro// myong ni ngos gzung med par myong gsung ngo // nA
99a1(rgyud 'grel): ga b+hU su kas gsungs pa/ myong ba med pa'i nyams myong la// blo dang bral bas nyams su blangs// rtogs su med par gtan la phra ba// thob du med par mngon du 'gyur gsungs so//
99a2(rgyud 'grel): lha yI bas gsungs pa/ gnyug myo'i shes pa 'gyur med mngon du gyur nas kyang // rtsol bas sangs rgyas logs su tshol ba ngal bya ste// glang po rnyed nas glang po'i rjes tshol ji bzhin no// nga ni sangs rgyas med
99a3(rgyud 'grel): par shes pas 'dod blo bral gsung ngo // kr-iSh+Na pas gsungs pa/ ngos bzung med par ngo sprad pas// stong nyid ngang du nyams su myong // dran pa'i mel tshe srung mkhas pas// 'khrul pa'i rkun mos glags ma
99a4(rgyud 'grel): rnyed// rgyun chad med par nyams blangs pas// 'du 'bral mer par mngon du gyur gsung ngo // in+d+ra bo d+his gsungs pa/ skyes bu gnyid log 'khrul byas non gyur kyang // gnyid sang dus na 'khrul pa yul
99a5(rgyud 'grel): na med// de bzhin ma rtogs 'khor bar sdug bsngal kyang // rtogs dang ldan la 'khor ba'i yul si med gsung ngo // rAt+na kIR+Shas gsungs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer kun nas rgyas pa'i dra ba can// mun pa'i tshogs
99a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'joms mdzad ngo mtshar che// rtogs ldan bla ma thugs rje'i 'od zer dra ba can// gdul bya'i blo yi mun sel 'di ni ji mtshar tshe gsung ngo // ko ka tas gsungs pa/ dbang bzhis smin po'i bu la nyams
99b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gdams pa yod// thos pas sgro 'dogs chod la tshig gi gdams pa yod// bla mas thugs la btags lnga gnad kyi gdams pa yod// 'khrul pa gong du bshig lce 'tshang gi gdams pa yod gsung ngo // sa
99b2(rgyud 'grel): hA dzas gsungs pa/ bu nyon khyod kyis nA mkha'i dkyil du ltos// lho sprin mi gda' 'di ni nam mkha'i cho 'phrul yin// 'ja' tshon 'di la bden par ma 'dzin par// chu bo chen po'i rgyun la zhon la shar du rgyug gsung
99b3(rgyud 'grel): do// glang chen gos kyis gsungs pa/ rtsi yi rgyal pos 'bru rnams btsud du 'gyur ba bzhin// nyams myong rtsi yis snang srid bde ba chen por 'bar// gang gang mthong ba de skye med spros dang bral// 'di la ngos
99b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin med pas stong pa btsal mi dgos gsung ngo // b+ha su d+hi saM ris gsungs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad bde bar gshegs// snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku// 'dod yon thams cad sems kyi rgyan// rtog tshogs
99b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ye shes che zhes gsung ngo // he ru ka pas gsungs pA/ lus la ye shes chen po gnas// tha ma'i kha las gsilnga bar rtogs// gzhan gyis brjod min gnyug ma'i don// 'di ni ma bcos rang
99b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'o gsung ngo // ka na kau tis gsungs pa/ srid de'i me yis dngos po thams cad bsreg pa ltar// rtogs pa'i me yis bdag du 'dzin pa bsregs nas kyang // 'khor ba'i bud shing ma lus gtan nas
100a1(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par byung // de nas 'gro ba'i don du ci 'dud gshegs pa yin gsung ngo // zhe na'i rdul gyis gsung sa byA/ sna tshogs sems kyi tshe la te// sems ni 'ang nas mya rgyan
100a2(rgyud 'grel): du med// de phyir 'khor 'das rtsa ba bral// de nyid chos skur shes par gyis gsung ngo // rin chen rdo rjes gsungs pa/ nges shes las ni don mthong 'gyur// mos gus las ni byin brlabs 'byung // brtson
100a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grus kyis ni dgos pa 'grub gsung ngo // tre'u tra pas gsungs pa/ rig pa khong nas ma sang+ga na// 'di zhes bstan pas rtogs mi 'gyur// mig nad can gyi snang ba bzhin// thog mar rang rgyud gsal bar bya
100a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/ mthong ba mngon du ma gyur na// mig gi dbang pos yul mthong bzhin// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung bas// goms par bya ba shin tu gces gsung ngo //
100a5(rgyud 'grel): dza bo ri pas gsungs pa/ sku gsum phyi rol yul na med// rig pa'i ye shes dngas pa las// gzugs brnyan tsam du nang nas 'char// rnam par rtog pas rnyog mi bya gsung ngo // gu d+ha ri pas gsungs
100a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ snang srid ye grol chos kyi dbyingaso// phyag rgya chen po spangs thob med// nam mkha'i bya yis gar ma phyin// byis pa'i rtsol ba sha thang chad ces gsung ngo // la po'i na bza' can gyis gsungs pa/ gang
100b1(rgyud 'grel): du'ang ma mthong long mig/ ci yang mi sems gti mug dang // gang du ma phyin 'phye bo'i bgros// ci yang ma thob dbul mo'i gter gsung ngo // DoM b+hi he ru kas gsungs pa/ srid ni mnyam nyid spros bral
100b2(rgyud 'grel): la// rtsol sgrub byed pa sha thang chang // yul sems gnyis med zang thal lo// b+h+yo dang 'dzin pa nyon re mongs// bdag gzhan gnyis mang chos sku la// bzang ngan 'dzin pa snying re rje gsung ngo // nyi ma sbas
100b3(rgyud 'grel): pas gsungs pa/ yul la bltas pas skye ba mang // sems la bltas pas spros dang bral// gnyis med don 'dri blo las 'das// ngas ni ci yang ma shes so gsung ngo // gu Na tis gsungs pa/ ma
100b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes mi g.yo na mkha'i ngang // gzugs brnyan sna tshogs cho 'phrul te// snyams med rig pa rang sar zhog/ chos kyis bcings pa snying re rje gsung ngo // pad+ma'i rdo rjes gsungs pa/ bya ba thams cad yongs
100b5(rgyud 'grel): btang ste// sems kyi glang po rang sar zhog/ gnyis mang ye shes btsal du med// thams cad thams cad de de nyid gsung ngo // te lo pas gsungs pa/ kun gzhi zang thal zhabs phyung la// bdag tu 'dzin
100b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dbyings su sbyar// yid kyi rnam shes stong la non// sgo lnga rang grol lhug par zhog gsung ngo // shes rab 'byung gnas kyis gsungs pa/ spos dang bral la rtog pas 'ching mi nus// sgyu mar mthong
101a1(rgyud 'grel): la yul gyis 'ching mi nus// zhe 'dong bral la spyod pasu 'ching mi nus// sangs rgyas 'dod la 'khor bas 'ching mi nus gsung ngo // dz+nyA na shrIs gsungs pa// rtsa ba bral bar
101a2(rgyud 'grel): sdong bu bzhin// nga yi sems nyid na mkhar stor// 'khrul snang ji ltar dgyes dgyes mdzod// nga ni na mkha'i rnal 'byor yin gsung ngo // pa ra he tas gsungs pa/ kaM ka mkha' le lding ba bzhin// 'khor 'das
101a3(rgyud 'grel): ri mnyam dbyings su grol// re dang dogs pa kun bral te// bde ba chen po na mkha'i dang gsung ngo // kA ma shrIs gsungs pa/ lus med lus kyi nang na gnas/ rten med mkha' la bya bzhin rgyu// dmigs
101a4(rgyud 'grel): med smra bsgom yul las 'das// 'gyur med rang byung ye shes che gsung ngo // mi thub zla bas gsungs pa/ sgron mes zla ba tshol pa bzhin// rtog pa de nyid mi rtog pa// nu mkhos na mkha' tshol ba bzhin//
101a5(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog pa nyid blo las 'das gsung ngo // dzA lan+ta ras gsungs pa/ ye shes med na mthong ba che// rtog pa med na gsal ba che// zhen pa med na bde ba tshe// gang du'ang mi gnas pa che gsung ngo // mai traM
101a6(rgyud 'grel): ka mA las gsungs pa/ sems nyid gzhi stong rtse ba bral// las kyis 'ching bar mi nus te// dngos por zhen pas de ltar min// de ltar rtag tu rang sems ltos gsung ngo // pad+ma badz+ras gsungs pa/ nam
101b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhye'i dbyings kyi b+ha ga ru// reg du'i rdo rjes gaskor nas kyang // gnyis med dang du sbyar bya sa nas// bde chen lhan cig skyes pa 'char gsung ngo // klu byang chub kyis gsungs pa/ mkha' lnga rlung
101b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phyo srab kyis zung // khang stong khyi yi spyod ba ltos// na mkha'i a ma sus mthong ba// bu ni pang du rgyug par nges gsung ngo // 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis gsungs pa/ rin chen gling du phyin na
101b3(rgyud 'grel): dngol dang bral// bla many+dzi bkar dron thob na 'khrul pa zhig/ sems kyi de nyid mthong na 'khor ba med// byung sems nang du 'byongs na 'gro don 'byung gsung ngo // rA dzA ha tis gsungs pa/ rtogs ni gzhan
101b4(rgyud 'grel): don mi byed pa// de naM sa yi gter bsrungs bzhin// 'di na tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thugs rjes sems can me 'dzin no ma gsung ngo // bzang po dpal gyis gsungs pa/ bdag dang sems can dbyer
101b5(rgyud 'grel): med kyang // 'gro ba las kyis sdug bsngal byas// rgyun tshad med pa'i thugs rjes yis// 'gro ba'i don la rol du gsol gsung ngo // li'i bzang pos gsungs pa/ rang la yod kyang ngo ma shes//
101b6(rgyud 'grel): dngul mo gter gyis bslus pa bzhin// de nyid ma mthong sems can la// thugs rjes sgron ma gdag du gsol gsung ngo // rnal 'byor ma 'du ti mas gsungs pa/ chab dang che ba rom tha dad min// sdang
102a1(rgyud 'grel): dang stong pa dbyer mi phyed// mkha' dang rlung la bye brag med// sems dang sems byung de bzhin no gsung ngo // shing ljo mas gsungs pa/ brag ca'i sgra 'dri su yis smras// me long gzugs
102a2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan su yis bris// rmi lam ltang mo gang du gyes// gdo na'ang med do sems kyi dang gsung ngo // dur khrod mes gsungs pa/ kun gzhi dag pa chos dbyings yin// yin dus shes pa ye shes yin// bdag 'dzin
102a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig na rtswa bral yin// sgo lnga rang grol lam khyer yin gsung ngo // gcer bu mas gsungs pa/ rang grol blo dang bral ba la// mi bcos sgo gsum lhag par zhog/ mi zhen dgag sgrub med par zhogs/ mi g.yo
102a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid chen por bzhag gsung ngo // ro longs mas gsungs pa/ ma yengs sgom du med pa la// nyams su len na mkhas pa yin// sna tshogs rjes mang chen po ru// lam du khye ra nu grol ba yin gsungs//
102a5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA sid+d+his gsungs pa/ mi bsgom ma bsgom blo ma bsgom// blo bsgom rtog pa'i 'khrul 'khor yin// rtog pas 'khor bar 'ching bI ste// blo dang bral la byisgom du med gsung ngo // dri med mas gsung
102a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sems nyid ye stong ye bral la/ skye med bsgoms pas ci zhig bya// sems byung rang shar rang grol lo// rtog pa spangs pas ci zhig bya gsung ngo // blo gros dbyangs mas gsungs pa/ nam
102b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i ye shes kun la khyab// ye grol chen mo mchog gi lam// mi g.yo mi 'gyur bsam las 'das// rtog med rang rig ye shes che gsung ngo // bdag med mas gsungs pa/ nam mkha' na mkha' mnyam nyid
102b2(rgyud 'grel): che// nyi ma nyi ma ye gsal che// chu bo chu bo rgyun chad med// 'ja' tshon rang grol bde ba che gsung ngo // gsal byed mas gsungs pa/ go ru meng pa'i don rtogs na// brjod du med pa'i gleng gzhi 'byung // bsam
102b3(rgyud 'grel): du med pa'i don bsgoms na// thob du med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung gsung ngo // bye ma lung pas gsungs pa/ gnyis med bde chen don gyi mchog/ radwa la yod pas gzhan du tshol// mi shes rtsol bsdu sgra phyir
102b4(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs// 'khrul pa'i sems can snying re rje gsung ngo // rdo rje gcig mas gsungs pa/ stong nyid na mkha'i glegs bam la// rang rig ye shes yi ger bris// sna tshogs thabs kyi gdums pa bkod
102b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyun chad med pa'i bstan pa sgrogs gsung ngo // sngo sang snga mas gsungaswA pA/ mi 'gyur na mkha'i rdo rje la// g.yo 'gul 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul shar// sna tshogs skye 'gro'i bya ba byas// rang grol na mkha'i dbyings
102b6(rgyud 'grel): suM yal gsung ngo // gre skor mas gsungs pa/ ming dang bral ba'i ming mang pos// nger 'dzin zhig pir blo bral po// yongs su grol bar byar meng po// ye yin chen por rtogs par gyis gsung ngo //
103a1(rgyud 'grel): lam skyes mas gsungs pa/ dmigs bya dmigs byed mtha' spangs te// ting 'dzin rten dang bral ba la// chu bo chen po'i rgyun bzhin du// ma yengs nyams su blang bar bya
103a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // bshes gnyen mas gsungs pa/ na mkha'i bya lam rjes med bzhin// rnal 'byor spyod pa rjesu med yin// rang rgyud 'dzin pa med gyur na// mi dge bcus kyang 'ching mi nus gsung ngo // ro zan
103a3(rgyud 'grel): mas gsungs/ gser 'gyur rtsi dang phrad pa bzhin// snod sring bde stong ror shar bas// dngos por 'dzin pa kun las grol// snang srid spros bral ye shes cha gsung ngo // pad+mo shrIs gsungs pa//
103a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa de// bsam bsgom blo yis mi bcos na// chos sku gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// rang ches yino lcig par zhog gsung ngo // pad+ma'i rgyal mos gsungs pa/ rang rig ye
103a5(rgyud 'grel): shes 'di rnyed na// bskal pa'i mun pa sgron me bzhin// las kyi 'khrul pa gtan nas bcom// skyes bu gnyid sad ji bzhin no gsung ngo // mkha 'gro ma dkar mos gsungs pa/ las zin skyes bu de ci sems//
103a6(rgyud 'grel): bram ze skud pa mkha' la ltos// na mkha' gang gis za bar nus// khyod dang nga la tha dad med gsung ngo // lha sras dpal gzhir gyis gsungs pa/ stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can// bde bar gshegs pa'i
103b1(rgyud 'grel): shulnga yin te// gol sa med par gsungs pas na// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya// gsung ngo // rdo rje bde bas gsungs pa/ mi g.yo bsam gtan rgya chen po// g.yo 'gul sna tshogs kun gyi gzhi// g.yo
103b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mi g.yo dbyer med pas// bsgom dang mi bsgom 'di la med gsung ngo // ye shes zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ gang du chos rnams ma mthong ba// de yis chos kun mthong bla ste// mthong bya mthong byed kun las
103b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das// rang rog ye shes chen po yin gsung ngo // g+ha g+ha dpal gyis gsungs pa/ gang du mthong tshor myong ba kun// de de'i ngo bos stong shes na// 'dod yon sems kyi rgyan yin te// 'tshong bar mi 'gyur
103b4(rgyud 'grel): grol bar 'gyur gsung ngo // las kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsungs pa/ sems kyi ye shes gang mthong bya// chos kyi de nyid rtogs 'gyur te// chos rtogs pas ni bde ba thob gsung ngo // rgyan gyi rgyal mos
103b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ dbyibs dang bral ba'i mdo ga med po// sna tshogs rig pa'i bsam med po// spangs po med pa'i thob med po gsung ngo // ma' 'gro ma la bA can gyis gsungs pa/ dmigs mang ye shes
103b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'di// tshi go gis mtshon par mi nus te// bla mi'i dus thab smra brten pa las// gzhan gyis rtogs pa ma yin no// gsung ngo // thig le dag pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ grub thob pho mo brgyad bcu'i
104a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa brjod pa/ mkha' groms ma gar bta bstu/ gsang mdzad na gnas pa las/ dbyangs kyu gan+d+ha mA rnams kyis bka' bgros nAs/ rje dam+b+ha pa rgyu gyur l+yA glan g+ha
104a2(rgyud 'grel): nAm lo sgrubs lags par bsgyurardzogs s+ho// / b+h+ra mA dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol skyes mA~M ya~M snying ge yis// mkha' 'gro ma yis ges tshig brtol// gru
104a3(rgyud 'grel): thob nyams kyi rtogs pa rnams// bka' rgyu bkrol te gtang rgya byas// Ar+ya dwe bas thugs kyi rtogs pa 'gur dro bzhengs pa/ kye 'o phung po lha yi ngo bor gnas// bum pa'i dbang bskur rang la rdzogs// sgra stong brag
104a4(rgyud 'grel): ca lta bur rtogs// gsang ba'i dbang la bltos mi dgos// nyams myong bang chen khong nas sang // shes rab ye shes dbang dang ldan// chos rnams na mkha' lta bur rtogs// bzhi pa'i dbang gis don dang ldan
104a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // nA gArdza nas gsungs pa/ kye 'o rtsa ba bral ba'i sems nyid 'di// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// de las 'khor 'dres sdong po gyis// bde sdug gnyis kyi lo 'dab rgyas// sna tshogs las kyi 'bras
104a6(rgyud 'grel): bu smin gsung ngo // mar pas gsungs pa/ kye ho sna tshogs snang la ngos bzung med// 'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral// mi g.yo mi sems sems chen po// bla dgas tsam du brjod par zad // 'di la don du
104b1(rgyud 'grel): bzung du med gsung so// rdo rje dril bu pas gsungs pa/ kye 'o dbang ldan pad+ma'i dbus na bde ba'i ye shes gnas// thabs kyi sbyor bas spros bral lhan cig skyes pa 'char// bde gshegs thugs kyi gdams pas
104b2(rgyud 'grel): nAn mkha'i khams dang mnyam// 'di ni gsang sngags thabs kyi gnad ngo ngo mtsha ri che gsung ngo // lU yi pas smras pa/ phung po'i dbus na gnyug ma'i ye shes me gcig po// srog dang rtsol bas bskyod na bde
104b3(rgyud 'grel): bi'i ye shes 'bar// bdag 'dzin sreg pa'i mi 'di rlung gis snga bar bya// bde chen mchog 'di na mkha'i khams su mi shong ngo gsung ngo // shAn+ta de bas gsungs pa/ kye 'o sems ni ye shes chen po ste/
104b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di las gud na sangs rgyas mad// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// 'khor bya rang grol mya ngan 'das gsung ngo // b+hi sa pas gsungs pa/ kye 'o 'gro ba sna tshogs las kyis bcings// las kyi de nyid
104b5(rgyud 'grel): shes gyur no// bcings pa med de grol ba med// sgyu mkhan rI mo ji bzhin no gsung ngo // g.yog po ljon pa can gyis gsungs pa/ kye 'o ha ru ka dpal rdo rje'i sku// rnal 'byor ma ni las kyi yum// sna
104b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs snang ba mchog gi zhing // 'gro ba lha dang lha mo ste// 'di ni 'khor ba'i ming yang med gsung ngo // a bad+hU tI pas gsungs pa/ bshes kyi stong nyid 'o ma'i mtsho// thabs kyis rol srub ma'i
105a1(rgyud 'grel): shing // dang brtson shams rtsol byas nas// sku gsum ma rA gyi gong bu 'grel gsung ngo // dur khrod dbang phyug gis smras pa/ mthong du med do sems kyi don// bsam du med do gnyug
105a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i dang // dgag sgrub med pa smyon pa'i lus// btsal du med pa gyad kyi nor gsung ngo // ye shes skyong gis smras pa/ kye'o snang stong dbyer myang lhan cig skyes// rig stong dbyer med lhan cig skyes// gnyis mang
105a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lhan cig skyes// rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhan cig skyes// 'di la tha dad ngas ma mthong gsung ngo // li la'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ sna tshogs snang ba rong gi sems// sems ni sems kyi rang bzhin bral// thig
105a4(rgyud 'grel): le chen po chos kyi sku// 'di las mi spro gzhi la bzhag gsung ngo // nyi ma sbas pas gsungs pa/ lus la ye shes chen por gnas// bde ba drod kyis sbyar bar bya// las kyi rtsi bur sreg par byed// bla ma'i bka'
105a5(rgyud 'grel): las shes par bya gsung ngo // sa 'dzin zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ lus kyi 'khor lo bzhi 'khor bas// srid rtsa'i sdong po gcod par byed// rtswa yi rgyal po spangs pa yis// thar pa'i srog shing 'dzugs par
105a6(rgyud 'grel): byed// bde chen na mkha'i pa bzhos pas// lhan cig skyes pa ston par byed gsung ngo // be na sas smras pa/ nyi zla stong la mnan pa yis// las kyi phreng thog gcod par byed// spu gri glang la bskor ba yis// bya
105b1(rgyud 'grel): blan na mkha'i dbyings su slong // bya ba zin pa'i skyes bu de// a ma'i pang du chug par byed/ gsung ngo // phyogs kyi glang pos smras pa/ rig pa'i sgron me sbyar ba yis// log rtog mun pa rab bsal te// gzhan
105b2(rgyud 'grel): g+hi sna pa kun bcom nas// rang gi mtshan nyid mtshon+da du med gsung ngo // dpa' bo dril bu'i zhabs kyis smras pa/ dga' ba'i ye shes sbar pa yis// gnyug ma'i lhan cig skyes pa rtogs// 'khor 'das
105b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis po gzhi lus grol// gsang sngags thabs kyis khyad par 'phags gsung ngo // li la'i bzang pos smras pa/ lkug pa'i kha dang rus sbal mig/ gzhon nu ma yi bdo ba 'am// khur bar chu blugs rje
105b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// mtshon du 'dug par ngas ma mthong gsung ngo // nA ga bo d+his gsungs pa/ gnyis med spros bral na mkha'i ngang // ming med ye shes bde chen po// bsum med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'dis/
105b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur meng chos sku ngo mtshar che/ gsung ngo // rtog rtsu paste gsungs pa/ ltos shig na mkhye'i dkyil du ltos// ma mthong ba ni de mthong yin// stod cig rgya mtsho'i gting du stong // mi g.yo ba ni dgongs
105b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yon// zung cig bar snang rlung po zung // ngos zung mong na stong pa yin gsung ngo // nags po zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ lam gyi de nyid mthong goms na// 'chi ba'i 'od gsal gdon mi za// las kyi 'phen
106a1(rgyud 'grel): ba na mkhas khyer// dus der chos nyid ma bu phrad gsung ngo // b+hi na zhabs kyis smras pa/ snang stong thabs dang shas rab la// bla ma'i ngo spong brda yis rol// rig pa'i ye shes
106a2(rgyud 'grel): khong nas sang // bde chen lhan cig skyes pa rtogs gsung ngo // pad+ma'i myu gus smras pa/ smon snang ba las kyi phyag rgya ste// der 'dzin stong pi tshwa kr-i phyag rgya yin/ gnyis med dang las mi 'da' dam tshig ste// der 'dzin blo dang bral
106a3(rgyud 'grel): na phyag rgya che gsung ngo // mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa/ lte ba mkha' dbyings gru gsum du// rig pa'i lha mo'i skur gsal te// 'od zer spro bsdus 'gro don byed// sku gsum gzhan nas btsal mi dgos
106a4(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // gu d+ha ri pas gsungs pa/ ye shes rdo rjes na mkha'i mdog/ sna tshogs 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul ston// dmigs pa med par kun la khyab// 'du bral med par rang la rdzogs// ma rtsal lhun
106a5(rgyud 'grel): gyis grub pa'i don gsungs so// taM lo pas gsungs pa/ kye 'o ltos shig yul le ltos// snang ba sna tshogs rig pa'i rtsal// 'dod yon sna tshogs sems kyi rgyan// bde sdug sna tshogs gnyug ma'i
106a6(rgyud 'grel): rtsal// grwar yang ma phyin na mkha'i bya// snang ba sna tshogs gzigs mor tshes gsung ngo // nI ro pas gsungs pa/ spyi gtsug pad+ma'i gdani stengs su// mtshan ldan bla ma'i sbyin snga ru// rtsa dang dkar
106b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi lam la 'gro shes na// mtshams med lnga po byed kyang grol// gsang sngags thabs kyi khyad par yin gsung ngo // kr-iSh+Na pas smras pa/ rtse gsum gsal bya'i me long la// sems kyi rgyal po
106b2(rgyud 'grel): blta shes na// 'khrul pa'i yul gyis mi 'phrogasau te// gnyug ma'i rdzong la nges par gnas gsung ngo // b+ha du las smras pa/ ka ra yul la bcings pa yas// rtog pa'i 'gyu ba gcod par byed// lha/
106b3(rgyud 'grel): stangs sna phyi rjes pa yis// bying rgod thun skyon sel bar byed// gnyen po'i rtsol ba bshig pa yis// gnyug ma rang la 'khor bar byed gsung ngo // rom+bi he ru kas smras pa/ las kyi phyag rgya las byung ba'i//
106b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' bzhi'i ye shes phyag rgya che// sdong po zag med spros dang bral// gnyugu ma don gyi ye shes mthong gasrung ngo // ka na pas smras pa/ sems nyid spos dang bral ba na mkha'i dang // rgya mtsho shel dang me
106b5(rgyud 'grel): tog bzhin// sang bye rjen no sa le ba// dran du med cing yongs su med// ci rigs tsam du goms par bgyis// gsung ngo // ban+d+ha badz+ras smras pa/ gnyis med ye shes chen po 'ang // bstan du yod
106b6(rgyud 'grel): de mtshon du med// goms su yod de bsgom du med// myong du yod de brjod du med / gsung // kam+ba las smras pa/ snang ba'i ngo bo stong pa'i ror// spor cig yul la yengs pa'i tshe// bde ba'i ngo bo
107a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba'i ror// spor cig sems la bltas pa'i tshe// rtogs pa'i ngo bor nyams kyi ror// sbor cig chags sdang skyes pa'i tshe/ gsung ngo // pUdz+nyA pA las smras pa/ sna tshogs sna
107a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs de de nyid// dgag pa med cing bsgrub pa med// dran pa'i rtsi dang ma bral bar// spang blang med par rol du gsol gsung ngo // dpa' bo rdo rjes smos pa/ sems kyi thig le yi ge'i dbyibs// rlung gis
107a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod de mkha' la 'phur// las kyi sgo bzhi 'gags nas kyang // bde chen gnas su 'pho bar byed// gsung ngo // shrI ba tas smras pa/ dug sbrul bsang la glang chen gtsong // bya ni mkha' la spar bar bya// btsun
107a4(rgyud 'grel): mo lha sras yul phyung la// rgyal po bcom na nges par grol gsung ngo // gnyis med sbas pas smras pa/ yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// spyi bo'i bla mA legs mchod no// 'dod pa thams cad 'byung
107a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas// bya ba mang pos ci zhig bya gsung ngo // in+d+ra bo d+his smras pa/ sna tshogs yul gyi snang ba 'di// rig pa ye shes rgyun yin pas// mi spang de bzhin nyid du rol// 'ching bar mi 'gyur/ grol ba'i
107a6(rgyud 'grel): lam gsung ngo // ka pa tsa ris smras pa/ chu bo sbubs su chud pa bzhin// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid du 'das// rgya mtsho lon tshwa'i ro bzhin du// du ma ro gcig bde bar 'bar// nags kyi me la rlung
107b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// rkyen ngan sna tshogs lam gyi grogs gsung ngo // ku la ma ris smras pa/ gzhi ma bcos chos dbyings pho brang du// lam rig pa'i ye shes lham me bya// de bde gsal sbyong ba'i ngar gyis rdeg
107b2(rgyud 'grel): don chos sku gnyis med kyi ngang du grol gsung ngo // rAt+na bo d+his smras pa/ ma bcos rnal mir shes pa de// mi bsgom de bzhin nyid du bzhag/ bcos pa thams cad blo yin te// blo las grol na thar pa'i lam
107b3(rgyud 'grel): gsung ngo // pad+ma badz+ras smras pa/ gang gis sems kyi don mthong na// rtsa ba bral ba'i sdong bu bzhin// sna tshogs snang bas 'ching mi nus// sems kyi de nyid yin phyir ro// gsung ngo // ra ma pa las smras pa/
107b4(rgyud 'grel): gang du rtogs pa blo yin la// gang du bsgoms pa rtogs pa ste// gang du spyod kyang bcos mu nyid// ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'dod pa'i lam// 'di kun byis pa'i rtsing mo yin// mkhas pa rnams la ci yang
107b5(rgyud 'grel): med// gsung ngo // klu'i byang chub kyis smras pa/ yi ge gsum gyi sbyor ba ye ste// rlung gi de nyid shes gyur na// sems kyi de nyid rtogs par 'gyur// sems rtogs pas ni bde bu che// gsung // karma
107b6(rgyud 'grel): badz+ras smras pa/ 'khrul po'i rtsa ba mchod ni// sems kyi 'khrul 'khor mi 'jig ste// bcos ma'i theg pa snying re rje// rtsa ba bral ba'i don mthong na// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gzhi la 'jig/ gsung //
108a1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba grags pas smras pa/ yod dmu med pa'i mtha' spangs te// dbus kyi don la mi gnas par// bsgom du med pa'i ngang la zhog/ thob du med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung gsung ngo //
108a2(rgyud 'grel): s+ya ra pas smras pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes 'di // khyod kyis spros dang ji ltar yin// ma myong shes na myong ba'i mchog/ mi btsal de bzhin nyid du bzhag gsung ngo // su kA ra sid+d+his smras pa/ gang la non pa'i
108a3(rgyud 'grel): blo de thong // rtog pa gnyis ni mtshungs par sgrib// rtog dang bral nu bsgom du med// bsam du med pa ji ltar dran gsung ngo // ye shes rdo rjes smras pa/ kun gzhi dag pa'i dbyings nusma rig pa'i nyi ma shwaR+Sha/
108a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho nor bu'i gling nas yid bzhin nor bu lon// 'gro ba'i ma rig ling tog shes rab thur mas phye// 'khor ba'i chu bo bzhi las thabs ldan bla mras bsgral gsung ngo // mtsho skyes rdo rjes smras pa/ dpe yi ya
108a5(rgyud 'grel): shes mtshon du med// don gyi ye shes bsgom du med// thabs kyi man ngag smra ru mad// bla ma'i drin lan 'khor thubs med// gsung ngo // ri tri tas gsungs pa/ mtshon gyi 'khor los phyogs rnams kun
108a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dngos po gtsang // thos pa'i 'khor los log rtog blo yi spros pa gcod// nyams kyi 'khor los gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba gcod// rtogs pa'i 'khor los 'khor 'das gnyis kyi re dogs
108b1(rgyud 'grel): gcod gsung ngo // grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ thig le 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod nas phyung ste/ rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che la gnang ba/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o//
108b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs s+ho//
109a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po rin chen brji'i man ngag ces bya ba bzhugs s+ho// /
109b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu drA rat+na b+h+r-i gI ta u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// u
109b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun tshun ngo'i gling du/ mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi yon tan gyis rtogs phyi'i brda brjod par+ya// u dum po ri'i gaM sAr chu 'dam las mi 'khrung // skyug nad can de zas kyi zhen pa bral nas 'dug/ gaM gA las thar
109b3(rgyud 'grel): mo de sems dral skams lngas so// bA shes med dgras gtser ba de phyogs bzhir mgon skyabs tshal// sku yu'i 'bras bu 'di ni 'phel stobs rab tu che gsung ngo // shar phyogs byade ldan gyi phug par mkha'
109b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma rdo rje nyi ma'i myig gis rtogs pa'i bar brjod pa/ 'gro ba tshul gru dang rdzings kyis sgrol// 'khor los brgyan pa'i shing rta sa lam gcod// so btang bum pas chu nang skol ma 'dzags// dang
109b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i skas sdang yang thog steng du sprul// zhun thar 'byongs pa'i mngar gyis sha rus bcad gsung ngo // klu sgrubs spyod kyi phur par/ mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi bum 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ nam
109b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dang ni stong gsum dbyer ma phyed// gshog gcig bya yis mkha' la phur ma nus// mgo dang sug po lus po go gcig 'gyur// rdo yi gzugs 'brir khyag pa'i ngo bo chu// me long
110a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ni gzugs brnyan tha dad myed ces gsung ngo // 'od ma'i tshul byA ka lan ta ka gnas pan+d+ha sar// mkhar 'gro mu ka ku khrag ldug mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod bya/ rlung gis drong pa
110a2(rgyud 'grel): rtol bas sngar snang 'jig/ 'khor los sgyur rgyal bya ba gzhan mi byed// dbul mo gter ngo shes tshe sbyar spyod 'chor// gling don grub pa'i ded dpon bde bar gnas gsung ngo // grong khyer chen po rdo 'jog tu mkha 'gro
110a3(rgyud 'grel): mA shA na glog gi zhabs pa can gyis rtogs po'i badz+ra brjod pa/ sna tshogs phyag rgya thul mo rang yin mong // tshe lus rlung mar shu rus khrag la brten// nyi ma'i 'od kyis skar ma'i 'od zer bcom// chu 'dzin nang du
110a4(rgyud 'grel): ma shel nus pa brlag gsung ngo // dur khrod chen po u tsa la'i lhor// mkha' 'gro ma sha za dung 'bud mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sprin lhung pA la brten sa yod ma yin// mkha' la byung ba'i rlung ni ngo bos stong /
110a5(rgyud 'grel): brag ca'i skrod 'di gzhan gyi sgra la brten// smyon pa'i sems ni gzag gtang bral 'dug gsung ngo // ri me ri 'bar ba'i khar mkha' 'gro ma glog gi ral pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rtog bral bu chung
110a6(rgyud 'grel): gser por bong ba len/ dus la bab pa'i myu gus sa sran 'bigs// mtshon gyi dri ma chu yis dag tshe gsal// bsam pas 'grub pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus gsung ngo // rgyal po'i khab ser skye'i byang du/
110b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha 'gro ma'i rgya mtsho mdangs len mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ mchil lham gyis ni rkang pa'i mi mthun skyob// ri gzar sbab ni mi sdong drag tu 'phar// gaM gA'i chu klung par mtshams med par 'brel// lce
110b2(rgyud 'grel): spyang mig la mun pas sgrib mi nus gsung ngo // rdo rje gdan gyi byang chub chen po'i rtsar// mkha 'gro ma bde ldan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// mgo gnyis spyi mas cig gis dug zos 'chi// rma can gcig
110b3(rgyud 'grel): gos sbal pa'i tshad rnams 'dul// mig skyon ma byang zla ba gnyis su snang // grib ma dgra ru mthong bas skyabs gnas rnyed mi 'gyur gsung ngo // mtsho kun d+ha l-i dung skyong gi gnas su// mkha 'gro ma rma bya'i
110b4(rgyud 'grel): mdongs can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// skyur mo nya med bya gzhin gyis mi 'tshe// dug gi nus po sngags kyis zin dus stor// rma bya sman por 'jol skrag radwa l-i blta// mgo bcad ta la'i shul dor
110b5(rgyud 'grel): myu gu stongs gsung ngo // byang chub shing gi rtsa ro mkha 'gro ma dga' ldan gser gyi 'od can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ til mar nang nas bton po so ras me yi rgyu// sgyu ma'i bu yis rgyal po'i gdung
110b6(rgyud 'grel): mi sobs// ri dgas lto ba'i dri ni rgyu nyid dri// mdza' bos bslus tshe grogs la yid ches sbyor gsung ngo // phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las/ rgyan rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu/ mkha 'gro ma
111a1(rgyud 'grel): mdangs ldan gser gyi ral pa can gyis bsdus so// dpal ldan gru 'dzin gyi ri bo la/ mkha' 'gro ma 'khor lo gdong gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ drang srong gdan du ku sha bzang bas
111a2(rgyud 'grel): rtswa gzhan spang // zhing pa sa bon nam zin dus su sems ngal so// rlung gis ma bskyong mar me rang khaR+Sha gsal// yid gcugs bu dang bral na gzhan mi dran gsung ngo // dpal ldan nor bu'i gling du/ mkha' 'gro ma nyi
111a3(rgyud 'grel): me'i 'od zer gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// skye bo blo chung don de rang gis// dam dum bcings pa'i khong 'khril grol na bde// dngul dkar mi long 'phrul gyi gdan la 'phye// 'phong gi slob dpon gam nas rgyang du
111a4(rgyud 'grel): bsring gsung ngo // lho phyogs a su ri'u phug par// mkha' 'gro me nor bu'i spyan ldan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ kha ra gzhong nang gi rus sbrul nyi ma'i 'od la dga'// gser la byas pa'i rgyan ni gser nyid yin/
111a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ben la mnga' brdeg dpog chen gzhon+da mi dr-in// pU ram gzugs rnams tsA l-i tha ma dang gsungaso// nags tsha lnga dra ba can+da gyi mthongs su mkha' 'gro ma ba tI ro zan mas rtogs pa'i brjo brjod pa/ chu shel zla ba yar
111a6(rgyud 'grel): ngo cig la 'phel// mkha' la 'ja' yi kha dog ngo bos dben// gzhon nu'i bde ba sus kyang brjod ma shes// til mar gyis srung ral gris bcang tshad 'gyel// grong khyer ser skya'i ljongs su mkha 'gro ma bur sna
111b1(rgyud 'grel): khyung gshog can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ khur bar chu blugs khong gi gtam rnams 'gags// sgyu ma'i ltung mo yang dag ma yin no// dbul mo gter dang phrad tshe sngar rtog bral// lan tshwa'i rdog po chu bo nyid
111b2(rgyud 'grel): la thim gsung ngo // dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du mkha 'gro mi nyi ma'i phreng bas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ wa ya skad la seng ge sdang skrag skyes// btsun mo rin chen bran mo la mi 'jigs// dgra ru bu langs
111b3(rgyud 'grel): mdza' bo su la bya// lcug ma'i rmi lam khar mi 'don par 'dug gsung ngo // lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la mkha' gro ma gtsug na mu tig 'chang gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// bag ma dang ni smyon pa'i spyod pa 'jol//
111b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i chu la nyo ni rang byan chung // rgyu skyegs ri la ma shor rlung rnams grogs// chu rnams 'bab sa nA ni ro gcig glo gsung ngo // ma gA d+hA rgyal po'i khap+pa du mkha' 'gro ma bdud rtsi bum 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda
111b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa/ lce spyang ro lo chags pa'i blo nau skye mi 'gyur// dgos pa'i dus las khra yi rtswal ni gzhan du min// wa yi 'gro 'dug dur khrod nang+ga du gzhol bA yIn// bu chung ngung ni me ldong seng ge ltos// glasungango //
111b6(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs 'br-i ka ma la shi la'i gtsug log du/ mkha' 'gro ma tshe ldan rgyan mes rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ chu tshad dus su lag kau ra sa zin// nyi ma'i snying po mun pas gos ma yin// lag pa chad pa'i boH
112a1(rgyud 'grel): mkhan bya ba 'dug/ dgar nag yi ges mkha' la gos pa min gsung ngo // klu gtsug na rin chen gyi yul du/ mkha'agro ma seng ge'i gdong can mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sgo nga mkha'
112a2(rgyud 'grel): la skyes pa'i tshang yang de nyid do// khug rta'i skum bu sa la nams kyang min// na mkha'i kha dog ma 'gags rnam par dag/ nu bun sa la langs nas mkha' la thim gsung ngo // shing 'dzam bu br-ik+Sha'i grib ma la mkha'
112a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro mo 'byung gnas rin chen mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// chu bo sna tshogs rgya mtshor tha dad min// ma dros chu ni gting nas g.yo 'gul bral// chu dang zla ba'i rang bzhin so sor stong // rlan dang rba rlabs rgya mtsho las
112a4(rgyud 'grel): ma 'das/ gsung ngo // phyag rgya rin po che brda'i man ngag las/ 'od zer dra ba'i dum bu mkha 'gro ma dpal ldan dbang gi rgyal mos bsdus pa ste gnyis pa'o// / bde ldan rin chen gling du mkha'
112a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rmu rgod dul ba'i spyod pa gzhan pas g.yung // 'bru yi chang rgod bram ze'i btung ba min// lcags kyus zin pa'i glang po rang dbyung med// g.ya' ma phyis pa'i mi
112a6(rgyud 'grel): long bzhin mi 'dod// rgyud med gzhu la su yis mnga' sring nus gsung ngo // thang bzang gser gyi bya skyibs can du// mkha 'gro ma rgya mtsho mig gis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ chol zangs nang du sbrang rtsi'i g.yos mi
112b1(rgyud 'grel): bya// smin pa'i sa bon ser dang ldan la gdab// bud med snol 'tshang khyo la sgra mi phod// rdzas ma tshogs pa'i srub mas me mi thon// til sbyangs zhabs med nang du til mi ldugs gsung ngo // nub phyogs p+lak+Sha'i tshul
112b2(rgyud 'grel): du mkha' 'gro ma bi za gzugs 'phrog mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ dug sbrul mar la blo ldan skye bo 'dzur// rin chen gling 'dod ded dpon gzhan gyis min// de 'og sman pa la snyan nad pa rang bzo spongs// lo stong
112b3(rgyud 'grel): mun pa sgron me gzhon nus sel// mkhas pa'i rus sbrul tsher ma'i khrod rnams spong // gsung ngo // grong khyer skyid pa'i 'byung gnas su mkha' 'gro ma kIrti thog mtha' can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ stobs ldan
112b4(rgyud 'grel): gyang spyod 'phye bos byar mi rung // chu bran rnams ni rgya mtsho'i nang du 'bab// rngon pa gling bu ri dwags ngos der 'bud// me shel 'od ni ras kyi bal la tsha// zengs kyi mdog ni gser 'gyur rtsi yis 'gyur/ gsung ngo //
112b5(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod so so'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i 'od can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ zlum ril me tog ljon shing grib las skyes// khab len rdo yis lcags rnams dbang du sdud// tshong ba rang gi rigs la 'jug par
112b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// spre'u'i rten ni 'bras bu can gyi nags// gru btsas len pa rgya mtsho sgrol la brtson gsung ngo // shing rtsi tra ba la'i grob ma la mkha' 'gro ma blo gros gser gyi gdu bu can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ chu
113a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong rus sbal skam la gdod mi rigs// dug mnga'i rma la le lo byas pas 'phung // phrag gis gtsang tsog med par kha ru bcug/ dur khyod nang du lde spyang ro lnga brel// ri yi sul la seng ge 'jigs
113a2(rgyud 'grel): pa med gsung ngo // rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du mkha' 'gro ma bde ba bzang mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ bung ba rtsi 'jib ut+pal mdogs mi nyams// char ni rdo sol me yi grogs yin no// mun pa'i dmag rum
113a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla'i 'od kyis sel// 'bru rnams skye ba tsha sgo med pa'i zhing // 'khor lo med pa'i shing rtas 'gro ma shes// gsung ngo // phyag rgya chen po badz+ra'i man ngag las/ ye shes rnam par gzigs pa'i dum bu/ mkha' 'gro ma
113a4(rgyud 'grel): su ka pa las bsdus pa ste gsum pa'o// / ri bo byang rkang gi steng du mkha' 'gro ma bum pa'i lto can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rigs ngan bu mo rgyal po'i khab du min// sbrang ma gu bur la 'byol
113a5(rgyud 'grel): ngan skyugs dri la 'du// bram ze gso sbyong dus su bya gzhan dor// sgog mo rgyan gyis spos tshe rab tu dga'// tsan+da dan dri la lto 'gro mchog tu gdung gsung // rgyal po'i khab yangs pa can du mkha' 'gro ma gtsug na
113a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bus rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ mi gtsang lung ni 'bras kyi zhing la phan// nad gzer skyes bu g.yo mad sman pa sten// rigs ldan ded dpon 'khor la bu bzhin po rtse// chu bran gling la nor bu yod ma yin// sbrang ma
113b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa yi nus pa grogs kyis 'gyur/ gsung // d+harma g+ha nA ra dzA chos kyi mdzod du mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma dpal gyi phreng bas rtogs pa'i badz+ra brjod pa/ 'dzam bu'i gser la 'gar bas 'dod dgu bsgyur// phye leb nya dang bung
113b2(rgyud 'grel): ba lcags kyus phung // gso bya'i dus der nad pas le lo smang // ma yis bu la brtse ba'i sems me gtong // rin chen gling du khrid pa'i ded dpon mnyes par bya gsung ngo // klu'i rgyal po e na l-i'i gnas su
113b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma khyung gi gdong pa tson gyis rtogs pa'i badz+ra brjod pa/ dug sbrul mche ba gdags pa'i rgyan mA yin// bde dang bral ba btson rar chud pa'i mi// ha la'i me tog 'char po'i dor ma 'thu// bang mdzod
113b4(rgyud 'grel): rku ba'i mi de bag yod ldan// btung bas gdungs pa'i mi de smig rgyu stag gsung // phyag rgya rin po che brda'i man ngag las/ sems rnam par dag pa'i dum bu// mkha' 'gro ma khyung gdong mas bsdus pa ste bzhi
113b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bya rgod phung po'i ri la mkha' 'gro ma gser gyi rgyal mos rtogs po'i brda brjod pa/ 'dam gyi skyon gyis pad+ma lA mi dgos// gshog ru rgyus tshe bye phyag tshad nas 'phur// tsan dan
113b6(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba'i sbrul gyis le lo bor// 'dod pa'i gnas der zo chu chu rgyun bsring // mchil pas zin pas nye yi bde ba stor gsung // 'byung po'i grong khyer bi ma la kar mkha'agro ma rdo rje 'angam skyes mas rtogs pa'i 'a
114a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa/ zhing la chu lung rim gyis bsten// pa lam gyis ni maM phigs med// 'byung la ma reg ut+pal 'dab// rgya mtsho'i chu la rigs byed med// mun pas ma zin nyi ma'i 'od gsung //
114a2(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs zangs kyi dung rgad kyi nang du/ mkha 'gro ma dpal ldan 'jigs med mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod po/ nags la brten bca' drang srong rgya bA tu shing lo gon// grangs la gnas pa'i seng ge ya nga bral nas
114a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug/ khyung phrug gshog ru rgyas tshe rten med mkha' la lding // sa 'dzin myu gus 'bras bu rang chas 'grub// gdol pa'i bu de 'tsher yang rang mthong zhig gsung / shar phyogs ka ma ru 'phags pa rang 'byung gi rtsar
114a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha'agro ma 'khor lo shugs 'chung mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// bram ze'i skud pa thog mar bsgrims nas glong // gso ras mkhan mos zla ba bcings nas glong // zhun la bab pa'i gser mkhar yangs
114a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bral// gdan gyi steng du rgyal pos bag gzhi phab// dmus long mig phye snang po gzigs mor tshe gsung ngo // mchod rten dpal dbyangs kyi rtsar mkha 'gro ma gtum mo gserI meg mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod
114a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ rmi lam sdug bsngal sad pa'i dus der dag/ mang po'i khrod der mi ngo shes po nyung // rgyu yis ma skyes na mkha' gdod nas ngag/ ti lo mar ngar btags ngar gyang snum gyis 'phyi// mdar ru ltor bros se bzhig
114b1(rgyud 'grel): sor du mthong gsung ngo // byang phyogs 'dam bu'i khyod du bde ldan 'od kyi gnas su// mkha'agro ma nyi ma'i gshog pa can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ bram ze'i rig byed gsang tshig pu lnga ston// rgyal po'i pho
114b2(rgyud 'grel): blang rigs ngan gyis ma mthong // srang ga'i kham phor bya ba zin nas 'dug/ dug gsum ngag na dmus long bris mkhan med// nor bu'i brtag pa blun pos shes pa min+de gsung ngo // rdzing bu pad+ma'i mdangs can
114b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'gram du mkha 'gro ma rdo rje bu snyems myas rtogs pa'i badz+ra brjod pa/ ra myong gse re la rtog pas bzo mi nus// rin chen gling na gram gsag gyo dum med// dus kyi rkyen gyisgra pad+ma rgyas par 'gyur// tshangs
114b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lus ni ma bkrus dri ma dag gsung ngo // dA ni ko shwa'i gling du mkha' 'gro ma rin chen thod 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i badz+ra brjod pa/ dgra med myi la su skyel bya myi dgos// ka la baM kA'i gshog ru sgo dAr rgyas// pad+ma'i
114b5(rgyud 'grel): kha ni nyi ma'i zer gyis 'byed// chu dang rlan ni gnyis su mi snang ngo gsung // sing g+ha la'i tshal du mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i zhabs pa can gyis rtogs pa'o badz+ra brjod pa/ rmi lam ltad mo su yis byas pa yin// bram
114b6(rgyud 'grel): chab med pa'i bu mo brjed ngas che// sgyid bsrungs la brtson 'bras bu me len blun// na mkha'i chu ni smin pa'i dgun 'brum 'bar gsung // dur khrod chen po sgra sgrogs su mkha'agro ma rdo rje dung can mas rtogs pa'i
115a1(rgyud 'grel): brda brjod pa/ lha khung nang du dmus ldong ljang mo nub// ji srid shing yod par du de srid mo// sos+ya ka'e chabA ro ma gzhi lnga sdod mi srid// sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'phrul la rtog pa bral// nor
115a2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i yon tan sus kyang byin pa med// bskal pa ma zhig nyi zla'i 'od mi 'gag/ khong snyan ma byang gyad la rgyu rtsal med// rgya mtshor ba'i chu thigs skam mi 'gyur gsung // dpal shrI na len+ti'i gtsug lug khang du mkha'
115a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ma rin chen 'od gsol mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ smyon pa'i mig gis nya dang stong mi mthong // rlan med sbyin la 'byar ba'i nus pa med// skyes bu med pa'i lcags kyus gling mi zin// thod le kor gyis
115a4(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' mtshon mi nus gsung ngo // phyag rgya chen po brda'i mon ngag las/ dpal gyi thugs rnam par bkod pa'i dum bu/ mkha' 'gro ma rin tshon gcig mas bsdus pa ste/ lnga pa'o// /
115a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho gser gyi gling du mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bu gcig mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ shing rta dang ni 'khor lo 'bral mi bya// dug sbrul dgra ru sgo nga ldan par 'gyur// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ni dngul gyis
115a6(rgyud 'grel): ldang // glang po dul tshe snying la yi ge 'jug gsung ngo // nub phyogs bai re'i tshal du mkha 'gro ma sha za dpal 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ ge sar steng du 'dab ma gdan du gting // thar pa 'dod
115b1(rgyud 'grel): pas khyab 'jug mig la blta// stobs dang ldan pas gser 'gyur rtsi mchog ni// di ring ban+d+ha'i drin las rab tu rnyed gsung ngo // dur khrod rab dga'i nang du mkha' 'gro ma nor bu'i 'od can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod
115b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ grang ba'i nad la ga bur bsten mi bya// tshangs pa'i yi ge sma ru ma gtub po// gi baM zad par glang po sgrog las thar// dngul chu'i nus pa lha dbang mig la phan gsung // shar phyogs khar+sa pa Ni'i gtsug leg
115b3(rgyud 'grel): khang du/ mkha 'gro ma bu ta ro zan mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// sbrul sngags shes pa'i nad la 'dug mi tshugs// 'chi ba'i dus der rgyal srid ci zhig bya// sna khrid med pa'i long ba gong du 'gro// phag gis glang po mtshon/
115b4(rgyud 'grel): te ma mtshon no gsung ngo // dur khrod ma hA kA lA'i dbus su/ mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi phreng ba can gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa// rmi lam ltad mo rang gi sboms la byas// ma ni sba ba dag la rab tu 'bar// yi ge gcig
115b5(rgyud 'grel): gis rig byed kun la 'jug/ rig byed kun gyis yi ge go cig ma shes+t+ra gsung ngo // bA ra Na ser mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan dung 'bud mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ sngo gzhan dang ni gser 'gyur rtsi mi 'dra// nya
115b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zla bos shel la chu rgyun 'dzag/ sbu ba'i chu rgyun rgya mtshor rang la thim// mkhas pa ba lang skyong ba drag shul 'dor gsung ngo // chu mig mnga' chu khron pa bskyes pa'i rtsar mkha'agro ma 'bar ma gser brel can
116a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ ri brag pas mtha' dben pa'i gnas ma yin// rgyal po'i pho byung tshong 'dus rab tu 'gol// byung na me long rgyub ngu blta mi bya// sdug tsha bI biR+Sha yi ge
116a2(rgyud 'grel): snying gis klag gsung ngo // glang po ljongs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro ma khrag snga rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ na mkha'i yid can mkha' las 'phags ma nus// drang srong rgyal mtshan thar pa'i lam ma yin// dkyil
116a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis kyang mya ngan las me 'da'// 'bras bu mchog ni smyon pa'i sems las btsal gsung ngo // byang phyogs sman gyi nags su mkha' 'gro ma gtsug na rgyan grol mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ phag rgod mgo bo rdog
116a4(rgyud 'grel): pas mnan pa'i mi// skyes bu de yis gdams ngag thams cad bstan// ded dpon bu yis na mkha'i yoM ge klags// grogs ngag 'di yis zhabs la 'dud par rigs gsung // dpal 'bras spungs su mkha' 'gro ma
116a5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan gru 'dzin mas rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ rdza yis 'khor lo srub thag ma then par// nor bu rin chen 'di la mchod par bya// glang po smyon pa 'tshong ba'i mi de mkhas// gter mthong nas ni 'byol bar mi bya'o/
116a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung / mchod rten rnam dag gi rtsarare/ dpal rang byung gi rgyal mos rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa/ kye 'o bu rnams seng ge'i 'o ma 'o thung // phan pa'i sman mar phyi ru ma skyu gcig/ snying gi dbus su nyi ma shar nas su/
116b1(rgyud 'grel): mun pa'i tshogs rnams rab tu 'joms par 'gyur gsung ngo // phyag rgya chen po brda'i man ngag las/ las rnam par grol byir dum bu/ mkha' 'gro ma dpal ldan pad+ma'i spyan gyis bsdus pa ste/ dum bu drug pa'o//
116b2(rgyud 'grel): lo phrin lnga bcu rtsa lnga ba/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man dog/ rje dam pa la mkhru' 'gro mas gtad de/ zham lo tsA bas bsgyur bya'o// rdzogs s+ho/ shud+d+hargya
116b3(rgyud 'grel): gar skad du/ DA kaM ni badz+ra gu t+yo gI tI nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo bdag med ma lnga phyag 'tshal lo// u dum+bA ra re ut+pal rgyun du 'khrungs pa dkon// g.yul ngo mi
116b4(rgyud 'grel): lcogs kyad kyi dgos pa stor// nor bu'i gling nas stong 'dab byed nus sam// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la zhon pa'i skyes bu bral// chu bo chen po'i rgyun 'dre bcad mi nus// lcags kyi pha bod gye ni la 'dril bar dka'// nyi zla'i 'khor
116b5(rgyud 'grel): lo rlung gis bzlog mi nus// mig ser nad kyis btA ba na dung yong ser// byang blta'i phug par nyi zla'i 'od mi 'cha ro// skyes bu rang srog dor ba'i dpa' bo blun// dug 'di sgrog gi bdud yin mngar yang dor// rbal 'byol ba'i
116b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyan pa bya bta' bskyed// nad la phan pa'i sman ni kha yang bza'// puN+Da ri ka'i sa bon ma mthong ngam// lha sras bzod pa che na kun gyis 'khur// tshong dus 'gron po 'brel mod tshogs kyi 'gyes// spang ma rtsi bcud mang
117a1(rgyud 'grel): bas sdug bsngal bskyed// ngal sar mkhar len byed pa'i skyes bu blun// sgyu ma'i yul la mkhan po chags mi skye// brag cha'i sgra 'di stong slad smra mi byed// rmi lam bde sdug 'di ni sang
117a2(rgyud 'grel): pas stong // phyag rgya chen po badz+ra'i mgur las/ bral tshe dang po'o// // a ma mthong ba'i bu chung gzhan la yid mi 'chor// skyes bu skom gyis gdungs pa kha zas gzhan mi 'dod// mkha' la
117a3(rgyud 'grel): 'brug sgra bsgrags pos dus kyi yid ches byas// khyim bdag kha mthong las la ngal ba med// nad kyis nyen pa'i mi ni dpyad la dga'// ded dpon nor bu 'dod phyir rtsol ba byed// nye zho med pa'i tshang tshol khug rta sgrim/
117a4(rgyud 'grel): drang srong rigs ldan ya nga'i kha zas spong // dor sdebs mthun pa'i glang po rol du bde// dge slong gzhon nu'i bsam pa dran gyis la// til ngar ldan pa'i gri thogs kun tu rgyug/ mar me'i 'od la btsal thabs logs
117a5(rgyud 'grel): su gyis// gdan sar bton pa'i rgyal bu 'di la ltos// bung bas rtse bcud ma lus ro gcig bsdud// gyang ni dpung bzhir bcas te dgra dpung 'joms// rgol ba'i mi ldog skyobs ldan ci'i phyir// gsang tshig mi
117a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub blun po gros mi dbang // bka' bzhin mi sgrub rgyal pos gshed ma spong // srog gol dgra la bzod par mi rung bsre// rig byed mkhan po'i rgyud ni shi yang slob// khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po sems rgya bskyed//
117b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po brngu'i myugur las/ brul tsho gnyis pa'o// / yid bzhin nor bu khur du khur nas kyang // stobs dang ldan pa'i glang po zhon byas te// bdud rtsi gangs kyi zhun ma btung
117b2(rgyud 'grel): bor bya// chu bo sbrel ba'i gru la zag lhan gdab// sgo lnga mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan ltos// srog dang bral ba'i skyes bu de ci sems// mkhan bzos ma byas pase ru'i gzugs la blta// btso bsreg ma
117b3(rgyud 'grel): byas skye bon myu gu'i rgyu// bram ze skud pa mkhal ba'i drung du sdod// ne bun 'thibs so 'di ni rlung gis gtor// glang chen smyon pa 'di ni lcags su gzhug/ bong bas me tog rtsi thob phyir mi blta// mkha' la 'ja'
117b4(rgyud 'grel): tshon skyon bral rlung sau ra yal// 'phrul pos chu sgrol g+hu yi ge tsAs 'dzin zhig/ mthong byed migra dang bral bas yul rnams 'gags// rgyal po bkar la brnyas na chang pa'i gnas// mthon po rIr+d+hA nI ltung ba'i
117b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas yin gzobs// 'dub gshog ya 'gal gyos ni 'phur mi nus// na mkha'i cho 'phrul skye 'gro'i dpal du shar// mkha' las tshar rgyun bab pas rtsi thog 'khrungs// ded dpon rgan po'i gling don
117b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi phyed// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ brul cho gsum pa'o// / dig mas tshig tu smras pa med// chu shel zla ba su yis byis// na mkha' cho 'phrul sna tshogs ngo
118a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshar che// nu mkha'i dbyibs dang kha dog su yis mthong // bar snang dngangs pa'i nus pa gang gi mthu// na bun 'di la ngos bzung 'dug gi ci// rna dbang sgral zin pa'i ri dgas thun//
118a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yul gyis non pa'i ri dwags ltos// gnyen po 'phrog dang ldan pa'i sho bA ltos// chu yi zla ba mi tshul gzhag na drungs// til gyi mar mi gasngal mdangs ngar dang ldan// rmi lam bde ba'i mnyams ni sad byas stong //
118a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pos sa srungs ral gris rgol ba 'joms// khro bo'i gzugs brnyan 'di yis byis pa bsdigs// gnam lcags thog gi shugs la sra snyi mad// chu yi zla ba 'di la yid mi gtad// 'ju' tsho ru dro byos
118a4(rgyud 'grel): stong pas spyang blang med// na thun mkha' la yul bya'i byung sa ltos// dngos med mun pa khyab pa'i na mkha' las// sna tshogs mdangs dang ldan pa'i lho sprin 'thibs// chur rgyun du mas 'gro ba'i lo tog rgyas
118a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ brul tsho bzhi pa'o// / myu gu mgo rtsa gnyis su gyes kyang gcig gi stobs// chu nang zla ba cha mad na mkha'i cho 'phrul yin// ga bur nus pa 'di yis
118a6(rgyud 'grel): smon dug byas pa med// chab rom snang yang chu las gung na grub pa med// na bun 'di yi rang bzhin cha mod gzung bas stong // me long nang du gzugs med rkyen shar snang ba tsam// mo gsham bu yi pha ma
118b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis mthong ngam ci// skad cig 'di la dus gsum khong nas dag pa yin// li tsA byi yis smras pa khyod kyis ji ltar go// a lu ngo shes byis pa de dus brid du med// 'a rtsi ba la'i mtshang rtogs nas ni 'jigs mi
118b2(rgyud 'grel): dngogos// nor bu lag du ljon pa'i ded dpon dngul dang bral// shel gyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur tshon gyis bcos su med// na mkha' ma grub phyir na sprin gyis gang la sgrib// gser la gzugs brnyan du ma
118b3(rgyud 'grel): byas kyang gser nyid yin// grib ma gzugs las byung bar shes pas spang blang med// drang srong rnams kyi rig pas sman dug dbyer ma phyed// dngul mo gter dang phrad tshe bcol ba'i las mi byed// nam mkha'
118b4(rgyud 'grel): no mkha' bstan pas na mkha' phyi nang 'dres// spang blang med pa'i na mkha' la ni 'byung bzhi shar// 'byung bzhi'i rtsal du 'gro ba gso bskyod byas// phyag rgya chen po brda'i mgur las/ la bzla ba'i brul
118b5(rgyud 'grel): tshe ste lta pa'o// // zhing pa brtson 'grus ldan pa la// lus ngag las la dug pa med// mtshan dpes po rgyun pa 'khor los sgyur// gdan sar gdon pa'i bya ba gces// lha
118b6(rgyud 'grel): yi bu mo yid 'ong ma// sgyu ma tsam du brtse bar bya// mdung rtse lde la ngar blud de// na mkha'i 'o ma dbug par bya// them skas go dang bu bzhi la dab ba// gzhon dus byis pa zas kyis skol// gangs
119a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi thigs pa mi spro bar// dbyung thag 'dren pa'i thug pa bzung // rlung gis mkha' la sbyar nas klung // r+m+ma bran yur ba bzung bar bya// chab rom sbyin pa rdo yi me// skye dang 'chi bas bskum
