182b4(rgyud 'grel): shugs byung zhen bral nyams kyi glong // rang grol rang bzhin spyod pa'i 'gros// re dgos las grol chos kyi sku// skye med kun rtogs spangs pa yis// byang chub lam tshan rtog dang bral// mi rtog
182b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin med blo las 'das// gung du btsal yang rtog med dang // rang bzhin dri med thabs dang shes rab kyi// rang bzhin sems gang las ni sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan rin chen rin thang med kyi mdzod// dam
182b6(rgyud 'grel): chos nyi ma bla ma'i drin gyis bltos// 'khrul bcas bden las 'das pa yi// nyon mongs 'ching ba gcod mdzad kyi// chos nyid bden pa mnga' brnyes pa'i// bshes gnyen skye med 'od gsal
183a1(rgyud 'grel): mthong // shes rab mig bral dngos po yi// gdon 'joms bdag gzhan bde chen sku// cir yang rtog meng bya bral gyi// nyams myong ye shes sgron ma gsal// gang gis dngos
183a2(rgyud 'grel): dung dngos med du// 'dzin te mar me lta bu ru// blo yi yul min spang ka'i phyir// blo 'das bcas bcos rgya mdung shig/ thabs bral shes rab sgron ma nyid// na mkha'i me tog shes rab lam// ri bong ra ltar don
183a3(rgyud 'grel): med kyi// spang bya mthar 'dzin blo dang bral// gang gis gnyis med don rtogs na// chos nyid ma mthong chos sku yi// chos nyid nyi ma yongs su med// de nyid phyag rgya chen po yin// shes dang shes bya las grol
183a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi// 'khor 'ongs stong nyid 'od gsal ba// bltar med bstan du med pa yi// blo 'das shes rab sgron ma nyid// snying rje rgyun ldan gru rdzings kyi// 'gro rnams 'khor bya bzod med kyi// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
183a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po las// ma lus sgrol mdzad thabs kyi skas// snang sems gnyis med thabs dang ni// shes rab dbyer maM da byang chub lam// chu dang 'o ma lte bu ru// ro mnyam nyams myong dbyer mi phyed// yod
183a6(rgyud 'grel): med bzung 'dzin mtshan nyid dang // mtshon bya rang bzhin dri med kyi// gnyis med ye shes chos nyid sgron// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro rnams bde sdug skyon yon go zhi// na mkha' la
183b1(rgyud 'grel): ni sprin bzhin du// ma lus sems can thams cad la// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gnas// dgag sgrub re dogs las grol gyi// nyams myong bltar med bstan du myed// yang dag don gyi de nyid lnga// yang
183b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag don mthong rnam par grol// ris drug sdug bsngal sems kyis ni// snang ba nyams myong bde chen la// snang ba mthun snang med pa ru// bla mo'i drin mthong rnal 'byor grol// don chen nyi ma byang chub kyi// chos
183b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid ye shes spyan pa yi// nyams myong sgron la thams cad kyi// bde chen smrar med don mthong bde// kun rtog 'ching bA gtsid mdzad kyi// bla mA'i drin thob zhen med nyams// gang gis bya ra mi byed par// gnas
183b4(rgyud 'grel): pus 'khor byar bde mi rnyed// sgra don 'brel med thos nas ni// shes rab yul las 'das pa'i phyir// bla ma'i drin gyis sems dang ni// nor bu rin chen yon tan ldan// dod gus yang sA med ngam
183b5(rgyud 'grel): tshig gi/ sgron ma bdag lus rgyal ba'i mdzod// bde chen yon tan 'byung gis gnas// bltar mod don mthong ngo mtshar che// gang nas ma 'ong gar yang ni// 'gro 'ongs las grol gnyug ma yi// 1\u0f7fts+tshe sbyar med gag
183b6(rgyud 'grel): nyanyamyong smrar med yongs su med// bsgom pa 'bral mang blo las 'das// chos nyid 'od gsal dag pa'i sems// byang chub gsal snang chos kyi dbyings// bde chen ye shes sku can gyi// sems kyi nor bu/
184a1(rgyud 'grel): dri med rnyed// ma blta bde chen mthong du med// ma rtogs nyams myong blo las 'das// mu sems rtogs pa chos nyid klong // cir yang bya bral yongs su med// dri ring mchog la gnas pa'i
184a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams myong rin po che// brtags pa ma yin gnyug ma yongs su med pa'i ngang // yungs med gzugs kyis bdag 'dzin dngos po 'joms mdzad pa'i// gnas lugs dge sdig spang blang ci yang bsam du med//
184a3(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med yid la mi byed dran pa yi// kun rtog 'ching ba gcod mdzad ye shes smon// rgyu ba chos nyid chos sku'i glong du chud// ma bsgoms dmus long mthong ba'i yul min phyir// bsgom pa bdud rtsi'i ro cher bla
184a4(rgyud 'grel): ma'i drin// byin brlabs brgyud pa gnyug ma'i nyams myong la// bde ba'i ro tsher ngos bzung cing yang med// 'khor pa dang ni mya ngan 'das// rtog med rtog dpyod yul las 'das// bsgom dang bsgom pa cir yang
184a5(rgyud 'grel): med// mi 'dzin 'dzin rtog 'khrul pa spangs// chos kyi spyan can chos kyi ni// sku can chos kyi sgron ma yis// tshogs gnyis chos kyi rnga mo che// byang chub lam chen chos kyi dung // bdag med 'od gsal sgra sgrogs
184a6(rgyud 'grel): dus// nor bu rin chen 'dod 'jo'i pa// 'chi med bdud rtsi bcud kyi len// ljon shing me tog 'bras ldan gyi// rgya mtsho ri rab bum pa bzang // na mkha'i nyi zla glu gar brtso// mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag gis/
184b1(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa don shes don mthong gi/ yid ches nges dang bcas pa yi// sngar 'dris ma bu dam tshig 'jal// chos dang chos min mnyam nyid las// tha dad 'gro rnams brdzun blo yis// thar pa'i srog gcod tshe 'di
184b2(rgyud 'grel): yi// rnam rtog thar med chu srin kha// snyidA rje dang ni stong pa nyid// ya bral tha dad don mi mthong // stong dang snying rje 'byor mang lam// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das mi gnas// zhen pa'i blo can rtag pa yi// yul gyi rgya mdud
184b3(rgyud 'grel): su mI 'dod// 'dod yon lhan cig skyes pa yi// bde ba'i ros gang skye med lam// rang bzhin dge ba'i sems nyid ni// gnyug ma'i bde chen mngon sum gyi// lhan skyes ro tsher brjod med na// rtags kyis de nyid
184b4(rgyud 'grel): don mi rnyed// bde chen 'khor 'das rtog pa yI// blo can rmongs rnams 'ching ba'i phyir// gang dang gang du bltas gyur kyang // de nyid blo yi yul las 'odas// rang rig bde chen mchin du med pa'i lam// lhan cig
184b5(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i yid can gnyug ma'i ro// bla ma'i drin rtogs skye mdu bsgom pa yi// nyams las don mthong skye med ngo mtshar che// 'gro rnams 'ching byed las la ni// rnam grol don shes rang rig gi/ sems rtogs mya
184b6(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'das kyi mchog/ de nyid spros pa'i yul dang bral// sems nyid nor bu rin chen mdzod// 'khor 'das srid zhi mya ngan 'das// dge sdig sa bon bag chags rtsa// thar lam byang chub rnyed kyi sku//
185a1(rgyud 'grel): rang sems chos nyid na mkha' yi// grong du grol na 'gro rnams kun// rnam dag ye shes nyi ma ste// rnam grol byang chub gzhan dga' med// 'gro rnams bde chen ros gang yang // thabs
185a2(rgyud 'grel): blal de nyid don mi mthong // thabs ldan bya bral skyes bu la// 'chi med 'gro 'od yul las 'das// gang gang 'dzin de dngos po yi// gdon gyi dbang gyur rmongs rnams la// 'ching las thar lam med pa'i phyir// thar
185a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam ston 'dzin med ltos// rlung gi rto zhon rtog bcas yid kyi bu// bzung 'dzin sbrang ma 'dod yon rjes su snyeg/ gang snyegs bde med 'khor ba'i 'khrul bcad de// ye shes byang chub rtsa rlung chos nyid zung // gang gang
185a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs 'dzin rtog pa yi// dbang song 'dod yon ltad mo nyid// bdag gzhan ltos med mthong ba las// rang rgyud ma mthong 'dod mi tshim// dngos med dngos dang bral ba yi// chos rnams dngos dang dngos min phyir// gang
185a5(rgyud 'grel): dang gang du 'dzin de nyid// blo yi yul yin 'dzin rtog phyir// stong dang stong nyid 'bras bu rung // dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon chen gyis// gzhan dbang bran ltar ma bkol na// gang la gnas pa de mi mthong // mos
185a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i blo ldan gus pa'i blo gros mchog/ las kyi mtshams sbyor bag chags rtsa ba can// yid kyi lus can chos nyid don mthong gi/ gzhan don nor bu dpag bsam shing ltar mthong // ting 'dzin bying rgod las grol rtog
185b1(rgyud 'grel): bA yi// rlung gis mi bskyod rtog med chos kyi ni// sku can bla ma chos nyid chos sku yi// ri bo nyi ma ma rig mun bral mdzod// 'gro la brtse ba'i blo can thugs rje yi// rgya mtsho mi g.yo dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// thugs/
185b2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i mnga' bdag thugs kyi dkor mdzod nas// ye shes sgron ma byang chub lam mkhan mdzod// me tog 'bras ldan 'gyur med dpag bsam shing // 'chi med bdud rtsi'i ros gang ku sA li// bdag med bde chen
185b3(rgyud 'grel): spros bral rtsed mo yi// 'gyur med don ston dngos po'i gdon 'joms mdzod// skye med 'od gsal stong nyid 'od 'phro yi// nor bu rin chen yon tan kun ldan gyis// dpal ldan dpal gyi 'byung gnas A
185b4(rgyud 'grel): tsAr+ya// gnyis med spros bral stong nyid sgra sgrogs mdzod// bde chen bde ba'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // mi 'jigs seng ge 'jigs bral me hA paN+Di ta// bum pa me tog bcud ldan sbrang rtsi len
185b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du// rang bzhin rtog med blo 'das sgron ma'i don ston mdzod// bsod nams mchog gis brgyan pa yi// na mkha'i yon tan mi zad gter// sangs rgyas ye shes d+harma bzhi// d+hU tI byang chub chos
185b6(rgyud 'grel): thob ma dzod// skye med blo ldan na mkha' lta bu yi// chos rnams stong nyid 'od gsal 'dus ma byas// mtha' brel bdag med spros bral chos sku yi// tshogs ldan nyi mas ye shes don rtogs shog
186a1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin lhan skyes 'gro rnams lhan cig skyes kyi sku// chos rnams rnam dag mya ngan 'das kyi dbyings// rnam rtog dang bral tshogs gnyis lhun grub sangs rgyas spyan// chogs
186a2(rgyud 'grel): rje tshogs kyi bdag po chos nyid don mthong shog/ sangs rgyas kun sdom bcom ldan mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom// bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde chen nyi ma bde ba kun gyi dpal// bla mi'i gsang mdzod gdamyos ngag snying
186a3(rgyud 'grel): bo don gyi gsang ldan mdzod// bde chen bdag med bde chen po'i tshogs dang ldan gyur cig/ sring dang zhi ba rnam dag ni// ro mnyam dkyil 'khor ldan gyi gtso// tshogs kyi 'khor lo tshigs kyi mchog/ tshogs rje
186a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag dpal ldan shog/ gnyis med 'dzin dang bral ba yi// chos rnams dngos med stong pa nyid// chos nyid 'ang gsal tshogs kyi ni// 'khor lo byang chub don mthong shog/ bsgom bya sgom byed dmigs
186a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// kun rtog 'ching ba gcod mdzad kyi// tshegs kyi 'khor lo tshogs kyi ni// byams mgon rgyun dang ldan par shog/ zhi ba'i blo gros bdag mod mya ngan 'das kyi dbyings// ji srid bde chen byang chub mchog
186a6(rgyud 'grel): gi sems// snying rje'i rgyun ldan gsang sngags snying po don gyi bcud// sgyu ma byang chub lam chen sangs rgyas byang chub 'ong // dngos dang dngos med brten g.yo gnyis dang gnyis 'dzin gyi// lam sbyor
186b1(rgyud 'grel): khyab bdag bcom ldan mi yi seng ge ni// sangs rgyas grong khyer tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i grong mchog tu// byang chub sgron ma ye shes sgron ma'i 'od ldan zhing // sems can rnam dag gdod nas sangs rgyas rang bzhin
186b2(rgyud 'grel): yang // ris drug rmongs rnams ma rig mun dra'i sprin tshogs kyis// yang dag lam bral bde gshegs nyi ma nub rnams lnga// tshogs kyi 'khor lo ye shes 'od 'bar mi po che// chos rnams rang bzhin spros
186b3(rgyud 'grel): bral mya ngan las 'das pa'i// chos nyid bde chen byang chub lam gyi rtsa ba can// gnyis med 'od gsal ma nyams zag med myang 'das kyi// bde spyod 'gro mgon thugs kyis 'dzin par shog/ ma rig
186b4(rgyud 'grel): mun gosal ye shes nyi ma'i byang chub 'od// dpal ldan chos kyi byang chub chos kyi sgron ma yi// ye shes byang chub bshes gnyen At+ma ta kI ni// chos kyi blo gros chos nyid gzungs kyis 'dzin par shog/ dge
186b5(rgyud 'grel): bi'i blo can yon tan kun gyi gnyen gcig po// thugs rje'i rtsa brtun mi yi seng ge byams pa yi// ljoHshing bshes gnyen nor bu rin po che// mi zad gter chen grib la spyod par shog/ dpal ldan
186b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten srid gsum yon tan kun gyi gtso// mi mchog rgyal po lha dang lha min kun gyi ni// gtsug gi nor bu yon tan kun ldan dam pa'i rje// zhing skyes nor bu rin chen rgyan dong ldan par shog/ rnam
187a1(rgyud 'grel): rtog las grol bcom ldan lhun grub chos kyi ni// sman pa nyon mongs zug rngu 'byin mdzad 'gro ba yi// mgron gyur rje btsun las can las las grub pa yi// las kyi nyon mongs drug rngu mi
187a2(rgyud 'grel): zad dbyung du gsol// bde gshegs nyi ma chos nyid chos kyi spyan can gyis// zla ba'i 'od zer dri med shal gong dngas gsal gyi// bla mi'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'chi med smon ma yis// sngags skyes 'khor de'i dri ma ma
187a3(rgyud 'grel): lus dag par mdzod// dpa' khyod thugs rjes 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus sel mdzad sgron ma'i pha// dpal ldan dri med thabs dang shes rab bdag gzhan phan pa'i rgyur gyur pa// rgyud ldan bla mo mtshungs med dpa' bo
187a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan kun gyi gter gyur pa// srid mtsho las sgrol 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyun gcod pa chen rol mdzad pa// dpal ldan rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis mchod pa chos kyi spyan dang ldan pa'i bu// tshogs rje tshogs kyi mchod pa
187a5(rgyud 'grel): srid mtsho ma lus skems byed bu// bde gshegs mchod pa dpag bsam shing chen yon tan kun gyi rgyan lta bu// mkha' 'gro'i gsang tshig sangs rgyas skye med tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bu// ma ma ma gcig bcom ldan yum
187a6(rgyud 'grel): gyur tshogs kyi 'khor lo bode chen ma// gnyis med byang chub lam mkhan tshogs 'khor bdag med chos kyi spyan can ma// gang zhig gang gi drin gyis bo dag blo'i pad+mo kha 'byed nyi ma'i 'od// mthong thos dran gyi sgron ma ma rig
187b1(rgyud 'grel): mun sel ye shes byang chub sgron// rnal 'byor nyams myong mkhas pa rtogs tshad spel legs mu tig rin chen phreng // 'gro drug nor bu rin chen yon tan med kyi dus// bde gshegs chos kyi spyan mnga' sangs rgyas sras po
187b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rin chen gdung rgyud ldan// yid la mi byed phyag rgya chen po byang chub lam gyis bag chags rtsa ba 'chang // chos nyid chos kyi don ldan chos mchog lam chen yid 'od gser gyi phreng bar ldan// gnyis med ye shes
187b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung khyab bdag 'gro mgon nor bu rin chen chos kyi mdzod// don yod lugs gzigs sde snod rnam grol don mthong rnam dag thugs de'i dgongs pa nyid// gang gi drin gyis ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam ltar bde
187b4(rgyud 'grel): chen don mthong zhing // the tshom blo bral yid ches sgron ma byang chub gsal dngas dri med rtog dang bral// gnyug ma'i nyams myong zhen med chos nyid 'od gsal nyi mas ma rig mun bA sangs// 'dir 'phrad smon lam mtshams/
187b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bag chags kyi rtsa ba can// bsam par sdong po rnams mdzes bsgrub pa'i me tog 'bras ldan gyi// byang chub ljon shing las 'bras yid ches bsil grib la// sngar 'dris myi dang phrad bzhin smon lam ma bu tsis mi
187b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jal// phyag rgya chen po gser 'phreng las// tshogs 'khor gsum pa gnyis ming yid ches rang gsal gyi le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// / phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu/ rin po che gser phreng zhes
188a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang // paN+Di ta mang pos gsungs pa rnams/ rje btsun mnga' bdag mai tri pas/ gzhung gcig tu bsdebs pa'i gdams pa rdzogs s+ho//
188a2(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo tsA ba mar po chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ pradz+wA le kha nA ma/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi phrin yig ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
188a3(rgyud 'grel): btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang // lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid gsum gyi rin chen rnam par dag gyur pa// gsang las shin tu gsang gyur mkha'i dang mtshungs par snang // rtse mo kun 'gro bde ba mchog
188a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sa gzhir gyur// shes rab don dam gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas go 'phang grub don thob pa'i rgyur gyur cing // yid bzhin nor dang bum pa bzang po ltar snang ba// de nyid shin tu gsang ba'i phrin
188a5(rgyud 'grel): yig mnyan 'os pa// de nyid don gyi go 'phang bshad sbyor spring bar bya// de nas sgrub po la phan phyi// shes reb phrin yig pad rdo rjes// gsang las shin tu gsang gyur pa// de kho na nyid rab gsal bya//
188a6(rgyud 'grel): sa sti dag pa kun grol ba// na mkha' lta bur skye ba med// ring rig tsam gyis shes bya dang // mo tshig tu dga' ba byed pa mo// mtshan ma med cing snang ba med// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// chos dbyings
188b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung bzhin zhes bya ba// mchog tu dri ma med pa'i gnas// mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// bdag med dri ma med pa gzhi// rdo rje gsum byung dri ma med// 'dod pa'i don
188b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi gnas gyur pa// yid bzhon nor bu bzhin du 'byung // lha yi dpag bsam shing lta bu// mchod pa mchog gi gnas gyur pa// de na gnas pa'i lha mo des// shes rab lha mo bla na med// rdor gsum mi byed sbyor ba yis//
188b3(rgyud 'grel): de kho na nyid pad+mar ldan// nang gi gnas kyi rang bzhin gyis// mchog tu dga' ba byed ma la// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin gyis// 'bad de yang dgu mkhyen par gsol// rba rlabs med cing snang ba med// rang gi
188b4(rgyud 'grel): lus la gnas gyur kyang // 'bar ba chen mo de srid kyi// dus gsum bdag gis ma shiso// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs can ma// rang bzhin med pas mdzes pa ste// skye ba med pas kun rtogs pas// thams cad du ni
188b5(rgyud 'grel): khyab byed ma// 'dod pa yon tan bzang sngar ldan// lus dang lus la kun tu gnas// dmyal ba la sogs thams cad la// gsang ba'i spyod pas rol pa ste// mdog dang yan lag rnam par spang smra// gsang las
188b6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gsang gyur 'di// dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga yi// bka' drin gyis ni bdag gis rtogs// dri ma med cing khyab pa mo// rang rig mtshan nyid gcig pu ste// skye ba med la rtogs bya'i phyir// ji bzhin
189a1(rgyud 'grel): du ni rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med mchog 'dzin pa// zad par bya phyir ji bzhin gnas// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// dge ma ji bzhin shes nas ni// yang dag gus drang bcas
189a2(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// nus pa ji bzhin sgom pa'ang byas// de ltar na yang da bar du// gcig tu mi 'gro ci yi phyir// yang na bdug la skal med dam// ji ste bdag gi sems rgyud la// yang dag pa yi sbyor ba yis// ji skad
189a3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs bzhin mi gnas sam// rang gi rang bzhin gyis dag pa// mngon par byang chub byed pa mo// phung lnga rdo rje gsum sogs la// je bzhin yang dag gnas pa yi// slob dpon dpal ldan zhal snga nas// snying rjer
189a4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa'i thugs kyis ni// 'bad de de bzhin rtogs bya'i phyir// yang dag ji bzhin bdog la gsungs// dpal ldan bde chen mgon po yis// khyod kyi dngos la bdag blo bskyed// bka' lung stsol cing gnas
189a5(rgyud 'grel): sa na// de la 'dir ni the tshom med// de nyid gsal bar shes nas su// nyin dang mtshan du bsgom byas kyang // gang phyir bden par gsal ba ru// me snang bas de stong ngam ci// yang bzhin nor bu mkha' mtshungs
189a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so lo// de ltar gsungs pa'i tshig de dag/ bden pa dang ni mi bden yin// mkha' mtshungs gang yin bden pa ste// gang zhig shes nas bsgom gyur kyang // gang
189b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos gsal bar mi ston pas// yid bzhin nor mtshungs brdzun pa yin// bdag gis khyod ni don dam gyis// kun tu 'char bar shes pa ste// de ltar na yang mi dmigs pas// sgyu ma tshogs kyis gzugs 'dzin/
189b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam du// nges par skyon dang yon tan dag/ grogs 'dus pa las ji bzhin 'gyur// gsungs pa'i ngag de bden pa ste// shes rab bden par smra ba khyod// gang gis rtogs
189b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin yang // bdag med bzhi yang 'dus pa yis// de dang mtshungs par de gnas so// bzang mo dri ma me 'bar ma// 'on kyang gang gis bdag shes nas// yun rings dus su rnam dpyad kyang // ma
189b4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa de gang du yi ba// mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i gzugs// mngon par byang chub byed pa'o// ye shes sgron ma'i snang ba ni// phyogs bcur bsal bar btegs na su// dri dang phreng sogs na
189b5(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang // bza' bca' ston mo de bzhin gzhan// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu ni// bdag gi shes rab bsten gyur kyang // skad cig kyang ni 'gyur ba med// mngon rtogs/
189b6(rgyud 'grel): dri med 'jug pa po// de bzhin nyid shes dag pa yis// khyod kyi dam tshig spyod pa yi// byang chub lam ni ston pa po// rgyud las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin// rgyun du bar chad med par ni// 'dod yon lnga po
190a1(rgyud 'grel): bsten pa yis// bdag gis byis pa nas bzung ste// shin tu bdag nyid rig pa yis// bsten pa dang ni bsgoms gyur pas// dge ba yi ni sa ga ni khyod// bdag la ci phyir yid mi
190a2(rgyud 'grel): rton// sems gnyis ldan pa'i bud med la// su zhig yid ni rton byed ces// yang dag mgon pos gsungs pa gang // de ni bden par nye bar gnas// sgyu ma dag ni thams cad la so// bud med sgyu ma khyod par
190a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags// rnam pa du mas phan btags pas// gang gis rnam kun bstan byas shing // khams gsum ma lus par bltas kyang // mi snang gcig pu gang na gnas// khyod kyis gnad ni dran medo bAr//
190a4(rgyud 'grel): byis pa gang gis khyod bsgoms na// de rnams don med 'phung 'gyur zhing // byang chub rgyur khyod gnas pa min// gnad ni legs par shes ldan pa// gang gis khyod ni bsgoms gyur na// byang chub snying po'i
190a5(rgyud 'grel): bor du yang // de rnams sangs rgyas bya phyir gnas// bzang mo khyod dngos shes gyur nas// gang gis ma bsgoms de la yang // grogs mo sA lag pa bsdams te spring // rigs ngan dung ni mtho ba'ong rung //
190a6(rgyud 'grel): gan shes na ni mdzar gyur nas// bzong mo nang du'ang snang byed cing // lan 'gi'ang mdzad par domed cing // ma rabs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// mtshang brtol na ni nges pa ru// skye bo de yi gdong gi ni/
190b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma lta zhing dbang du 'gyur// chos 'brang can gyi skye bo yang // 'jug pa lam ni 'di nyid de// tshig tsam chad pa byas na yang // 'chi ba na yang 'gyur ba med// gnyi ka dag pa'i rigs las byung //
190b2(rgyud 'grel): chos 'brang can du skyes pa yin// bya ba dang ni byo min dang // snod dang snod min 'dir khyad med// khyed la bdag gis rnam kun tu// mchod byas len 'ga'ang mi lta bas// shes rab khyod kyi rigs
190b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul// de ltar bdag gis khong du chud// bud mang rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// shin tu 'phyar lnga g.yo ba yin// mchu rkan la sogs skem pa ste// 'tshang 'bru mang pos ci zhig bya// khyod
190b4(rgyud 'grel): ni nyin dang mtshan dag dang // skad cig gcig kyang ma g.yengs par// bsgoms na skad cig nyid kyis ni// bla na med pa'i gnas thob byed// gang gis nye bar bsgoms pa yis// sangs rgya ste ge
190b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phang rgyu yin pa'i// khyod kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu// ji skad gsungs bzhin sngar ma shes// mang po smra ba ci zhig dgos// yid brtan rung ba 'ga' yang med// 'gyod dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yis//
190b6(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pas khyod ni mi shos ni// khyod kyi rang gi rang bzhin gang // gsal ba ru ni de smros shig/ rdor gsum sa bon las byung bas// gsum gyis bskyed par the tshom med// 'dod chags
191a1(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang sogs dri mas// sems can thams cad rmongs pas na// bye ba du ma'i nang nas kyang // gang gis khyod shes su yang med// mang du smra ba ci zhig dgos// smad 'tshong g.yon can gyis
191a2(rgyud 'grel): bskor bzhin// don dam du ni grub med pas// sgyu ma mchog gi gzugs 'dzin mA// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// rmongs pas khyod ni ma shes te// bza' dang btung sogs chags pa yis// srid pa'i
191a3(rgyud 'grel): btson rar lhung bar 'gyur// de la shin tu chag sa pa yis// 'byor ster khyod ni brjed par 'gyur// phyag rgya'i chags la 'jug po yis// rgyal 'gyur rdo rje can mchog ma// bla ma'i zhabs kyis bka' drin
191a4(rgyud 'grel): las// bzang mo khyod kyi rang bzhin no// ji ltar yang dag gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar yang dag gnas pa bzhin// thams cad bdag gis shes par 'gyur// khyod kyi rang bzhin ma lus pa// thams
191a5(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag gis shes pas na// rmi lam na yang bslu mi nus// de bsdu bdag la b+h+yo gtod cig/ khyod kyi lam ni gcig pu nyid// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin sbyangs te// gang bzhugs sangs rgyas nyid
191a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrang par// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bstan// zib mo de yang bdag gis ni// ji srid sbyang ba ma byas pa// de srid khyod kyi lus reg las// byung ba'i bde ba rnyed ma yin// gti mug 'obs kyis 'khrigs
191b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // zhe sdang gi ni sdong dum ldang // 'dod chags tsher mnyam nga bas// byang chub lam ni bgrod par dkar// phung po'i shing ni thog mtha' med// 'dod yon yal ga gyen 'grengs pas// na mkha'i mthongs ni g.yogs
191b2(rgyud 'grel): pas na// lam de dam por bkag ste gnas// phung po nyon mongs de bzhin du// 'chi bdag lha bdud chom po pa// sdung ba mang pos bskor nas su// rnam rtog chen po las byung ba'i// srid pa'i rtsa dang lcug ma dang //
191b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rgyal la sogs ldan pa'i nags// shin tu rgya chen brgal dka' bar// phung po'i shing rta brten nas su// gti mug 'obs ni brgal dkaru gnas// kun rtog rtswa dang ldum sogs pa'i// skyibs su 'bad de yib
191b4(rgyud 'grel): bar byed// lha bdud la sogs chom po pa// de lta bu yi phyogs na gnas// yang dag lam zhugs 'gron po dag/ sems kyi nor bu 'phrog pa yis// rab tu sdang bas 'joms par byed// dkon mchog gsum
191b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi mdzad po che// yon tan nor gyis yongs bkang ba// byang chub lam la gnas pa yI// me la 'tshe bas yis de mthong nas// ye shes rdo rje sta re ni// so ni rnon por bad ru ba yis// byang chub kyi nI ldem 'gog
191b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// phung po shing ni kun bcad nas// cho ga bzhin du gtubs nas su// yid kyi shing de las byung ba'i// nyon mongs sdom dum tsher mar bcas// bdag med me la bsreg par bya// nga rgyal rdo yis tshogs
192a1(rgyud 'grel): de ni// shes rab rdo rjes phye mar bya// gti mug 'obs ni 'khrigs pa dag/ byang sems rgyun mi 'chud pas dgang // yang dag lam zhugs 'gron po la// 'tsho byed 'dul bar dka' ba yi//
192a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bdag bdud sogs chom po bya// bcom pas de dang de 'bros 'gyur// byang chub lam ni yangs pa na// byang chub 'gegs bya'i phyir gnas pa// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i spang ba rnams// thabs kyi lus ni dri med
192a3(rgyud 'grel): pas// shes rab ral gri rnon po yis// 'bad pas de dag bcom nas su// lam bzang de ru zhugs nas ni// thams cad dor ni ci dgar 'gro/ byang chub lam ni sbyangs pa yis// kun tu shin tu dri med pas// rmyad
192a4(rgyud 'grel): byung bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// grogs mo khyod ni sbyangs pas na// rang bzhin dri med dag cing zhi// rang rig bdag med mnyam pa nyid// 'dod pa'i don gyi 'bras ster po// go 'phang bla meng thob par 'gyur// khyod kyi
192a5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ro myangs no// 'di ni 'di 'dra zhes bya ba// sangs rgyas kyis kyang brjod mi nus// rang rig skye ba med pa nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// dbang po las 'das gang yin 'thob// mchog tu dga'
192a6(rgyud 'grel): ba las byung dag/ shin tu rnyed dka' gau 'phang ni// bsam gyis mi khyab bla na med// mya ngan 'das gnas zhes bya ba// mngon par byang chub byed pa'o// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin ni// nyin dang mtshan du bsgom
192b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// chos gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur// shin tu gus pas bsgom pa las// gzhan du de ni thob pa min// de ni rang bzhin dag pa ste// dus kun du ni 'dus ma byas// rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs//
192b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab dri ma med// skye ba med par rtogs pa yis// sems can kun la yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// bla na med par de shes bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas de
192b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob byed pa'o// de ltar sems dang sems byung gi/ don gyi rang bzhin rtogs nas ni// rdo rje dri med gsum sbyor ba// ji ste shes nas rnam bsgoms nus// ye shes rdo rje rab sbyor gyis//
192b4(rgyud 'grel): des ni grogs mo 'grub par 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med las 'das pas// nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa ste// dri med zhi ba thabs bcas par// brten par bya zhes 'dren pas brjod// thabs dang bral na khyod kyi min//
192b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyang khyod dang bral na min// de gnyis phan tshun bral ba yis// 'grub pa nam yang yod ma yin// thabs dang yang dag ldan pa ru// mdza' mo khyod ni ji bzhin 'gyur// bdag gi kun tu shes zin na//
192b6(rgyud 'grel): de las gzhan pa ci slar yod// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin ni// bdag gi byang chub snying po'i bar// sangs rgyas nyid du brten bgyid na// de bas bodag la drin gyis g.yogs// dpal ldan bde chen na
193a1(rgyud 'grel): snga nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid bya'i rgyu// thabs dang yang dag ldan pa yi// blo gros chen mo khyod la ni// pad+ma rdo rjes nges par ni// sangs rgyas kyis zhes ji skad du// springs pa
193a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin grogs mo mchog/ thabs dang bcas par bya dgos par// dpal ldan bde chen rdo rje can// de skad phrin brdungs de bzhin du// bang gi ni sangs rgyas rgyu nyid du// khyod kyis de ltar myur du gyis// bdag
193a3(rgyud 'grel): la ji bzhin gsal po ru// phrin las skad cig myur du skur// khyod kyis spangs pa'am brjed ngas pa// bdag gi tshe 'di gnas mi byed// bying dang rgod pa spangs nas su// dus kun nyin dang mtshan du ni// rgyun
193a4(rgyud 'grel): du bar chad med pa ru// skad cig skad cig khyod dran pas// dngos grub don kun bdag la byin// gal te de ltar ma gyur na// de tshe bdag ni rma phab pas// ji ltar byed pa ltos shig dang // ji bzhin rgyud kyi de
193a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi// thag pa yis ni bcings nus su// yang dgra pa yi khyim du ni// dge mas kun nas bcug nas ni// skye ba med par rtogs pa yis// sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis// 'bad de bsrung ba byas
193a6(rgyud 'grel): nas su// de nyid sangs rgyas sa mchog du// thabs kyi lca gso sgrogs gis bcings te// ye shes rdo rje'i gzer btab la// bdag mang rdzong du bzhag nas ni// de nas bdag gis bsgrub par bya// de ltar
193b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la sprid bya ba// ji ltar gyur pa bdag gis springs// 'dzem dang ngo dga' spangs nas su// bzang mo la ni kun bzlas kyis// gal te byams par mi byed na// de tshe cig zhig skyu ru yod// 'on te min na tha na 'di dag
193b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin mi'i snying la zhog/ khyod kyi lam dang sbyang ba yi// bye brag dag kyang ngas shes la// rigs dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang // bdag gi khyod kyi kun 'byung dang // don dam gnas kyang shes pas na// de
193b3(rgyud 'grel): bas bdag la blo gtod cig/ bla mo'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// thabs kyi mchog dang bcas pa ru// shes bya thag pa rab sra bas// de dang de ru rgyug byed pa// bdag gis bzung ste bcings zin pas// da ni 'bros
193b4(rgyud 'grel): sa gA la yod/ de bas lha mo bdag dga' bas// dpung gyur dam tshig la mnos la// dpal ldan bde chen zhal snga'i bka'// yon tan rgya mtshos bskyang bar gyis// khyod kyi rang bzhin bzung med cing // rmad
193b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ji bzhin rig nas ni// dpal ldan bde chen spyod pa ni// bkra' yis de bzhin 'jug par bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig ldan pa// shes rab phrin yi go mnyam med pa// dpal ldan byed chen zhal snga yi//
193b6(rgyud 'grel): bka' drin gyis ni bdag gis byas// shes rab ri bo bsrubs shing gis// shes bya'i 'o mtsho bsrubs las byung // ye shes bdud rtsi rang byung ba// mngon sum sangs rgyas byed pa po// shes rab phrin
194a1(rgyud 'grel): yig la 'bad de// skyes bu gang gis de rig nas// 'bad de rnam par bsgoms pas na// de ni rdo rje 'dzin dngos 'gyur// shes rab kyi phrin yig slob dpon chen po pad+ma rdo rjes mdzad
194a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs s+ho// / paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang // bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rnal 'byor ba'i
194a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa'i bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba/ rje btsun bla ma rnams dang dang lce rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// ci phyir zhe na gang gis gang la gang ltar bsgom// rtags dang yon tan bar chad bgegs skyon bsal//
194a4(rgyud 'grel): de dag shes nas goms pas byang chub 'thob// ma thos mi shes mi 'grub yang na 'gyangs// dang po ci phyir bsgom pa bzung 'dzin gnyis// ma spangs ji bzhin ma bsgoms rnal 'byor pas// phyag 'tshal
194a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod bshags sbyin pa mang byos kyang // bsod nams 'phel yang ye shes rdzogs mi 'gyur// gnyis gong gis rnal 'byor dang ldan pa// thos mang brtson zhing dam tshig sdom gnos shing // mchod dang
194a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mos byang chub sems ljon pa// de ni theg chen gsang ba'i snod yin sgom// gsum pa gang la zhe na rang gi sems// ji bzhin ma bcos ye nas rnam dag cing // spos bral yod med rtag chad mtha'
194b1(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa// de la g.yeng ba med par rtag tu gnas// bzhi pa gang ltar sgom pa bsgom bya dang // sgom pa gnyis med rang gi ngo bo la// ci yang myed la cir yang snang gsal bar// bying rmugs spros pa'i rtog
194b2(rgyud 'grel): pa med par bsgom// lnga pa de rtags rnal 'byor brtson ldan la// dang po gnyid dang 'dod srog chung bar 'gyur// de nas rim gyis rmi lam 'dod la sogs// rtog pa ji bzhin cho 'phrul ga/ zugs kyang ston//
194b3(rgyud 'grel): drug pa de yi yon tan bsam brjod pa// mngon sum tshe ring nad rnams gso ba dang // bgegs sel la sogs yon tan mang po 'byung // de bzhin rim gyis byang chub lam la 'jug/ bdun pa bar
194b4(rgyud 'grel): chad bgegs ni rnal 'byor pa// gnas spangs gnas 'tshol gzhan du 'gro 'dod na// gnod sbyin gzhan dang gzhan du 'gro 'dod de// rnal 'byor sems la zhugs nus gnas gzhan 'phan// gal te//
194b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bsgom zhing gnas bzung bas// sgra bcad bar skabs nang du gzhan 'jug dang / phyir byung khengs grags 'dod sgrom zas nor tsho lo// yi dwags 'dod sred can gdon de sems zhugs// gal
194b6(rgyud 'grel): te rnal 'byor sems 'khrugs 'thab 'dod cing // 'khor la gshe dang gzhan la spyo byed na// 'byung po'i bdag po ya ba shon pa// sgrub pa de yi snying la zhugs pa yin// gal te rnal 'byor 'phres
195a1(rgyud 'grel): shing nyal la dga'// zas skom skyed cing bzlas la mi brtson na// lto 'phye nyal brtson snyoms byed ces bya ba// rnal 'byor sems la zhugs nas gnas par byed// gal te rnal
195a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor rang gi longs spyod rkyen// yo byad srung zhing so 'dzugs srungs ma sgo// gsog phyir 'dod tshol gzhan du gtong 'dod na// gnod sbyin nor bsrungs zhes bya sems la zhugs// gal te rnal 'byor pha ma spyan tshogs
195a3(rgyud 'grel): lo// chags nas smon lam rim 'gros srung byed na// lhan cig skyes pa'i bag chags ma byang bas// nyon mongs ma spangs byang chub ring bar 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor gza' skar 'jug phod dang // dus dang lo
195a4(rgyud 'grel): zla bzang ngan rtsi byed na// dbyer med mnyam po nyid dang 'gal bas na// byang chub thob par rab tu dka' bar 'gyur// gal te rnol 'byor thos mad+ma rtogs che zhing // bsgom brtson bsnyems pas bdag bstod gzhan smod
195a5(rgyud 'grel): nu// nyon mongs ma spangs nga rgyal 'phel 'gyur bas// phyir yang lhung zhing byang chub ring bar 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor bdag la gzhan dag gis// sngon dang da ltar ma 'ongs gnod byed ces// zhe sdang skyes nas/
195a6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags gsod gtong na// zhe sdang dbang gis byang chub ring bar 'gyur// gal te bdag la gzhan gyis mchod bkur zhing // bsngags pa mang brjod bstod la sems dga' na// 'gro la phyogs char
195b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur te chags sems kyis// byang chub lam la 'dis kyang ring bar 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor 'khor mang 'du long dag/ rgyal po lta bur mang por brten na ni// khang grags yin pas bsgom pa g.yeng ba'i rgyu// byang chub
195b2(rgyud 'grel): lam las shin tu ring bar 'gyur// brgyad pa skyon gsal thabs ni rnal 'byor pa// sems la bar chad mtshon ma de byung na// 'di ltar bsam nas mtshan rtog gsal bar bya// chos su ci snang sems las gzhon med
195b3(rgyud 'grel): cing // sems kyi rang bzhin chos nyid ngo bo la// bzang ngan spong len 'dod sred byams sdang sogs// rtog dang rtog pa'i dbang gis bgegs byung na// sems la bltas ni gang yang mi snang bas// snang med sems rtog mtshan mgal
195b4(rgyud 'grel): papal/ rtog mtshan mar sems la bzung nyes byas// rtog pa thams cad spangs shing rtog med gnas// rtog pa med pa la yang gnas pa med// de ltar ring du gnas na rtog bgegs ni// myur bar zhi gnas ji bzhin
195b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa las// bar chad sems kyi rtog pa 'byung mi 'gyur// byang chub 'bras bu myur du thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa'i rtog pa'i bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba// dngos grub mnyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen
195b6(rgyud 'grel): bo sangs rgyas gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs spro// dpal 'khor lo sbom po la phyag 'tshal lo// byis pa'i rjes so byis pa 'breng // byis pas byis pa 'jig 'gyur bas/
196a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dir byis pa grol bar bya ba'i phyir// zhes pa 'chad par bsams so// byis 'ching lam du dkyer ba bshad// de la 'dul ba don yod par grub pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa chen po'i rgyud las//
196a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gi rmongs pa 'ching 'gyur zhing // ngu 'bod mthar ni ngos 'gyur ba// de nyid kyis ni grol 'gyur zhing // shes rab stobs kyis bde ba thob// ces gsungs pa'i don mkhas pas mngon du bston par bya ste// gang
196a3(rgyud 'grel): de la mchog du bsdams par bya ba yin pas// thog mar rgyud brtag par bya'o// de la chu mnyam pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa yun ring por skye bar mi 'gyur yang dngos po des de la 'dod tshogs la sogs
196a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mi 'byung ba ma yin no// nyon mongs pa chung ba ni 'dod tshogs la sogs pa'i dngos po chen po dang // mang po dang lhag pa dang phrad cing mngon du gyur pa la ni nyon mongs pa bul bar skye la// 'bring dang chung ngu la ni shin
196a5(rgyud 'grel): tu cha phra ba'o// gang zag 'dod chags spyad pa ni chags pa'i dngos po chung ngu dang // ngan pa la yang chags pa chen por 'gyur na// de las ldog pa la lta ci smos te// yun ring du chags pa'o// dbang po mnyen pa dang //
196a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du 'jam pa dang / mi byung ba dang / lus ngag gis gzhan la tho 'tsham pa ma yin pa dang / dpral bar dka' ba dang / dman pa la mos pa dang // spro ring ba dang / de la 'du ba dang / yid mi bde ba mang ba dang /
196b1(rgyud 'grel): kun dga' ba mang ba dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / mdog gsal ba dang / 'dzum pa sngon du gtong ba dang / sha rtsi dmar zhing 'gro ba mgyogs pa dang / 'khun bur smra zhing mi brtan pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs rgyu ba'o// zhe sdang dang
196b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i gang zag ni sha rtsi nag cing stobs che ba/ drang por 'gro zhing brlang por smra ba/ thams cad mnar sems dang ldan pa// zhe sdang ba'i dngos po chung ngu la khong khro ba kun nas dkris pa stug po dang / mang po skyed par
196b3(rgyud 'grel): byed na/ 'bring dang chen po la lta smos ci dgos te/ yun ring du gnas par byed do// dbang po mi gnyen mi 'jam/ gzhan la tho 'tsham/ dpral bar sla/ yid 'byung ba smra/ mu cor smra/ spyi brtol che/ mi mos pa mang /
196b4(rgyud 'grel): lngas kyi mtha' ngam brtan/ brtul zhun dam ldan/ yid mi de yang 'khrug pa mang / bzlog dka'// gnod bzhin du gnas/ khro gnyer dang ldan/ gzhin gyi mdog mi gsal ba'o// gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni rmongs par 'gyur
196b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dngos po chung ngu la yang gti mug gis kun nas dkris pa stug po dang / mang po bskyed par byed na gzhan lta ci smos te/ yun ring du gnas par byed do// dbang po bul ba dang / blun pa dang / zhan pa dang / lus kyi
196b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang / ngag gi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang / nyes pas sems dpa' dang / nyes par smra/ nyes par byas pa'i las byed/ le lo che/ sgrub mi phong / smra ba zhan/ yid mi 'jug/ brjed pas shes
197a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du mi spyod// log par 'dzin/ dpral ba dka'/ yid 'byung bar dka'/ dman pa la mos/ glen dig lkugs/ lag pas brda byed/ legs par gsungs pa dang / nyes par
197a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'i chos rnams kyis don kun shes par mi nus// rkyen gyis phrogs/ gzhan gyis phrogs/ gzhan gyi dring la 'jog/ sha mdog nges pa med/ ngal bar rgyu ba'o// gang zag nga rgyal dang ldan pa ni/ khengs par
197a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i dngos po chung ngu la yang nga rgyal gyi rgyu kun nas dkris pa stug po dang / mang po skye bar byed na/ 'bring dang chen po la lta ci smos te// yun ring du gnas par byed do// dbang po rgod pa dang / dbang po 'dam lta bur mtho/
197a4(rgyud 'grel): khengs lus cher brgyan pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson// brtsan ngag tu smra zhing mi 'dud// pha ma nye du bla ma lta bu dag la dus gsum du rkyen du 'bab pa'i mchod pa mi byed/ lus mi 'dud/ gsong por smra ba dang / phyag
197a5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal mngon du ldang thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa dang / bdag nyid kun tu 'dzin// bdag bskyod gzhan la smod/ rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti 'dod/ grags pa 'dod/ tha ma thom gyi
197a6(rgyud 'grel): snod gyur/ dpral cing yid 'byung ba dka'/ rgya chen po la mi mos/ snying rje chung / bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang gsob dang gang zag tu lta ba shas che/ khro gtum che 'khrug pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de lta bu
197b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun pa ni nga rgyal gyi rtags so// phrag dog dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni sha mdog sngo nag pa/ 'dus pa'i yul med par rgyu ba/ gzhan la gnod par smra zhing / nges pa med pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs rgyu ba'o// zhes
197b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa 'di dag nges par slob dpon gyis brtags la gdams par bya'o// de yang gsungs pa/ sreg bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtags te nga yi dka'// blang bar bya yis gus phyir min// zhes
197b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas/ dngos su sgrol ba la bsam gyi mi khyab par 'dod pa dang / rgyu ma dag pa la bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang / phyogs tsam la bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang / rab tu thal po bsam gyis
197b4(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab par 'dod pa ste/ 'di dag ni rmongs pa rnams kyi ngan rtags yin te/ mkhas pas kun tu sbyangs par bya ba yin no// blang bar bya ba ni mchog tu gsadra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de yang gsang ba bsam gyis
197b5(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab pa dang / bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'pho ba bsamo gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang drug go// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bla
197b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gdams pa'o// bzod pa bsam gyiso mi khyab pa ni/ dug lnga sbas pa'i lom du khyer ba'o// gsang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa kha cig kyang dug lngar 'dus mos kyi dgongs pa can yin no// dug lha
198a1(rgyud 'grel): lam du ji ltar 'khyer na/ gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa/ de ni kun gyi stong nyid yin/ zhes gsungs pas 'dod chags kyi stong nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang la sogs pa'o// de la phyi nang gi
198a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba cig la chags pa skyes pa de yang kha dog la sogs par ma grub pasna na brtag pa'i mthal bsal ba'o// rlung rjes su dpag pa las shes pa de bzhin du/ shes rig myi 'gags
198a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo nas chad pa ma yin no// de gnyis kyi bar de gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yang yod pa ma yin te/ de bas na bzhi pa ni rjes thob kyi shes pas dpag par bya ba'i de nyid dus su spros pa ci yang yod pa ma
198a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no// de la 'dod chags ma spangs rnam par dag pa'o// zhe sdang la sogs pa la smras te/ de ni phan tshun spangs te 'gal ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings rtogs pos ma lus pa'i yul dug med par byas so//
198a5(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs ngo // sngar smos pa ltar stong pa nyid ni kun tu sbyar bar bya la/ dug ldi'i btsal thabs ni zhe sdang btsal ba bzhin du kun tu blta bar bya'o// de la nung par ltung ba'i dus su di rede ni bdag gi zhe sdang gi
198a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos po bdag gi skyes pa 'am/ phas rgol ba 'am/ gzhan dag phan tshun 'thab pa 'am/ zhe sdang skyes pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag mchog dngos grub 'thob par byed pa'i yan lag yin pas zhe sdang ci byung
198b1(rgyud 'grel): tshor bar shog cig par smon lam btab la/ nam tshor ba'i dus su zhe sdang de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab par bya'o// gal te de'i nyin par zhe sdang ma byung na sngar bdag nyid zhe sdang skyes pa 'am/ phan tshun sdang ba dang / gzhan
198b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi phan tshun zhe sdang skyes pa la dran pa bskyed la de nyid rang bzhin med par bya'o// de ltar nang gcig bzhin du smon lam btab la bya'o// de ltar byas pas zhe sdang gi dug gi myi tshug par bya'o// zhe sdang skyes so cog
198b3(rgyud 'grel): lam du shos tsam+ba na/ drug gzhan la yang de bzhin du shes par bya ste/ zhe sdang yid kyi gang zag gi zhe sdang yang dam du byas paso de las su rung po dang / 'did chags la sogs pa la sla bar 'ong ba de bzhin du gang
198b4(rgyud 'grel): gi zhang che ba de thog mar yi dam du bya'o// de nas gzhan la sbyar b+h+rUM ni snga ma bzhin no// cha mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa chung bsdu kyang thug myur gang yang rung ba cig yi dam du byas la/ de las su rung ba dang rom
198b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi spro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las dang po'i gang zag gi gcig la mchog tu ma gdis na/ dug lnga mang du 'byung bas yid gtong snying mi 'dod de/ gzhug lhod pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag ni sngon du
198b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan par mri ba ste/ na mo sgom pa'i dus su gzod gang la de gdams pa zhes pa sngon du bstan pa'i don de ni de nyid yi dam du gdams pa'o// dug lngas 'jigs pa brtul nas mi 'jigs pa la zhugs pa
199a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mchog tu gasdang ba'o// snod shin tu babang ba la gdams par byi'i// snod ngan tshig tsam la brten nas bag med du spyod pa la ni ma yin no// thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni// gtor
199a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang ni bzlas pa dang // dkyil 'khor me dang chu'i yis las// phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa dang // phyag dang bskor ba bya ba dang // lug ma'am bris pa la sogs dang // gsung rab bri sogs rtsom pa dang // thams
199a3(rgyud 'grel): cad dus su rnal 'byor pas// thams cad rang bzhin rtog med bya// gnyid ni bag mang mi log ste// ji ltar pad+ma kha zum pa// grib mas non pas zum pa ste// gribA sel stobs kyis rgyus pa ltar// gsal ba 'das nas
199a4(rgyud 'grel): ma rig pa// sa 'thug gyur pa'i stobs kyis te// dbugs dag me long dkyil 'dus ltar// rim gyis bsngos te ma rig pa// shes rab kyis ni sbyang byas nas// cig shos la ni nges 'dus pa// ma goms pa las yid
199a5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'byung // goms pas yid gnyis med pa ni// rab tu 'bad pa'i sems goms yin// gsang ba 'dus pa las// 'pho ba'i dus su bsam mi khyab// las kyi shugs kyis 'pho ba dang // rnal 'byor lcib pa'i man
199a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag go/ bsgom bya smig rgyu la sogs la// mthong 'og nga nyid gnas pa dang // rang bzhin gyis sgrub rdo rje'i lus// bdun gyi 'pho ba spangs nas su// srid mi 'jug ste mtha' gnyis spang // sbyor sems sngon du btang ba yI//
199b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas ldang 'gyur mi 'jug byed// 'da' bar mi 'gyur mchog grub pa'o// rkang pa dang ni kha dang lte// snying kha spyi gtsug mig rnams te// rlung ni gang nas 'pho 'gyur ba// rim pa bzhin du skye zhing 'thob//
199b2(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang // mi dang lha dang ya shes so// de nas sgo gzhan dgag byas la// mig nas rlung ni phul bar bya// bla ma'i zhalnga la gnas pa'o// de bzhin lhub pa'ang zhal lo gnas// rnal 'byor
199b3(rgyud 'grel): mi shes gang zag gis// mi dang lha yi skye bA ru// blang ba'i sems ni rtse gcig bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nang nas kyang // 'chi ka'i sems ni gtso yin pas// gang ltar bsams pa de ltar 'gyur// zhes gsungaso//
199b4(rgyud 'grel): 'o na sdig pa can yang de ltar 'gyur ram zhe na/ mi 'gyur te/ sdig che las kyis bskal nas ni// man ngag 'dod dang mi 'phrad de// gal te phrad kyang glang gzer dang // smyo 'bog sogs pas mi dran no// 'o na tshogs
199b5(rgyud 'grel): bsags pa la 'dar ka'i sems med kyang bde 'gro ru skye bo zhe na// tshogs du ma bsngags kyang 'chi kar sems ngan skyes na rgyal po ma skyes dgra lta bu'o// de bas na 'da' kau ma'i bsams kyis mi khyab pa la// shin tu
199b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bad par bya'o// 'bras bu bsam gyi khyab pa ni/ sku yang ye shes te/ gser ni mi gtsang nang du bcug gyur kyang // 'bar ba'i rong bzhin nam yang mi 'bri ltar/ nges pa gang zhig 'jig rten chos spyod kyang // bsam
200a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin nam yang de mi spong // zhes gsungs pas gzugs skus 'gro ba'i don byed pa na yang 'jig rten gyi bya ba ngan pa dang bral ba'o// de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad du gnyis su med
200a2(rgyud 'grel): pa kho na yin zhing / dug lnga shin tu btsal bar bya ba yin kyang // thog ma med pa'i dus nas phyin ci log la goms pa'i dbang gis shes rab dang bral nas log pa'i shes rab rgyu bas dben pa ru gnas te/ mi rtog pa'i nus pa rnyed
200a3(rgyud 'grel): nas tshogs kyi bsab du phyin kyang zhe sdang la sogs pa gang byung yang dran pa dang mi 'brel zhing gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gro na dus la bab pa'o// yang na kun tu rgyu nyid bya ste/ gnas gcig tu yun ring du gnas par mi bya ste/ mi
200a4(rgyud 'grel): dang khyi 'dra bas khyi yang rang gi gnas na stobs che la// yul gzhan du dul bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mi yang rang gi gnas na nyon mongs pa dul bar dka' ste/ yul gzhan du nyon mongs pa thul bar sla bas kun tu rgyu'i tshul
200a5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par bya'o// gang zhig bdag gis byas bsod kyis// kun kyang 'tshe bar med par shog/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid du grub par shog/ dug lnga sbas pI la mchog tu gsang ba bsam gyis
200a6(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phags po lhas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ yaM ga lak+Sha Na sa t+ye// bod skad du/ rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid bden pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag
200b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu dus kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge 'dun tshogs bcas la// thal sbyar gus pas phyag 'tshal nas// rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i man ngag 'di// rin chen sna tshogs tshogs pa ltar// rnal
200b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa rnams sgrol ba'i phyir// mdor sdus nas ni bshad par bya// nam gyi cha smad grwa nyid las sang // bdag ma gtogs pa'i sems can la// thog ma nyid du snying rje sgom// de nas bdag nyid la ltas nas// ding gi
200b3(rgyud 'grel): nyin zhag 'di la ni// slong po'i sems can dag la ni// ci srid 'ongs kyang ser sna yi// dri mas mi gos nyid du bya// gal te bslab pa las 'gal ba'i// yid la rgyu ba phra mo yang // bsam pa nyid du mi bya na// ngag dang lus
200b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi smos ci dgos// bdag la di ring khro ba dang // brdeg pa la sogs 'byung bar shog/ des kyang 'khrug par mi bya yi// le lo byung na shes bzhin gyis// mgo la me 'bar bzhin du dor// bdag gi 'gro 'am nyal
200b5(rgyud 'grel): 'du gi rung // spyod lam ji ltar gnas 'dug kyang // yid ni lha'i nga rgyal dang // skad cig tsam yang mi 'bral bar// rang nyid yin par rtag tu bsam// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi// shes dang shes bya ba dag
200b6(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// di ring nyid nas bdag gis brtags// bstod dang smad pa grags ma grags// gzhan dag ji ltar zer yang ni// de nyid brag ca lta bur dang // 'on pa lta bu bdag gis bya// chags pa'i gzugs sgra dri ro reg
201a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yon lnga la gang du yang // rnam shes 'phro ba'i yul byung yang // ngag du mthon bar du bzlog/ gzugs su snang rnams sku nyid yin// sgra rnams gsung du bdag nyid brtag/ sems can
201a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rgyu yin phyir// de yi shes pa ye shes yin// sems can ji ltar mthong gyur kyang // de dag nyid la blo phyag bya// 'di dag nyid la brten nas bdag/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pas na// dge ba'i gshes gnyen dam pa
201a3(rgyud 'grel): yin// mang po tshogs par gyur pa na// ro dang dur khrod 'du shes skyed// grong du 'jug par byed pa na// brtson ra khri mon 'du shes bskyed// rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro ba na// ngan 'gro nad dang 'ching ba dang // g.yangs sa
201a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i 'du shes skyed// gal te bud med tshogs mthong na// mi gtsang rdzas ni sum cu dang // 'khor ba'i lam 'dren yin par bsam// nye du pha ma bu tsha rnams// de la chags spangs btang snyoms sam// dgra
201a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams mthong na 'di dog gi/ bzod rdzogs byang chub yin par bsam// bdag gi longs spyod rdzas la yang // 'dir ni brtsod pa'i rgyu dang ni// phyi mar ngan 'gror khrid par bsam// bdag la bstod pa brjod na yang
201a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni nga rgyal 'phel byed pas// ngan 'gror khrid par byed pa yin// gal te smod pa byung na yang // 'di la bzod bsgom byang chub yang // mtshan ma rdzogs par rab tu bsam// gnas la zhen pa byung gyur na// rmi
201b1(rgyud 'grel): lam grong khyer ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu sgom// bdag gis deng gis nyin zhag la// ngag las bzlas brjod kha don bya// klag sogs bslab las mi 'gal bar/ di ring bdag gis smra bar bya//
201b2(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad kyang // mchod dang skor pA la sogs pa// ngal so don yod nyid du bya// rnam rtog gnyen por ma snga mas ni/ tshig du brjod pas ci zhig 'grub// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// gnyen
201b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i dpung tshegs bskyed nas ni// nyon mongs rnams ni dpyis phyin bya// bza' btung zhim po za bo'i tshe// ro la zhan pa spang bye zhing // mi gtsang rgyu las byung ba dang // tha mar mi gtsang 'gyur bar bsam// reg
201b4(rgyud 'grel): bya 'jam por tshor ba'i tshe/ reg bya ji bzhin yin par bsam// 'dir mang smos pa ci zhig dgos// gang du nyon mongs 'phel ba yi// khyim pa'ang rab tu byung yang rung // de dag rab tu spang bya zhing // nyon mongs rnam
201b5(rgyud 'grel): por mi 'phel ba'i// sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gang yang rung // de dag brten pa mig ltar bya// bdag ni de ring nas brtsams te// byang chub snying por mchis bar du// rtag tu rab tu byung ba dang // tshangs par
201b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa nyid du bya// nyin mtshan dus las ma yol bar// thun mtshams gsum du bsgom por bya// srog dang rtsol ba bkag pa dang // rlung med pa yi mar me ltar// rtag tu spros brel bsgom par bya// de nas
202a1(rgyud 'grel): ljang tshe nga rgyal gyis// mtshan dang dpe byad skur ldan pa'i// lha yi nga rgyal brtan por bsam// mtshan mo'i thun la bab pa'i tshe// bde gshegs ji ltar gzims pa ltar// 'jig
202a2(rgyud 'grel): rten rtogs spangs bdag nyid nyal// mdor na chos rnams thams cad kun// rmi lam lta bur brtag par bya// rnal 'byor bsgom rnams gtsor bya'i// lus ngag dge ba btsor mi bya// chos spyod rnam bcu la
202a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs la// nyon mongs pas ni ma yangs par// bsgrims nas bdag gis 'bad pas bsgrub// rtag tu 'o chi bsam ma tshogs smos// dngos po ci la'ang ma chags par// spyod lom ji ltar gnas kyang bsgom//
202a4(rgyud 'grel): bstod nams sems can kun la bsngo// byang chub bzang po bdag gis ni// rnal 'byor bsgom pa brtsams pa yi// dge bya zla zer dri mang nges// bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pas// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang 'grub
202a5(rgyud 'grel): shog/ rnal 'byor gyis mtshan nyid bden po/ mkhas pa chen po dpal byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ prad+d+ho tAt+ma gaM b+ho shI pA ri
202a6(rgyud 'grel): kA thA nA ma/ bod skad du/ shes rab brtsam pa dus kyis gtam zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde chen 'khor lo zag med spros pa rgyas pa'i sku dang / chos/ tshogs pa'i zhing
202b1(rgyud 'grel): dang dngos grub rtsa ba rnams la phyag 'tshal te// gal te brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i dus min gyi// yin pa'i rtags dang ldan dus dag tu bzod med brtsams// slob dpon slob ma tshol ba dang // rin
202b2(rgyud 'grel): chen rnyed par sgrub pa dang // slob ma don drin slar ldon dang // dbang bskur med pa slar 'dod dang // re ba'i gos kyis 'gro ba dang // lci ba'i zas kyis 'tsho ba dang // mi phyed rnyed sogs rtsod pa dang // drag
202b3(rgyud 'grel): pos gzhan zil gnon 'dod dang // sku gzugs brtsod pas 'jigs pa dang // mig can 'gran zlas brtsod gyur dang // dge slong gnas la brtsod pa dang // grub mtho'i skur pas sun 'byin dang // 'gro
202b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams spyod pa lta ba dang // mkhu 'gro 'bras bur 'pho ba dang // rin chen grags pa 'das pa dang // mi rnams g.yo sgyus 'tsho ba dang // shing rnams g.yab mos g.yob pa dang // rnyi rnams cho nges
202b5(rgyud 'grel): 'debs po dang // chu rnams me yis 'od 'byin dang // skal ba can ma grugs min brjod// rtsod rtags nyi shu sh+log sa pa yis// bram ze mo yi mar me 'dra// kye lha dang drang srong 'tsho ba'i dus 'das
202b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// snying rjes dman pa rjes 'dzin zla 'byung dus// skyabs su 'gro ba dam pa'i rten 'brel na// 'chi ba'i dus tshe sdug bsngal sogs 'byung 'gyur// kye skye ba bzang thob skyes ngan bud med kyis//
203a1(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag yid sdom pa mchog gsum la// brtse ldan dmigs med 'brel pa mi glanas pa// dam par 'gyur tshul bral na nges par 'ching // kye dngos grub nye bar rnyed pa ma btsal na// rang
203a2(rgyud 'grel): gi bde chen 'bad pas rtogs mi 'gyur// 'od gsal ma rnyed nyon mongs lam mi 'gyur// ngag dang mi ldan chos nyid rgyus gdab bral// dben pa bral bas nges 'byin rnyed mi 'gyur// brtul zhugs brtun te ma byas
203a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal mi rnyed// sems kyi mal 'tshe bral bas mchog thob min// dbang po ma g.yeng skye ba rnal 'byor rnams// 'dod pas ma g.yeng bya ba la mi 'jug/ man ngag 'gro la ma g.yeng gnyid ma ldog/ dam po'i brgyad
203a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ma bskam 'bras ma gtsang // kye ma rtag tu phyi nang mnyam par blta// dus ni yun thung 'di la ma rdzogs na/ dus su 'gyur ba'i dus rAb rnyed mi 'gyur// de bas brtson 'grus dus la bab kyis byos// rtogs pa'i
203a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bram ze ste// 'dod la rab chagaso b+ha b+hi ti// ngoms med nyams bral le lo sha/ da ni dus 'das nyi mu 'dra// bdag gis gdams pa 'di bris pas// rim gyis lam la rtsol 'gyur shog/ shes rab
203a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsam pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba// pad+ma la'i mkhas pa dpal nges par sbyangs pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes bram ze b+ha lo la gdams pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/
203b1(rgyud 'grel): su mA d+hi saM b+ha ra pa ri brta/ bod skad du/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u// 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po snying rje'i stobs las byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan bya// srid pa'i longs spyod bde ma chags//
203b2(rgyud 'grel): ngas su 'dzin la rgyab kyis phyogs// dad sogs nor ni phun sum tshogs// bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam gus// des bstan dam tshag spyod pa ni// yongs su bskang la rab tu brtson// bum pa gsang ba'i dbango sku ra ba// bla ma'i
203b3(rgyud 'grel): drin gyis yongs su thob// lus dgu sems ni rnam dag pa'o// bsgrub pa po de dngos grub sdong // ting 'dzin yan lag las byung po'i// tshegs ni yongasu rdzogs pa las// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar gsang
203b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshul gnas yin// ting nge 'dzin yan lag nyams gyur cing // de yi mi mthun phyogs gnas na// skye ba bye ba skyong gis kyang // ting 'dzin rab tu grub mi 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin ni rab grub phyir// gsang bsngags spyod
203b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnal 'byor pas// de las gzhan pa'i sems spangs te// g.yengs med brtson pas 'bad par bya// ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag dang // mi mthun phyogs gang nges bya'i phyir// ting 'dzin yan lag mi mthun phyogs//
203b6(rgyud 'grel): de ni mdor bsdus nas bshad bya// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang // longs spyod rnams lo bltos med nyid// bzod ldan dam bca' brtan po dang // skye bo 'odu 'dzi rnam par spong // lus dang ngag yang las rnams
204a1(rgyud 'grel): la// shes bzhin dang ni ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas skur 'dogs dran pa yi// lus kyi rjes dran yang dag ldan// dus gang du ni gang bya ba'i// rjes dran de la brtan pa dang // sgrib pa lnga ni spyang
204a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // zas kyi tshed rig spyod lam ran// 'jig rten chos ni thams cad la// rtag tu sems ni btang snyoms dang // yo byad bsnyungs 'di yan lag ste// go bzlog pa ni mi mthun phyogs// ting nge 'dzin tshogs le'u bkod pa'i
204a3(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams des// 'gro bas ting 'dzin rdo rje lta bu thob par shog/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u/ slob dpon mkhas po chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzod pa rdzogs s+ho//
204a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA bas dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ lo ka a ti ta sap+ta ka bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten las
204a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dras pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'u la phag 'tshal lo// phyag gnas phyag byeng phyag rnams ni// gang tshe tha dad mi
204a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa// de 'dir sngags pa'i phyag yin te// rdo rje phyag ces brjod pa yin// mchod gonas mchod byed mchod pa rnams// gang tshe sna tshogs mi dmigs po// de tshe mchod pa chen po ste// rdo rje mchod pa zhes brjod do//
204b1(rgyud 'grel): bshags bya 'chags byed bshags pa rnams// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas ma mthong // rang bzhin drag par yang dag mthong // de 'dir bshags pa'i mchog yin no// rjes yi rang bya thams cad dang // bdag dang rjes su yi
204b2(rgyud 'grel): rang ba// rnal 'byor pa yis mnyam par mthong // rjes su yi rang dam pa yin// sgyu mas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas la// sgyu mas sprul pa'i lus can phyir// brag ca lta bu'i chos rnams no// bstan par yang dag skul 'debs pa//
204b3(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa dag dang mtshungs bA rA ni// thal mo sbyar nas skul byed cing // rdo rje rnal 'byor mnyam par mthong // bskul bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'dod// mya ngan 'das bzhed sangs rgyas rnams// 'khor bar sprul pa bzhin du ni//
204b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can sprul pa'i don gyi phyir// bzhugaso par gsolnga 'debs de nyid rigs// 'jig rten 'das pa nyid kyi phyir// de 'dir gsol 'debs mchog tu 'dod// dmigs pa can du 'jug pa nyid// thams cad 'jig rten
204b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rmi 'dra la// de nyid rig pas rmi 'drar rig/ rmi 'dra'i srid par gnas pa yin// sems can rnams la phan btags pas// chos dbyings bzhin du dpag med par// dge ba thams
204b6(rgyud 'grel): cad yongs bsngos na// de 'dir bsngo ba dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsngags// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis// dpal
205a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ro// / rgyu gar skad du/ s+yA ga tA shwA sa na rat+na b+hA
205a2(rgyud 'grel): hid dra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// brtse ldan rtog bcas lung gi phyug/ sgra mkhas skyo ba med yid thul/
205a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs sdom dbang po rab zhi ba'i// bla ma la btud des bstun bshad// shin tu rnyed dka'i ngal ba sprin 'dra las 'bras rjes 'brel sdug bsngal can// gnas la rab dang 'gro la brtse dang chos rab rnam byed brtson 'grus dang //
205a4(rgyud 'grel): sa pas mchog gsol cho ga bzang ldan mnyam par 'jog brtson lags bsngor bcas// bsam bya rnal 'byor mchog spyong srid zhi'i rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru// rus sbal gyis ni gnya' shing dang // yungs 'bru khab kyi bu gar dang //
205a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsig ngos la ni sran 'bras ltar// dal ba shin tu rnyed kar gsungs// gang phyir lus can kun gyi las// rgyun ltar thur tu ltung phyir dang // der yang mi dge 'phel phyir dang // min yang legs sbyang bya dka'i phyir// rten
205a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di thob dka' de bzhin du/ ji tsam rnyed dka' de tsam gyis// snying po med pa'i lus 'di las// snying po dam pa btsal bar bya// de phyir bdag la legs 'dod pas// skyes bu'i don bsgrub bya ba'i phyir// rgya mtshor bying
205b1(rgyud 'grel): bas rnyed pa yi// gru bo lta bur lus 'di spyad// srog 'dri 'dus byas yin phyir dang // mi gdod phyir dang rkyen mang phyir// 'chi bdag gis bdag myur za des// lus dang longs spyod sdug pa yi// mdza' rnams rjes 'brang
205b2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur zhing // mgon med gcig pu gyi naR+Sha ni// 'jig rten pha rol 'dong bar byed// re zhig tshe rabos 'ga'o lta zhig/ nyon mongs mi 'gyur gdang thob pa'ang // bdag la yang yi mI snang na// ci phyir bdag yid bde bar
205b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug/ de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// tshe 'di'i dgos pa khyad bsad cing // mgo la me shor bsgrim pa bzhin// mkhas pa slang ma'i don bsgrub bya// mthong dang ma mthong myong ba yi// rnam smin rgyu mthun dbang gi
205b4(rgyud 'grel): las// mngar sbyar kha la rung rgyu bzhin// sku med las 'bras 'brel bar 'dod// mkha' ltar 'gag med sems nyid lnga// sna tshogs bag chags sprin tshogs 'khrigs// smin 'gyur char gyi rgyun 'bab pas// rjes myong
205b5(rgyud 'grel): lo tog smin par byed// chos kun rten cing 'brel 'byung zhing // rten med de yi rten yin te// brten pa'i rgyu 'bras ga shis yin phyir// dkar gnag las 'bras 'brel pa nyid// slu med so sor nges phyir dang // chung
205b6(rgyud 'grel): las tshe nyid 'byung phyir dang // sngon byung da dung myong 'gyur phyir// blo ldan blang ngor 'bad par rigs// de ltar lnga de dang de yi// 'bras bu sdug bsngal bsam yas kyis// skye dgu kun tu gdung ba yang // me lce yis ni
206a1(rgyud 'grel): so mal bzhin// de ni 'du byed 'gyur ba dang // sdug bsngal gyi yang sdug bsngal sogs// skye rgan dang rgud dang 'chi// phrad bral bsrung dka' tshol la sogs// ji ltar bkra shis rna nag dang //
206a2(rgyud 'grel): dri mi zhim dang myi gtsang bzhin// sdug bsngal nye bar len pa la// lhan skyes rtag tu 'brel pa yin// rmongs rnams sdug bsngal gyis skrag bzhin// de yi rgyu la dga' mgur spyod// mi gang nad la dug bzhin du// shes
206a3(rgyud 'grel): bas gnyis spong de mkhas pa// bskal mang rnyed dka'i ngal ba legs rnyed phrag rum u dum wa ra bzhin// gang thob srog 'di'ang rtag tu mi rung ri gzar khyod kyi klung rgyun 'dra// lus can rnams kyi dkar gnag las
206a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang sa bon dang ni lo tog mtshungs// 'di dag tu ni sdug bsngal gdung pa'ang me 'obs 'bar ba'i ma lce bzhin// zhes bya ba ni bsam par bya ba'i gnas bzhi'i chos mdor bsdu ba'o// // skyabs gsum
206a5(rgyud 'grel): thar pa las 'bras la// rab dang mngon 'dod yid chos dang // rnyog med yid gzhungs rnam par nges// gus sbyor the tshom med par rgyu// yon tan shes pa nyid dang de// cig shos skyon mthong yid 'byung bcas// rtags/
206a6(rgyud 'grel): myong khong du chud gyur la// rten nas dad pa thob par 'gyur// bya ba kun sngon 'gro phyir dang // byed pa yi ni rgyu nyid phyir// sa bon tshig las myu gu bzhin// chos kun spro ba med la min// 'di na gang la rab dang yod//
206b1(rgyud 'grel): dri yis dngos gung bsgrub dka' bya// de yang gzhan gyis bya sla bas// rab tu sla byas 'grub par 'gyur// sems can chos dang chos nyid la// brtse rtogs mtshan ma med snying rje// mi bzod mngon du byed rtog med// don
206b2(rgyud 'grel): shes dri ma zad sbyor rgyu// gnyen tshogs sdug bsngal mthong dran dang // gang zag chos bdag med nyid dang // rigs lung man ngag gi phye bas// mthong phyir gzhan zhugs brtse ba skye// sku gnyis lhun gyis 'grub pa'i rgyu//
206b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sems kyi rgyu phyir dang // ji ltar khab la khab len bzhin// 'gro ba bsdud par byengad phyir te// de bzhin de yi khyad par gyis// rgyal sras mdzod pa khyad par phyir// sman shing ljon pa lta bu yi// phun tshogs
206b4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje bskyed par byos// sgyu mas sprul pa'i grong khyer du// skyes bu de dag dga'i dang gdung // yul dus rnam kun shin tu ba// snang mtshungs don ma kAb rtogs shos// mi 'gags mu mthar thug min dang // skye
206b5(rgyud 'grel): mimed las skye phyir ni// snang 'gyur gong skyes skye med dang // rten 'brel rtsa ba zang phyir stong // de la gang snang la sogs phyir// 'khor ba'o de nyid de tshe de re// spyad na mkha' ltar dben pa ni// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das
206b6(rgyud 'grel): par brjod// de ni mi rtogs rtogs dka' zhing // rtogs na nges par grol 'gyur phyir// rab zab zab cing ngo mtshar phyir// mkhas pas 'dzin pa rnam par gzhig/ 'bras bu bzang rnams mthong nyid dang // 'grub
207a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'bad pa la rag phyir// rgyun 'brel goms pas don thob shes// bsam brtson phyir mi ldog brtson 'grus// gzhan sgron 'di yi yon tan rig/ gnyid sogs snyoms bral zhum med dang // thab
207a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs snying brtan brtul phod dpa'// skal ldon spro ba rnam par 'phel// rlung mang rnam g.yo mi 'byung bzhin// brtson bral legs spyang ga la yod// spro ldan skad cig nyid la yang // ri rAd thal bar bArlag sems bskyad//
207a3(rgyud 'grel): gyo ma ho gzhan du yid brtan mang // nying mtshams tshe ni long med de// gson tshe 'ang bsil khang mar me bzhin// ci phyir bdag blo dalta bar gnas// bdag nyid pad+mo dmar gsal rab dga' dri meng dad pa'i nyi zer 'bar bso
207a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam phye ba// mtha' yas 'gro la brtse ba'i chab brlan rjes chags ut+pal mig gi rdzi rab dkrugs nas ni// sna tshogs snang sems shes bya'i dkyil 'khor rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin stong pa nyid rig dang // sbrid pa'i
207a5(rgyud 'grel): dgra tshogs skyon mang gis skyug pa du sbrul 'od brtson pa bzhin du brtson par bya// zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas bzhir chos mdor bsdu ba'o// // srid ni'i skyon yo nA dran byas nas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don
207a6(rgyud 'grel): yod bsgrub phyi// yid bzhin nor la byi dor bzhin// de nas dngos grub mchog gsol bya// gang phyir bskal pa brgya phrag du// 'bad kyang phyogs tsam mi rnyed pa// gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid// skad cig nyid la thob
207b1(rgyud 'grel): byed phyir// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor cho ga yis// ji bzhin mngon du byas nas su// re ba nyid dang gdung ba dang // gus pas brten gnyid gsol ba btab// gang tshe lhar bcas bla ma yi// byin brlabs snying la gang babs pa// de tshe shel ltar
207b2(rgyud 'grel): dong po yi// sems thob spro bas non par 'gyur// rnam dag gsum gyis bsgyur byas nas// 'od gsal gyis ni dri med bya// zung du 'jug pas ye shes te// dbang gyur sbyor bas phrin las bsgrub// lha dang sngags dang ting 'dzin nyid//
207b3(rgyud 'grel): snang grags dran pa nyid med nyid// sna tshogs bral ba kun snang zhing // gang snang gzhan gyi dbang can no// 'di dag lus ngag yid rim bzhin// dri ma 'khru bar byed phyir dang // mchog byed ro gcig byed pa'i phyir// don bsgrub byed phyir
207b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bzhag/ bdag nyid rtogs par byed phyir dang // rtogs pas grol phyir grol ba nyid// gzhan don rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir// lam 'di theg gzhan los khyad 'phags// rnal 'byor chen po rang gi sems// dri medo
207b5(rgyud 'grel): rab dang sim byed phyir// mkha' dang zla 'od ba don mthong zhing // mi rtog 'od gsol bde chen brjod// sgyu ma nyid dang de snang dang // de bdag ji bzhin chos rnams kun// sems yin de nyid 'od gsal phyir// blo mchog rnam
207b6(rgyud 'grel): par mi rtog go/ rang bzhin kun tu ma 'gags shing // rnam pa sna tshogs rang snang ba// kun khyab rnyog pa med mtshan nyid// bskal bzang 'od gsal ting 'dzin bshad// mchog mthong phyir dang rdul med dang // dngos
208a1(rgyud 'grel): bral dngos la mngon chub phyir// chags bral zag pa med rab zhi// sim gyur bde ba chen por 'dod// de ltar 'di skyes dge ba yang // mtshan ma med nyid rgya che nyid// stong nyid snying rjer bcas sems kyis//
208a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog spyod sku gnyis legs bsngo bya// rmi lam yul gyi 'du byed bzhin// gang phyir gang du gang gis gang // ji ltar bsgrub pa mi dmigs phyir// dge ba mtshan ma med par gsungs// dmigs med dmigs par rab gsal
208a3(rgyud 'grel): ba// ngo bo ngo bo med rjes 'brel// rnam lnga yan lag snang ba'i gni// rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs rab yin// gang zhig chos shes gang zag shos// shes rab thabs bcas chags bral chags// mi gnas mya ngan 'das bsngo
208a4(rgyud 'grel): ba// bdag nyid chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad// gang snying cod bran chu skyes dmar rgyas lha mchog gis mtshan rdzogs sangs stong ldan mgon pos brgyan// phyi nang gsang bdag dri myed ye shes lhan cig skyes rol 'od kyi sbyor bas rnam
208a5(rgyud 'grel): par brtson// sprin bral mkha' dang zla rgyas zer ltar dag cing rabo gsal bode chen yid rab sems pa dang // gang skyes dge tshogs rin chen mda' de 'ong brtse bar gzhus bskyod 'gro lnga yongs 'phen de dpa' bo// zhes bya ba ni
208a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor du bya ba'i gnas bzhi'i chos mdor bsdu ba'o// // srid mtshe rab gnas nyon mongs chu srin kha gdangs gnas// sdug bsngal brlabs 'khrug gting mtha' medo mngon 'jigs pa dang // zhi ba 'ching bu'i mtsho
208b1(rgyud 'grel): chen dkar 'khyil gnyis ka la s+ya// sgrol byed bstan pa rin chen grwa mchog bad 'di yin// legs sgyur byudagu blo rab dang dgar ba dang // snying brtses yid gnangs 'bang byas dge ba 'dis// 'gro rnams sngon gyi rgyal bas
208b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bskal pa// de dag legs sgrol ded dpon mchog bdag gyur// bde bAr gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba grub pa brnyes par pAN+Di ta chen po e dzi tA mi tra gup+ta su mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
208b3(rgyud 'grel): baN+Di ta dza ga ta mi a nan+da dang bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nI dang lo tsA bA byams pa dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI bran+d+ha bi mu ka ta shAs+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dngal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos// bcom ldan 'das
208b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig ma rtogs rtogs dka/ r-i rtogs na de nyid dus// 'tshong ba mi zang shin tu grol dka' grol 'gyur ba// bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam//
208b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar de ni 'gro ba bskul phyir bdag gis bshad// gyad kyi nor bu la sogs bzhin// snying po de ni gzhan min gnas// gang phyir thams cad rang gi rang // 'ching dang grol byar 'gyur ba'i phyir// 'di na 'ching ba gang
208b6(rgyud 'grel): yang med// 'ching ba gang yin de grol ba'o// de ni stong dang rten 'brel 'jug/ de phyir 'phongs pas mi rtogs so// dman dang log pa'i bshes gnyen gyis// zin gyur bsod nams brtson 'grus zhan// sbyangs stob
209a1(rgyud 'grel): blo gros chud pa yi// skye bo rnams kyi sna rtogs dka' bo// rtogs ldan snying brtse man ngag mkhas// bshes gnyen dam pa btsal bur bya// de ni sogs lus longs spyod sogs// rnam kun dri med
209a2(rgyud 'grel): gus pas bsten// ji srid bdag sems brtun gyur pa// de srid lus ngang grib ma bzhin// de yi rjes su bstan pa ni// rten 'brel stong nyid bdud rtsi'i chu// skom pas gdungs la chu bsil bzhin// dga' 'gu mi zad dang bas
209a3(rgyud 'grel): btung // lam gzhan phun tshegs nges 'byung min// de shes thabs dang shes rab yin// de ni chos sgo kun gyi sgo// rtog sa dka' rtogs byed dam pa'i lam// ji ltar rten 'brel tsam nyid phyir// de ni ji ltar stong ma yin// gang
209a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir stong pa nyid yin na// de ni mkha' ltar 'gag med phyir// ci phyir rten cing 'brel mi 'byung // de phyir de gnyis gnyis ma yin// de la rton 'brel ji lta bu// de yi stong nyid gang zhe na// nyon cig 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos//
209a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i gzhu ltar rab gsal ba// sna tshogs bde dang sdug bsngal sogs// 'di dag rang 'byung rgyu med min// rgyu gzhan ma yin ma nges min// mungar sgyur kha la rang rgyu yin// sems nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung //
209a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mkha' la sprin bzhin no// kye ma srid pa'i nags tshal du// sdug bsngal lo 'bras cher lhags shing // nyes par spyad pa'i yal ga can// 'dzin pa'i me tog rab gsal ba'o// de rgyu chags sdang tshul min sdong
209b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag tu lta ba'i rtsa brtan te// mi shes pags chags bcas drod gsher// sa chen 'byung ba las bskyed pa'o// mkha' la snod kyi 'jig rten ltar// e ma'o rten med rten gyur pa// rten 'brel brten pa rnams kyi mchog/ re
209b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig rten ni ma grub na// brtun pa ji ltar rnam gzhag rung // bdag med de lta bden min na// des bskyod chags sogs las rnams sogs// glang du ji ltar nges par bya// de ma grub na sdug bsngal gang // de myong nyid kyang
209b3(rgyud 'grel): su zhig brjod// ji ltar sdong po'i rtsa phyung na// bcad pa'i bya ba grub pa ltar// gzhir gyur bdag rtogs rnams bzlog pas// mkhas pa de bzhin srid pa zhig/ bsrogs bcad brdar bas gser sogs bzhin// 'di ltar
209b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang gzhan pa zhes// bya ba ji ltar rten dang gnas// ngo bo mtshan nyid brtag par byos// de la lus dag rlung dang yid// phyi nang par sogs 'di dag ni// nam yang rten byed gnas gyur pa// sus kyang nges par mi nus so// /
209b5(rgyud 'grel): gang phyir bdag de snang rung ni// dmigs gyur dmigs pa med pa'i phyir// mi snang sems dang sems min smos// sems ni rang bzhin stong bdag nyid// sems min mi brtag rten 'brel ba dag/ rnam par dpyad na spros
209b6(rgyud 'grel): med do// rtag la bye ba 'gal ba'i phyir// gang na ci 'dra bdag bston byos// mdor na 'dir mang smra mi bya// bdag de rang gi sgo gsum las// gzhan na 'dir gnod ci zhig byas// mtshon gyis rma ltar nyes pa yang // byis
210a1(rgyud 'grel): ba rnams kyi rang brtags dang // log sred skye bo'i brtsod par zad// gzhan min de dag rnam dbyung na// ji ltar gang zhig bdag tu 'gyur// de min de rten de gnas gang // gang yang 'di dag de rten dang //
210a2(rgyud 'grel): de gnas phyogs kyang rnam dpyad kyis// tshul 'dis bdag dngos bdag mtshan nyid// sgyu ltar legs grub bstan pa yin// ltos shig tshul 'di chu shing 'dra// ngag ni brag ca mkha' 'dra yid// rdul tsam dmigs pa yod min
210a3(rgyud 'grel): na// 'di la ji ltar bdag tu brtag/ phyi ni phyi rol nang yang gzhan// des na bar yang de bdag min// gang yang de ni dkar sogs dang // ring dang thung dang sbom dang phra// 'thugs dang srab ces bya la sogs// mtshan
210a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid nges par nus ma yin// ci ste shing la 'khril shing bzhin// de ni kun gzhi 'am bag chags la// brten de mi mngon gnas she na// snang dang mi snang rnam dpyad dang // de nyid sems dang snyoms min zhes// sngar
210a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin brtags pa mtshungs par 'gyur// 'on te sems ni gang yin pa// de nyid bdag ces bya zhe na// sems ni dmigs med 'od gsal phyir// da ni bdag de bdag med 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu rtogs dka'i gnas//
210a6(rgyud 'grel): e ma'o i ma shin tu rmad// e ma'o mkhas pas shes par rung // e ma'o shes bral shes pa'i dbyings// de ltar 'gro ba 'di na bdag/ med kyang nga dang nga yi zhes// gzung dang 'dzin pas bslabs pa yi// skye bo smyos
210b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dag ci// 'on kyang 'jig rten log pas mig/ bsgribs nas bzung dang 'dzin pa ni// ji ltar snang ba ji bzhin gzhag/ snang la snang ltar rab chags srid// sdug bsngal 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyu// bdag cag de las
210b2(rgyud 'grel): 'a' min nam// gal te bdag nyid ma grub kyang // de 'dzin nyid du bden zhe na// 'di nyid e ma'o 'gro kun gyi log par 'ching ba mi zad pas// mgo la me shor bsgrim pa bzhin// rengs par myur du ldog par bya// grogs dag
210b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar mngon sum du// yang dag rigs pa'i mig nyid kyis// bdag de ma grub des na 'dir// gzhan zhes bya ba'ang yod min na// yu bu thams cad nga snyam dang // nga'o mnyam dang gzhan mnyam dang // gzhan gyi'o zhes
210b4(rgyud 'grel): log rtog pa// 'di drag ji ltar gang du dogs// dper na rmi lam bu shi ba// bu nyid med na de shi yang // bden par yod pa ma yin pa// de bzhin yu bu'i 'dzin pa yang // e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar gnas// gang zhig
210b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig nyid rtogs pa yis// thams cad rnam par grol 'gyur ba// 'di lta the tshom su zhig skrag/ 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// phung po khams drang skye mched sogs// thegs gsum theg gsum nges 'byung/
210b6(rgyud 'grel): lam// ma lus bdag min bdag gis min// bdag med stong pa'i mtshan nyid de// med phyir med la med nyid du// tshul bzhin nges par byas pa la// kye mo khyod la skyon ci yod// gang gang bdag dang bdag gi
211a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes// 'dzin pa'i 'ching ba thams cad kyang // phyi min nang min par yang min// de bzhin lus ngag yod ma yin// de dag las min der gnas min// de bzhin chags dang sdang sogs kyi// ma lus
211a2(rgyud 'grel): yid la byed pa yang // dpyad na re zhig gang la gang // gang du gang gis chagaso pa dang // sdang bar 'gyur ba 'ang ga la yod// gzugs sdug sgra snyan dri zhim dang // ro mA ngar reg 'jam yid bde'i rkyen// 'di dag gang gis de shes la// ci
211a3(rgyud 'grel): zhig phan brtags 'brel pa yod// de shes pas kyang de dag la// chags dang rab tu chags 'gyur gang // de ni phyi nang par dag dang // lus sogs dngos po gang zhig yin// de min de las de brten dang // skyes dang gnas dang 'gag 'gyur/
211a4(rgyud 'grel): bya// sgyu ma yi ni rta glang ltar// don du grub pa yod ma yin// gang gis bdag la brnyas sogs dang // slad sogs brdeg sogs byas pa'i rgyu// sdang dang rab sdang sems 'byung ba// 'di'ang sngar bzhin bdag sems dang // gang yang pha
211a5(rgyud 'grel): rol de yi sems// mkha' 'dra mtshan ma med pa yin// de bzhin gzhan de'i ngag nyid dang // lus ni dri smra shing lta bu// yin na sgyu mas sgyu ma yi// rgyal ltar des 'dir bdag gnod gang // bdag gi'ang de bzhin drag dang lus// de ltar
211a6(rgyud 'grel): lus can thams cad kyi'ang // mtshungs phyir 'di dag skye ba dang // gnas dang 'gag 'gyur mi dmigs so// gang phyir phan tshun 'brel med phyir// dpyad na thams cad spros med phyir// yul dus rnam kun dri med phyir// mkha'
211b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'phur ba'i bya rjes bzhin// de ltar stong pa'i spyod yul 'dir// rmi lam dgra dang 'ja' bzhin du// gang la gang zhig ji ltar chags// de bzhin sdang ba'ang grang du dogs// phA dang ma dang chung ma bu// gnyen dang bshes pa de bzhin
211b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra// sgyu mdzo bzhin de bzhin pas// 'dzin pa thams cad gcig par bya// de nyid kyis nA cha gas sogs kyis// las byed de yang ji lta bu// yang yang shes rab brtan po yis// skye khas pas sngar bzhin rtag par byos// de phyi
211b3(rgyud 'grel): bad dang sdug bsngal yang // bam pos rnam par myong min la// rig la dngos po yod min te// thog mang dus nas log sbyangs pa// 'khrul pas 'dzin pa nyi tshe ba// de yang dngos po med pa nyid// de ltar mad la mod nyid du// blo
211b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang rnams kyis goms byas na// brnyes pas gnyen la dag bzhin du// mi bzang 'ching bas bcings pa de// sbrul mdudo rang gis grol ba bzhin// nges par rnam par grol bar 'gyur// rnam grol rnam grol las byung ba'i//
211b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu lhan gyi grub pa gong // don gnyis phun tshogs ngo mtshar ba// de ni bum pa bzang po bzhin// // dngul 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos// rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po grub pa brnyes pa'i dngal ni sku
211b6(rgyud 'grel): ladas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tAn n+ti zhal snga nas/ kha che'i baN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shI b+ha dras gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi kho chung gnubs tshul khrims shes rab kyis
212a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur danargyag skad du/ b+h+rU~M prad+d+ha dmanasas pad krAnA mya/ bo ska smra/ snod rnam dag gi man ngag ces byu/ bcom ldan 'das shUts+tsha seng ge la phyug/ 'tshul lo// rmi lam sma bArAr+dz+dza
212a2(rgyud 'grel): ra med// s+yA mA lA ba 'i sprin don myed// namakhar lta bA ma tshan nyid bra la/ chos na rang bzhin stod gas pa par/ nga gnas meng byung chub sems// rgya chen sems can dorgyal mkhaso// tshogs gnyis dbyer mau lam
