373b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsa kra bi d+hi tsin+ta ma Ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba// 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog dang thun mong kun gyi
373b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi/ lam dang dngos grub mthar phyin pa// rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin// der 'dir bsdus te brjod par bya// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon sel cing // mi mthun phyogs rnams 'joms byed pa// 'dod pa'i don
373b3(rgyud 'grel): kun sgrub pa nyid// lhag pa'i lha yang tshim par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ni// myur du lung bstan thob par byed// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yi// rim 'dis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin// ji ltar yang dag
373b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba las// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed cing // dge ba'i tshogs la 'dud pa gang // zos pas dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid// de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis
373b5(rgyud 'grel): nyon/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa 'dus// gang zhig mchod pa bzhin du spyad// rang bzhin dngos grub nye ba nyid// 'dir ni mgron dang dus dang ni// gnas dang rjes dang bye ba'o// mchog tu gyur pa'i cho ga 'dis// gang
373b6(rgyud 'grel): zhig dngos grub mngon du 'gyur// de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sgra// don ni dgos pa'i sgo nas te// mgron gyi rang bzhin bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje 'phreng ba las// rnal 'byor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// mnyam zhing
374a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu gyur byas nas// brda dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba shes// dam tshig ldan pa 'jug pa'o// de la mad+ma du 'dus pa tshogs// 'khor lo lha yi rim pa nyid// thun mong dus su bshad pa nyid//
374a2(rgyud 'grel): khyad par 'di yis shes par bya// thams cad du ni dam tshig gcog/ rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs// bu ma la gus ting nge 'dzin gnas// sbyin sogs yon tan rgyan spras pa'i// thabs 'dir tshigs kyi 'kho
374a3(rgyud 'grel): lho le/ bgegs med par ni rab tu 'jug gzhan du skyon dang bcas par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du// yid 'phrog bya dang bye min mkhas// lo ni nyi shu lnga lon pas// lhag pa yongs su spang bar bya//
374a4(rgyud 'grel): yongs shes thabs ni thams cad la/ shes rab gcig gis bya ba min// 'dir ni sgrub pa gcig pa yi// blo mas slob ma rjes su bzung // ji skad sdom pa 'byung ba les// gang zhig dkyil 'khor dge bar 'gyur//
374a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon sngon du phyogs byas nas// slob dpon yon tan ma bsdams na// 'jig rten pa yis dpyas par 'gyur// slob dpon med par gyur pa na// gzhan yang bla ma mtshan nyid ldan// 'khor lo'i dbang phyug byas pa
374a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ gus pa gcig pa'i tshul gyis spyad// de yang rdo rje phreng ba las// ni sogs pa'i phrin las dang // sngags kyi sbyor ba'i cho ga shes// bya ba nyi shu'i dbye bas ni// bla ma'i tshi ga bya ba nyid// sbyin dang tshil khrims
374b1(rgyud 'grel): bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan pha rol 'gro/ nyin mtshan rtag par dge la spro// shes rab rno zhing bzo gnas mkhas// gnyis med yon tan gyis lci ba// 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'o// nang du gsang ba 'dus
374b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs// phyi ru nyan thos spyod pa can// man ngag rim pa'i khyad par gyis// ji ltar rigs pa'i spyod pa la// slob ma rje 'dzin ston pa dngos// de bzhin dkyil 'khor la sogs dang // mdo dang las kyi tshogs
374b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // don dam pa yi bye ba mkhas// snang ba gsum la sogs pa la// rang gis goms 'gyur gzhan la ston// rnal 'byor rim pa'i slob dpon te// yid 'phrog bsdud pas bsdud pas slob dpon no//
374b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes// dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las la mkhas// slob ma rjes 'dzin nus pa dang // gsang ba'i dbang gi mthar son pa// shes rab snying rje mtshungs par ldan// rgyud kyi rim pa'i sbyor ba mkhwa
374b5(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i spyod pa rab ldan pa// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' dngos// ji skad phyag na rdo rje yis// 'khor lo sdom pa 'grel pa las// thun mong bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu// ye shes dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs
374b6(rgyud 'grel): dge bsnyen pho ma la sogs pa// slob dpon dag la rab tu phyogs// gsang sngags theg pa'i cho ga 'dir// slob dpon rnam pa gsum yin la// khyim pa dge tshul dge slong ste// tha ma 'bring dang ma cho ga yin no//
375a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bdag blo gros mi 'phel phyir// thun mong spang bya'i slob dpon+da ni// snying rje med cing khro ba dang // khengs shing chags la mi brtan pa// bslab pas ma bsdams 'dod pa che// rang la bstod la
375a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bya'o// khyad par khyim pa'i slob dpon ni// bud myong bcas shing dkor zas dang // zhing las g.yog dang tshed pa dang // rmongs pa rnyed phyir chos smra ba// 'di ni tshogs kyi slob dpon mim 'dir ni tshul khrims yon tan
375a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i// yon tan bdag zil gnon bkur ba'i gnas// 'di nyid 'khor lo'i dbang phyug 'gyur// 'dis ni dkyil 'khor gtso bo dag/ ma byas yon bdag bsod nams nyams//
375a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di nyid du// dam tshig sdom pa ma gcig na// 'khor lo'i dbang phyug de yis ni// rnal 'byor bsdu bar mi bya'o// gzhan gyi rgyud kyi bslab byar mngon// gnas khang gzhan du mchod par bya'o//
375a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di nyid lung dang bcas pa'i phyir// bya ba don dang bcas par 'gyur// kha cig rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma// bsgyum rim gzhan du gyur pa na// rnal 'byor lhag pa'i lha la mchod// de yi rjes su rim pa 'dis// skad cig
375a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsgrub bya daM yas lce mchod pa// 'di nyid yang dag mtshan nyid yin// zo dang so so'i rgyud dag gis// bslab pas grol por 'dod pa la// brda yi rim pa so so yi// phan tshul dam tshig sbyor mi
375b1(rgyud 'grel): shes// 'khor lo'i cho ga nyams pa nyid// de rnams mgron gyi rnam bzhag go// de nas lha yi nga rgyal gyis// gong du gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor la// maN+Dal sngon du 'gro ba yis// sngags kyis mchod par gsol ba gdab
375b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor kun spyod la sogs pa'i// 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyis ni// nag po'i phyogs dang dkar phyogs kyi// bcu pa lA ni de rab mchod// yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // de bzhin du ni brgyad pa la// dpal ldan
375b3(rgyud 'grel): dgyes mdzad rdo rje mchod// dus kyi 'khor lo nya gnyis le// gsang ba 'dus pa zla re bzhin// lnga brgyad bcu dang bcu bzhi dang // de bzhin bco lta nag phyogs la'ang // lde ste dus ni bcu ru 'gyur// de dag dus kyi
375b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par ro// 'dir ni rtag tu phun tshogs sam// ji ltar 'dod cing ji ltar nus// grub par nus na nyin re 'am// lo zla kun tu bya ba'o// gnas ni dben par gsang ba yi// 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya// phyag
375b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen po thig le las// thams cad 'jigs pa spangs pa yi// skye bos dben zhing yid 'phrog pa// grong ngam ldum ra nags tshal dang // dur khrod ri yi phug tu'o// dang po yid 'jug byi dor bya// dkyil 'khor
375b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par me tog dgram// rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las ni// me tog sna tshogs bkram pa yi// gzhal yas khang gis rnam par smras// de dag gnas kyi rnam bzhag go/ gang zhig dam tshig med par ni// bu la sogs
376a1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'ang mi gzhug go/ ji skad sdom pa 'byung ba las// yongs su grub pa'i gnas dag dang // gdan la 'jug par bya ba ni// rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye bas der// slob dpon rje su 'jug par bya//
376a2(rgyud 'grel): snod dang mi ldan nga rgyal che// bla ma'i sbyin rtog shes rgyu de rnag/ gong ma'i dbang gi sna me smin pa// rang gi bu dang chung ma dang // de bzhin blun dang bran mor bcas// dngos grus 'dod phyir bsgrub pa pos// dam tshig 'di
376a3(rgyud 'grel): dag gzhug mi bya// de ltar 'di dag gzhug pa na// rmongs dang dngos grub ring bar 'gyur// dam chege dral gyur sdug bsngal zhing // de bzhin lus dag yid kyis myong // gnas nas 'thon dang phun tshogs nyams
376a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sdug bsngal myong pa nyid// sgrub pos 'di bzhin mchod pa'i yul// pha rol rnal 'byor dngos grub nyams// dam tshig med pa'i 'khor lo ni// nam yang bskor bar mi bya'o// mched yul rnam par bzhag pa ni// tshul
376a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// sman gsan+da phab pa'i rnal 'byor pa// slob dpon rjes su 'jug par bya'o// phyi ru rnal 'byor khrus byas nas// sgo dag skyong ba'i slob dpon la// tshogs bcad 'di yis 'jug par
376a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ khro bo sngon po mdzes pa ste// khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong // nor bu rin chen spras pa yi// dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa nyid// bdag ni 'khor ba las bsgrol phyir// rnal 'byor tshogs kyi dbus dag tu// bzang po'i
376b1(rgyud 'grel): sgo ni phye nas su// dpa' bos gnang gis gtang du gsol// nang du stan+na la rgan rim gyis// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rim pa 'am// yang na gral gyi rim pa'o// de nas slob dpon yon bdag gis// ri rab steng du skad
376b2(rgyud 'grel): cig la// gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang dkyil du// lhag pa'i lha yi gzugasu blta// dmu tshig sems pa'i rang bzhin la// ye shas sems dpa' gzhug par bya// ar+g+ha dang ni nul gsil dang // bsang chu
376b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba yis// me tog phreng ba spos la sogs// thun ming gi ni mchid pa dbul// yon gyi badrag pos bstod pa bya// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur// ye shes lnga dang
376b4(rgyud 'grel): skye gsum nyid// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// kun tu rtog pa 'ching gcod cing // 'jig rten bye ba rab 'jug ma// de snyed rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yid med rtog pa las
376b5(rgyud 'grel): grol zhing // 'khor 'das rnam pa gnyis med pa// dApe mang byed par gang gyur pa'i// 'khor lo'i dpa' bo la sogs bstod// 'dis ni mngon par brkyang phyag 'tshal// slob dpon rgyud kyi dbye bas der// ting nge 'dzin gyis
376b6(rgyud 'grel): rim pas ni// rang gi lha yi gzugasu 'gyur// ji lta'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom// yon bdag yi dam gzhan yin no// sngon la rang gi yi dam ste// rjes la skad cig nyid la ni// yon bdag 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor bsgo
377a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can// las kyi rdo rje'i bya ba ni// ji skad bde mchog 'byung ba lngas// gtsang zhing zhil blo gros ldan// rmongs dang ser sna rnam par spangs// thams cad dang ni mthun par
377a2(rgyud 'grel): lha// las kyi rdo d+hA ra der rtog go/ de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las// khyod ni rang 'byung rdo rje sems// mtshungs med las kyi rdo rje nyid// de nas sna tshogs ston mo dang / sha dang chang ni mnyam por sbyor// lo spyod yid 'phrog bde bcan// dang ldan ni se
377a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes// u smra dang ni sa nI sa// mi dim+b+ha na ri kai la sogs// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa// tshegs kyi dkyil du dbul ba ni// yang dag sbyor ba'i rgyud las gsungs// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs// ji ltar tshogs pa'i
377a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor la// bdud rtsi ril bu chu yis bsang // sngon du gtor ma sbyin par byi// phyag rgya chen po'i thog le las// thog mar gtor ma chen po ni// sna tshogs pa yi bza' ba dang // btung ba dang ni ldan pa nyid// thog ma bar
377a5(rgyud 'grel): dang tha ma ni// lhag pa lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// gtor ma dbul bar bya ba ni// mdun du dri bzang sogs pas byug/ dri yi thig les dkyil 'khor la// rang gi lha yi 'khor lo ni// cho ga bzhin du bskyed la mchod//
377a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sems dpa' mkha' nyid las// ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya// de yi rtsibs bcur khro bo bcu// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la// sgrub pa po yi lha nyid de// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol tu//
377b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyogs skyong dang // zhing skyong dur khrong la sogs pa// ji ltar mngon rtogs sngags kyis su// skad cig gis ni rang gi lha// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gzugs su blta// yum dang bcas
377b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du bsgom// dam chog la ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar cho ga la sogs pa// gtor ma bdud rtsir byin brlabs te// rang rang sngags kyis dbul bar bya// khyad par so so'i mngon rtogs ni// gzhung mang 'jigs
377b3(rgyud 'grel): pas ma bris shing // yongs su grags pa cung zad bkod// de nas g.yon pa'i ming med dang // rgan po'i sor mo gnyis sbyar nas// shes rab khu ba byin gyis brlab// de yi mdun du chos 'byung bri// shes rab
377b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi khu bus gtor// ldog pa lha yi dkyil 'khor ni// gzugs brnyan bzhin du gsal bar blta// bsrung bas byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// ting 'dzin byed pa rgyun mi bcang // de nas las kyi rdo rje
377b5(rgyud 'grel): yis// slob dpon la ni snod gnyis dbul// gzhan pa rnams la re re'o// mchod rdzas bla ma nyis 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan rnams mnyam por shes// 'ga' zhig tshim par ma gyur na'ang // rang gis blang bar mi bye
377b6(rgyud 'grel): ste// las kyi rdo rje las blangs na// ltung ba nyid du mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig lag nas lhung ba dag/ dngos po gzhan gyi dga' bar bya// 'dren pas ha cang gang ba min// len pa ha cang stongs pa min// phan tshun
378a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig la gcig min bzhin// 'dod ces ngag gis smra ba yin// yang / 'dren pas par skor phyag rgya ste// g.yon pas steng du bskyod par bya// len pas kyang ni de bzhin no// phyag 'tshal nas/
378a2(rgyud 'grel): ni dbul bya zhing // 'dren pas de bzhin shes par bya// g.yas pa'i lha nga sar btsugs te// thog mar thabs dang shes rab la// gzigs shi gaM mdzes pa dam pa'i chos// 'di la the tshom bya mi rung // bram ze
378a3(rgyud 'grel): khyi dang gdol ba yang / rang bzhin gcig tu dgos te rol// tshogs bcad 'dis ni sbyin par bya'o// yang ni len pa po yis ni// bde gshegs chos la rin thang med// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma bral//
378a4(rgyud 'grel): gzung 'dzin rnam par spangs pa yis// de kho na nyid la skyabs su mchi'o// tshogs btsod 'dis ni len par bya'o// bla ma'i bka' drin gnad pa yi// snod ni sa la bzhag mi bya// gnang ba thob gyur bzhag par
378a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de las gzhan du chad par 'gyur// slob dpon rjes gnang ma byin par// rnal 'byor bza' tung don gzhan man// slob dpon thog mar rang gi ni// phyag rgya mchod la de nas rol// btung ba dga' bu skyed
378a6(rgyud 'grel): pa tsam// de bas lhag dang chad pa min// bde ba skyed phyir btung ba ste// myos pa'i phyir ne ma yin no// rnal 'byor lha yi nga rgyal ni// dus rnams kun tu bya ba nyid// rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lor
378b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa na// gtam gyi rnyong pa la sogs pa/ de btsun g.yod pa spang bar bya// mtshol ma 'dor la sogs pa dang // sma ra 'thog dang rgod pa dang // rkang lag brkyang bar mi bya'o// yang yang ldang dang 'dug pa dang //
378b2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa bsgyur sogs rtag tu sdang // gang zhig dgos pa'i dbye ba la// brda skad phyag rgya bgo bar bya// 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dbang phyug gis// gnang ba byin par ma gyur par// gzhan du glu dang gar dang ni//
378b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin rol mo 'khrol la sogs// zab mo'i skad stsogs 'dri ba min// gnang ba thob nus ci bdor 'gyur// gang zhig bza' dang ba tung ba la// thams cad bdud rtsi ri sbyar byas la// de nas rang gi lte bar
378b4(rgyud 'grel): niHgang zhig dgos pa'i dbye ba yis// lha yi 'khor lo gnas par bsam// rang gis lag pa g.yas dang g.yon// blugs gzar dgang gzur rang gzugs nyid// lte bya'i lha la mchod pa'i tshul//
378b5(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod tshogs kyis mchod par bya// de bzhin gzugs la sogs pa'i yul// myig la sogs pa'i dbang po nyid// ji ltar lha yi gzugs kyis ni// rnam par dag pa'i ro gcig pa'i phan tshul
378b6(rgyud 'grel): shes pa nyid kyis so// de yang rdo rje phreng ba las// lta ba pad+ma'i dbus su ni// dpa' bo dbang phyug dran pa nyid// gang zhig pa ni tshun gcig la gcig/ rnam par dag par mi shes na// de la 'khor lo'i 'brus
379a1(rgyud 'grel): bu med/ thams cad dngos grub 'bras nyams 'gyur// gang du rim pa 'di yis ni// phyi dang nang gis bdag nyid kun// ro gcig par ni spyad byas nas// de ni 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid//
379a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag tshogs 'khor 'bras bu 'byin// myos byed bde ba skyed pa'i tshe// glu dang gar ni byed 'dod na// gnang ba thob nas rdo rje yi// glu gar rnal 'byor pa yis bya// de yang brtag gnyis rgyal po las// glu ni
379a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar ni sgom pa byed po nyid// de yis phyir ni glu dang gar// rnal 'byor pa yis rgyun tu bya// dga' ba rdo rje bsdams pa yis// rkang pa rdo rje rtse gcig dang // rnal 'byor mnyam par bzhag/
379a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// bde ba bskyed phyir gar nyid de// thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya'o// rgyu de las gsungs pa'i rim pa ste// gzhan du gnang ba ma yin no// de bzhin rdo rje phreng ba las// dga' ba bskyed nas gnad pa yis// glu dang
379a5(rgyud 'grel): gar ni bya ba nyid// ga zhig rdo rje bsdams la sogs// de bzhin lha nI mnyes pa nyid// rgyud las gsungs rdo rje'i glu/ ko la e b+d+hi a b+ho lA mu m+ma ni ro kak+ko la/ g+ha na kri bi Ta ho badzaM i// ka ru Ne ka a i ne ro lA/
379a6(rgyud 'grel): ta hi baM la khadz+dza au/ g+ha D+ho ma a ni pi d+hI a a i/ ha le kA leny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ du du ra bodz+dzi a i/ tsa u sa me kats+tsha r-i sih+la kap+sa ra lA i A i// mA la a in+d+ra Na pA li a ta hi b+ha ru kha pi a i/ pre k+Sha Na khe Ta/
379b1(rgyud 'grel): ka ran+ta shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na ma Ni a i/ ni rang su a kats+tsha TA wi/ tA hi dzaM su wi a NI A i/ mu la a dza kun+du ru pa Tu i Dim+b+hi ma ta hiM ni badz+dzi a I// grub thob bla mas gsungs pa'i dbyangs// stong pa snying rje dbyer med pAr// don
379b2(rgyud 'grel): ston rdo rje'i glu nyid do// gzhan du rtog pas phan tshun du// spel pa rdo rje'i glu ma yin// rdo rje rkang pa'i ger la sogs// gzhan du grags phyir 'dir ma spros// 'dir ni cho ga ji bzhin du// gru ga ra la sogs rim pa ni//
379b3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba nyid// de la thun mong byin brlabs rtags// de yang brtag gnyis rgyal po las// gsungs pa rim bzhin shes byas te// 'khor lo'i dbang phyug mdun du ni// gang zhig gus pas glu dang gar// byas
379b4(rgyud 'grel): pas dri yi mtshan nyid ni// thog mar sgrog pa'i dri nyid de// de nas yang ni bya rgod dri// gdur ma lA ya yi dri// byin brlabs glu yi mtshan nyid do// ngang pa'i ngang ni bung ba'i sgra// thos pas glu yi khyad par nyid// ba lang tsha yi
379b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra nyid ni// phyi rol nye ba'i mtshan nyid do// khyad par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags// de yang rdo rje phreng ba las// gal te thun mongado rnal 'byor mye// 'dus pa'i tshegs su 'ongs pa na// g.yin pa'i ts+tsho mo'i brda yis ni// bde
379b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya bye ba nyid// de la sgrub pa po yis ni// gtan 'dri rnam rtog byar mi rung // cung zad 'dri bar 'dod na yang // gang zhig rdo rje slob dpon nam// yang na las kyi rdo rje yis// brda dang phyag rgya 'dri bar 'gyur//
380a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs gzugs kyi rnal 'byor ma// yang dang yang du 'gro zhing 'ong // de la the tshom za ba dang // ya mtshan 'jigs par byed don sogs// sgrub pa po yis mi bya ste// byas na dngos grub nyams pa nyid//
380a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas dkyil 'khor sdud pa na// lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin par bya// de yang rdo rje phreng ba las// lhag ma'i gtor ma'i sbyor ba yis// dngos grub rnal 'byor chen por 'gyur// oM k+Shi uts+tshu k+She k+Shi tra pA lA ya swA hA// sngags 'dis
380a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod cing kha phrus gdage// yang ni slob dpon sngon 'gro bas// gang zhig ma mthong gyur pa na// rtags kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rnal 'byor gyis ni shes par bya// gang zhig byad zlum kha dog dmar// gzhin bzang smin ma
380a4(rgyud 'grel): ring ba ni// 'od dpag med kyi rigs shes bya// de la rus sbal phyag rgya bstan// cung zad sbom zhing dmigs dkyus ring // dkar ser mdog can yid 'phrog ma// sna tshogs gos ni 'dzin pa ste// ri mo gsum 'greng dpral
380a5(rgyud 'grel): bapar mtshan// gang du gnas pa'i sa dag tu// grong ba'i shi sogs gtam smra ba// 'di nyid rin 'byung rnal 'byor ma// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro zhes byar blta// rtsi gsum pa yi phyag rgya bstan// g.yon brkyang ba yi
380a6(rgyud 'grel): gar stabs kyis// de yi mdun du blta bar bya'o// lag tu g.yon pas byin nas ni// phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed// kha dog gnag cing gos nag 'dzin// skra li dpral ba gzhu yi dbyibs// mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog
380b1(rgyud 'grel): par ston// sems 'gro ba yi mar rab grags// g.yon bskum dge ba'i gar gyis ni// phyag rgya rab tu bstan par bya// mi bskyod pa yi rigs su shes// g.yon pa'i stangs kyis lan yang 'debs// lus sbom gsus bcud
380b2(rgyud 'grel): zad 'phyang // mig yangs rdzi ma mang ba la// byin pa sbom zhing mdzes pa ni/ sa 'og grus pa shes pa ste// rnam snang rigs su shes pas na// de la dung gi phyag brgya bstan// mig skam pa spu thams cad langs// lus skem
380b3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa ring ba la// mkha' 'gro zhes sgra rab tu sgrogs// 'di nyid don grub rigs su shes// de la rab blta mtha' ma bskor// lag pa g.yon gyi dbye bu yis// bi dan phyag rgya bstan par bya// ji ltar 'di dag la mkhas
380b4(rgyud 'grel): pas// rab tu 'bad pas shes par bya// dri ba 'am phyag rgya byed pa na// de yi don gyis mchod par brjod// gang zhig 'di rnams thams cad la// dpa' bo brkyang ba'i bya ba ni// dpa' bo'i ston mo zhes su brjod// chos
380b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang phyug de lta min// de bzhin dpa' mo brkyang ba la// dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ston mo nyid// de ltar 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la// shes rab thabs dang bcas pa nyid// gzhan yang gang zhig stobs dang ni// myos byed
380b6(rgyud 'grel): khu brkyang bas ni// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs// stobs dang myos byed khu bar ni mi ldan yon tan bsod nams nyams// gtso bo tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi/ khyad par shes rab g.yon du bzhag/ 'dir ni ji ltar
381a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa dang // ji ltar nus pa'i rim pa yis// lha yi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor sogs// rnam par dag pa'i cho gas mchod// thams cad rang gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'dir ni dge bar 'dod pas na//
381a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag lha yi rnal 'byor gyi// slob mas tshogs kyi rnal 'byor goms// nang gi dbang phyug gyur pa ste// rgyun par shin tu goms pas na// gang tshe cho ga 'di yis ni// rim pa 'di ni rnam par spyad// de tshe rtag tu goms pas
381a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ spros bcas smos mod rnam par bzhag/ de nas sgrub pa po yis ni// zhal gsil phyag phyis go la dbul// yon tan sogs pas mnyes par bya// rang gi lha yi 'khor lo nyid// dang po thar par 'gyur ba ste// de nas
381a4(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams bsngo bar bya// bzod par gsol la tshogs kyi ni// 'khor lo gshegos par bya ba nyid// bdag nyid dbang phyug gyur pas na// gzhan la phyag ni bya mi dgos// cho ga'i rim pa 'di yis ni// ji ltar rigs
381a5(rgyud 'grel): par 'bang gyur ni// de yi bsod nams mtha' ma ni// tshad bzung nus pa ma yin no// de ltar phyog na rdo rje yis// gsungs pa'i rjesu 'brangs par 'gyur// tsho gas kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bAzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ paN+Di ta rat+na
381a6(rgyud 'grel): rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi to pa'i zhal snga nas dang // bod kyi lo tse ba shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur po'o//
381b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ gaN tsa kra bid+hi bA ka sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba zhes bya ba// rje btsun ma 'phyags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan pad+mo chen rgyal po yis// rdo rje sems
381b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' phyag 'tshal nas// dngos grub dgos pa kun bsgrub pa'i// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim bshad bya// de la tshogs kyi 'khor lo brgya rtsa 'am 'bum la sogs pa byed par 'dod pas 'byor pa dang bsnun pa'i
381b3(rgyud 'grel): rim po ni gsum ste// rgyal po lta bu'i dang // dmangs lta bu'i dang // rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa lta bus bya ba'o// dang po ni 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyud gang dang rtog bsre mthun pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo lha grangs dang
381b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa rang gi slob dpon ston du 'gro ba'i blo can rnams kyis de'i cho ga dang / brda dang phyag rgyal sogs pa tha ma snyoms 'jug gi bar du bya ba mi gcig ste// rim par phye ba dang po'o// gnyis pa ni ji ltar tshogs
381b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'byor pa dang // ji ltar rigs pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo rnams rdo rje slob dpon sngon du 'gro bar bya ste// cho ga ni rgyud kyi dbye ba las shes te// de lta bu'i bya ba gcig tu 'dod de rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// gsum
381b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyud du ma'i rnal 'byor pa rang gi rigs byed la mkhas pa'i tshogs la// spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas bya ste/ de ltar rnal 'byor po'i grangs ji snyed pa de snyed tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbye ba
382a1(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya ste// 'di rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// de thams cad la gnas dang rdzas dang // rnal 'byor pa dang / cho ga dang / yon bdag la bar chad med par bya'o// grangs du ma byas par
382a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas tshul 'dis ni yongs su shes par bya'o// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye bA zhes bya ba// A tsArba he ru ka badz+ra yis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas
382a3(rgyud 'grel): lo tsA ba grub pa dpal bzang pos sgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta/ suM pra tiSh+Tha nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/ bicom ldan 'das de bzhin
382a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs rten bla ma la/ gus pas phyag 'tshal rten gsum la/ rgyud dang bla ma'i gsungs brten
382a5(rgyud 'grel): nas// sgrib skyong rab gnas bri bar bya// slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing // mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes// las rnams kun la mkhas pa ste// dam sdom byang chub
382a6(rgyud 'grel): sems 'byongs pas/ bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas la// de dang 'dra ba'i grogs bcas kyis// dus zla gza' skar chos grangs ni// nyi ma'i khyim ni bcu gnyis te// dgun dpyid ra 'bring ro ha ti'o// dus
382b1(rgyud 'grel): su nyi ma log nas ni// byang 'gro zla drug nyin mo 'phel// de drug zhi ba rab gnas shis// dbyar ston ra 'bring zla drug lhor// nug 'phel drag nyi der mi brtsam// phur bu lag dang pa bA sangs// zla ba bzang ldan gza
382b2(rgyud 'grel): ste shis// nyi spen dmag dpon nor 'joms ngan// chu smad snar ma gro bzhin dang // lag/ ngang snron snabs rgyal chu stong // khrus smad skye dgu 'phel ba dang / rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed// yid 'dod
382b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub me bzhi ste// snrubs dang gro bzhin de bzhin te// lig gis skal bzangs snar mas rgyal// mi go yis nye bo zhi bar byed// chu stod kyi ni bu dag gson// khrums slang rtag par dngos grub ster// rgyal
382b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis tshe ring bstan par 'gyur// snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed// lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur// gza' dang skar ma de dag kyang // ngar rgung myi rigs las dang sbyar// tshes gcig
382b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum lnga drug bdun bcu// drug bai nor 'joms spang gzhan shis// gza' skar tshes grangs mthun 'jom na// myur gyi ro la 'ang bya bar shis// gnam stong bcu bzhi kun tu spring // zla ba gza' dang
382b6(rgyud 'grel): skar ma dang // nyi ma dus 'jom skad cig la// ji skad gsungs pa bzhin byas na// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur te// 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang
383a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug ni// thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// slob dpon mtshan ma thob pa na// gza' dang rgyu skar rtsi mi dgos// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med// gza' rnams thams cad
383a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes mthun zhing // bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid// de drug bka' sgrub kun gnas shing // gzugs brnyan mchong rten la sogs kyis// dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad// yid kyis cung zad gang bsams
383a3(rgyud 'grel): skye dang skye bar 'grub par 'gyur// yang thog mchong rten la sogs gnas// khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su// sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas bya// brdungs lugs 'bur bris sogs rten ni// rang
383a4(rgyud 'grel): rang mtshan nyid ldan pa ste// zhi khro la sogs rang tshul mthun// tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang // de 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur// bzlog pa skyon 'gyur du phyir gzab// rab gnas dgos dang myi dgos
383a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na// gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab// gdod ma nas zhi skye med la// ji 'dra ji ltar rab tu gnas// chos rnams thams cad 'od gsal du// rtogs dang ldan pa'i mchod gnas
383a6(rgyud 'grel): la// rab tu gnas pa mi dgos te// yang na stong nyid ma rtogs kyang // mchod rten glegs bam sku gzugs sogs// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul byin brlabs las// byung ba min na mi 'byung bar// rtogs ti//
383b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dang ldan na// rab tu gnas pa mi dgos so// dang po'i las can ma 'byongs la// 'jig rten tha snyad kun rdzob tu// 'gro bas de nyid mi shes la// ston pas rab tu gnas pa bshad// dbye ba sgra don skyon yon
383b2(rgyud 'grel): las// bya ba'i thabs dang rnam pa drug/ don dam spros med rab gnas dang // kun rdzob sku gsung thugs gsum ste// yon tan 'phrin las zhor la 'byung // dam tshig sems dpa' sbyangs skyed la// ye shes
383b3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yun ring du// gnas pa'i phyir na rab tu gnas// gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la// byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na// de la bkra mi shis 'gyur zhing // de srid mchod par de mi 'os// dper na/
383b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu la la zhig/ rim pa'i mtshan nyid spongs pa na// 'jig rten kun gyi mchod mi byed// de bzhin byin ma brlabs sku la// gang zhig phyag 'tshal mchod byed pa// dom tshig bral zhing sngags dman te//
383b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs// 'jam dpal rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las// skye bo tshul khrims 'chal 'di la// bde 'gro mtho ris yod min la// bde ba mchog tu'ang mi 'gyur na// rgyal bas gsung
383b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sngags rnams ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'i mgo bcang sngo min ltar de bzhin sngags sgrub rmongs pa dang // tshul khrims nyams shing sdig las byed// rtag tu bud med chags pa
384a1(rgyud 'grel): laH'di ni rab tu bstan ma yin// mi dge bshes gnyen bsten pas ni// sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// yon tan yang ni rtsa rgyud las// 'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed dang // de slob bse
384a2(rgyud 'grel): ru byang chub sems// bdag nyid chen pos gsungs pa yin// cho ga gzhung dang mthun par ni// rab tu gnas pa byas nas kyang // ri mo 'di ni mdun ga zhag na// sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin/
384a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang phyag 'tshal dang // mthong dang reg pra tsam gyis kyang // sdigs pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol// ras ros la sogs mthu chen la// don du gnyer dang bskul bas ni// myur du skye ba don yod thob// rjes su
384a4(rgyud 'grel): yi rang de bzhin no// rten 'di mthong ba'i skye bo yi bsod nams thob pa don yod pa// bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang // brjod par yang ni mi nus so// las ni yon bdag bsod nams spel// sngags pas dge ba rnyed
384a5(rgyud 'grel): par byed// de bzhin slob dpon sngags gnas byas// chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang // de yis skyo bar mchod par 'gyur// bya thabs cho ga dge pas bya// cho ga dman gnas bkra mi shis// 'dir sdug pha rol 'jigs
384a6(rgyud 'grel): pa che// dngos grub 'dod pas cho gar 'bad// cho ga'i tshul legs bsod nams ni// mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye// sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis// rten la byin brlabs 'jug par 'gyur// gang zag blo//
384b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs tha dad pas// yon mchod 'byor cho ga tshogs pa yis// rab gnas rgyas pa spos bcas bya// 'bring pos cho ga cha tsam dang // bsdus pa ting 'dzin thun gcig la// rdul tshon la sogs mi dgos bya// rgyas pa mtshan//
384b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan bla ma la// slob ma sA lan gsum gsol btAb nas// bka' bsgo slob mas rdzas po sogs te// yid 'ongs gnas su bsnyen gsum bsgral// sa yi cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// lha bum sbyin sre gau sa yi lha// sta gon
384b3(rgyud 'grel): spyi dang mthun par bya// 'di skabs slob ma sta gon na// gang byed gzhung dang mthun gnas yin// de yang sngags grogs slob dpon 'dra// yon bdag sta gon gnas pa ni// rgyas pa bkra shis cho ga 'di// brtsams nas
384b4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs kyi bar// yon mchod la sogs mi rnams kun// lus ngag yid spyong bzang ltas bya// ba'i phyogs kun thag ring spang // bzang ngan gang byung mi rabs bdun// 'byung bas ngan na 'bar sogs bzlog/
384b5(rgyud 'grel): nang par dkyil 'khor rdzas chang bsham+ba// shar lhor rab gnas dbang stegs ni// dpyangasaM khyu rgyu ni sten dang sbyar// ba yis lngas byugs pang 'khor ser// nyi nub dpon slob khrus byas brgyan// bgegs
384b6(rgyud 'grel): bskrang chang lhag bskang byas te// bum pa'i bsnyen bsgrub gzhung ltar bya// de yang bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nas// mchod bstong bston bzlas par du mi// mtshan ma byung gi bar du bya// rdo rjes rang 'jug dbang yang blang
385a1(rgyud 'grel): de rjes snyan gsan gsol ba gdab// phyir phyin gtor ma rgya chen gtang // bgegs la bka' bsgo bden bdar bya// nang zhugs nye regs 'thor 'thung byas// sngon du yon bdag dbang rgyas bskur// de nas
385a2(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas sta gon te// rten gsar rnams ni der drangs la// dkyil 'khor mkhar gdegs bdag khror bsgyur// bgegs la bka' bsgo stang stabs bya// khro bo'i bstod bzlas ra dra sogs// bsrung 'khor rgyas par
385a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// gong nas rten gsar bzhugs pa na// na bza' car g.yog zhal phyir bstan// ba dkyil 'khor bris nas ta gon to// maM bris rab gnas dbang nus med// slob dpon brten ma thob nus med//
385a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bris chog dgos meng 'gyur// des na rgyud dang bla ma ni// dam pa'i snyan po rgyud gdams ngag dgos// sta gon bgegs ni bskrad pa'i gnang // dngos gzhi byin brlabs sbar ba'i gnang // rjes ni bstan
385a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dar rgyas gsum// sta gon nub mo phyag rgya dgrol// dkyil 'khor shar sogs ku sha'i steng // seng ge'i nyal stabs chos nyid nyal// skya reng shar dus chos nyid las// langs te khrus byas brgyan lhur
385a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// rten gsar tha mal dri sbyang phyir// shing bu gru gsum me sbar la// kham phor steng du bag zan gyi// kong bu gsum la mar me sbar// 'bras kyi chang bu gsum la ni// rdo rje gtsug tor gnod sbyin gyis
385b1(rgyud 'grel): sku la phyi bkru lan gsum bya// 'bras med bag phyes bya bar 'os// sngags gnyis zlos shing yungs kar byug/ mi gtsang dor bsam sla ngar blugs// de rjes chu med de ltar bya// yang na g.yem steng chu me dang //
385b2(rgyud 'grel): zho zan bsres dang yungs kor la// oM sarba pA pau da ho na badz+rA ya swA hA// zhes zlas mar bsregs bzhi mdor ngor// 'dag cha la sug pa nye shing pa/ shu tI sran phye ba yi lha// til mar gyis ni sngags bcas
385b3(rgyud 'grel): bag chags sbyang phyir spu brgyang / brus// rdul g.ya baM me long bstan byas te// chab gtsang chu gtsang sman chab dang // smra chab 'o ma 'bru sA lnga// rin chen mchod yon khras byas la// shing bal ral kyis
385b4(rgyud 'grel): sku phyis la// dbang steg sgo steng du bzhugs gsol la// mar dung dri lcug pur dang // tsan dan+ta dza ti gur gumya dang // gla rtsi byugs te stong par sbyang // stong pa'i sngags gsum rI mi bzhin brjod// de nas lhur
385b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod dngos de 'am// dkyil 'khor gang bris yi ngam lha// gtso 'khor bcas pa 'am gtso rgyung ni// mngon par byang chub lngas bskyed la// rab gnas dbang bskur mnga' gsol gsum// rab gnas ye
385b6(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' yi// spyan drang chos brgyad gnyan san dbab// spyan drangs bzhugs gsol khrus mchod yon// phyag 'tshal sum bsres sku gsung thugs// byin gyi brlabs pa'i bar du bya// de la
386a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i rim pa ni// rin chen maN+Dal thun mong lnga// rgyun dang gzhal yas gdugs rgyal mtshan// bya dan 'phan dang bla rA dang // me tog phreng ba rol mos bskor// nam bza' na mkha' mdzod
386a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal zas// gling bzhi'i maN+Dal dbul bar bya// rang rang sngags dang rten 'brel gyis// snying po brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// yi ge brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas pas brtan par byed pa
386a3(rgyud 'grel): yin// de dag spyi yi rab gan ste// khyad par sku gsung thugs rnams la// rang rang cho ga gzhung bsrang la// mchod rten la sogs thugs rten la// khyad par chos bzhi byin gyis brlabs// rdo ring them skas chu srin
386a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi// rgyal mtshan la sogs dbul ba'o// byin brlabs sa gzhi chos kyi dbyings// seng khri mi 'jigs bzhir byin brlabs// rmang ni dge bcu khri 'phang ni// dang po dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// gnyis pa yang dag
386a5(rgyud 'grel): spong ba bzhi// gsum pa rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// bzhi pa snang ba'i dbang po lnga// bum rten stobs lngar byin gyis brlabs// bum pa byang chub yan lag bdun// kha bskyer 'phags lam yan lag brgyad// de dag
386a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyu chos byin brlab ste// 'bras bu'i chos su 'di ltar bslab// srog shing mkhyen bcu bre legs ni// ye shes bzhi dang rnam thar bzhi// 'khor lo bcu gsum sa bcu dang // dran pa nyer gzhag gsum du brlab/
386b1(rgyud 'grel): char khebs gdugs ni thugs rje'i skyabs// tog ni chos dbyings ngo bo nyid// phyi ni sku gsum nang gzhal yas// rdo ring rin chen tham skas dang // chu srin rgyal mtshan dar dpyangs dang // rin chen phreng ba nyi zla dbul// bya ru
386b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab yin// gdan tho dbul ba rgyas pa yin// mchod rten sku bsdus rab gnas bya// rang rang rab gnas legs par bya// sku gzugs khyad par chos brgyad de// spyan dbye dbu skra sbrul sku'i bzhar// longs
386b3(rgyud 'grel): sku'i dung gi so mang bshad// shangs dbyes spu thog tshems rtsa bru// ljags bzhar snyan spabs bru zhing gsal// na bza' sprul pa'i skul ni// slang gsum chu tshigs par 'khar sil// longs sku zhi la dar gyi ste//
386b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo stag lpags dang sngon gyi// stong g.yogs rgyan ni sbrul thod sogs// sprul sku rgyan med longs zhi la// bris dkong 'bul bsams cho gas dbul// dngos su dbul du yod na rab// gsung rab zhal bsro'i khyad par
386b5(rgyud 'grel): dgu/ don gsung skye 'gag med par brlab// tshig gsung yig 'bru gsung rab ni// yan lag tshad med bzhi bcur brlab// khri dbul glegs bag dbul// na bza' zhal khab rgya rim bdun// pha rol phyin pa yum chen
386b6(rgyud 'grel): mo// mdo sde 'dul ba byang chub che// rgyud sde rdo rje chos sogs te// cho ga yid dam la sogs pa// ngo shes bye brag mi shes spyi// yang na bden gnyis yi ger bsam// dri lnga yis ni de nas byug/ sa bon lnga'i gtor bya'i don
387a1(rgyud 'grel): skye med rtogs pa gsal ba yis// chos sku la ni chos sku thim// gnyis su meng bsam me tog dbul// thugs kyis mchod pa dri yis byug/ de nas spyir ni dbang bcu gcig/ bum pa dbu rgyan
387a2(rgyud 'grel): con pan dang // phyag rgya maung dbang las bzhi'i dbang // chos kyis rgyal po gsang ba'i dbang // babs shes gdugs dang phreng dbang bskur// rjes la mnga' gsol rten kun la// rdzas brgyad sna bdun dbul ba dang //
387a3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis byin cher gsol ba ni// 'brang rgyas la sogs bkra shis rdzas// mang la 'jig rten dge ba dang // mdzad pa bcu gnyis dkon mchog gsum// rigs lnga la sogs mang po ni// klog dang gyed pas zhal
387a4(rgyud 'grel): sro bya// gong du cod pan dbang bskur 'am// yang na sngags 'dis bcings byas te// oM hUM aM badz+ri khaM// U yi sum 'gyur khri la ni// mdun du ma nub mi yor bzhugs// de ltar ma byas skyon mang 'byung // de nas slob dpon
387a5(rgyud 'grel): yon bdag gnyis// me tog gtor te gdan khri nas// gzung la gzhugs par lan gsum gsol// de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad sogs// bstod brgyas bsdus skabs dang sbyar// de yi yon tan la dad pas//
387a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog spos dang de bzhin dri// mar me lha bshos na bza' sogs// sngags ldan rgyas bsdus skabs dang sbyar// de nas yon bdag bdun bzhag/ me tog dri yis mnga' gsol ba// rten 'brel snying po zlos bzhin
387b1(rgyud 'grel): pu/ lha la 'bul bzhin byas la// gzeng bstod mchod pa'i rjes gnang sbyin// gsang ba'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das/ phyag na rdo rje 'khor bcas la// gtor ma phul la gsol pa gdab// spyi yi chos skyong phyogs skyong
387b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu// rnam sras mgon po bzhi bdag la// gtor sbyin phran las bka' bsgo bya// phyi rjes gzo bo grogs byed sogs// 'di skad brjod de mchod par bya// kye gson dga' bas 'di nyid du// ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod
387b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid du// ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams// bdog lce rnams// bdag lo mthun pa'i nus pa med// de phyir khyed ni bzod par gsol// de dag gang dag brtul zhugs can// dge slong dge bsnyen dge bsnyen ma// /
387b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gus pas mchod byas la// ji ltar 'os pa'i yon yang 'bul// rab tu byung ba'i gnas brtan dang // khyim pa'i gtso bo la sogs la// gnyer gtang bka' bsgo 'di skad brjod// snyigs ma lnga'i dus 'di
387b5(rgyud 'grel): yi mchog gi sku dang mnyam pa yi// sprul pa'i sku ni 'di yin gyis// khyod kyis ma nyams srung mchod gyis// sngags kyi bza' bca' yon bdag la// skabs 'dir sbyin te 'di skad brjod// sngags kyis gtsang sbra'i
387b6(rgyud 'grel): bza' bca' dag/ gzugs brnyan bdage po khyod la sbyin// bde gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni// zos na sdig pa byang bar 'gyur// gal te lhag nyid dge 'dod na// bla ma gus pas dge bya zhing // de ltar rnam pa
388a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du// bla ma yang dag mnyes byas te// yon gyi dam pa dbul ba ni// rta dang glang po shing rta nor// longs spyod yo byad dbul 'di brjod// bla ma yongs su mnyes pa yis// las dang dngos grub/
388a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'thob// de bas dngos po thams cad kyis bla ma mnyes par byed par shog/ de nas mtshan mo gtang rag ste// gnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyis// bzang ba'i glu gar rel mo ste// dung la sogs pa'i rol
388a3(rgyud 'grel): mo dbul// lho phyogs rgyas pa'i thabs byas la// 'o ma can gyi bud shing brtsig/ 'bru dang mngar gsum mar 'o mas// dang po mjug tu me lha mchod// bar du dkyil 'khor rab gnas lha// stong ngam lnga brgya sogs sngags
388a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dis// oM badz+ra A yu She puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA// sdig zhi tshe dpal rgyas par 'phel// gtang rag lhag chad bskang ba yi// mchod bstod gzong gsol skabs sbyar bya// rten gsar ye shes myi gshegs te// tsA ru'i ston
388a5(rgyud 'grel): mo rgyas par bya// dkyil 'khor lha gshegs dam tshig sdu// rdul tshon a kAr sngags bsdus te// chu sogs dor la ba'i lngas byug/ de nas 'gro rnams dang bya'i phyir// shing rta khri sogs mtho bar bteg/ mchod
388a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rol mo dang bcas pas// grong khyer rnams su bskor bar bya// spros mi dga' la bsdus pa ni// bsnyen pas cho ga sta gon dang // dkyil 'khor bri sgrub rten gser la// bgegs bskrang yi ge brgyas brtan
388b1(rgyud 'grel): par/ grong bzhin spyan dbye la sogs pa// nub gcig la ni kun rdzogs bya// mnga' gsol rgyas par ma grub kyang // 'di la nyes par mi 'gyur ro// shin tu bsdus pa'i rab gnas ni// brtan pa thob pa'i slob
388b2(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyis// gza' skor tshes grangs mi brtsi ste// rdul tshon mi rten thun gcig la// dkyil 'khor bsgoms te brgya rtsa bsnyen// bgegs bskrad bkru sogs gong ltar bya// bskyed de spyan drang sku gsung thugs/
388b3(rgyud 'grel): na gyis brlab dang dbang bskur ba// snying ga'i sa bon 'od kyis ni// 'og min rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas// bkra shis lha mo 'bum rol bcas// dbang bskur rigs bdag rgyas btab bsam// rten 'brel snying
388b4(rgyud 'grel): po brgya rtsa res// dri dang me tog gtor byugs te/ rang rang lha la chos skur thim// bsams la rdo rjes mchod bstod bya// rjes sogs spyi dang mthun par bya// lha khang rab gnas 'dir ma bshad// da ni phyag
388b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan byin dbab ste// swa d+hA'i sngags kyis stong dang las// dkar rigs lha khang mchod rten gnas// khang khyim bru las 'khor rnam snang // gsung rigs dmar dang po bo ti cong // gaN+Di cha lang dril bu sogs//
388b6(rgyud 'grel): dri las pad+ma snang mtha' yas// neg sngo rdo rje phur 'phreng thugs// hUM rdo rje las mi bskyod skyed// ser po bang mdzod yon tan rigs// aM las rin chen rin 'byung bskyed// las rigs ljang gu rgya gram gri/
389a1(rgyud 'grel): khaM las ral gris don yod grub// chos skyong rnams la rang rang gi/ 'jig rten 'bag la rigs gsum gyis// rigs kyi 'bag la rang rang lhas// ngo mi shes kun de 'drar re 'am// rigs bstun
389a2(rgyud 'grel): gong gis shes par bya// srogs chags gtso bo'i sbrul skus bya// bsrung 'khor kun dga' ra bkang sa// gzhal yas khang ngam a mo li// chu mig khron sogs mA ma kI/ bza' shing ra dang ldum re sogs// shing gi lha
389a3(rgyud 'grel): mo 'od 'chang mas// phyogs lhas par+Na sha ba ri// 'bru dang bang mdzod 'dzam b+ha la// yon bdag dkyil 'khor mthong na lha// ma mthong na ni sbrul skus bya// bla ma'i sku 'bag thugs dam ste// mi shes rang gi yi dam las//
389a4(rgyud 'grel): gas la ma zhugs sprul pa'i sku// kun la dgug gzhug gong bzhin bya// phrin las rgyas pa'i cho ga ste// rab gnas rim gsum 'khor bcas 'di// bdag gis rang bzor ma byas te// gtso cher klu sgrub lugs
389a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsor bzhag/ rdo rje 'chang nas gnyis brgyud pa'i// lung dang 'dra ba'i na ro dang // byang chub sems las thob pa yi// sgeg pa rdo rje skal ldan mchog/ de gsum snyam nas snyan brgyud pa'i// man ngag bla ma mnyes
389a6(rgyud 'grel): pas thob// rgyud dang bstan bcos legs brten nas// rang nyid dran pa gso ba dang // gzhan yang bdag 'dra gti mug la// phan phyir gzhan gyis bskul nas bri// ma rtogs nongs pa gzod par gsol// brtsams
389b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dge ba bcu zad des// sems can bde chen sku thob shog/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad ye shes gyis mdzad pa rdzog so// / rgya gar
389b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi mkhan po dI paM ke ra dang / lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng gis bri ga ma la shI lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ kA ma shAsta nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'dod pa'i
389b3(rgyud 'grel): bstan bcos zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gsal dang yan lag bde stangs dang // rigs dang rdzas dang sngags rnams ni// sngags pas shes ni 'jig rten 'dir// bde ba'i
389b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba'i khyad par bskyed pa'i phyir// drang srong swa ra ya nas gsungs// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos 'bum sde las// klu sgrub kyis ni stong phrag gcig/ bsdus te de las bdag
389b5(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang // bde ba sgrub phyir 'di gsung ngo // 'bade bso rol byed ma rnams kyi// mkhas pas bde ba bskyed par bya// yang na shes pa tsam gyis ni// rol byed ma yi rigasu shes 'gyur// 'dod pa sten
389b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus su ni// bud medo rnams ni mgu bar 'gyur// bud medo rigs ni rnam bzhi ste// skyes pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// pad+ma can dang dung can ma// glang tshan ma dang sna tshogs ma// ri bong dang ni khyu
390a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang // rta dang de bzhin rko ba dang // pad+ma'i gdong can skal bzangs ma// 'dod pa'i gzugs can bud med mchog/ khyams gsum kun tu grags pa yi// pad+ma can gyi mtshan
390a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid do// gdong pa ring zhing gzugs bzang ma// skal ldan kun gyi yid du 'ong // ngang pa'i bgros can blo bzang ma// 'di ni dung can ma zhes bya// tshe zhing cung zad mche ba can// yan lag ma nyams mdzes ldan
390a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ mdog ldan skal bzang gsang ba thub// de ni glang chen ma ru grags// sbyang ka'i dbyangs can yan lag gnag/ sna tshogs gzugaso can snyan par smra// byams ldan sems ni ma dkrugs mchog/
390a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni sna tshogs ma zhes bya// pags pa stong zhing 'jam pa dang // gser gyi me tog dang mtshungos rtags// yan lhag bkra zhing khe dog gnag/ glang gi rtags ni dr-i rI bong // gding pa ring zhing skad bzed mchog
390a5(rgyud 'grel): rol bying ma rnams mgu bar byed// pa gas pa dmar ldan rtsed mo mdzes// de yis rtags wAn khyu mchog yin/ shin tu ring zhing sbom po nI// dpag med yon tan ster bya'o// mag+nin sngon dang ni mtshungs
390a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// 'bras can ltar ni bshad pa yin// thung zhing sbom pa glang nya yin// brtan zhing rol byeng ma yid 'ong // rtags kyi tha snyad de yis ni// ri dgas rko ba zhes su brjod// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos
390b1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' dag las// rtags kyi mtshan nyid 'di bzhi bstan// lhan cig skyes pa bad kan can// ring ba rlung can mkhris pa can// rkeng pa zlum zhing bzang mo ste// pad ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs mig/ yongs
390b2(rgyud 'grel): su rdzogs shing 'dod pa rdzogs// skye gnas mdzes pa lhan cig skyes// bud med mdog dkar pad+ma can// yid 'byung las 'byung ring bar bshad// tsho zhing gsang ba rgyas pa ni// glang ba'i reg ldan par
390b3(rgyud 'grel): kan+da can// mgo yi cha rgyas bzang mo ste// kha'i 'gram gnyis shin tu dog/ sgra li mgo bo lhag par che// gang gi mtshan ma de rlung can+da// sbal pa'i rgyab 'dra mgrin pa sra// dro ba'i rig pa yang dag ldan
390b4(rgyud 'grel): mdog sner+ya zla mtshan myur ba ni// maN+DanA ma de yod mkhris pa can// dus kyi so ra ni ri bong ste// de bzhin rgyu bu khyu mchog bcad// rta ni lo yi zla ba'i tshad// bzang po'i tshad kyi rko ba'o// rigs pa'i spyir
390b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i'ad yin// mkhas bya rnams rgyu shes par bya// bud med dag gi rigs dag dang // mtshan pas blo tshom med par shes// pad+ma can ni nor sbyin mo// drung ma dri za mo rU ba sh+yad// glung chen
390b6(rgyud 'grel): sha za ma yin te// tshogs ma ni srin mor bshad// ri bong pad+ma can gyi bdag/ khyu mchog dung ma de bzhin te// rta ni glang chen ma'i bdag/ sna tshogs ma ni rko ba'o// nor sbyin mo ni nor gyis mgu
391a1(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim spos sogs dri za mo// bza' dang bcas pas sha za mya gu/ dpa' ba gnyis kyi srin mo mgu/ rigs mA mthun pa mthun bya'i phyir// rdzas kyi sbyor ba bshad par bya// lan+da brgya bkrung /
391a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mar gyis ni// rtags ni 'bad pas bsku bar bya// me la cung zed bsros gyur na// 'dod pa'i dus su sbom par 'gyur// rtse ba bcu pa'i bcud kyis len// bau zhos thog 'o ma bsres te btung // 'dod pa'i nus pa
391a3(rgyud 'grel): med pa rnams// bzlog dka'i 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur// sbal ba'i yan lag lnga blangs nas// chu skyes dmar po'i ze 'bru bsres// phye ma b+ha ga'i nang du ni// zhag gsum bcug pas chung bar 'gyur// gang du
391a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba gnas par ni// der ni 'dod pA rta ga tu gAnas// gcig tu gyur pas mnyam pa'i bde// long sr-i spyod grol bar mkhas pas bskyod// yul dang rigs kyi bye brag nI// shes nas las kyi tshigs rnams
391a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyar// so dang sen mo gnas rnams ni// chos kyi sbyor bas shes par bya// tshes gcig la ni spyi bo ste// gnyis pa la ni rna bar bshad // gsum pa la ni sA ru ste// de bzhin bzhi pa gdong yin te// lnga pa la ni
391a6(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par gnas// drug pa la ni dpung par ro// bdun pa la ni snying gor gnas// brgyad pa de bzhin lto bar bstan// dgu pa lte bar blta ba rgya/ bcu pa ka rags 'khor bar gnas// bcu gcig pa ni gsang bar
391b1(rgyud 'grel): brtug/ bcu gnyis pa ni brla dag gnas// bcu gsum pa ni pus mo ste// bcu bzhi pa ni byin pa gnyis// gnam stong la ni rkang bol du'o// yar ngo'i zla ba gnas la ni// rim bzhin bu ni zlog par bya// 'phel dang 'grib
391b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul du nA// mkhas pas shes nas spel bar bya// smin drug dang ni smel po mgo// khro dang rta chung de bzhin te// bre dang phulu dag chos lha ni// mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya// dus min la ni mau brtsam ste// rol byed
391b3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang phrad mi bya// gal te chags pas 'jug gyur na// the tshim med par 'chi bar 'gyur// mnyam pa'i bde ba dus su ni// rol mo sna tshogs bsten par bya// bud med mchog rnams mgu bya'i phyir// dang po'i thun
391b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ston par bya// so dang sen mo gdab pa ni// bde ba'i dus su bsten par bya// bde bas myos pa'i dus su ni// sen mo la sogs khyad par gdab// nyi ma zla ba 'pho dus dang ka/ zla ba zhag gi mtshams de bzhir// 'chi
391b5(rgyud 'grel): bas 'dod pa spyad mi bya// bud med zla mtshan dus su ni// sa bon len pas spang bar sngags// skal ldan ma ya b+ha ga las// mkhas pas me tog blang byas nas// bzhos thog 'o mar bsres byas nas// bud med mo bsham
391b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la ni// byin pos bu bzang skye bar 'gyur// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar po'i rtsa// skud pa dkar pos dkri bar bya// bud med rked par gcing byas na// bde bar bu ni btsa' bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bsten chos rgyas
392a1(rgyud 'grel): pa las// bcing thabs bzhi po bshad par bya// pad+ma'i bcing thabs gnyis log dang // brlab bsdams dang ni reg pa'o// b+ha ga lA ni 'o byas nas// skye gnas lag pas ban+de bar bya// 'bad pas ling+ga bcug byas nas//
392a2(rgyud 'grel): dal bas rgyal ba brtsam par bya// rkang pa byin pas gnas byas nas// mgul nas rtag tu 'khyud par bya// sen mo yan lag 'dri byas nas// myur ba'i brgyab pa brtsam par bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i bcing thabs te// pad+ma can dang lhan cig
392a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsam// 'di ni pad+ma can dgyes pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i yon tan ster// rkang pa gcig gi mnan byis nas// rkang pa gcig khyad par du// 'bad pas rtag tu chad byas na// 'jam pa'i brgyab par rtsam par bya// byin pa gis ni phye
392a4(rgyud 'grel): bas na// rang gi byin pa'i nang du 'jug/ de nas phrag par dgal bar bya// slar yang mgul nas bzung bar bya// rtags ni 'bad pas 'jug byas nas// yang dang yang du brgyab par bya// rang gi yon tan 'byung 'gyur na// 'o mas
392a5(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum bgro byas nas// de bzhin b+ha ga bkru ba byas// dung can ma yai nu me bzung // snga ma'i 'dug stangs slar bcings nas// bsrub bcing sngags 'di brjod par bya// oM tsi la tsau la swA hA// stong bzlas pas ni dngos grub
392a6(rgyud 'grel): ste// yon tan slabs rnams skye bar 'gyur// nga ni gnyid log 'dug stangs te// dung can ma dang lhan cig bshad// brla gnyis kyi ni brlabasdams te// nu ma lag pas bzung bar bya// byin khung dri mos phye byas nas// 'bad
392b1(rgyud 'grel): pas rtags ni 'jug par bya// de ni glong mo dag gi ni// rol byed ma yi byin pa phye// ma mchu tsum pa byas nas su// de'i 'og tu brgyab par bya// 'di ni bsdams pa'i 'dug stangs te// glang chen ma la sbyar byas nas// yon tan
392b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun rnams ster bar 'gyuraro// yan lag phan tshun 'khyud byas nas// rol byed ma yi nu drog 'jig// rang gi brla stangs bzhag byas nas// rtags ni 'bad pas 'jug par bya// sa la bsdang bar byas nas ni// de 'og mgrin pa
392b3(rgyud 'grel): po g.yas pas 'khyud// lag pa g.yon pa gtso bos bzung // yang dang yang du brgyab por bya// sna tshogs ma dang lhan cig tu// rig pa'i 'dug stangs tsog bur bshad// sna tshogs me ni tsum pa nas// mgrin par 'khyud
392b4(rgyud 'grel): pas yon tAn ster// de dang chang ni btung bar bya// bcud kyis len kyang khyad par du// yang drang ying du ngal so zhing // sngo rtsi dog kyang bza' bar bya// tshig ni snyan par smra bar bya// 'bad pas rigs kyi sgra ni brjod// 'du
392b5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa yi mkhas pas ni// sna tshogs gos ni bgo bar bya// pad+ma'i dri can pad ma'i// dung ma mar gyi dri yis brtag/ glang chen ma ni rtul dris so// 'o ma'i dri yis sna tshogs brtag/ nu ma btsir
